1b1(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug grogasang
1b2(rgyud): dzad thogs pa med pa'i yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying po
1b3(rgyud): 'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
2a1(rgyud): bya bya bya/
2a2(rgyud): lpa ga 'tshal lo// 'du sang du dag gis postsa dustsas
2a3(rgyud): na mi ga nas
2a4(rgyud): de//
2a5(rgyud): da /
2a6(rgyud): po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/
2a7(rgyud): gos chags bcos nas pus
2b1(rgyud): sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la
2b2(rgyud): sprul pa du ma chen po'i tsan dan gyi snying po'i 'khor lo zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po smon cing bgyi ba thams
2b3(rgyud): ca mngon par 'grub par bgyi ba mchis te/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos bdag gis
2b4(rgyud): bshad par gnang na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems can thams cad la sman par bgyi
2b5(rgyud): ba'i slad du bshad par 'tshal lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di ni gzi byin
3a1(rgyud): #/ chen po'i mthu dang ldan pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen po dang / yid bzhin gyi ljon shing bzhin du smon pa thams
3a2(rgyud): cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
3a3(rgyud): la legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ khyod kyis snying brtse ba'i phyir sems can gyi ched du 'di ltar zhus pas na/ khyod
3a4(rgyud): thogs pa med pa'i gzungs 'di bshad par gnang bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de ltar gnang ba
3a5(rgyud): dadangad / langs nas thal mo sbyar te phyag byas slar stan la 'dug ste/ sems rtse gcig tu 'khor 'dus pa dag la rnam par bltas
3a6(rgyud): nas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sngags 'di smras so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya ka bo d+hi satwA ya/
3b1(rgyud): mahA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA yA/ tAd+ya thA/ oM tsakra pa tI ts+tshin+tA ma Ni ma hA pad+me ru ru tiSh+Tha tA/ badz+ra b+ha ra/ A ka rA ye hUM swA hA/ 'di ni lus kyi sngags so// oM bad+me/ tsan+d+ha
3b2(rgyud): ma Ni/ ma hA badz+ra b+ha ra hU~M/ 'di ni snying po'i sngags so// oM b+ha ra ta pad+me hUM// 'di ni snying gi snying po'i sngags lags so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
3b3(rgyud): dbang phyug gis yid bzhin 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang / sa chen po'ang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
3b4(rgyud): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang rnga/ mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i khang khyim rnams kyang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ bdud kyi rgyal po dang bdud kyi 'khor
3b5(rgyud): rnams kyang shin tu skyug cing 'jigs pa chen po skyes par gyurabadud kyi rgyal po'i gzhal med khang yang rab tu 'bar bar gyur/ gnod sbyin dang 'dre srin ma rungs
3b6(rgyud): pa gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyang dngang zhing skrag pas gdong bkab ste sa la 'gyel bar gyur/ sems can dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad phye nas sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnam par
3b7(rgyud): thar te lha'i bde mchog myong bar gyur to// de'i tshe lha rnams kyis kyang rin po che'i me tog dang / rin po che'i rgyan gyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char mngon par phab par gyur/ lha'i rol mo rnam kyang bar snang la sgra sna
4a1(rgyud): phyung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
4a2(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug la/ rigs kyi bu khyod sems can la brtse ba'i phyir gzungs 'di bshad pa nyid kyis sems can rnams kyis phan yon chen po thob par 'gyur ba legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod do//
4a3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ yang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sems can rnams kyi phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rgyal po chen po'i gzungs
4a4(rgyud): 'di'i cho ga shod cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/
4a5(rgyud): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gzhon nu gang la la zhig gis tshe 'di nyid la rnam par smin pa mngon du myong bar 'tshal na/ gdugs mtshan sems rtse gcig
4a6(rgyud): tu nan tan brtson 'grus kyis gzungs 'di mi bskyud par bgyis te/ gdugs dang dus mi 'dam par gtsang yang rung mi gtsang yang rung ste/ g.yar ston du bzlas par gyur na bgyi ba rnams dang ldan par 'gyur lag
4a7(rgyud): so/ ci'ang rung ste don du bgyi zhing gnyer ba zhig mchis na lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na don brgya stong du ma 'grub par 'gyur bas/ rig sngags gzhan gang yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di dang
4b1(rgyud): bskrun par bzod pa gang yang ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'das pa dang da ltar gyi las ngan pa dang sgrib pa lci ba rnams rab tu 'joms pas so// gang la la zhig gzungs 'di bzlas brjod bgyis napanar ma/
4b2(rgyud): mchis pa'i dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs dag kyang thar bar 'gyur la/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur na/ las ngan pa dang / gdon bgegs dang / zo dang /
4b3(rgyud): gzhan thams cad lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ gang dag rims na nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / nyin mtshan du bro 'tshal ba 'am/ rlung ngam
4b4(rgyud): mkhris pa 'am/ bad kan la sogs pas 'bro 'tshal ba dag la rig sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis par gyur na thams cad 'byung zhing sos par 'gyur lags so// gang zhig dug dang byang stems kyis phog par gyur
4b5(rgyud): tam/ lhog pa'am/ g.yan pa 'am/ mdzend dam/ phol mig gam/ rlung nad dam/ smyos pa 'am/ klad pa bro 'tshal ba'am/ rna ba dang / sna dang / mchu dang / dang / mid pa dang / kha dang
4b6(rgyud): gdong dang / gtsug dang / klad rgyas dang / brang dang / rtsib logs dang / snying dang / lto ba dang / rked pa dang / rgya ba dang / rkang pa dang / lag pa la sogs pa thams cad bro 'tshal bar gyur/
4b7(rgyud): na'ang thams cad sos par bgyid/ ji tsam du lus kyi bro nad ci mchis pa thams cad kyang sos par bgyid lags so// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bi na ya ka dang / bdud sdig can dang / 'dre gdon
5a1(rgyud): dag gis kyang gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so// mtshon cha dang / dmag tshogs dang / chab dang / zhugs dang / rlung dang / char pa dang / serab ma rungs pa dag gis kyang
5a2(rgyud): 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// dgra dang / chom rkun dang / rgyal po ma rungs pa dang / rkun po ma rungs pa dag gis kyang gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// glo bur du 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ rmi lam
5a3(rgyud): ngan pa rmi bar mi 'gyur/ rtsangs pa dang / sbrul dang / sdig pa dang / srin bu gyi med dang / rkang mangs dang / gcan gzan gdug pa ma rungs pa dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / sbyang ki dag gis kyang
5a4(rgyud): gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so// g.yul ngor 'thab pa'i tshe thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur lags so// gal te bla'i bgyi ba dag gis rtsod par gyur na'ang 'dum par 'gyur te/ gzungs 'di lan
5a5(rgyud): cig bzlas na gong du bstan pa de dag thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur lags so// gang la la zhig gis gdugs re gzungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan
5a6(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'jigs shig/ ci zhig smon cing ci zhig yongs su gnyer bar byed/ thams cad khyod la sbyin no zhes bsgo bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs
5a7(rgyud): pa tshe dpag med kyang sku mngon du ston par 'gyur/ mdo las gsungs pa bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bkod pa'i dngos po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi byang chub
5b1(rgyud): sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas ri po Ta la'ang mthong bar 'gyur//
5b2(rgyud): bdag nyid kyi lus kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur bas/ rtag par rgyal po dang blon po rnams kyis bkur zhing rim gro bgyid par 'gyur/ skye bo mang pos byams shing bkur bar 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du
5b3(rgyud): ma'i mngal du mi skye zhing pad+ma'i steng du skye bar 'gyur/ bkod pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par 'gyur/ 'di nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du
5b4(rgyud): nam yang ngan 'gro rnams su mi ltung zhing rtag par sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur lags te/ 'di ni sdig pa'i las thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zhes bgyi ba lags so// sdig pa tham
5b5(rgyud): cad rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ yang yid bzhin
5b6(rgyud): gyi 'khor lo'i snying po'i gzungs gsang ba'i cho ga bstan pa su'ang rung ba gces pa'i don grub pa zhig mchis na/ thams cad rang zhi bar 'gyur lags so// de'ang rnam pa gnyis te/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten
5b7(rgyud): gyi nor dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor gang lags pa'o// de la 'jig rten pa'i nor ni gser dang dngul la sogs pa'i rin po che rnams so// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor ni bsod nams dang
6a1(rgyud): ye shes kyi bkod pa rnam pa gnyis dang ldan zhing / lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang / skye bo mang pos byams shing bkur ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'i sems can thams cad
6a2(rgyud): yongs su skyob pa dang / byams pa'i sems rgyas nas blo dang ldan pa rnams bde ba stsol ba dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'phel zhing mthu stobs rtas pa gang lags pa'o// gsang ba'i mdzod kyi spyod
6a3(rgyud): yul 'di ni gzhan dag la brjod par mi bgyi'o// gang la la zhig bdag gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dngos grub mchog thob par 'tshal na/ sems rtse gcig tu dus thams cad dang /
6a4(rgyud): gnas thams cad du gtsang yang rung mi gtsang yang rung ste/ rtag par bzlas brjod bgyis na nongs pa ci'ang ma mchis pas bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshang bar bgyis nas/ gzhan yang
6a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming dang / yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi ming dang / gang zag de'i ming nas brjod de/ gal te rgyal po 'am/ rgyal
6a6(rgyud): bu 'am/ btsun mo 'am/ slas sam/ rgyal po'i bu mo 'am/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gdol pa 'am/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u
6a7(rgyud): 'am/ bu mo gzhon nu ma 'am/ mu stegs sna tshogs dag la brten cing mdza' bar 'tshal na/ de dag gi ming nas brjod de rtag par tho rangs kyi tshe bzlas pa'i grangs tshang bar bgyi'o// gal
6b1(rgyud): te dngos grub mchog gnyer zhing rgyal po la brten par 'tshal na/ dgung zhag bdun gyi bar du rtag par po rangs kyi tshel na stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na mjal bar 'gyur lags so// gal te btsun mos
6b2(rgyud): brten par 'tshal na lan dgu brgya bzla bar bgyi'o// rgyal bu la brten par 'tshal na lan brgyad brgya bza bar bgyi'o// slas dag mthong bar 'tshal na lan bdun brgya bzla bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i bu mo la
6b3(rgyud): brten par 'tshal na lan drug brgya bzla bar bgyi'o// bram ze la brten par 'tshal na lan lnga brgya bza bar bgyi'o// rgyal rigs la brten par 'tshal na lan bzhi brgya bzla bar bgyi'o// dmangs rigs la ni sum
6b4(rgyud): ban+d+ha'o// gdol ba la ni nyes brgya'o// dge sbyong dang dge slong ma la ni lan brgya'o// dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma la ni lan dgu bcu'o// khye'u gzhon nu dang bu mo gzhon nu ma la ni lan drug cu'o// 'di ni brten
6b5(rgyud): cing mdza' bar bgyi ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi ste/ nor dang / bran dang / rta dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad 'byor par bgyid lags so// gang la la zhig snying du sdug cing mdza' ba dag ring po na mchi ba dang
6b6(rgyud): mjal bar 'tshal na/ yid la bsams pa bzhin rlung bzhin du mchi bar 'gyur lags so// ci bgyi'o 'tshal bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshang bar gyur na don de dag 'grub par 'gyur lags so// gal te
6b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'tshal na lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de'i lus yang dag pa nyid mthong zhing bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par bgyid lags so//
7a1(rgyud): gal te lag na rdo rje mthong bar 'tshal na bzlas brjod lan khri bgyis na lus mngon sum du bstan nas/ de la brtse zhing phas bu la byams pa bzhin du sems kyi smon pa rnams stsol
7a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur lags so// gal te sangs rgyas dang 'khor 'dus pa mang po mthong bar 'tshal na lan khri sum stong bzlas brjod bgyis na de bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur lags so// gal te gdugs mtshan bdun
7a3(rgyud): gyi bar du rgyun chad pa ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyis na rig sngags 'chang rnams mngon sum du ston cing / so so nas rang rang gi sngags kyi mthu ci mchis pa gang de la stsal nas yongs su srung bar bgyid de/
7a4(rgyud): zhag bdun pa la ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po rnams 'khor dang bcas te mchis nas de'i smon pa rnams stsol bar bgyid do// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga
7a5(rgyud): gong du bstan pa bzhin du bgyis na smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod las/ thams cad byams shing mos par
7a6(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi ba lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod las/ thams cad byams shing mos par 'gyur ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//
7a7(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ gang gis mthong ba dag byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman sbyar nas lus la thogs
7b1(rgyud): te 'gro na mchog tu mngon par 'grub cing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub pa'i cho ga bstan pa/ gi'u wang dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / gur gum dang / ga pur dang / grAr+Ni dang / dzung bal dang /
7b2(rgyud): li shi dang / ka ko la dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pal sngon po dang / gser gyi gyim bag rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te brdungs nas sbrang rtsi dkar pos sbrus te/ snga ma'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas
7b3(rgyud): lus la bdugs sam/ gos la bdugs sam/ mig la bskus sam/ dpral ba la thig le bgyis sam/ lus la byugs na rgyal po dang / btsun mo dang / blon po rnams dang / bran rnams
7b4(rgyud): dang skyes pa dang / bud med la sogs pa byams shing dga' ba dang / lam gyi chos la bkur zhing byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lus kyi zho sha dang nor rdzas dag 'phangs pa ma mchis par gtod
7b5(rgyud): zhing rim 'gro bgyid par 'gyur te brjod kyis mi langs lags so// ji ltar nyi zla thams cad kyis mthong bar mos pa bzhin du sgrub pa'i don rnams 'byor cing 'grub par 'gyur lags so// gang la la
7b6(rgyud): zhig sman 'di thogs par gyur na kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa rnams zhu byang nas bgegs thams cad las thar par 'gyur lags so// rgyal po'i mthus nan gyis 'phrog pa dang / chab kyis ded pa dang /
7b7(rgyud): zhugs kyis tshig pa dang / mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dug dang / 'ching ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur lags so// bsam pa zag pa nas sman a ka ta sbyor ba'i cho ga/
8a1(rgyud): 'di bgyis na thams cad kyis byams shing dga' bar 'gyur lags so// sman 'dis bdugs pas bab bcol du g.yar khar stsal bar bgyi ste/ 'di ni spyan ras gzigs
8a2(rgyud): dbang phyug gis gzhan dag la byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman gyi cho ga zhes bgyi ba lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs las/
8a3(rgyud): gzhan dag la byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman a ka ta sbyar ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis
8a4(rgyud): gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman khar mur ba'i cho ga bstan pa/ ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur kum zhib mor btagra/
8a5(rgyud): te gi'u wang dang bsres na sa gong du bstan pa'i sngags rnam pa gsum re rer yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te cha ba gtsang mas sbyar nas ril bu che chung shing 'go sbyong gi 'bras bu tsam du bgyis te/
8a6(rgyud): yang sngags gong ma gsum lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas grib ma la bskams te/ gdugs dang rlung gis ma phog par bgyis nas/ ril bu re re la'ang gong ma'i sngags rnam pa gsum
8a7(rgyud): lan bdun bdun gyis btab ste/ ril bu gcig kha ra mur nas rgyal po 'am/ blon po nye phan na ma/ skye bo'i tshogs mang po dag la gtam bgyis par gyur na/ bkur sti bgyis nas nor
8b1(rgyud): dang / rin po che dag 'phangs pa ma mchis par ci dang ci 'tshal ba thams cad stsol bar 'gyur/ tshig tu smras so 'tshal thams cad kyis yid ches shing nyan par 'gyur/ bsgo gzhig mchis
8b2(rgyud): na'ang thams cad nyan cing bgying bar 'gyur lags so// khar sman mur ba'i tshe rtag par sngags bzla 'tshal te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smon pa rnams 'grub par bgyid lags so// byang/
8b3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du spos chab kyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhi chu zheng khru bzhis 'khor ba gcig bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du rtsi shing gi me tog rnam pa
8b4(rgyud): sna tshogs ci 'byor paM bkram zhing / tsan dan dkar po bsregs nas sman gyi ril bu snga ma blangs te dkyil 'khor gyi nang du bzhag nas/ rgyal mtshan bzhi gzugs shing / yol ba dang bla re dkar po zas
8b5(rgyud): tedakyil 'khor gyi steng du pad+ma dkar po bzhi'ang bris te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bgyis lags pa'i rjes la snying po'i sngags dang / snying gi snying po'i sngags lan
8b6(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bgyi'o// lus kyi sngags kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas tsan dan dkar po bsregs te me tog gtor na/ de'i tshe smon pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur la/ dkyil 'khor
8b7(rgyud): gyi nang na mchis pa'i sman blangs te lus la btags na phyogs gang du mchi'ang rung ste/ ci dang ci gnyer ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ tshig tu smras pa thams cad kyis yid ches shing nyan par 'gyur/ don
9a1(rgyud): du sgrub pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur lags so// sems rtse gcig tu ma bgyis pa ni ma gtogs te/ 'di ni yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo las/ sman bur ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi ba lags/
9a2(rgyud): so/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo las/ sman mur ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
9a3(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir skye bo mang po thams cad kyis mthong na byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i cho ga bstan pa/ sman shing ri ka ku shu dang / pad+ma le/
9a4(rgyud): brgan dang / pad+ma sngon po dang / rgya mtsho'i chab kyi dbu ba dang / nya rkun nag po'i rus pa dang / ba bla dang / ka kun ban s+ya dang / gi hang dang / gur kum dang / rgya'i gur kum dang / pi pi ling dang /
9a5(rgyud): na le sham dang / bca' sga rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te/ brdungs nas zhib mor btags te sman snga ma srang gcig mchis na/ gla rtsi dang ga pur srang phyed stsal nas zhib mor bdar te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang
9a6(rgyud): phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du sbyar ba bgyis lags pas/ snga ma'i sngags rnam pa gsum re re'ang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying brtse ba'i sems bskyed nas/ sman de
9a7(rgyud): dag byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rkang pa'i drung du gzhag par bgyi'o// de'i rjes la reg par bgyis nas 'khar ba'i thur mas blangs te mig tu stsal na mig dang klad pa bro 'tshal ba dang /
9b1(rgyud): ling tog gis bsgribs pa thams cad dang / sprin dkar dang / mchi ma 'dzag pa dang / sprin dmar dang / long nad dang / klad pa bro 'tshal ba thams cad sos par 'gyur lags so// rtag par gdugs/
9b2(rgyud): de bzhin du sman 'di mig tu stsal na mig nang thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur lags so// gdugs gnyis stsal na lus kyi bro nad thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur lags so// gdugs gsum su la na spro/
9b3(rgyud): ba'i bro nad rngam pa brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'byang bar 'gyur lags so// gdugs bzhi sA la na phyi nang gi sgrib pa thams cad kyis sgrib par mi 'gyur lags so// gdugs lnga su la na dgra dang 'thab pa na thams
9b4(rgyud): cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// gdugs drug su la na sdig pa'i las dang / nyon mongs pa dang / lci ba bzhi dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / byang stems thams cad rnam par
9b5(rgyud): 'joms shing / ngan 'gro rnams su nam yang ltung bar mi 'gyur lags so// gdugs bdun stsal na rgyal po dang / blon po chen po dang / skye bo mang po thams cad rjes su 'brang zhing bkur sti bgyis nas yid
9b6(rgyud): ches shing byams par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag gnyis kyi bar du stsal na rang dbang chen po thob par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag gsum gyi bar du stsal na rgyal po dang blon po chen po dag mdza' bar gyur ro// zhag
9b7(rgyud): bdun phrag bzhi'i bar du stsal na gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa rnams rim gro bgyid par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag lnga'i bar du stsal na lha ma yin dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po rnams
10a1(rgyud): g.yog bgyid par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag drug gi bar du stsal nanam mkha' lding dang srin po mthu chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du
10a2(rgyud): yongs su srung bar bgyid pas/ byang stems dang 'dre gdon rnams kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bdun gyi bar du stsal na lha nag po chen po dang / 'dre srin sde brgyad rnams nye bar lhags
10a3(rgyud): nas rjes su 'brang zhing g.yog bgyid par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag brgyad kyi bar du sprul na an trad nar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag dgu'i bar du stsal na gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// zhag/
10a4(rgyud): bdun phrag bcu'i bar du stsal na lha ma yin gyi khang khyim gyi sgo rang bye nas/ de na ci mchis pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ 'byung zhing 'jug pa la thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun
10a5(rgyud): phrag bcu gcig gi bar du stsal na sman zhugs ltar 'bar ba ji snyed pa thams cad mngon sum du dga' bar 'gyur bas/ tshe ring bar 'gyur 'tshal lam/ mthu chen po dang ldan par 'tshal na'ang de bzhin
10a6(rgyud): du 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu gnyis kyi bar du stsal na drang srong mang po rnams kyis rin po che'i gter rnams phye ste nye bar bstan nas yid bzhin du longs spyod par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu
10a7(rgyud): gsum gyi bar du stsal na klu'i gzhal med khang rnams sgo rang bye nas lta ba dag la thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu bzhi'i bar du stsal na 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med
10b1(rgyud): khang dag sgor ngadabye bar 'gyur bas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bco lnga'i bar du stsal na mtshan mo mun nag gi nang du'ang gdugs bzhin du gsal bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu drug na
10b2(rgyud): bar du stsal na sa'i 'og gi rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu bdun gyi bar du stsal na gling bzhi po rnams su sems can dmyal ba'i sems can ji snyed
10b3(rgyud): mchis pa'ang thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// de'i mthu'i dbang gis sdug bsngal myong ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang thar par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bco brgyad kyi bar du stsal na gang zag
10b4(rgyud): de nyi ma lta bu'i mthu thob par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu dgu'i bar du stsal na lag na rdo rje'i lus yang dag pa nyid mthong bar 'gyur bas smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do// zhag bdun phrag nyi
10b5(rgyud): shu'i bar du stsal na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen po dang ldan pa mthong bar 'gyur bas smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do// zhag bdun phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du stsal na rdzu
10b6(rgyud): 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob par 'gyur ro// gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang gi sgo rnams rang bye nas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sem
10b7(rgyud): dpa' rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// lo gcig gi bar du stsal na yongs su dag pa'i mig lnga 'thob par 'gyur lags so// gang la la zhig
11a1(rgyud): spyod pa'i chog 'di mngon par 'grub par 'tshal ba gang lags pa des bstan pa 'di la shin tu mngon par yid ches par bgyi zhing sems can la snying brtse bar bgyi ste/ the tshom ma mchis na gong /
11a2(rgyud): du bstan pa bzhin du thams cad 'grub par 'gyur lags so// gal te the tshom 'tshal bar gyur na cho ga rnams grub par dka' ste/ 'di ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga tsin dan nor bu'i 'khor lo las/ mig sman
11a3(rgyud): gyi cho ga zhes bgyi ba lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sems kyi 'khor lo las/ mig gi sman gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// de'i tshe byang chub sems
11a4(rgyud): dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir sgrub pa'i don thams cad grub par byed pa/ nyon mongs pa dang / kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa dang / las ngan pa tham/
11a5(rgyud): cad rnam par 'joms pa/ dgra thams cad 'dul ba/ bi na ya ka khro ba'i sems nye bar zhi nas skye bo mang po la gnod pa mi byed cing byams pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba/ sbyin sreg ho bkra shis kyi cho ga
11a6(rgyud): bstan pa/ dog sa brkos te zhugs thab khru gang khru bzhi pa gcig bgyis nas/ me tog man len tsa su dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / chab mar cha mnyam par bsres te/ a ka ru
11a7(rgyud): dang / tsan dan dang / shing dri can so so nas srid du sor bcu gnyis zheng du sor gcig mchis pa gtubs te thab tu bsreg par bgyi zhing / sman nyung zad cig blangs nas lan cig sngags btab ste zhugs
11b1(rgyud): kyi nang du dor ba lan stong brgyang tshang bir bgyis na/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'joms shing tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub par 'gyur lags so// zhag bdun gyi bar du rgyun chad pa ma mchis par te byan
11b2(rgyud): ga bzhin bgyis na tshe lo stong thub cing lus kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag gnyis kyi bar du cho ga bgyis na rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po chen po nye phan dang / skye bo phal pa
11b3(rgyud): rnams kyang skyabs su mchis nas bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag gsum gyi bar du cho ga bzhin du bgyis na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa dang / nyi zla'i lha
11b4(rgyud): dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa'ang nye bar lhags nas yongs su srung bar 'gyur/ lag na rdo rjes kyang dngos grub chen po stsol bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
11b5(rgyud): dbang phyug gis kyang smon pa chen po rnams yongs su skor bar 'gyur lags so// gal te yul khams su char dkon par gyur na/ yungs kar dang chab mar la sngags 'dis btab ste/ gdugs gsum
11b6(rgyud): gyi bar du zhugs kyi nang du bsregs na char pa 'bab par 'gyur/ gal te char ches te mi 'khums na thabs de'i thal ba de blangs nas sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btab ste/ gnam du gtor na char ba
11b7(rgyud): 'khums par 'gyur ro// gal te ser ba ma rungs pa babs sam/ rlung drag po glo bur du langs par gyur na'ang thal ba de blangs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ sprin mchis pa'i phyogs su
12a1(rgyud): gtor na zhi bar 'gyur lags so// sngags 'di rtag par bzlas brjod bgyis na mthu stobs mthu bo che dang 'dra bar 'gyur bas/ lus 'di spangs nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du/
12a2(rgyud): skye bar 'gyur/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du skye ba thams cad du sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa thob par 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
12a3(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tsan dan gyi snying po'i 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di bdag gis bstan pa bzhin du dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam
12a4(rgyud): dge bsnyen ma 'am/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med gar la la zhig gis lan cig 'chang bar bgyid na gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur bas the tshom gyi bsam pa bskyed par mi bgyi'o// yid la bsams pa'i don
12a5(rgyud): thams cad thob par 'gyur bas shin tu mngon par yid ches par bgyi zhing the tshom skyed par mi bgyid/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la khyod kyis snying rje
12a6(rgyud): chen pos yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi cho ga gya nom pa 'di yang dag par bshad de/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar byas pa legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod do//
12a7(rgyud): gang la la zhig gis sems bskyed de kha nas bzlas brjod byas na dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// de ltar yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod kyis ngas bstan pa bzhin du sems can rnams la yang nas yang du nan tan brtson/
12b1(rgyud): 'grus kyis rjes su bstan nas/ dngos grub thob par bya ba'i ched du lus nye bar ston la/ nga'i tshig dang 'gal bar ma byed cig dang / nga'ang rjes su yi rang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub
12b2(rgyud): sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas byams pa dang brtse ba'i sems kyis sems can la rjes su ston
12b3(rgyud): cing / rtag par yongs su bsrungs na dngos grub stsal bar lags pa ni bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mkhyen cing dbang du gyur pa lags so// sems can rnams kyi slad du yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs
12b4(rgyud): 'di bshad pa lags pas/ gang la la zhig gis len cing 'chang ba dang / rtag par bdag nyid bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshang bar bgyis na smon pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur te/ bdag ni de ltar bcom
12b5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams yongs su sgrub par bgyid pa lags so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yid
12b6(rgyud): bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang / 'khor 'dus pa chen po thams cad rab tu dga' nas mngon par yid ches pas yang dag par blangs te spyod par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
12b7(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs las/ sbyin sreg ho gyi cho ga sman sbyor ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
13a1(rgyud): dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod thogs pa med pa'i yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / zhu chen gyi mkhan po dang lo tsa ba bcom
13a2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi ring lugs pa ban d+he chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra nA ma
13a3(rgyud): d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzungs zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
13a4(rgyud): dbang phyug byams pa'i ngang las snying rje'i shugs kyis byang chub kyi sems rab tu bskyed nas/ pad+ma dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba'i gdan la hri'i 'phro 'du las zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ dang po
13a5(rgyud): gnyis thal mo sbyar ba/ g.yas 'og ma na bgrang 'phreng mu tig dkar po/ g.yon 'og ma na pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa/ sku mdog dkar po/ zhabs rdzogs pa'i skyil krung bcas pa/ rin po che'i rgyan
13a6(rgyud): sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyis mdzes pa/ ma lha mo drug ma dang / yab nor bu rin po ches brten pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang sems ma rab tu mang pos bskor te 'di skad ces gsungs so//
13a7(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos sngags 'di lan cig tsam brjod dam/ dran zhing yid la byas sam/ bris nas lus la bcangs sam/ mos shing gus par byas na mtshams med pa lnga dang / de
13b1(rgyud): dang nye ba'i sdig pa'i las thams cad byang zhing / ngan song gsum dang / mi khom pa brgyad dang / sdug bsngal dang bcas par mi skye'o// mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / gcan gzan gyi 'jigs pa thams cad
13b2(rgyud): las grol bar 'gyur ro// nad dang gdon thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/ zhes brjod pas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur zhing / tshe 'phos nas
13b3(rgyud): kyang bde ba can du skye ste/ 'di la the tshom mam/ som nyi 'am/ yid gnyis ma pa zhig/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzungs rdzogs so//
13b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal
13b5(rgyud): lo de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'di brjod kyis/ rig pa 'di bdag la grub par gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ ha ha ha sa ne/ ni paM sa ne/ ta pa ta pa ne/ dz+wa la dz+wa la ne/ tsa la tsa la ne
13b6(rgyud): pUrba yog sma ra pad+ma hastA ya swA hA/ gang gis rig pa 'di bklags pa de tshe rabs brgya stong du skye ba dran par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro//
13b7(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ pad+ma mu ku Ta tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ pad+ma cod pan zhes bya ba'i rgyud
14a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i gzhal med khang na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
14a2(rgyud): skur sangs rgyas nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i sgo kun 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
14a3(rgyud): par zhugs te/ 'od zer gyis rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mtsho'i zhing gi rdul la reg pas/ reg ma thag tu bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis la mchod nas/ 'od zer de bcom
14a4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du nub bo// nub ma thag tu thugs rje chen po phyag stong spyan stong dang ldan pa/ sku mdog gangs kyi rtse la nyi ma shar ba ltar dkar ba/ zhal bcu gcig gi rtsa ba'i zhal
14a5(rgyud): dkar po/ steng gi zhal dbus ser ba/ g.yas ljang khu/ g.yon dmar ba/ steng gi gsum nag po/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu ni byu ru bcag pa lta bur gyur te 'dzum pa mdzad nas thug
14a6(rgyud): rje chen po'i bdag po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la gzigs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan
14a7(rgyud): 'das la gsol pa/ sku dang sngags dang las rnams dang // khyad par cho ga bstan par bgyis// zhes gsol ba btab nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
14b1(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas bka' stsal pa/ sku ni rnam pa 'di lta ste// thugs rje dag pas chu shel te// mnyam par bzhengs pas 'gro don mdzad// chu shel mdog 'dra
14b2(rgyud): zhal gsum dkar// ljang 'u'i mdog can nag po che// ser po de bzhin bcom ldan dmar// drang srong dag tu ri dgas brgyan// zhi ba 'dzum dang bzhad pa dang // khros pa'i zhal mnga' spyan gsum
14b3(rgyud): mdzes// bcu pa sems dpa'i chags can te// bcu gcig bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag/ yon tan nor bu mu tig 'phreng // 'phrin las sna tshogs smad dkris pa// dang po'i phyag ni thal sbyar te/
14b4(rgyud): g.yas pa rin chen 'phreng ba 'dzin// g.yon pa dri med pad+ma 'dzin// g.yas pa mchog sbyin mdzad pa'o// g.yon pa ril ba spyi blugs te// g.yas pa 'khor lo rab tu 'dzi ni// g.yon pa na ni
14b5(rgyud): mda' gzhu ste// lhag ma mchog sbyin spyan ldan no// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad de cod pan gnyis nas rin po che rab tu 'phro ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas thams
14b6(rgyud): cad kyi byin gyi rlabs las byung ba'i pad+ma'i steng du rigs lnga 'byung ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par snang mdzad dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub pa dang
14b7(rgyud): mi bskyod pa'o// khang bu brtsegs pa'i rin po che de'i nang du seng ge dang / rta dang / rma bya dang / nam mkha' lding dang / glang po che'o// de dag ni cod pan las byung ba'o// yang yum gyi sku mdog sngon
15a1(rgyud): mo ste/ pad+ma las byung pad+ma'i steng // tshad med bzhi ste phyag bzhis mdzes// sems dpa'i rgyan dang ldan pa yi// mnyam pa yi ni skyil krung bcas// yab ni sku mdog ser
15a2(rgyud): bo ste// pad+ma las byung pad+ma'i steng // thal sbyar nor bu bgrang 'phreng 'dzin// rgyan rnams yongs su 'dzin pa'o// yang ni 'od zer rab bkye ste// zla ba nyi ma las byung ba'i// nyi ma'i mdog can nyi ma
15a3(rgyud): ni gzhon nu ut+pal mchog sbyin mdzad// zla ba las skyes nam mkha'i mdog/ cung zad khros pas rdo rje can// dkar po gangs ltar dkar ba ste// nyi zla'i steng na pad+ma 'dzin// drag po gnyis
15a4(rgyud): dang hrI yig las// gnyis med tshul gyis 'bras bu rdzogs// ha ya grI bas khams gsum sdud// khro gnyer can gyis 'phrin las mdzad// gshin rje'i gshed po gter 'dzin cing // khams
15a5(rgyud): gsum rnam rgyal bdud sde 'joms// 'khor lo dkar po dag pa'i steng // gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas// dang po dkon mchog rab dad cing // tshad med bzhi ni yongs su rdzogs// byang chub
15a6(rgyud): yan lag rdzogs pa dang // chos kyi dang canan gro ci ngo do// skye gni dang mu bsnyen pa'i yin sa da pa'o// de nas gas sngags bstan pa'i byor bcom ldan 'das /
15a7(rgyud): rnam par snang mdza gang chen mtsho'i ning 'ams thams cad du 'od brgyan sa gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas yang gsungs pa/ oM rmAHhA hrI maHna mo rat+na tra ya sa/ na ma ad+ya d+he na sA mar ze
15b1(rgyud): nA sa/ prA pa rA dzA ma?/ ta thA ga tA ya/ an te/ samyags brgyus/ namaHsarba ta thAg te b+ho/ and b+ha/ sam+b+haka sa budz+ra b+h+yo/ nam A sa pa mo ka tI shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi sa twa la/ ma hA satwA ya/ mahA k+ShaR+Sha/
15b2(rgyud): Ni kA ya/ tid+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+ha ru/ i bin+de ban+deHtsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su ma ba re/ i l-i mi li/ tsai ti dz+wa la ma pa na ya swA hA/ sngags 'ad rnams kha na
15b3(rgyud): byed pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos lan cig brjod dam/ dran zhing yid la byas sam/ lus la bcangs na mtshams med pa lnga dang / de dang nye ba'i las 'byung zhing sems can dmyal ba dang
15b4(rgyud): yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su mi skye zhing / mi khom pa brgyad du sdug bsngal dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro// gcan gzan dang / srin po dang / mi ma yin pa dang / nad dang / 'jigs pa
15b5(rgyud): thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// oM rak+Sha rak+Sha/ zhes pas kyang bsrung bar bya'o// oM a kAro mu kha~M sar+b+ba d+harmA NAM/ A d+ya nuta pan+na tAta/ ces pas gtor ma'i chus yi dgas la mchod par bya'o//
15b6(rgyud): oM AHhUM/ zhes pas so// de rnams srung ba'i sngags so// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/ zhes pas so// 'dis ni rigs gsum gyi bdag por 'gyur te/ phan yon ni 'di'o// chos kyi sku dang gzugs kyi
15b7(rgyud): sru drugs rje chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro// yon maHsa ca thA ga ta pe pA ji ma sras sungs rajam ma me hUM/ yon mas ma ta phrag ta pu ni bu 'im rgyas sun slar nyam ma me hU~M/ yon mngasacata
16a1(rgyud): thA ga ta A lo ke pA dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM nA maHsarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+he pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye n+tu/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ne wi d+h+ye pA dza ma g+ha sa mu drasa?/
16a2(rgyud): raN sa ma ye hUM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta shapA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta maN+Dal pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas mchod pas yang dag mchod// stong nyid ye shes las/
16a3(rgyud): byung ba'i// thabs dang shes rab gnyis ldan pa'i// hrIHyig dkar po yang dag ldan// sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / las dang cho ga bstan pa'i phyir// dang po zhi ba'i las bsgrubs nas// yid du 'ong
16a4(rgyud): ba'i gnas dag tu// dkar po dag pa gsal dus su// dri zhim chu yis legs byugs te// me tog dkar po dgram byas nas// khrus dang kha zas phyogs 'thun pa'i// bde ba'i stan la nyer
16a5(rgyud): 'dug ste// bum pa dkar po tsan dan dkar// dris bkang gos kyis legs par bkri// maN+Dal dbus su legs par gzhag/ hrI las byung ba'i sems dpa'i sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku
16a6(rgyud): mngog dkar// rngan rnams rdzogs pa bad+ma bsnams// zla ba'i gangan la legs pazhugs pa// hrI las 'od byer slob bsgom// phug slong stan yang de bzhin te// rgyam pa'i slani mdun pasams nas/
16a7(rgyud): hrI ai 'gro 'dugs la ba ni// bzlas pa rab tu gsal bste// gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya'o// na mo rat+na tri yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na~M sA ga ra bai ro tsa nA ya mU sa rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga dA sa
16b1(rgyud): nas sa \u0f7f/ sa [à¤½]/ rmAH/ nams sa ma/ bar+d+has d+hAs/ d+hA / oM yA/
16b2(rgyud): cho chu hA/ zhes bzlas pa bya'o// dz+riM/ rnam par snang mdzad bum pa'i rje// gang dag legs par khrus byed pa// dri ma thams cad mings dug nas// 'bras bu bde ba bde thob 'gyur/
16b3(rgyud): 'jigs pa kun las rnam grol nas// myur du chu skyes mthong bar 'gyur// de nas rgyas pa sgrub 'dod na// nags tshal shin tu mtho bar ni// dri zhim chu yis legs byugs la// 'bras bur
16b4(rgyud): bcas pa'i me tog dgram// rgyun rnams yongs su btags nas ni// bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste// rin chen sna lnga 'bru sna lnga// rin chen ga'ur blugs par bya// maN+Dal dbus su leg
16b5(rgyud): par gzhag/ hrIHlas byung ba'i sems dpa'i sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser// rgyan rnams rdzogs pa pad+ma bsnams// phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te// rgyas pa'i sku ni mdun
16b6(rgyud): bsams nas// mchod pa lnga yis yang dag mchod// hrIHyi 'phro 'dugasal bar bzlas// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra/ bai ro tsa nA ya/ pU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ aH
16b7(rgyud): te/ sa muka so bud+d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ ar+had b+h+yaHsa myaka saM bud+d+ha b+h+yo/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ka te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi sitwA ye/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ rat+na ku ne puSh+Ta~M ku ru
17a1(rgyud): swA hA/ bang mdzod stong pa'i thog bzhag na// 'bru yis yongs su khengs par 'gyur// de nas dbang gi las byed na// sdud par byed na chu klung 'gram// ba la sha dang a shrat+tha/
17a2(rgyud): me tog dmar po'i ril bu byas// bse gab dmar po'i nang du bdug/ me tog dmar pos rab tu mchod// hrIHyig las byung sgron ma'i sku// ljang khu phyag na lcags kyu 'dzin// phyag stong spyan yang
17a3(rgyud): de bzhin te// rgyas pa'i sku ni mdun bsams nas// mchod pa lnga yis mchod byas te// hrIHyi 'phro 'du gsal bar bzlas// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra/ bai ro tsa nA ya/
17a4(rgyud): byA ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samya ka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ ar+ha dra b+h+yaHsamya ka saM bud+d+ha b+h+yo/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sAtwA ya/
17a5(rgyud): ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ a mo g+ha b+ha smai ku ru/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a mo g+ha b+ha smai ku ru swA hA/ rdzas kyi lde gus lus byugs ni// byugs pa de yis khugs par 'gyur// de nas 'phrin las
17a6(rgyud): byed 'dod na// dur khrod shing gcig dag tu ni// ba yi lci bas legs byugs nas// me tog sngon po nim pa yi// spos kyi tshom bu lnga steng dgram// byang du 'dug ste las 'di brtsam//
17a7(rgyud): gcan gzan phreng du du shes te// hrIHl-i yi ge las byung ba'i// mdog dkar ral pa'i thor tshugs can// zhal gcig sman ni gsum pa ste// mi dgas pags pa 'dzin pa'o// drang srong
17b1(rgyud): khros pa'i cha byung can// phyag bzhi dang po mchog sbyin pa// g.yon na pad steng ral gri can// g.yas pa ltos 'gros brgyan pa'i mdung // rtse gsum dkar pos brgyan pa'o// g.yon mthong ba dkar/
17b2(rgyud): po ste// dri zhim me tog dag gis bkang // rgyal po chen po rol pa ltar// cung zhig zur gyis gzigs pa'o// phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin stong // bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas te// pad+ma'i
17b3(rgyud): 'dab mar legs zhugs pa'i// rgyas pa'i sku ni legs bsams nas// hrIHyi 'phro 'du las byung ba'i// gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas par bya// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dzA na sA ga ra
17b4(rgyud): bai ro tsa nA ya/ byA ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ sa myaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ ar+had b+h+yaHsa myaka saM bud+d+ha b+h+yo/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA
17b5(rgyud): satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM ka te ni ka te/ ka ta ka ti ka ro ta ka rI ta bIr+ye swAhA/ oM kar+m+ma a mo g+ha badz+ri siM ha nA~M dwe hUM phaT/ dri'am byug pa dag la ni// bta ba laM lus la
17b6(rgyud): drug par bya// mi tig sngon po mgo la gnag/ man+tas chu yis lus la byugs// nyi shu rtsa lnga bzlas pas ni// las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de nas bzhi ka smrab 'ang
17b7(rgyud): bkra shis dus su rdzogs dus su// ri bo yid 'ong gnas dag tu// sa gzhi chag chag legs btab ste// maN+Dal legs byas me tog no// dri zhimi dkar pos yongs gtor te/
18a1(rgyud): gtsang zhing dam pa'i rdzas rnams dgram// gtsang ma bram ze byas te gzhag/ khrus dang ku sha'i steng gnas te// hrIHlas byung ba'i chu skyes steng // chu skyes mdog 'dra zhal
18a2(rgyud): gsum yang // 'dzum zhing zhi ba'i cha byad can// ljang khu gzhad pa zhal gsum pa// nag po khros pa dmar ser sgra// ser po'i zhal nas 'dzum pa ste// dmar po bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu// ri dgra
18a3(rgyud): lpags pas stod g.yogs can// sna tshogs sham thabs bsnams pa ste// zhabs gnyis mnyam por bzhengs pa las// g.yas g.yon dang po thal mo sbyar// bar ma bgrang 'phreng pad+ma bsnam//
18a4(rgyud): tha ma mchog sbyin spyi blugs 'dzin// bum pa rnam snang lha mo ni// la se mA le girti ste// nirti nang gi lha mo'i bdag/ zla ba'i gdan la legs par bzhugs// hrIHyi yi ge las byung ba'i// gsang
18a5(rgyud): sngags rgyal po bzlas par bya// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nam Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga re/ bai ro tsi nA ya/ b+hU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ ar+tha te/ samyaka sa~M bud+d+ha la/ na maHsarba tA thA ga te b+h+yo/ ar+hadaH
18a6(rgyud): saMm+bak+Sha sa bud+d+ha dz+nyA/ ram Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwe rA ye/ bo d+hi satwa ye/ ma hA satwa ya/ mahA kA ru Ni kA la/ tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ra d+hi ri/ d+ha ru d+hu ru/ i baT+Ti Ti ban+d+hi Ti/ tsa le tsa le/ prats+tsha le/
18a7(rgyud): tha tsal/ kr-i sum bu sum bai re/ oM ma mo li tsa ti/ dz+wa lam pa na ya swA hA/ bum pa'i tshul legs bsgrubs nas// lus la thugs na 'grub par 'gyur// tshog gsang sngags grub pa'i
18b1(rgyud): legs da/ de nas rnabs rgya ma pan// zlog sa su sbyi ldan sa// rnam mas rgyas pa'o// smo rnal 'dod / na /
18b2(rgyud): te lnga pa yi ni lnga pa ste// shar du de yang bri bar bya// bzhi pa'i lnga pas dbus su mtshan// lho ru de ni yang dag dgod// lnga pa'i dang po bzhi pa'i gsum// nub tu de ni yang dag dgod// lnga pa min
18b3(rgyud): lnga pa la// e yi rnam par sbyar ba ste// byang du de ni yang dag dgod// dbus su thugs kyis bon te// shAn+tiM ku ru mtshams su'o// swAhU dbus su dgod par bya// de ltar 'khor lo gsal bkod na/
18b4(rgyud): dngul lam dkar po'i ga'ur gzhug/ thams cad las kun zhi bar 'gyur// yung ba'i chu yis legs par bri// puSh+TiM ku ru mtshams su'o// kham phor ser po legs par gzhug/ rgyas pa'i las
18b5(rgyud): rnams 'grub par 'gyur// pa la sha yis legs par bris// ba sha~M ku ru mtshams su dgod// kham phor dmar por legs par gzhug/ dbang gi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// nim pa'i
18b6(rgyud): chu yis legs par bri// mA ra ya ni mtshams su dgod// lcags sam thod par yang dag gzhug/ 'phrin las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// tsan dan dkar po dri zhim zhing // zhi bas de ni me la
18b7(rgyud): sreg/ 'bras bu dmar por bcas pa'i shing // rgyas pas de ni me la'o// dbang ni pa la sha yi shing // de la bsregs na khugs par 'gyur// nim pa'i shing la tshar gcad pa'i// bsregs
19a1(rgyud): pas 'phrin las 'grub par 'gyur// 'khor lo'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas las kyi rim pa ni// dur ba'i rtsa dang 'bras kyi 'dag/ til
19a2(rgyud): dang yungs kar tsi tse la// gsang sngags bzlas na grub pa ni// da li'i shing la legs bsregs nas// thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// ku sha star bu shug 'brum dang // stag pa'i me tog
19a3(rgyud): dmar po la// gsang sngags bzlas par rab byas te// tsan dan shing la legs bsregs nas// rgyas par bya ba'i las 'grub cing // nus pa'i mchog ni thob par 'gyur// pA la sha
19a4(rgyud): shing dag dang // khre dang ci tse mon sran la// gsang sngags bzlas pa rab byas te// pad+ma ka yi shing la bsregs// nus pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur// thams cad dbang du 'dus par 'gyur//
19a5(rgyud): gro dang so ba 'bras dang ni// bre bo mon sran til nag po// gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas te// kha tir yi shing la bsregs// rus pa ldan te las rnams ni// mur ba nyid du 'grub par/
19a6(rgyud): bram mtsham shing dgas// lom 'bras bur bcas pa dang // dzAr+t+r-i 'i shing la sngags bzlas nas// mya ngan 'chang na shing la bsregs// nus pa thab nas mA d+ha na// mi rnams thams
19a7(rgyud): dmang chub / ma pa rje bdang// yum rjem zhing dgas// gas sngags rab tu batha~Ms byas nas// ma ru ma shing sa migs// rim mi las tu rdzun pa'os/
19b1(rgyud): ma byas pa gyu/ ma la / rgyu nas rgya sa ma gas su/
19b2(rgyud): 'dus namam/ yum dbang pa dbang du 'gyur// cher byas brgya na pa'i das// mtshan gyis bstan pa'i sa pa // gsang lags ga tu bzlas byas sa// steng pa ma
19b3(rgyud): bsregs te// lcags kyu'i 'og tu rab bcug na// glang po dbang du 'gyur bar byed// ba le ta dang te l-i sha/ kha tir dang d+ha ti ma// dur khrod shing la rab bsregs na// stag la sogs padang
19b4(rgyud): du 'du// nas dang 'bras dang so ba dang // sman dang rin chen sna tshogs dang // maN+Dal zlum po legs byas te// rgyan rnams rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// pad+ma chu shel las skyes pa'i/
19b5(rgyud): chu shes mdog dang 'dzum dang bcas// rdo rje skyil mo dkrung bcas bzhugs// ku sha'i stan la shar du 'dug/ pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcas pa yis// byams pa'i sems kyis dbul bar bya'o//
19b6(rgyud): nad dang rims dang 'brum bu dang // shu ba g.yan pa me dpal dang // nad dang gdon dang thams cad zlog/ mtshams med lnga dang mi dge lta// 'bras bu sdug bsngal thams cad zlog/ me'i las
19b7(rgyud): kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas rgyal pos 'jigs pa yi// maHla dkar po legs byas la// tsan dan dkar po'i dris bsgos te// mchod yon me tog bkang ba dang //
20a1(rgyud): rgyal ma tshung pa s+ho// rgyal thos thugs / sa ga shA
20a2(rgyud): glan la// rgyal po dag gi gzugs byas te// yig 'brus yis btab pa yis// tshon sna lnga la su rab tu bcing // byams pa'i sems kyis rba ba~Ml// bad+ma na rgyam po'i tshams rna
20a3(rgyud): oM trA dz+dza hrIHa sho na ha ri mA ka to/ sa ra sa ra kar kar swA hA/ gcan gzan 'jigs pa'ong ba'i tshe// maN+Dal dkar po legs byas la// me tog dkar pos rab tu gtor// mchod pa lnga
20a4(rgyud): yis rgyal po mchod// sdig bshags myur du skyabs su 'gro// 'bru sna lnga dang rin chen lnga// tshon sna lnga yi phur ma las// byas pa lus la btags pa la// gcan gzan su 'jigs
20a5(rgyud): thams cad las// myur ba nyid du grol bar 'gyur// chom rkun dag gis 'jigs pa la// rdo rje sngon po rdo rje can// mthong nags gnon phyag rgya can// mchod nas bdag nyid skyabs
20a6(rgyud): su 'gro// oM ak+Sho b+h+yaHta ka ka ra Na ga ra kha ti pa/ swa d+hi tsa kri ta ya/ ri ka tse tsa tra ti na du dan+ta sa ra sa ra ka ra kA ra swA hA/ sbrul gyi gdugs pas 'jigs pa la// bal po se'u'i lcug ma
20a7(rgyud): la bram ze'i gzugs kyi rgyan bsgoms nas// rin chen 'byung ldan skur bsgoms te// spyi bor mu tig byu ru dang // me shel pad+ma rA ga dang // in+d+ra nI la dung g.yas 'khyil/
20b1(rgyud): gser dang dngus dang drar ba dang // rin chen rgyan dang 'bru sbyar bcas// sa sha gra rtsi can dran dang // bal la skyer ba srut+pal// gur bum dri nim lus thugs la// sor d+ha sa d+ha/
20b2(rgyud): sa te big sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra swA hA/ lce 'bab pa yi 'jigs pa la// sag dang 'brug gi rus pa la// 'a'ar ba'i khyi ma lcags phyi dang // zangs pa rigan phye ma dang // gso
20b3(rgyud): gyi bye ma tho bar gtum// snang ba mtha' yas skur bsgoms te// byams pas phyogs mtshams kun tu bstan// dug rnams sna tshogs drung pas bdugs// oM s+yamr-i ta badz+ra
20b4(rgyud): dz+wa la badz+ra dz+wa la/ gardza gardza/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra swA hA/ me ya~M 'jigs pa dag la ni// 'brug rus sen da wa sha dang // til dang sA lu tsi tsi dang // nas dang gro dang rkun
20b5(rgyud): 'brum gyi// zang brom dag la sngags btab ste// me yi phyogs su gtor bar bya// oM be ro tsa na pra b+hA/ dz+wa la dz+wa la sa ra sa ra kA ra ka ra swA hA/ rnam par snang mdzad skur bsgoms
20b6(rgyud): la me la gtor na sa yis gsod// chu bo dag gis 'jigs pa la// mdze can pho mo'i thod pa yi// ra dang khyi dang phag gi khrag/ sa bdag sde brgyad gzugs dang bcas/
20b7(rgyud): nang du bcug ste chu bor dor// don yod grub pa'i sku ru gsal// oM a mo g+ha sid d+hi/ oM ka bai tA ra Ni sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra swA hA/ phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te// thugs rje chen po'i kha
21a1(rgyud): dog ni/ ma so gsal nang bsgom par bya// byams pa kun la rab tu bas// 'jigs pa kun las grol bar 'gyur// 'jigs pa kun srung ba'i mi
21a2(rgyud): ba'o// / sku gdung me tog dkar pos mchod// sa gni dri yis chag chug btag/ snying po gzungs dang bcas pa'am// khrug tshad kyi mdzod rten la// legs
21a3(rgyud): bar bstod cing mchod par bgyi// stong nyid ye shes las byung ba'i// thugs rje'i gzugs kyi rten du shar// rdzu 'phrul tshad med pazhi dang ldan// byang chub phyogs ni yongs su rdzogs/
21a4(rgyud): med dung 'dra dkar po ste// rgyal chen bzhi yang de bzhin no// byang chub chen po'i mchod rten ni// khri 'phang bcu gsum tog dang ldan// lha yi rol mo char du 'bab// chos sgra rgyun mi 'chang
21a5(rgyud): pa'i gter// rin chen lnga yi bdag nyid de// phur bus gdab cing yongs su gzung // sangs rgyas kun gyi byin rlabs che// de yi bsod nams rab bstan pa// mtshams med lnga dang mi dge
21a6(rgyud): bcu// nyon mongs dbang gyur sdig pa rnams// skad cig tsam gyis dag par 'gyur// shin tu gtsang ba'i gnas dag ni// byams ldan snying rje can gyis byas// bram ze'i rigs las byung
21a7(rgyud): ba yi// 'dri mkhan snying rje can gyis byas// rang bsam rnam par dag pa yi// mdun du bdar te mchod par bya// tshad dang kha dog yongs gsal ba// yid du 'ong ba dag la'o// zas dang
21b1(rgyud): yid du 'ong ba yi// dkar gsum spags pa spangs pa yi// sha dang sgog pa la phug dang // zan dang chang ni shin tu spangs// shel 'phreng pad+ma'i snying po dang // bo d+hi tsi dang mu tig shis// g.yal
21b2(rgyud): dang sbring pa mi tshig gis// nam yang mchod par mi bya'o// yo byad dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / las rnams sna tshogs sgrub byed pa// po ti'am lugs ma/
21b3(rgyud): ras ris la// brten nas bdag ni byams sems ldan// mu~M la s+ya 'phags pa 'jam dpal ni// dmar ser ut+pal po ti 'dzin// mnyam pa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// bum pa
21b4(rgyud): dog ser po ni// rin chen lnga dang 'bru snang bcas// tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ iT+Te ban+d+ha/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su ma ku su me/ mnad re/ i maM
21b5(rgyud): mi ma/ tsitAt+pa la ma pa na sa sAt+ma/ lan bdun yongs su bzlas byas na// gti mug thams cid zhi bar 'gyur// shes rab chen po thob par 'gyur// ras rim mchod rten la brten nas/
21b6(rgyud): sa/ sa sa da /
21b7(rgyud): / la kya pa bral zhi / ma / sems pa tshu mi rung ma @#/
22a1(rgyud): in+d+ra baT+Te/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su me man da re/ i li mi li/ tsi ti dz+wa la ma pa na ya swA hA/ ril bu dag la sngags btab ste// byams pa'i sems/
22a2(rgyud): dang ldan pas bza'// srid pa'i 'dod chags zhi gyur nas// rab tu bde ba thob par 'gyur// maN+Dal sngon po legs byas nas// ut+pal sngon po nim pa dang // a ka ru dang tsan dan dang // dri yi//
22a3(rgyud): chu yis bum pa dgang // phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can// sku mdog ljang sngon cung zhig khro// rdo rje dril bu phyag na bsnams// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/
22a4(rgyud): d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ in+d+ra ban+d+he/ tsa li tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su me man da re/ i li mi li/ nr-i te dz+wa la ma pa na ya swA hA/ hUM bskyed phyag na rdo rje ni// bum pa'i chu
22a5(rgyud): yis khrus byas nas// zhe sdang rab tu zhi nas ni// bzod pa chen po thob par 'gyur// dug rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / ras sam grog shing shun
22a6(rgyud): la 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha zhes pa'o// srung ba lus la gdags byas na// nad dang gdon dang rims dang ni// 'dzi
22a7(rgyud): ba'i nang dang gdon las thar// bde ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// srung ba dag ni dkar po la// mdung pa dag ni rab byas te// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam// brgya rtsa brgyad ni legs
22b1(rgyud): smra sa /
22b2(rgyud): ma ni par gdags par bya// can nganam ci bu ma dang // sAm+b+hal nag po bamigs pa'i bya// ba ma 'oms len \u0f7f// gnas gsum dag tu thugs pas ni// gdon dang dang kyis lag
22b3(rgyud): las// thugs pas don srung bar 'gyur// srung ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste dag pa'o// ser pa yongs su spyang nga ni// seng ldeng ljang ti'i thur bul// gzungs snyag sa
22b4(rgyud): bzlas pa dbus su ni// hUM las byung ba'i sku bskyed do// phyogs bzhir khro bo chen pon// shar du khams gsum rnam rgyal ni// sku mdog dkar po me dpung 'bar// rdo rje 'khor lo sngags mdzub
22b5(rgyud): mdzad// oM pradz+nyAn+ta krita ha na ha na hUM phaT/ lho ru gshin rje gshed po ni// dmar po lag na be con 'dzin// oM ya mAn+ta krita tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ nub tu rta mgrin dmar po ni// me dpung rdo rje dbyug pa
22b6(rgyud): 'dzin// oM ha ya grI ba hu lu hU lu hUM phaT/ byang du khro gnyer can sku ni// ljang sngon ral gri 'dzin pa ste// oM a mo g+hu ka b+hI ku ti ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ phyogs bzhir phur bu dag la ni// bdun nam ti
22b7(rgyud): shu rtsa gcig bzlas// gcan gzan dri ma yungs kar bsres// gsang sngags bzlas shing mkha' la gtor// oM badz+ra kro d+ha hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ ser ba/
23a1(rgyud): srung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer rab tu bkye ste/ phyag stong dang spyan stong las 'od zer 'byung ba 'di lta
23a2(rgyud): stedakar po dang / dmar po dang / nag po dang / ljang khu dang / ser po ste/ 'od zer de dag gis 'gro ba ris drug po de dag thams cad la khyab ste dbugs dbyung ba mdzad do// de nas rgyal
23a3(rgyud): chen bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tsha
23a4(rgyud): ba mdun na 'don dang / tshangs pa chen po dang / 'od chen dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nam
23a5(rgyud): skyes dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min la sogs pa'i lha de dag gis mchod pa'i sprin gyi char phab
23a6(rgyud): nas/ lha'i bus tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje'i sku// phyag stong nyon mongs grol ba'i phyag/ spyan stong shes rab 'od gsal te// 'gro don mdzad/
23a7(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i sku de mi snang bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub par gyur to// de nas lha'i bus gsol pa/
23b1(rgyud): 'dril pa na lon ci zhes nus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig rgyud 'di mid byed na// nang dang rims dang gdon dang ni// rgyal po gcan ga zan 'jigs pa dang /
23b2(rgyud): 'jigs pa kun las grol bar 'gyur// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // mtshams med sdig pa mi dge kun// rab tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur// dmyal ba ngan song sdug bsngal dang /
23b3(rgyud): mi 'om brgyad las rnam grol te// nyan dang 'chad dang sgom par 'gyur// dri med nam mkha'i dkyil lta bur// bcom ldan 'das kyang mthong bar 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal nas/ byang chub
23b4(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs nas/ legs so legs so zhes bya ba
23b5(rgyud): gsungs nas stan la 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag lnga stong dang / lha dang / mi dang / lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
23b6(rgyud): bal mngon par bstod do// pad+ma cong pan zhes bya ba'i rgyud le'u bcu gcig pa rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta d+harma thi mi t+pa dang / mo tsa ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing rdzas
23b7(rgyud): cigatan ma bab pal/ rgyagar skad du/ mo ga shwa ka lA/ bong skang du/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa/ bcom ldan 'das
24a1(rgyud): bsnyun ras gtsigs dbang thugs phyag 'tshal pa// sangs rgyas sa myug 'dum la// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dudus thug 'o// 'dzi ma/
24a2(rgyud): rtog pa na// mdor bsdus 'dir ni brjod byaste// sangs rgyas thams cad tan rten po// 'dod pa'i don can rabasar ba// dang por zhig rig pa 'dzin pas gcu ning dbyed pa'is byon
24a3(rgyud): su hUM gis dag par byas pas nye bar 'jug cing pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ oM shAn+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kots+tshadz+dza/ zhes brjod la/ thams cad stong pa'i rnam par bsam par bya'o//
24a4(rgyud): de'i rjes la/ oM tsit+ta pra ti bo d+haM ka ro mi/ de ltar brjod la/ sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad par bsgom nas/ pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya'o// zla ba'i steng du prI'i sngags
24a5(rgyud): gyur pa las bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug tu bsgom par bya ste/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ mdog dmar ba/ mtshan du ni gos dkar mo/ de la 'khyud pa/
24a6(rgyud): pad+ma dmar po kha 'byed cing gar gyi tshul can/ khab kyi phyag rgyas kha 'byed par bsgoms la/ 'di brjod par bya ste/ ji ltar pad+ma dmar po ni// 'dod chags skyon gyis mi gos shing // de bzhin sna
24a7(rgyud): tshogs bag chags skyon// khams gsum rnam par dag pa'o// dbu rgyan la 'od dpag tu med pa bsgom par bya'o// de nas 'di brjod par bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ kA ya bA k+tsit+ta badz+ras
24b1(rgyud): b+hA ba At+ma ko&ha~M/ de ltar bsgoms nas phyogs brgyad du lha mo rnams bsam mo// oM bi lo ka na~M/ a ba lo ki ni/ a ba lo ka ya swA hA/ shar gyi 'dab ma la ni rnam par gzigs ma zhes bya ba'i rgyu/
24b2(rgyud): mo pad+ma dmar po bsnams pa'o// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ lho'i pad+ma la bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma pa la sha'i 'dab ma lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams pa'o// oM b+hu ri Ni ma hA tsakra brti ni hUM/ nub kyi
24b3(rgyud): 'dab ma la b+hu ri Ni zhes bya ba'i lha mo ut+pal sngon po lte bu'i pad+ma bsnams pa'o// oM b+h+r-i ku TI tA re tu ta ma ta hUM/ byang gi 'ang bya ma la khro gnyer can zhes bya ba'i lha mo pad+ma ser po bsnams
24b4(rgyud): ba'o// oM ma hA shri ye ma Ni pad+me hUM/ 'di ni pad+ma'i gos can shar phyogs kyi mtsham su btsod lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams pa'o// oM badz+ra pad+me shwa ra ma ra pad+ma hU~M/ lho phyogs kyi mtshams su padz+ra
24b5(rgyud): dkar po bsnams pa'o// oM bai shwa pad+me hUM/ 'di ni sna tshogs kyi pad+me ste/ nub phyogs kyi mtshams su pad+ma nag po bsdams pa'o// oM bi shra bag+h+nA nA~M/ 'di ni sna tshogs kyi zhal can te/
24b6(rgyud): byung phyogs kyi mtshams su sna tshogs pad+ma bsnams pa'o// oM hrI pad+mA narbe shwar hU~M/ ze 'bru'i dbus su 'dod chags chen po'i bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go// de ltar
24b7(rgyud): sa dbang sgom pa nga lda ni 'ating 'dzin la goms par byed de ma thub pa na por 'gyur ro// rnam sangs rgyas cing dang 'a dang pa 'i langs spong thams cad snang ngo // mas
25a1(rgyud): rol phyin grub cing // gzungs dang sa yang de bzhin no// 'jig rten kun gyi bde ston cing // so so rang nyid rjes su sgrub// sangs rgyas nyid ni byang sems nyid// rang
25a2(rgyud): rgyal nyid kyang de bzhin no// yid 'ong sangs rgyas go 'phang ni// spyad mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur// byang chub sems dang ga pur bcas// tsan dan dmar dang rab sbyar te// rdo rje
25a3(rgyud): chu dang yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas kun gyi bcud len yin// sbyor ba bzang po 'di yis ni// bcud kyis len ni bde ba yang // 'grub 'gyur 'jig rten mgon po yi// gzhon zhing
25a4(rgyud): nad med dam bde zhing // tshe dang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang // skal bzang ye shes bla na med// skye ba 'di la 'grub pa'o// ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// dbang dang dgug dang
25a5(rgyud): dbye ba dang // gsad dang bskrad pa la sogs pa// rengs dang phur bus gdab nyid dang // nam mkhar 'gro ba de bzhin no// sa bcu'i dbang phyug thob 'gyur zhing // ting nge 'dzin la gnas
25a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur// de phyir ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// rdo rje dam tshig de yi ni// rig pa dang ni bcas pa'i mchog/ 'jig rten mgon por 'grub par 'gyur// oM hrI pad+ma na rte shA re hUM/ rtsa ba'i snam
25a7(rgyud): 'di brgya rtsi brgyad bzlas na nyin mo dang nub mo byas pa'i sdig pa nyams par 'gyur ro// yang na lnga brgya bzlas brjod byas na nang thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// yang na stong bzlas brjod
25b1(rgyud): byas na dus ma yin par 'chab med par 'gyur ro// ra rjong blag gnyis bzlas brjod byas thams cad kyis mchod pa 'osas 'gyur ro// gzhan yang spong nug gsum bzlas brjod nus na smrasar/
25b2(rgyud): bzang ba dang g.yang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang stong phrag bzhi bzlas brjod byas na dbul ba med par 'gyur ro// yang na stong phrag lnga bzlas brjod byas nang gra thams cad kyi ming 'jug
25b3(rgyud): par byed do// stong phrag drug bzlas brjod byas na dgra thams cad med par 'gyur ro// stong phrag bdun bzlas brjod byas na bdud bzhi las mchog tu rgyal bar 'gyur ro// stong phrag brgyad bzlas
25b4(rgyud): brjod byas na rig 'dzin ma 'grub par 'gyur ro// stong phrag dgu bzlas brjod byas na gnod sbyin mo 'grub par 'gyur ro// khri tsho gcig bzlas brjod byas na lha dang / klu dang / mi'i bu mo rnams/
25b5(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur ro// stong phrag nyi shu bzlas brjod byas na bar snang la 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ma rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// stong phrag sum cu bzlas brjod byas na bsam pa thams cad rdzogs
25b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// stong phrag bzhi bcu bzlas brjod byas na nam mkha' la spyod pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// stong phrag lnga bcu bzlas brjod byas na ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// skyong
25b7(rgyud): phrag drug cu bzlas brjod byas na grub pa'i rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// stong phrag bdun cu bzlas brjod byas nas gsum gyi bdag por 'gyur ro// stong phrag brgyad cu ba zlas brjod byas na 'khor los
26a1(rgyud): sbyar ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gcig bzlas brjod byas na byang chub sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag bcu bzlas brjod byas na rang dga'i gzugs su
26a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gzhi cha dang bcas pa'i 'bum phrag bzlas brjod byas na sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ro// bye ba phrag gcig bzlas brjod byas na thams cad du rjes su 'dzin par byed pa'i nus pa can spyan ras
26a3(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug lta bu 'grub par 'gyur zhing / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyang byin gyis rlob bo// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das gsung rdo rjes gsungs pa'o// oM paN+Da ra ba si ni ba ri de hUM
26a4(rgyud): 'di ni gos dkar mo'i sngags te lan gcig brjod pas sdig pa'i rigs kyi tshogs sreg par byed do// nub bdun gyi nang rol du rgyal po blon po dang bcas pa mdun na 'don dang / skye 'gro'i tshogs dang /
26a5(rgyud): btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// bzlas pa tsam gyis phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi skal ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de lta bu'i rim pas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na ga
26a6(rgyud): yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nus pa mnyam zhing / dngos su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'grub par 'gyur ro// oM bi lo ki ni a ba lo kA ya swAhA/ 'di'i sbyor ba
26a7(rgyud): stong brag bcu bzlas brjod byas na me long dang / mtheb cher dang / nam mkha' la sogs pa la gsal po phrang bab ma 'grub par 'gyur ro// gang sngor byung ba dang yang nga ster dang phyis 'ong ba'i gror/
26b1(rgyud): par byed do// mang nas gang sas na sa na rgya bgyis mang bar bklags par byas pa/ rna mthal ba'i drus sum ga 'jas nam mi skab pa la da dgos pa dang phyi pa rnaMms du tshur pa byu
26b2(rgyud): 'khrul pa med par ston no// oM t+tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma 'di 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na 'jig rten gsum grub par 'gyur ro// lnga'i bu mo dang / klu'i bu mo dang / mingam
26b3(rgyud): ci'i bu mo dang / gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dang / ma'i bu mo ste/ 'di rnams kyi nang nas gang 'dod pa de'i chos 'byung du gur kum dang / rgya skyegs dang / rang byung gi me tog dang / byang chub kyi sems
26b4(rgyud): dang yang dag par ldan pas rtsibs drug pa shin tu rno ba'i 'khor lo dmar po 'khor bzhin pa rnam par bris pa bsam la/ chos 'byung de sgrub pa pos ri sul chu ngogs gsang ba'i gnas su bsam par
26b5(rgyud): bya'o// de'ang myos shing sgrub pa po'i steng du lhung ba'i rnam pa bsgom par bya'o// de bkug la rang la chu shing nor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur bar blta'o zhes bya'o// yang na lha dang / klu dang /
26b6(rgyud): lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / rig pa 'dzin pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'khor los sgyur ba dang / blon po dang / skyes bu 'am/ gang 'dod pa de dmar por rnam par bsams la/ de'i
26b7(rgyud): snying khar rdo rje lcags kyu 'od 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrug pa'i lcags kyus 'bigs bzhin pa dang / zhags pas rked pa nas bcings la 'gugs bzhin pa 'dod pas myos par gyur pas rab tu
27a1(rgyud): gsal por bsam par bya'o// bdag nyid nor dang bcas pa 'gugs shing dbang du 'gyur ro zhes bya'o// oM b+hA ri Ni ma hA tsakra brtin hUM/ 'di'i sbyor ba ni dri chen dang rdo rje ru
27a2(rgyud): la sogs pas dkyil 'khor byas la/ ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog gis mnyam par mchod la/ de na gnas pa'i sgrub pa pos gling ngam/ gling gzhan dang / grong khyer dang / grong dang / yul 'khor/
27a3(rgyud): gyi rgyal por bsam zhing bzlas par bya'o// des bdag po nyid du 'gyur zhing longs spyod pa la longs spyad nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye ba thob par 'gyur ro// oM b+h+ri ku TI tA re tu ta ma ta
27a4(rgyud): hUM/ lha mo khro gnyer can zhes bya ba 'di ni/ dgra'i rkang rjes kyi rdul blangs la/ dug dang / tshwa dang / ske tshe dang / khrag dang / chu bo'i 'gram gnyis kyi sa dang dri chen rdo rje chus bsngos gzugs/
27a5(rgyud): brnyan byas la/ mi'i rus pa'i rang bzhin gyis phur bus tshig dang gnang kun la btab la/ thod pa kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhag ste dur khyod kyi me la gdung bar bya'o// zhag bdun du sbyor ba byas pas/
27a6(rgyud): 'chi bar 'gyur ro// gal te sems la sdig pa med par gyur ma nag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis ni sangs rgyas kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ro// oM ma hA shri ye mche bdwe hU~M/ lha mo 'dis dri dang / mi tog dang /
27a7(rgyud): mar me da / bamang snyoms kyi zas kyi me sa sor mtshad la bzlas pa byas na thams cad du bsrungs par 'gyur ro// yu'i chos kyi rtsod pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// sun ram gzigs dbang phyug
27b1(rgyud): dang batham pa sa sal/ na nang pa'i bdu thor gyur // 'ang skyo las sbyin las byas gyu// slo sa yang nA/ dan bdang phyu 'ja/
27b2(rgyud): kyis bzlas na dbang dang dkrug pa la sogs pa byed do// lan bdun mngon par bsngags te gtsug pung bdud na srung zhing rims dang / lkog nang dang / nang thams cad dang / mtshon dang / me dang /
27b3(rgyud): rkun po dang / seng ge dang / glang po che dang / sbrul dang / 'ching ba dang / rgya mtsho dang / sha za'i nang stong phrag gcig bzlas pas zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan gcig gi las kyis brjed byed kyi
27b4(rgyud): gdon dang / zad byed dang / skyug pa dang / bri bar dka' ba dang / sgom par dka' ba'i gdug pa can gyi sems can thams cad nyams par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na lus
27b5(rgyud): 'phel zhing skal ba bzang ba dang / lus gzhon zhing nad med par byed cing dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba nyams par byed do// yang nA klu thab khung du bris la der dug dang / ske tshe dang / tsha ba'i sbyin sreg
27b6(rgyud): bya zhing / klu'i ming dang spel bas 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na char chen po phab na sa mu ge med par 'gyur ro// oM bi shwa pad+me hrIH/ sna tshogs pad+ma 'di ni rmongs pa dang / rengs pa
27b7(rgyud): dang / mnan pa dang / phur bus gdab pa dang / gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang / phur bu dang / mig 'phrul dang / ngo mtshar dang / mi mthong bar byed pa dang / phug tu 'jug pa dang /
28a1(rgyud): nam mkha'al 'gro ba dang / lcags stsog bcod pa dang / ril por dgug pa gang dang gang minab rgya mas pasan dang / d+hA gan dang yang na
28a2(rgyud): thams cad byed do// sras dang / da dang / yi dgasum gyi dngos grub sted te/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa stan ras gzigs dbang byug 'grub cing gang 'dod pa'i las thams cad/
28a3(rgyud): ni 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya'o// oM bi shwa pad+me hUM/ sna tshogs rdo rje zhes brjod pa'i lha mo 'dis ni ngag gi dngos grub ster ro// tshigs bshad mkhan du byed cing gzhan gyi dag rengs par
28a4(rgyud): byed do// rang nyid srung ba dang gzhan yang srung bar 'gyur ro// rang skal ba bzang zhing gzhan yang skal ba bzang po'i rang don dang gzhan don byed do// ji ltar 'dir ni 'phags pa spyan
28a5(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug sems can gyi don la spro zhing brtson pa de bzhin du/ 'dir bcom ldan 'das mas dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems
28a6(rgyud): can rnams sgrol bar byed do// bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa rnams la ma nyid kyis srung ngo zhes thugs kyi rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so// de ltar rtog pa'i rgyal po
28a7(rgyud): bsdus pa rab tu bstan no// sems brtan rtog pa med pa yi// blo dang ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur// gang zhig spyod lam bstan pa yi// sangs rgyas kun rgyu ji lta bar// de ltar 'dir ni
28b1(rgyud): rab sbyar nas// de nas rtag pa'i go 'phang 'grub// ji ltar 'dod par gnas byed cing // kun la longs spyod kun byed ltar// ji ltar 'dod pa'i snying rjes spyod// ji ltar 'dod pa'i spyod pa
28b2(rgyud): yis// 'dug pa 'am ni langs kyang rung // 'chag pa'am ni gang dang de// rgod pa 'am ni brjod pa 'am// gang de ji ltar don bzhin no// dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa'am// sgrib pa
28b3(rgyud): kun dang ldan pa yang // rang mos lha yi rnal 'byor bdag/ bsod nams chung ba'ang 'grub par 'gyur// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// thams cad mkhas pa nyid dang ni// thams
28b4(rgyud): cad rdo rje 'chang nyid kyang // skye ba 'di la 'grub par 'gyur// yang gsungs pa/ rnal 'byor dag ni gzugs brnyan gyi// bcos ma'i sku las 'gyur ba min// byang chub sems chen la brtson
28b5(rgyud): narnal 'byor dag ni de lha yin// khrag chen po dang ga pur bcas// tsan dan dmar dang bsres pa ni// tshogs kyi nang du zhugs pa na// kun las mchog gyur bcud len no// sbyor ba bzang /
28b6(rgyud): po 'di mas ni// bcud kyis len ni srasla ba ru// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe bzang dang // nad med bde ba bzang po 'thob// grub pa'i mtshan nyid ji ltar gsungs// sangs rgyas pha rol
28b7(rgyud): phyin pa dang // gzungs dang sa yang de bzhin 'grub// bde ston thams cad thob 'gyur zhing // rang nyid so so rjes su 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas
29a1(rgyud): thams cad nyid du 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos nyid kyang // sangs rgyas kun ni rab 'grub 'grub/ gzhan yang ral 'byor gyi spong ba byed pa 'dzadu sa
29a2(rgyud): yongs su dag pa med na de'i tshe thang sku'i sgrud pa bshad de/ bsnyen gnas dang ldan zhing smyung bar gnas pa'i sna bzos/ tshun snum 'dres par ras gas pa de'ang rang rang ga kun tu zla re'i d+hang kyi
29a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bri bar bya ste/ sna tshogs kyi pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa/ ze 'bru'i dkyil du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das mdog
29a4(rgyud): dmar ba/ mi bskyod pa'i dbu rgyan can/ zhal gsum pa/ zhal gyi gtso bo ni dmar ba ste 'dod chags chen po nyid kyi phyir ro// g.yas pa gnag pa ste zhe sdang chen po nyid kyi phyir ro// g.yon pa/
29a5(rgyud): dkar ba ste gti mug chen po nyid kyi phyir ro// phyag drug pa bya'o// g.yon pa'i phyag gcig gis gos dkar mo'i mgrin pa nas 'khyud pa dang / pad+ma dmar po bsnams pa dang / g.yon pa
29a6(rgyud): gnyis kyis me tog gi gzhu bsnams pa'o// g.yas pa gsum du khab kyi phyag rgyas pad+ma kha 'byed pa dang / me tog gi mda' dang / lcags kyu bsnams pa'o// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung
29a7(rgyud): gis gnas par bya'o// shar gyi 'dab ma la rnam par gzigs ma mdog dkar mo pad+ma dmar po dang rdo rje phyag na bsnams pa'o// lho phyogs kyi 'dab ma li lha mo sgrol ma ljang khu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi
29b1(rgyud): lo mdang rin po che phyag na bsdams pa'o// nub phyogs kyi 'dab ma la b+hu ri ni ser mo ut+pal sngon po dang 'khor lo bsdams pa'o// byang phyogs kyi 'dab ma la khro gnyer can pad+ma dkar ser lha bu pad+ma ser /
29b2(rgyud): dang ral gri phyag na bsnams pa'o// shar phyogs kyi mtshams su pad+ma'i gos can ma gser lta bu'i mdog gcod lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams pa'o// lho phyogs kyi mtshams su rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang phyug ma nam mkha'i
29b3(rgyud): mdog can dkar po pad+ma dang shel gyi 'phreng ba bsnams pa'o// nub phyogs kyi mtshams su sna tshogs kyi pad+ma ston ka'i zla ba lta bu dkar ser gyi mdog pad+ma nag po dang po ti phyag na bsnams pa'o//
29b4(rgyud): byang phyogs kyi mtshams su sna tshogs rdo rje ma sna tshogs kyi mdog can du byas la/ sna tshogs kyi rdo rje dang sna tshogs kyi pad+ma bsnams pa'o// de ltar pad+ma la bkod cing bris la/ sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams ni
29b5(rgyud): mtshams su'o// rma hA bi hoH'i yi ge las yang dag par byung ba'i lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog dang / dril bu rnams ni shAr la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su'o// yang zang sgra
29b6(rgyud): gzhan brjod par bya ste/ ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i dkar ser gyi bcom ldan 'das g.yas na skud ba dang / dbyug pa dang / rtse gsum dang / mchog sbyin pa'i phyag can/ g.yon na pad+ma dang / ril ba
29b7(rgyud): spyi blugs dang / zhags pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i dam tshig gi po ti bsnams pa'i phyag can/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs 'chang ba/ sbrul mchod phyir thogs pa/ ral pa'i cod pan la
30a1(rgyud): 'od dpag med bzhengs pa 'am skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa ba rgyan du byas pa'o// de'i g.yas phyogs kyi cha ru sgrub pa po mchod yon gyi snod dang bdug spos kyi snong lag pas
30a2(rgyud): gzung bar bya'o// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das phyag gnyis la ri gru 'dzin la gnas shing seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/ g.yon pa sa la gnas shing zhabs g.yas pa pad+ma'i steng gi gdan stengs su bzhugs
30a3(rgyud): pa'o// phyag re re na 'phreng ba bsnams par sems pa pos 'phreng ba'i 'og tu 'dren pa'i tshul 'dis bsam par bya ba ni sems pa lta bur gnas pa zhes bya'o// cho ga gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das dkar/
30a4(rgyud): zhing dmar ba phyag bcu pa ri dgas seng ge'i gdan la pad+ma'i steng du skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa/ g.yas na 'phreng ba bsnams pa'o// seng ge dang / glang po che dang / me dang / sbrul gyis 'jig
30a5(rgyud): pa rnams las grol ba'i cha byad can no// g.yon na pad+ma dmar po sdong bu gnyis pa steng du po ti can te/ rkun ma dang / lcags sgrog gis bcings pa dang / mtshon dang / thog chen po dang / sha zas/
30a6(rgyud): za ba rnams sgrol ba'i cha byad can no// gnas de brgyad du sgrub pa po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa/ sngon bzhin du langs pa 'am 'dug par bsam
30a7(rgyud): par bya'o// gzhan yang cho ga ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das sna tshogs kyi gzugs 'chang ba/ dbu bcu gsum pa/ spyi bo'i mgo bo ni ljang khu'i rta zhal lo// yang na zhi
30b1(rgyud): ba sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhal lo// phyag rgya ba'i bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sna tshogs kyi mtshon cha bsnams pa'o// yang na zhal brgya pa phyag stong pa'ang bya'o// kha cig tu rdo rje skyil mo krung gis/
30b2(rgyud): gnas pa 'am bzhengs pa'ang bya'o// tsam pa lta bu'i dkar ser gyi bcom ldan 'das so// thang sku de kun gyi g.yas phyogs kyi bar du sgrub pa po me tog dang / mchod yon gyi snod dang / bdug spos kyi
30b3(rgyud): snod lag pa na gzung bar bya'o// de rnams kyi dbu la dbu rgyan du 'od dpag med pa 'am/ chos kyi rgyal po'i mchod rten bri bar bya'o// 'di ni zang sku'i cho ga'o// thang sku'i mdun du rtsa ba'i sngags ji lta
30b4(rgyud): ba 'dod pa de bzla zhing bsam gtan yang byas nas/ mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod la/ mchod yon snod dang / yongs su gang ba'i bdud rtsi lta bu'i zas dang / sgron ma'i zas la byas nas mchod
30b5(rgyud): yon byin te sngags gang 'dod pa de bzlas pa byas na/ de la gsungs pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// gsang ba po ni sngags 'di nyid// kha cig la yang mi sbyin no// blo ldan sems can doH/
30b6(rgyud): brtson pa'i// sems brtan pa la sbyin par bya// mchod rten las byed nyid la ni// blo ldan 'bad pas sbyin par bya// rang nyid dang ni nor dang ni// bla ma la rtag gus par bya// rdo rje slob dpon
30b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor la/ mchog tu gyur pa'i yon yang dbul// gang dang gang ni gtang dka' ba// mchog tu gyur par 'dir ni bsngags// chung ma sring mo dang yang ni// bu mo dang ni tsha mo dag/ bu mo rgyan
31a1(rgyud): kun brgyan par bya'o// glang chen rta dang shing rta dang // phyogs dang grong khyer rgyal srid dang // yul 'khor rgyal srid ldan pa dang // rin chen sna tshogs dag kyang ni/
31a2(rgyud): gzhan yang rdo rje slob dpon dbul// rdo rje slob dpon dgyes gyur pa// thams cad rab sbyin dbul bar bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi
31a3(rgyud): mkhan po dzam+b+ha la dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sa man+ta b+ha dra nA ma d+hA ra Nibod
31a4(rgyud): skad du/ 'phags pa kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'dra
31a5(rgyud): rgyal po'i kha ba na bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ dge slong brgyad stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ gnas gtsang
31a6(rgyud): ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs
31a7(rgyud): te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsug te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
31b1(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das deng bdag ni bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba bla ma'i 'od las blangs pa kun tu bzang po'i gzungs yang dag par ston par 'tshal te/ gzungs de thos ma
31b2(rgyud): thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams phyir mi ldog cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang sel
