31b3(rgyud): to/ longs spyod chen po phun sum tshogs pa'ang yongs su 'dzin to// lus rnam par dag pa'ang 'thob bo// ngag rnam par dag pa'ang 'thob bo// sems rnam par dag pa'ang 'thob
31b4(rgyud): bo pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do// gzungs rgya mtsho thams cad kyang 'thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad mnyes par/
31b5(rgyud): bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ rin chen phyag rgya'i
31b6(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ 'bar ba'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ mi zad pa'i za ma tog
31b7(rgyud): gi ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das de la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bye/
32a1(rgyud): ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bdag la mngon sum du gyur to// bcom ldan 'das des na bdag de ltar dran pa 'di lta bu dang ldan/ blo gros
32a2(rgyud): 'di lta bu dang ldan/ chags pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan zhing / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis pa'i don mchis par gyur te/ bcom ldan
32a3(rgyud): 'das bdag thos pa don mchis/ gzungs 'di thos pa'i don mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad cing 'khor bzhi po de'ang yongs su dged du gsol/ bcom
32a4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can dag pa de'i dus la dbab par shes na smros shig/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor bzhi po 'di ni byin gyis brlabs zin to// de nas byang
32a5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
32a6(rgyud): gzungs 'di smras so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
32a7(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ kha ga me kha ga me/ tsak+Shu kha be/ shro tra kha be/ g+hA Na kha be/ dzi hA kha be/ ga la ya kha be/ ma na kha be/ sa ra kha re/ sa ra kha be/ sa ra kha be/ shU na tra/
32b1(rgyud): kha be/ a na mit+tA kha be/ a pra Ni hi ta kha be/ sa mA d+hi kha be/ pA ra mi tA kha be/ bo d+hi kha be/ sa ra sa ra sa ra/ sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi ti/ b+ha ra b+ha ra b+ha ra d+harma a d+hiSh+Thi te/ ka la ka la ka la/
32b2(rgyud): saMg+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ na mo dAn ba tI nAM/ bud d+ha ko TI tsa/ a d+hiSh+Tha na du man/ tsa ta sra par sha do U yur ba la tsad ngan du/ tad+ya thA/ su ra b+hI su ra b+hi/ ma hA su ra b+hi/ mu ni mu ni/ ma hA
32b3(rgyud): mu ni/ ma ta~M ma ti/ many+dzu ma ti/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwAtwa yA/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sa mri dAn du man/ sa man+ta b+ha dra d+hA ra
32b4(rgyud): Ni swA hA/ gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'
32b5(rgyud): dpag tu med pa dag ni gzungs sna tshogs thob par gyur to// gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di lags te/ nang par langs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
32b6(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phongs par gyur pa'i tshe lan bdun yid la bgyis na thar par 'gyur ro// rims nang thams cad
32b7(rgyud): la rna bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o// rlung gis zin na mar dang 'bru ma ra la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te bslu bar bgyi'o// so nan so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te bca'/
33a1(rgyud): par bgyi'o// rngub nan ras bal gyis bor 'brumar ngang phrad cig bskol ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ langs kyi snang kyis rna bar blugs par bgyi'o blang ba
33a2(rgyud): napa la 'bru mar ro// ljon pa la byab par bgyi'o// gdon gyis btab pa la tshon skud sna lnga la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te mgul du gdags so// mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon gyis btab na 'bru mar la
33a3(rgyud): lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te gshis thams cad du byug go// nad thams cad la byab par bgyi'o// 'di ni sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i cho ga'o// ci ste sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba
33a4(rgyud): dang / gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang / mi snang bar bgyi ba dang / mig bslu ba dang / ldong ros la sogs pa sgrub par 'tshal na/ des sku gdung dang
33a5(rgyud): bcas pa'i mchod rten dang sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor bgyis te bum pa gang ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzhag la/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bres te/ me tog sna tshogs kyis tshal
33a6(rgyud): par bkang la/ tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang / kun tu ru'i gdug pas bdugs te/ mar me brgya rtsa brgyad bud cing mchod pa chen po bgyis te/ tshangs par spyod pa gtsang bas gos gtsang ma bgos
33a7(rgyud): la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis mtshams gcad par bgyid do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/
33b1(rgyud): ta li ban d+ha mi/ mi li ban d+ha mi/ tsil mo li ban d+ha mi/ sdo mo ban d+ha mi/ bdag gi mtshams las su'ang 'da' bar mgyur cig swA hA/ chul lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te phyogs bcur mtsham
33b2(rgyud): gcad par bgyi'o// gang gis 'gugs par 'gyur ba'i gzungs 'di dag kyang thog mar brjod par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA
33b3(rgyud): kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tsi li tsi li/ mi li mi li tsi le la~M/ i hi b+ha ga bAn/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki tre shwa rA ya swA hA/ 'di ni bdag gi snying po bshad pa ste/ des bdag la dgug par 'gyur ro//
33b4(rgyud): dede'i 'og tu zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad nas bzung ste/ nya'i bar du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ dus gsum du bzlas brjod bgyi/ dus gsum du khrus bgyi/ dus gsum du gos brje
33b5(rgyud): babar bgyi'o// de nas tshes bco lnga la mchod pa chen po bgyis te bzlas brjod dpag tu ma mchis par bgyi'o// 'on tang nam gyi gung thun la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser gyi kha
33b6(rgyud): dog gi lus dang ldan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa dang / lus las 'od zer bye ba stong 'byin cing mchi bar 'gyur ro// de la rig sngags 'chang gis skrag par mi bgyid cing
33b7(rgyud): brtan par bgyis na mthong ma thag tu sa thob par 'gyur ro// gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur ro// shar phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// lho
34a1(rgyud): phyogs su rin chen tog dang / nub phyogs su 'od dpag med dang / byang phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra mthong bar 'gyur ro// de la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i de bzhin
34a2(rgyud): gshegs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rags pa'i tshul gyis mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'di nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ thams cad du'ang
34a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par bgying bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
34a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i rnamams dang / thams cad pa badzin pa'i 'khor de dang / sgra dang / dang / yum sa ningang / rnaM mar bcus pa'i 'phru
34a5(rgyud): sems te/ somangan 'das kyisags sa pal yangan pa da // 'phags pa sa dzu babajab nas bya ba'i gsu ma rdzogs so/ chag darnam pa ma
34a6(rgyud): dang / ra rje legs sa pacwa su/ rlungags ba sa panas gtam g+sa/
34a7(rgyud): #sa sa@#
34b1(rgyud): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo// btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
34b2(rgyud): thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par shes rab chen po'i mig thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges
34b3(rgyud): par sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myur du thabs la mkhas pa thob par
34b4(rgyud): gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myur du shes rab chen po'i grur zhugs par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs
34b5(rgyud): dbang phyug zugs rjen mo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myur du sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las rgal bar gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal
34b6(rgyud): bdag nges par rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan zhing lam myur du thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myur
34b7(rgyud): du myang na las 'das pa'i rol 'dzeg par gyur cig/ btsun pa sbyin ras gzigs dbang phyu gzugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myur du 'dus ma byas kyi khyim du 'dug pa
35a1(rgyud): gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myur du chos kyi sku dang gcig par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag
35a2(rgyud): ral gri'i ri la mchi ba na ral gri'i ri de rang nyil zhing zhig par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag me ma mur gyi nang du mchi ba na me ma mur de rang med par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag sems can dmyal ba'i
35a3(rgyud): lam du mchi ba na sems can dmyal ba rnams rang bzhin gyis stongs par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba na yi dgas rnams rang tshim par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe
35a4(rgyud): bdag lha ma yin gyi gnas su mchi ba na de dag gi sems rang dul bar gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag dud 'gro rnams su mchi ba na de dag ye shes chen po rang thob par gyur cig/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya
35a5(rgyud): nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sarba ban d+ha na/ ts+tshe da na ka rA ya/ sarba pA pa sa mu dron+ta Sha Na ka rA ya/ sarba bu d+hi pra sha ma na
35a6(rgyud): ya sarba i tu ba dra ba/ be nA sha ra ka rA ma/ sarba b+ha ye Shu tre NA ya/ tAs+ya na ma swe ta/ i daM AR+tha a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ ta bA nI la kar+b+ha/ na mA pa ra ma dzA dasa~M/ a bar+Na mi Sh+Tha
35a7(rgyud): sarba ar+tha sAd+ha nA~Mn/ bu b+ha tse tingaH/ sarba bud d+ha nam/ bab ma rag zi sho d+haka/ tarbathA/ A ma~M kaM/ A lo ka/ a d+hi ba tI/ mo ka ti/ shAn+te/ e h+ye hi ma hA ba dz+wa satwa/
35b1(rgyud): mahA bo d+ha satwA/ he pri ya bo d+hi satwa/ be ma hA kA ru ni// rdzi ma e h+ye he Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya pa ra ma mai tri tsit+ta kA ru Ni ka/ kA ru kra ru/ kAD+ga sA d+ha yA/ sAd+ha ya/ b+hi d+hAr/ de tha~M /
35b2(rgyud): a raM ga ma ga mebi tsa ga ma/ sid d+ha yo gI shwa ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ bir+yan+te/ ma hA bItsan+te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hA rar+t+ti shwa ra/ tsa la tsa la/ bi ma la mAr+Ne/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra/ kr-iSh+NA rin/
35b3(rgyud): dzan mu ku Ta/ A la kri ta/ sha rIr lam pa/ bra la mAM ba la~M ba/ ma hA sid d+ha shud d+ha d+ha ra/ ba la ba la/ ma hA ba la/ ma la ma la/ ma hA ma la/ tsa la tsa la ma hA tsa la/ kr-i/
35b4(rgyud): bak+Sha kr-iSh+Ta bA sha nir+g+hA ta nA/ he pad+ma hAstA/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ni shA tsa re shwa ra kriSh+Ta sarba kri ta ya dzI pa bI ta/ e h+ye he ma hA bi ra/ ma hA ba rA ha mu kha tri pu ra/ da ha ne shwa ra/ nA ra yaNA/ rU ba ba la
35b5(rgyud): be sha d+ha ri/ e h+ye hi nI la kaN+Tha/ e h+ye he ma hA hA la hA la/ bi Sha nirdzi ta lo ka s+ya rA ga bi Sha bi na sha na/ dwe Sha bi Sha bi na sha na/ mo ha bi Sha bi NA sha na/ hu lu hu lu/ ma hA hu lu ha re/
35b6(rgyud): ma hA bad+da nAH/ sa ra sa ra/ saM ra saM ri/ su ru su ru/ bu d+ha buH/ bo d+ha ya/ bo d+ha yA mi ta ba nI la kaR+Sha e h+ye hi/ bA ma s+thi ta mahA so ha mu Sha/ ha sa hA sa/ muny+tsa ruH/
35b7(rgyud): masbyin ces/ e rtse ge b+ho rtsom pa sing d+ha/ mo gwa ga ra/ bcwa bar+d+ha/ bA tsan/ sA d+ha ma sA la/ btAn/ s+phar snga ra ma thug ze/ lo sa du tha ma kag+sa/ bra gcam
36a1(rgyud): tsi de rti/ me dang / shan kAm s+ya/ dag na/ pra sA d+ha ya sAhA/ sid d+hA ya swAhA/ ma hA sid d+hA ma swAhA/ sid d+ha yo gi shwa rA ya sAhA/ nI la kaN+Da ya swAhA/ bA rAH/
36a2(rgyud): mu lA ya swA hA/ sau ha mu khA ya sA hA/ ma hA na ra sa~M ha mu khA ya swA hA/ badz+ra hastA ya swAhA/ sid d+ha bi d+hA rA ya swA hA/ ma hA sid d+ha bid+ha d+ha ra ya swA hA/ pad+ma tA sA ya swA d+ha/ kr-iH sarba ti ta yodzI pa thaM
36a3(rgyud): ya swA hA/ me hA mA la mu ku Ta d+ha rA ya swA hA/ tsakrA yu d+ha d+ha rA ya swAhA/ shaM khe sha bA no rA nA da na ka rA ye swA hA/ bo d+ha na ka rA ya swA hA/ bA me s+thi ta kar+t+ti de sha kriSh+Ti dzi nA ya swA hA/ b+ha g+h+ra tsar+m+ma
36a4(rgyud): Ni bA sa nA ya swA hA/ lo ke shwa rA ya swA hA/ ma hA yo grI shwa rA ya swA hA/ sarba sid d+hi shwa rA ya swA hA/ rak+Sha rak+Sha maM swAh+ma/ ku ru rak+Sha mAr+t+ti nAM sA hA/ ni ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi
36a5(rgyud): satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ side d+h+yAn+t+ra me man+t+ra pa dA ni swA hA/ 'phags pa nI la kaN+Da'i gzungs rdzogs so// bod skad
36a6(rgyud): du snying rje mi bshol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems
36a7(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po mnga' ba/ gnod pa thams cad las thar par mdzad pa/ nang thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa/ 'byung po thams
36b1(rgyud): cad nges par bzlog pa/ sems can mi khom pa brgyad du lhung ba rnams yang dag par sgrol ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de la phyag 'tshal nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bshad par
36b2(rgyud): gzungs thugs rje chen po mi bshol ba zhes bya ba 'di brjod kyis thugs rje chen po mnga' ba bdag la dgongs su gsol/ 'di lta ste/ oM dza ta dza ta/ dzi ti dzi ti/ dzu d+ha dz+ra tra/ ta ra da ra / ti
36b3(rgyud): ti ri/ tu ru tu ru/ ka la ka la ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ thugs rje chen po mnga' ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'dus pa rjes su dgongs te gshegs su gsolatsa ta tsa ta
36b4(rgyud): ti tsi ti/ tsu tu tsu tu/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sprin du rjes su dgongs te thugs rje chen po mnga' ba myur du gshegs su gsol/ ra la ra la/ r-i li ri li/ ru lu ru lu
36b5(rgyud): bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i gzhi las gzhengs su gsol/ tsa la tsa la/ tsi li tsi li/ tsu lu tsu lu/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ e hi e hi
36b6(rgyud): bud d+ha bud d+ha sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pas gzhengs su gsol bzhengs su gsol/ byams pa chen pos 'byung po thams cad bzlog tu
36b7(rgyud): gsol/ thugs rje chen po'i sprin gyis bdag gi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bai d+hu na bi d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/ pra tha ma pra tha ma/ bzhengs su gsol bzhengs su
37a1(rgyud): gsol/ tshur gshegs tshur gshegs/ bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ las sbyang du gsol/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya swA hA/ ma hA pad+ma hastA ya
37a2(rgyud): swA hA/ pad+ma A sa nA ya swA hA/ shwe ta ma dz+nyA u pa bi tA ya swA hA/ kir ti ne swA hA/ shU la ne swA hA/ tsakra Ni swA hA/ badz+ra Ne swA hA/ ti Ne tre ya swA hA/ triN tre ya pra ha ru pA ya swA hA/ A kA shA ye swA hA/
37a3(rgyud): shi shaM ni swA hA/ pre tsa ba ta ye sA hA/ ya ma ye swA h+ma/ ya ma b+hu ya swA hA/ aN+Da dze b+h+yo b+hU ta b+h+ya swA hA/ dza ra yu dze b+h+yo b+ha te b+h+yaHswA hA/ saM swe da tse b+h+yo b+hU te b+h+ya/ oM pa pa tu ke b+h+yo b+hU te b+h+yaHbi ti ka b+h+yo b+ha d+hi b+hU
37a4(rgyud): swA hA/ bai d+ha ti ki b+h+yo byA d+hi b+h+yaHswA hA/ ShASh+Tha ke b+h+yo byA d+hi b+h+yaHsA hA/ sa ni na pa hi ke b+h+yo byA d+hi b+h+yaHswA hAsarba b+ha d+hi b+h+yaHswA hA/ b+hU me an+ta ri Sha tsIr+ye b+h+yo b+he d+hi b+h+yaHswA hA/ 'di lta ste/ tra Ta tra Ta/ tri Ti tri
37a5(rgyud): Tirdi tru Tu tru Tu/ ba dag 'jigs pa thams cad dang 'tshe ba thams cad las srungs shig swA hA/ gra sa gra sa/ ma thi ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa na ma Ar+ya/
37a6(rgyud): ba mo ki te shwa ra A dz+nyA ba ya ti swA hA/ snying rje mi bshol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ sa~M ha nA da tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ seMng
37a7(rgyud): ge sla'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma gsung gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i dbang phyug tu bsgyur ti rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs
37b1(rgyud): so 'de nas pasang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dang / lam rnams ji ltar byung / em
37b2(rgyud): sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i mchog spyan ras gzigs seng ge sgra zhes bya ba yod do// des smon lam sbyang ba dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs bsags par yod la byas so//
37b3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i dbang phyug langs te gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+ya ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru
37b4(rgyud): Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a ka Te/ bi ka Te/ ni ka Te/ ka TaM ka Te/ ka ro Te/ ka ro kaM Ta/ bIr+ye swA hA/ oM AHhrIH/ sau ha nA dA hUM/ bruM AM dz+r-i khaM hUM/ oM AHhUM/ oM bA li ne b+hu/ dzA dzI ba/
37b5(rgyud): buSh+pe d+hU pe drA/ sarba amr-i ti d+hA/ oM ba ta li/ ma hA ba li/ dA d+da drA \u0f7f sAhA/ oM b+hak+Sha b+ha k+Sha sa me ya tISh+Tha dza drA phaT swAhA/ oM ti mr-i te hUM phaT/ krod ti ka rAsh+mi phaT/ oM ba ru \u0f7f A gan+d+ha sa/
37b6(rgyud): A gan+d+ha ya/ ma hA nA ga gi sa ti sarbe b+hu raHphuHphuHphuHswA hA/ oM b+ha ga ba ti shru te smr-i ti sa ma ba ti/ sa ra ma ti sid d+ha swA hA/ oM AHhrIHhUM swA hA/ puHhrIH/ au siM ha nA da hUM phaT phaT/ nA ga du ba
37b7(rgyud): li mA ra ma phaT/ dz+wa le dz+wa la hU phaT/ oM a big+h+nAn+da kr-iti hrIH/ oM ag+na ye a ti byaM/ a b+hi sa ma ya ya // ma hA kr-i yes bya/ kabye ma hA ne ye sA hA/ oM b+ha ba ga a g+na sa~M/ shAn+ta ku ru sA tra/
38a1(rgyud): A d+hI sa~M ha nA da ba dra tsakra brti lo ki ka Tu rbu Tu/ lo kot+ta ra Ni si ha nAd Tu Tu Tu hUn d+hu na sa~M ha nA danu rburbu rU dzu hU~M sA hA/ gsang ba'i bdag po 'di maN+Dal gyi bsgrub pa zhes bya/
38a2(rgyud): ba'o// gsad pa dang / phyir ldog pa dang / gdug pa dang / bcing ba dang / zhi ba'i las yin te/ nang par ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas maN+Dal byas te/ mngar gsum lag pa'i mthil du
38a3(rgyud): mnyes pas klu'i zhe sdang zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni klu'i sde dpon zhes bya ste/ seng ge'i steng du zla ba la// rgyal po rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs// g.yas na thod mtshan rtse gsum la/
38a4(rgyud): drag po'i rgyal rigs dbang du bsdus// pad+ma'i rtse la thod pa ni// 'phrin las bzhi ldan ku mu da// shes rab sbyor ba'i ral grir bcas// dka' thub ldan pa'i sku de la// rig sngags rnam par
38a5(rgyud): rgyan pa po// gsum dang lnga ni mdun du 'phyang // rtse mor 'od dpag med pas brgyan// seng ge'i cha las byung ba yin// 'dam skyes dmar po'i lo ma gnyis// pad+ma bzhi la sngags bzhi ldan//
38a6(rgyud): rang lus 'og gnas thal mo sbyar// sku la 'dud cing 'phrin las byed// rdo rje'i gdan la mi bskyod pa'i// thugs ka nas ni sngags 'od 'don// spro ba gsum du ldan pa'i sngags// nyi shu rtsa
38a7(rgyud): gcig gdon par bya'o// gsang ba'i bdag po rgyud 'di la smod pa'i sems can de ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la smod pa yin no// gsang ba'i bdag po rgyud 'di nyan pa
38b1(rgyud): dang / sems pa dang / mchong ba dang / 'chang ba dang / bran 'dis mas pa'i sems can dngag la rgyam chen pa na'i lnga dang / sam na rtsa gsam gyi lnga dang / tshangs pa'i bu dang / tshangs cher
38b2(rgyud): rnams kyis srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sra ba dang / kun tu rjes su 'brang bar byed/ de bas ches lhag pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bu lams srung ba bzhin du byung
38b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// bdud kyis bar du gcad par mi nus so// gang shi 'phos nas nub phyogs bde ba can du pad+mo las skye bar 'gyur ro// mngal gyi sdug bsngal las thar bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'odim
38b4(rgyud): dang chu'i 'jigs pa las thar bar 'gyur ro// 'dir ni mdo tsam smos su zad kyis/ de ma yin pa gang 'dod pa thams cad bsam pa yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// gang rgyud 'di la
38b5(rgyud): gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed na/ de la lha'i bu dang / klu'i bu khyed rnams kyis srung bar gyis shig ces bka' stsal to// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po dang //
38b6(rgyud): tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu de dag rab tu dga' nas tshul bzhin du khas blangs par byas so// de nas gzhan srung ba'i phyir bdag sa dkar po la lan du mar bsngags na bar chad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur
38b7(rgyud): ro seng ge sgra'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta pradz+nyA kA ra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba 'gos khug pa lhas btsas kyis zhus shing bsgyur te gtan la
39a1(rgyud): phab pa'o// @rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya saM ha nA da nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras
39a2(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra'i gzungs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/
39a3(rgyud): dbang phyug gi pho brang ri bo po Ta la'i rtse mo na rin po che'i khang bzangs rin po che dang / mu tig dang / nor bu dpag med kyis spras pa/ 'od kyis stong gsum khyab pa me tog dri zhim po
39a4(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis kun nas brgyan pa'i sa phyogs de na byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dang / nyan thos chen po sha ra dwa ti'i bu la sogs pa dge slong rab tu mang pos yongs
39a5(rgyud): su bskor zhing / bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal zhes bya ba 'dus te 'dug par
39a6(rgyud): gyur pa de rang gi stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
39a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha na rgyal po dbang phyug 'od ces bgyi ba 'khor dang btsun mo dang / longs spyod
39b1(rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa las rgyal po de la mdze dang / bol mig dang / dbugs mi bde ba snying nang 'bar ba byung ste/ de ji ltar bsal bar bgyi bcom ldan 'das kyis/
39b2(rgyud): bka' stsal pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal sngon 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid na 'jam dpal khyod nyid byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po zhes bya ba
39b3(rgyud): yin la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i mchog ces bya ba yin pas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis stong gsum du
39b4(rgyud): sems can gyi don la gshegs pa la seng ge dkar po gcig dbang du bsdus te chibs pa byas/ sku la rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa mdung rtse gsum pa dang ral
39b5(rgyud): gri dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pa la thogs nas phyin pa la/ rgya mtsho chen po la rgal ba'i dus su seng ge bzhag nas 'khur res byas shing byon pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' shes
39b6(rgyud): rab chen po khyod nyid ni grogs la phan pa'i sems kyis rang gi ral gris rang bkum mo// byang chub sems dpa' snying rje mchog gi bsam pa la steng 'og par snang gi klu dang lha la sogs pas
39b7(rgyud): bsad dam snyam nas btung ba'i snod bram ze'i thod pa lag na thogs tri shU la rtse gsum pa lag na thogs seng ge dkar po la zhon mya ngan du ral pa thod du bcings nas
40a1(rgyud): steng gi lha la bsdigs te/ snying rje'i stobs kyis sems can don byas pas// rang gi grogs po spangs nas gcig pu lus// lha rnams kun gyis nyes nas
40a2(rgyud): chad pa'i las// grong khyer 'joms shing lha rnams 'gums par bgyid// ces smras te lha rnams la tri shU la gdengs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
40a3(rgyud): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / khams gsum gyi lha dga' ba'i mdangs phyung ste/ lha'i me tog pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da ri ka dang / tsam pa ka la sogs pa phul te thod pa
40a4(rgyud): bkang ngo // de nas bar snang gi lha dang / klu dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / grul bum dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci la sogs pa la bsdigs pa/
40a5(rgyud): tri shU la gdengs nas/ snying rje'i stobs kyis sems can don byas pas// rang gi grogs po spang na gcig pu lus// sde brgyad tshogs kyis nyes na chad pa'i las// grong khyer 'joms
40a6(rgyud): shing sde brgyad 'gums par bgyid// ces smras te sde brgyad la tri shUl gdengs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po gtsug na rin chen dang / dri ba'i rgyal po zur phung lnga pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam
40a7(rgyud): thos kyi bu dang / phram mir gyi rgyal po zags zangs ris dang / mi'am ci'i rgyal po sngon bi ta ma go can dang / thul bum gyi rgyal po sbrul mtho dgro dang / nam ma la'i rdzing sa rgyas bam
40b1(rgyud): mig can la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang bcas pa dga' ba'i mdangs phyung ste seng ge la rin po che'i rgyan phul lo// de nas sa'i 'og na gnas pa'i kul bsdigs te/ snying rdo'i stobs kyis sems
40b2(rgyud): can don byas pas// rang gi grogs pos spangs nas gcig pu lus// klu tshogs rnams kyis nyes na chad pa'i las// grong khyer 'joms shing klu rnams 'gums par bgyid// ces
40b3(rgyud): smras te rgya mtsho chen po tri shA las dkrugs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / de dag la sogs pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ 'od
40b4(rgyud): dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul myong bar byed pa/ klu'i rgyal po 'bum phrag drug g.yog dang 'khor du bcas pa 'dus te dga' ba'i mdangs phyung nas/ klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na sbrul
40b5(rgyud): dkar po gcig tu byas nas phyag 'tshal bskor ba lan gsum byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can// khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi// klu rnams kun gyi mgon mdzod cig/ nyams na
40b6(rgyud): klu yi gsheng ma mdzod// ces smras nas tri shU la lan gsum dkris/ kha byang chub sems dpa' la bsgyur/ phuHphuHzhes brjod cing gus pas kha nas khrag 'byin cing gnas so// klu'i rgyal
40b7(rgyud): bo gzhan rnams kyang thal mo sbyar nas bskor ba lan gsum gsum byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can// khyod la bdag cag skyabs su mchi'o// klu rnams thams cad skyabs
41a1(rgyud): su rung // nyams na klu mi ga she ma mdzod// ces smras nas klu chen po brgyad sbrul dkar po gcig tu byas nas tshangs spyad la 'khris so// klu'i rgyal po rnams kyang bdun
41a2(rgyud): cag ni bran bgyid do// ci bka' stsal pa nyan no zhes smras nas klu rnams so so'i gnas su dengs so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' de ni snying rje klu 'dul zhes bya'o// snying nad sel ba zhes
41a3(rgyud): bya'o// 'jam dpal de ltar sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge khyod nyid yin no// de'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' snying rje mchog de ni da lta'i 'phags
41a4(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra klu'i ded dpon chen po 'di nyid yin no// 'jam dpal ngas rgyal po chen po de'i don du thugs rje chen po'i sngags brjod par bya'o// yid la zung zhig/ na
41a5(rgyud): mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ye/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te/ ka taM ka Te ka ro To/ tsi ti dzA la ka ro ti bAr+ye swAhA/
41a6(rgyud): gzungs 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cus gsungs la/ da ltar nga nyid kyis brjod pa'o// 'di'i cho ga ni mi dgos pas las thams cad 'grub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs
41a7(rgyud): dbang phyug seng ge sgra'i sku lugs ma 'am/ bras sku'i spyan sngar ba'i lci ba sa lam lhung bas so sor ma 'dres par maN+Dal brgyad byas te/ maN+Dal re re la me tog chom bu lnga lnga pa 'am ste/ me tog dang /
41b1(rgyud): bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / phye ma rnams kyis mchod nas/ maN+Dal re re la gzungs lan bcu gsum bcu gsum gyi bar du bzlas la lci ba de bsdus te/ lcib lhag ma la bsngags
41b2(rgyud): shing nang pa la blugs na nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// lha dang klu la sogs pa'i dug gi nang thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig la grub par ma gyur na/ 'jam dpal
41b3(rgyud): thugs rje chen po nyid kyis mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas pa yin no// 'jam dpal thugs rje chen po nyid kyis dam bcas pa'i tshig go// 'jam dpal rgyal po chen po'i gnod pa ni gzungs 'dis
41b4(rgyud): snying nad 'bar ba las grol nas skye ba phyi ma la bde ba can gyi zhing khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal nyon cig/ sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la sogs pa sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu
41b5(rgyud): bcu rtsa dgus snying po 'di gsungs so// oM AHhrIHsa~M ha nA da hUM phaT/ da ltar nga nyid kyis brjod de/ rig sngags kyi snying po 'di lan cig brjod pas sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur
41b6(rgyud): srid pa nyam ngar 'gro mi 'gyur// lus la mtshon gyis tshugs mi 'gyur// dgra dang chom pos mi tshugs shing // klu la sogs pas 'tshe mi 'gyur// rtag tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur/
41b7(rgyud): bung med lus su mi 'gyur zhing // rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyur// shi nas bde ba can du 'gro// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang /
42a1(rgyud): thams cad skyob dang / log par dang sel dang / gser thub dang / 'od srungs kyis kyang gsang sngags 'di gsungs la/ da ltar shAkya thub pa ngas kyang brjod
42a2(rgyud): pab ste/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma ha ya grI bA ya/ na mo lo ke shwa rA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM hrIHku lu yu lu nI la kaN+Tha/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ hA hA hA hA
42a3(rgyud): badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hrIHhUM phaT/ 'jam dpal gzungs 'di 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid pad+ma ha ya grI ba'i sngags yin te/ lan cig klog par byed pa'i mi// sdig pa kun las
42a4(rgyud): grol 'gyur zhing // ngan song sgo rnams gcod par 'gyur// ku sogs gdon gyis 'tshe mi 'gyur// byad dang dug las grol 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yin no//
42a5(rgyud): bgrangs med mthu las byung // de yi yon tan dpag tu med// lan cig bklags na sdig pa sel// lan gnyis bklags pas dpal dang ldan// gsum gyis tshe rnams ring bar
42a6(rgyud): 'gyung// 'brum zlan bain+d+ha mas nal mthor 'gyur// ban+d+han+dan gyu dang der 'gro// 'jam pal mi gzhan dag la ni// zub dang bzhes pa las gyur ba da / rlung dang zang ba las
42a7(rgyud): pa dang / su rgyam rigs kyis zin pa dang / bu bram ze'i rigs kyis zin pa dang / gru gdol pa dang dmangs rigs kyis zin pa ni snying mi dga' ba dang / snying na ba dang / dbugs mthong
42b1(rgyud): d+ha dang / lho rgyab tu na pa dang / ma dkor dun pa dang / gnogs phyed ngun pa dang / mthu ba dang / khros pa dang / 'bum gyis btab pa dang / sdum pa lta bur rab dang / srog chags sun bang/
42b2(rgyud): tshigs dang sha khol bur na ba dang / ma khu can dang / lung pa glo can dang / rul khol dun pa dang / 'phres pa dang / zha ba dang / yi ga mi bde ba dang / zor pa lta bu'i nad dang / sman can
42b3(rgyud): dang / dmu chu can dang / 'bras dang / me dpal dang / lhog pa dang / gag pa dang / chu thig can dang / grang lhang lgang dang / tsha tsag tsag la sogs pa'i mdze rigs can dang / bol
42b4(rgyud): mig dang bcas pa dang / lha dang / bdud dang / tshangs pa dang / gshin rje dang / brag srin dang / sems 'khrugs gi gdon dang / zab gzho ba dang / mtsho sman dang / klul
42b5(rgyud): sogs pas zin pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / log 'dren dang / sha za'i gdon rnams kyis zin pa dang / nad sna tshogs 'byung ste/ de'ang mi dge ba las sdug
42b6(rgyud): bsngal 'byung ba yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal nyon cig/ snying po gzungs kyi cho ga 'di// dang po
42b7(rgyud): thugs rje chen po la// gus shing ngang pa'i sems bskyed nas// sbun pa'i sa la dkyil 'khor bya// la dzir bcas byugs nas ni// tshon rtsi kha dog sde lnga yis// dkyil
43a1(rgyud): 'khor ba d+ma lta bur bri// bum pa gang ba lnga dag kyang // phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga ru gzhag/ gang ba'i gtor ma lnga yang bshams// sang ldeng bur bu lnga yang dgo//
43a2(rgyud): dar gyis dkris pa'i mda' bzhi dgod// tshon skud lnga yi dra ba bre// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo// khro bo'i rgyal po rta mgrin la phyag 'tshal lo//
43a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ma gos dkar mo la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na la phyag 'tshal lo// a hrIHhrIHpaM/
43a4(rgyud): taM naM/ yi ge drug pa'i sngags 'di ni// brjod pas sdig pa sdug bsngal sel// swA hA/ sangs rgyas mchod la brtson par bya// me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba
43a5(rgyud): dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / phye ma dang / rgyan thams cad kyis mchod nas/ seng ldeng rgya shug me btang la// tshon skud bcang zhing 'bru rnams
43a6(rgyud): sreg/ rma bya smug shad lcug ma yis// klu yi dug rnams sel bar byed// hrIHnA ga le le/ nA ga dum ba le le/ nA ga phud phud/ ha le ha le/ hA la hA la/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/ nA ga khrol khrol
43a7(rgyud): sheg shig swA hU~M/ klu da'i log 'dren thams cad kyi yid kyi drug dang / mthong ba'i drug dang bcings pa'i dug dang / kha rlangs kyi drug dang / rig pa'i dug dang / dug thams cad phyir
43b1(rgyud): phung cig spya / drug 'dir ma 'dug cig/ sbyin par byed pa'i gam du mo ngasas/ 'dzin pa'i nang du so ni// me'i nang dum panag/ chu nang dum panag/ zhi bar gyur cig sna/ 'am
43b2(rgyud): dpal 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bsgyur ba'o// hrIHd+hu ma~M hA khaM/ rigs sngags dbang bskur ba'o// rdo rje srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur// bkra shis lha mo dpal
43b3(rgyud): dang ldan// bsnyen gnas la ni gnas gyur nas// dkon mchog rjes dran sems bskyed nas// bum chu dag pas las sgrib sel// lus ngag sems kyis dag pa thog// pha rol phyin
43b4(rgyud): drug gnas gyur cig/ sangs rgyas sems can mkhyen par 'gyur// ting 'dzin thams cad mngon du 'gyur/ bu mo gzhon nus bkal ba yi// srung pa dkar po gsum sgril la/
43b5(rgyud): bzlas brjod nyi shu brgyad bzlas na// mgul du btags na nang las grol// nad la phan pa'i sman rnams la// gzungs sngags bzlas shing btab gyur na// nang rnams kun las
43b6(rgyud): grol bar 'gyur// tshul gzungs sngags mang bzlas na// klu nang khong du sel bar 'gyur// lo tog za ba kha bcing na// bye ma sa dang thal bas sel// ha cang char pa ches pa na/
43b7(rgyud): lha la phul ba'i snying pa la// kham por gsar pa'i nang du yang // me tog gtsang ma blangs nas ni// bsregs na char pa 'chang bar 'gyur// ser ba drag po 'ong ba na// thal chen
44a1(rgyud): zhungs kar bzlas brjod kyis// ser ba nya lcibs lhag ma dang // lhum po btags te btsugs gyur na// ser ba 'chad par 'gyur ba yin// lA klu dri za la sogs/
44a2(rgyud): pa'i// gdon ni gnod par gyur pa la// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// bum pa gtsang ma lnga bzhag ste// sman sbyar chus ni gang ba la// bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas/
44a3(rgyud): slob ma gos zas dkar por sbyar// dkyil 'khor de yi nang du gzhug bum pa'i chu yis bkru bar bya// nad dang gnod pa kun las thar// klu sogs gdon rnams dpag med kyis/
44a4(rgyud): glags kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// bus pa gdon gyis 'jigs pa la// gi'u wang gis ni srung 'khor bri// yungs kar dag dang bcas te gdags// byis pa gdon dang nad las thar/
44a5(rgyud): lam du zhugs te 'gro ba na// thu ba g.yas pa'i gos kyi grwar// bzlas brjod bdun byas mdud pa bor// song na bde zhing don yang 'grub// rta la sogs pa'i phyugs rnams la/
44a6(rgyud): chu dang yungs kar bcas pa la// bzlas nas gtor na bde bar 'gyur// mi nang phyugs nad thams cad la// yungs dkar dang ni bum pa'i chus// bkru zhing btags na mi na pa ni/
44a7(rgyud): a s+pha ri l-i gzungs sel ltar// las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal rgyal
44b1(rgyud): po 'di'i long na kru'i dug gis gang nas 'dug ste/ 'di ni nu'i rgyal po b.ru Na 'di sa klu thams cad la dbang byed pa yin pas 'dri dbyung bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyugs
44b2(rgyud): sgra la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i rgyal po tak+Sha ka la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i rgyal po pad+ma la phyag 'tshal lo//
44b3(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po pad+ma chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i rgyal po dung skyong la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i rgyal po rigs ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i rgyal po dga' bo la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i rgyal po
44b4(rgyud): nor rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// oM ba ru NA ya swA hA/ oM a nan+ta ya swA hA/ oM bA su kA ya swA hA/ oM tak+Sha kA ya swA hA/ oM karko TA ya swA hA/ oM pad+ma ya swA hA/ oM ma hA bad+d+ha swA hU~M/ oM
44b5(rgyud): shaM kha pA lA ya swA hA/ oM ku li kA ya swA hA/ klu yi gzugs ni meng po yang // dkar gsum mngar gsum 'bras zan la// legs byas kha dog ba sbyar byas la// me tog spos dang byug
44b6(rgyud): pa dang // mar mi zhal zas sgra snyan dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan me tog 'phreng // tshangs pa'i skud pas mnyes par bya// rtsa ba lo ma sdong bu dang // me tog 'bras bu sman gyis
44b7(rgyud): mchod// rma bya gzugs mo me long gis// rgyal po khong gi dug thon cig/ rin chen rmag shang mchod pa'i rten// mi ldog pa yi rdzas su chongs// bum pa gter gyis gang ba mdzes// srog
45a1(rgyud): chags yid 'ongs gzugs kyis mchod// zhi 'gyur 'dil the tshom med// klu yi rgyal po 'jog po yis/ zin kyang skad cig gcig la zon// 'jam dpal 'ang/
45a2(rgyud): gzhan gyi mthu ma yin te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i mthu'o// stobs so// byin gyi rlabs so// thugs rje dang ldan pa 'di'i yon tan brjod kyis mi yang yang bdag gi cha
45a3(rgyud): shas tsam zhig brjod na/ oM bcom ldan 'das bya ba byas shing byed pa byas// khur bor bdag don rjes su brnyes// srid par sbyor ba yongs su zad// yang dag bka' las rnam par grol/
45a4(rgyud): sems dpa' dbang sgyur thams cad kyi// mchog tu pha rol phyin thob pa// srid las brgal zhing tshogs gnyis rdzogs// AHgzhan la phan brtson thugs brtse can// sems can kun la
45a5(rgyud): mchog tu byams// khams gsum kun gyi gnyen gcig pu// mtha' yas sems can sgrol la mkhas// hrIH'gro ba nyam thag kun tu skyob// dri ma gsum spangs pha rol phyin// mngon shes
45a6(rgyud): drug brnyes n+ya gro bu// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams ni// sum cu rtsa gnyis dag dang ldan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes// sku mdog shel gyi kha dog 'dra// gangs ri nyi shar lta bur
45a7(rgyud): mtshan// sla da chel 'od zer 'bar// rigs sngags sangs rgyas sbal 'gro// dbu ma thor tshugs gyen la brjes// dbul 'di pas med pa bzhugs// thu rnams thams cad 'dul
45b1(rgyud): mdzad pa// rtse gsum sbrul gyis rab tu dkris// rigs gsum mgon po'i byin rlabs 'dzin// dug gsum rtsad nas gcod la bstod// skyon gyis mgos pad+ma bsnams// shes rab zur sum
45b2(rgyud): ral gri 'bar// nyon mongs dag pa zam ze'i mgo// me tog phrin mtshogs kyis bkang // bu rnams kun nas dbang bsdus pas// sbrul gyi tshangs srung mdzes la bstod// sa~M ha bad dag gid
45b3(rgyud): la bzhugs// bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon mdzad pa// seng ge dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs// 'dod pa'i don rnams sgrub pa'i phyir// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// ba spu nyag ma re
45b4(rgyud): re yang // sems can kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// phyag 'tshal thugs rje can la bstod// dam chos rgyal tshab dbang bskur ba// lha mo sgrol ma rjes su 'brang // 'jigs pa brgyad skyob sku
45b5(rgyud): mdog ldang // gnod pa sel ba mi 'jigs sbyin// ut+pal thugs rje'i bdag nyid can// btud de sprul pa mang po 'gyed// tsA gos dkar ma ni bka' bzhin byed// yid bzhin 'khor lo
45b6(rgyud): bde bar bskor// 'dod pa'i don yod sdug bsngal ni// 'jigs pa brgyad po sel la bstod// phaT/ ha ya grI ba khro bo'i sra// 'phags pa rta mgrin bdung bzhi 'joms// kro d+ha mgrin ston/
45b7(rgyud): gdug pa 'dul// klu bdud 'dul mdzad hUM gis bstod// nA nam mkha' klu rgyal ba ru Na// chu lnga ston pa'i zhal mthong zhing // bstan la rab dga' klu rnams 'dul// sa dang po 'i
46a1(rgyud): bden pa mthong // bde bar gshegs pa'i ring bsrel 'dzin// klu rgyal byang chub sems la bstod// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ oM ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te/ ka ta kar
46a2(rgyud): swA hA/ gang gis bstod cing zlos pa de mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'ang yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags thams
46a3(rgyud): cad bzlas par 'gyur ro// bskal pa stong gi bar du ngan song du mi skye'o// bud med kyi lus su mi skye'o// su zhig nang par langs nas chu dri zhim pos khrus byas te gtsang sbra la gnas nas/
46a4(rgyud): thugs rje chen po seng ge sgra'i spyan sngar gzungs 'di klog gam/ 'dri 'am/ 'chang ngam/ klog tu 'jug gam/ kha ton du bton nas snying po dang gzungs sngags zlos na ni/ de'i lus
46a5(rgyud): la 'dze dang / shu ba dang / phol mig dang / 'bras dang / bas baljags dang / me dpal dang / g.yan pa dang / ldog pa dang / gag pa dang / ltos pa dang / dmu chu dang
46a6(rgyud): skem pa dang / mkhal ma rdol ba dang / don sdod du 'dus pa dang / byad kyi dkyil 'khor la nang sna tshogs 'dus pa dang / glob na ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / rlung ma khris padakan
46a7(rgyud): 'dus pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzungs 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// su zhig gam rgyal po des gzungs 'di glegs
46b1(rgyud): bam la bros te 'chang ba dang / thog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / mchong ba dang / mi ger 'dri ba dang / grong ngam/ grong khyer ram glong rdal lam/ ljongs sam rgyal po lum
46b2(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa 'am/ gtsug lag khang du glegs pam 'di 'chang na/ dpal nag po chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / klu'i rgyal po b.rA NA dang / gru chen po brgyad rnams srung
46b3(rgyud): bzhin 'brang zhing / dpag tshad stong tshun chad du slar rgol ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / gdon ma rungs pa thams cad dang / log par 'dren pa dang / phyir rgol ba thams
46b4(rgyud): cad 'joms par 'gyur ro// skom nyes pa dang / bri nyes pa dang / sngags nor ba dang / phyag rgya nor ba dang / bshad nyes pa dang / mnyan pa nor ba'ang gzungs 'di bklags pas dag
46b5(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// gzungs 'dis su la bsrung ba byas pa dang / yongs su bskyab pa byas pa dang / bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su byas pa de la mtshon dang / dug dang / dbyig
46b6(rgyud): drug dang / byang dang / gshed ma dang / rims dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / dus ma yin par 'chi bas mi tshugs so// gnod par byed po tshar gcod par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
46b7(rgyud): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / nyan thos chen po shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i
47a1(rgyud): 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sku zhes bya ba'i gzungs
47a2(rgyud): rdzogs so// / kha che'i yul dur khrod 'bris ka rang byung gi mchod rten rtsar dngos grub brnyes pa'i rje btsun ma rdo rje sems ma dang / sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba 'gar shes rab
47a3(rgyud): 'byung gnas zhes bya bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA
47a4(rgyud): kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA oM a ka Te/ bi ka Te/ ni ka Te/ ka TaM ka Te/ ka ro Te/ ka ro Te/ bAr+ye swA hA/ bcom ldan 'dis de'i spyan sngar ba'i lci ba sa lem lhung bas so sor maN+Da la
47a5(rgyud): brgyad byas la/ maN+Dal re re la lan bcu gsum gyi bar du bzlas la/ lci ba lhag ma la sngags bzlas te nad pa la nye bar byugs na nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// gal te nyi ma bdun nam/
47a6(rgyud): bcu gsum mam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gis 'grub ste/ mtshams med pa lnga byas pa ni ma yin no// de ltar ma grub na bdag gis mtshams med pa lnga byas par 'gyur ro// seng ge sgra'i gzungs
47a7(rgyud): rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ngag gi dbang phyug dang / glog skya shes rab brtsegs kyis bsgyur ba'o//
47b1(rgyud): gar gang du/ A ba mag te gar snyamam sa sha ta kar/ zod mang du/ 'phags pa stan ras gzigs dbang byug gi mtshan brgyartsa brgyad pa/ sangs chus dang drang chub sams dpa' bams/
47b2(rgyud): cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang ri po Ta la'i rtse mo na me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs
47b3(rgyud): kyis brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu na dI'i gser gyi kha dog dang 'dra ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kun tu 'bar ba'i sa phyogs na bzhugs te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lham
47b4(rgyud): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
47b5(rgyud): stong du mas bcom ldan 'das la bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gror byas/ mchod cing bkur stir byas te/ yongs su bskor nas mdun du byas pa la chos ston te/ thog mar
47b6(rgyud): dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su byung ba/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su gsal ba
47b7(rgyud): tshangs par spyod pa 'ba' zhig yang dag par rab tu ston to// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
48a1(rgyud): la bstod pa/ kyai bcom ldan 'das/ bya ba byas shing byed la mkhas// khur bor bdag don rjes su brnyes// srid pa sbyor ba yongs su zad// yang dag dka' la rnam/
48a2(rgyud): grol sems// shes rab shin tu rnam par grol// klu chen po ni cang shes po// sems la dbang sgyur thams cad kyis// mchog tu pha rol phyin pa thob// ye shes tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs// /
48a3(rgyud): srid pa'i dgon pa rab tu brgal// gzhan la phan pa mdzad la brtson// thugs rje dang ni 'brel ba'i thugs// skye dgu kun la mchog tu byams// bde bar brtson pa byams las byung // mtha'
48a4(rgyud): yas sems can grol la mkhas// bde bar gshegs pa nyid las skyes// bde bar gshegs pa nyid kyi bkal// khams gsum kun gyi gnyen gcig pu// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti
48a5(rgyud): mug med// dri ma gsum ni rab tu spangs// rig pa gsum gyi pha rol phyin// mngon par shes pa drug kyang brnyes// n+ya gro d+ha ni lta bur zlum// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams ni// sum
48a6(rgyud): cu rtsa gnyis dag dang ldan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad nus kyang // sku ni rnam pa kun tu brgyan// sku mdog gser gyi kha dog 'dra// sku tshad tshil dkar sham po// nAg ge sar gzhon du sbyar/
48a7(rgyud): rlung za dang mar ba 'dra ba'i mdog/ dbu yi thor tsugs ngag dang ldan/ zor tsugs mang pos nye bar g.yogs// dbul 'ong dpag med po bzhugs// 'od zer ngag ni rnam par 'phro// 'od 'gro
48b1(rgyud): 'dom gang rab tu 'bar// gser gyi ri 'dra grags pas khyab// gzi brjid dag kyang rab tu che// shar gyi ri la 'char ba yi// nyi ma'i gtsug tor dag dang ldan// nor bu rin chen 'bar ba yis// se/
48b2(rgyud): ral khar ni sku phyed brgyan// sa dag la ni rab tu mkhas// pha rol phyin pa bcu rnams spyod// tshul khrims ma nyams ral ba med// mthon ka seng ge'i ral pa 'dra// sku ni 'jam zhing ldem bag can//
48b3(rgyud): gzigs shing gshegs pa khyu mchog 'dra// g.yas su 'khyil ba'i dung yang 'dra// dpral ba zla ba kham pa 'dra// dpral ba'i dbyibs kyi rgya yang che// smin mtshams par yang yong ma chad// sha
48b4(rgyud): kyi dbyibs kyang cung zad mtho// mgur yang bum pa'i mgrin pa 'dra// dpung pa dag kyang rab tu zlum// phyag sor rnams kyi tshigs kyang ring // sor mo 'jam zhing cung zad dmar// phyag sor rnams
48b5(rgyud): kyi bar 'brel ba// phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil rnams la// 'khor lo dag gis rab tu brgyan// ston ka'i pad+ma 'dra bar mdzes// sku mdangs 'jam shing shangs kyang rgyas// gsung ni tshangs pa'i
48b6(rgyud): dbyangs ltar snyan// yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur// blta na sdug cing mdangs dga' ba// pad+ma las 'khrungs pad+ma 'dra// pad+ma dag las kun tu skyes// pad+ma dag gi gdan la bzhugs// phyag na
48b7(rgyud): pad+ma bzang po bsdams// rim pa spyi thugs phyag na bsdams// khri snyan sa le'i pags pa man bas// dbyug pa dang de bgrang 'phreng 'dzin// bkra shos dag gis gtsang mar gyur// snga nas gsung
49a1(rgyud): zhing gsong por gsungs// bdud rtsi'i char ni rab tu 'bebs// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'dra// sems can thams cad dga' bar mdzad// bzang po snang ba'i ljon shing
49a2(rgyud): ltar// sems can kun gyi gsos su 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi ni sprul pa lags// bde bar gshegs pa'i cha lugs mnga'// bde bar gshegs pa'i ring bsrel 'dzin// ba spu nyag ma re re yang //
49a3(rgyud): sems can rnams kyi gtso bor 'gyur// bsod nams mdzad cing dge ba mdzad// bshol ba med cing nges par mdzad// rab tu drag pa'i brtson 'grus can// 'khor ba dag las rab tu brgal// dam chos
49a4(rgyud): rgyal mtshan mnga' gsol ba// yid bzhin 'khor lo dge ba sbyor// don yod zhags pa sdug bsngal 'dren// ha ya grI ba bdud bzhi 'joms// kro d+ha mgrin sngon gdug pa sel// lha mo sgrol ma rjes su 'brang //
49a5(rgyud): khro gnyer can ni bka' bzhin byed// rgyal ba can ni tshul dang ldan// mthu chen ldan zhing dnga' dang ldan// yon tan ldem ning byams dang ldan// shes rab ldan zhing dpal dang ldan// tshul khrims ldan
49a6(rgyud): zhing don dang ldan// don rnams kun ni rig pa bo// the tshom thams cad gcod papo// chos rnams thams cad srab po// 'jig rten rnams kyi ston pa po// zhal bzang zla ba nya ba 'dra// sku srang rin
49a7(rgyud): chen kun gyis brgyan// gamar gyi nga ldang 'drab gnas// 'das kyi mthong bas sdug/ tshangs pa la lags byasag bgyis pa'o// 'phags pa stan ngas gzigs dbang drug lamatshan brtsam na
49b1(rgyud): kyis gang zhig bstong pa byed pa de mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i las kyi slob pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags thams cad kyang 'grub
49b2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// bskal pa stong gi bar du'ang ngan 'gror mo skye'o// mnar med par mi 'gro'o// su zhig nang par langs nas klog gam/ klog tu 'jug gam/ kha ton du 'don na mi de'i lus la ma
49b3(rgyud): dang / shu ba dang / glo na pa dang / dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pa'i nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// skyes so cog tu skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i
49b4(rgyud): dus kyi tshe na'ang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// gar skyes kyang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na yid
49b5(rgyud): gzhungs par 'gyur ro// sems dpa' bar 'gyur ro// dbyangs snyan par 'gyur ro// gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas par 'gyur ro// bstod pa 'dis bstod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan
49b6(rgyud): 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma drug cu rtsa gnyis snyed la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// rnam par smin pa'ang de dang 'dra bas na bye brag med do// rgyal ba thams cad kyi ring bsrel rin po che za ma tog ces bya ba/
49b7(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// @rgya gar skang du/ sAr+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra s+ya nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta/
50a1(rgyud): bod skad du/ 'phags pa stan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshas so// 'dra
50a2(rgyud): skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas ri gru 'dzin gyi rtse mo me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs bkram pa/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser kha
50a3(rgyud): dog bzang po ltar snang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs snang ba'i sa phyogs na bzhugs te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci
50a4(rgyud): dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas te mchod cing rjed nas
50a5(rgyud): yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to// tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs/
50a6(rgyud): su rdzogs pa/ yongs su byang ba yang dag pa rab tu ston to// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa/ kyai bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa
50a7(rgyud): mdzad pa/ mdzad rgya mdzad pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su brnyes pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su bsal ba/ yang dag pa'i mkhyen pas thugs shin tu rnam par grol ba/ 6
50b1(rgyud): mkhyen pa/ glang po che chen po dang / sems thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa/ ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa/ srid pa'i dgon pa las brgal ba/ gzhan la sma pa/ thugs rje dang/
50b2(rgyud): 'brel ba'i thugs mnga' ba/ skye dgu la mchog tu mnyes gshin pa/ bde ba rab tu stsol bar mdzad pa/ byams pas zhugs pa/ sems can mtha' yas pa sgrol ba la mkhas pa/ bde bar
50b3(rgyud): gshegs pa'i sras po/ srid pa gsum gyi rtsa lag gcig pu/ 'dod chags mi mnga' ba/ zhe sdang mi mnga' ba/ gti mug mi mnga' ba/ dri ma gsum spangs pa/ rig pa gsum gyi pha rol tu gshegs
50b4(rgyud): pa/ mngon par shes pa drug brnyes pa/ shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa/ pags pa srab cing
50b5(rgyud): mdog ser ba/ sku ring rgyu bzang zhing dkar ba/ sku shing gi me tog gsar pa dang dmar rengs lta bu'i dbu thor tsugs mnga' ba/ lcang lo 'khyil ba mang pos dbu khebs pa/ 'od dpag med
50b6(rgyud): kyis 'od zer btang ba/ 'bar ba'i 'od 'dom gang gis gser gyi ri bo ltar snyan par grags pa/ gzi brjid rgya che ba/ gzugs 'char ka'i ri lta bu gtsug tor mnga' ba/ nor bu rab tu
50b7(rgyud): 'bar ba mchod byer thogs pa spul se ral du thogs pa/ sa rab tu rnam par 'byed pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i zhabs dang ldan po/ rdul khrims ma nyams pa/ tshul khrims ma zhig pa/
51a1(rgyud): / seng ge ltar thong ga phel ga che ba/ sku 'jam zhing mdzes pa/ gzigs pa dang gshegs stabs kyu mchog gi dbang po 'drab/ mkhur ba g.yas su 'khyil ba/ dbul /
51a2(rgyud): che zhing zla ba khams pa 'dral thig le mnga' ba/ phyag pus mor bslebs pa/ smin ma par ma chang ba/ shangs mtho ba/ mgur bum pa'i mgrin pa 'dra ba phyag sor mo dang tshigs ring ba ga seMn
51a3(rgyud): mo 'jam zhing zangs kyi mdog 'dra ba/ phyag bar dra bas 'brel ba/ phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor los brgyan pa/ ston ka'i pad+ma 'dra ba/ sku 'jam zhing rgyas pa/ tshangs pa ltar dbyangs zab
51a4(rgyud): pa yid du mchi ba/ sdug pa/ blta na sdug pa/ nyams dga' bar bgyid pa/ 'od pad+ma 'dra ba/ pad+ma las 'khrungs pa/ pad+ma las byung ba/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ phyag na pad+ma
51a5(rgyud): mnga' ba/ phyag na ril ba spyi blugs bsnams pa/ ri dgas nag po'i pags pa mnabs pa/ phyag 'khar bsnams pa/ bgrang ba'i nor bu bsnams pa/ gtsang ba spangs pa/ gsong por
51a6(rgyud): gsung ba/ bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu/ blta na sdug pa'i shing 'dra ba/ sems can thams cad mos par mdzad pa/ dga' bar mdzad pa/ sems can thams
51a7(rgyud): cang bar 'tsho ba sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa/ bde bar gshegs pa'i snga mnga' ba/ bde bar gshegs pa'i ring bsrel 'dzin pa/ spu re re skyes pa/ sems can gyi snying po/ bsod nams
51b1(rgyud): mang sa/ dag pam sa/ nges par mdza sa/ na 'grus pa dang/ 'khor b.lamasam 'das pa/ dmapa tshas pa rgyas btu bang sgru / sgrol ma 'angs byu nas/
51b2(rgyud): gnyer can bka' bzhin bgyid pa / rgyal ba dang ldan pa/ tshul dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pa/ mthu rtsal che ba/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ byams pa dang ldan pa/ zhi ba dang ldan pa/ nul
51b3(rgyud): khrims dang ldan pa/ skal ba dang ldan pa/ don dang ldan pa/ don rnams thugs su chud pa/ the tshom rnams gcod pa/ chos rnams gsung ba/ 'jig rten rnams kyi ston pa/ zhal gyi
51b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor yongs su rgyas pa/ sku rked pa'i phyogs rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/ gser gyi mchod sdong lta bu/ sku nyi ma stong pas lhag par mdzes pa/ tshangs pa'i dbang po la sogs/
51b5(rgyud): pas phyag bgyis pa lags so// gang la la zhig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa sgrub pa byed pa de'i mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa rnam
51b6(rgyud): par byang bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro// de la gsang sngags thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// bskol pa bye ba 'bum phrag du mar ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi
51b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// mtshams med par 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// su zhig nang par langs nas 'don tam/ klog gam/ kha don byed na de'i lus la mang dang / rkang shu dang / lung ba dang / mi bde ba
52a1(rgyud): mi 'byung zhing nang thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs so cog tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i dus kyi na 'jig rten gyi/
52a2(rgyud): khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs so cog tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro// dpa'
52a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ skad snyan par 'gyur/ skal ba bzang por 'gyur/ bstan bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ tshig btsun par 'gyur ro// ba stod pa sgrub pa 'dis pa stod pa
52a4(rgyud): byas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung drug cu rtsa gnyis snyed kyi bye ma snyed dag la mchod pa byas par 'gyur te/ rnam par smin pa mtshungs shing bye brag med par 'gyur ro// 'phags
52a5(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyud pa rgyal ba thams cad kyi ring bsrel gyi za ma tog ces bya ba rdzogs so// // rgya gar
52a6(rgyud): skad du/ Ar+ya ru tsi ra ang ga~M yASh+Ti nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lus kyi dbyibs mdzes zhes bya ba'i gzungs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
52a7(rgyud): 'tshal lo// na mo bi pu la bi ma ni su pre tiSh+Tha ta a sang khA ya/ sUr+yA sha ta sa ha sra a ti ra~M ka te dza/ pra b+hA a be b+hA si ta mAr+ha ye ma hA ma Ni mu Ta kuN+Da la~M/ a laM kA ra d+hA ri Ne b+ha ga bA te pad+ma pA Na
52b1(rgyud): ye sarba lo ka a pa lang sha man sa/ bi bi d+ha khu la sa ma pA sha a biSh+Ta/ sarba satwa pa mo tsa kA ya/ dad+ya thA/ oM b+hur thu ba sAh+ma/ ma hA A lo ka ka ra Na ma swa mi rab ta la bi nA sha ka/ rAg/
52b2(rgyud): dwe Sha ma hA mo ha dz+wa la sha ma ka/ sha sa ka rak+Sha ka/ sarba a pa ya dun ti pra sha ma ka/ sarba satwa sa mA shA sa nA ka ra/ sarbaM A shA pa ri pA rA ka/ sarba ta thA ga ta saM b+ha na kA ra/ h+ye he ma hA bo d+hi satwA/
52b3(rgyud): ba ra ba ra dA ya kA/ pad+ma A lo ka saM b+ha ta/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka dza TA mu ku TA/ a lang kri ta shi ra/ ma Ni ka Na ka rA dza/ sha ta badz+ra bai DUR+Ya a lang kri ta sha rI ra a mi tA b+ha dzi na ka ma la a laM
52b4(rgyud): kr-i ta / pra b+ha ra Na rA dzA na sha ta sa ha sra A b+hi la sha ti kA ya/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra bi d+ha ma b+hi d+ha ma/ bi nA sha ya/ bi nA sha ya/ ma hA yAM tra kre sha ka ba TA a ba ba d+ha bi bo d+hi satwa sa ra tsa ra ka pra ma thA na/
52b5(rgyud): pu ru Sha pad+ma / pu ru Sha nA ga/ pu ru Sha sA ga ra/ pu ru Sha si ha/ bi ha/ bi ra dza/ su dan ta pa ri bri ta/ d+ha ma d+ha ma sa ma sa ma/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ pra shA sa ya pra shA sa ya/ pra d+ha na sa ya/
52b6(rgyud): prad+ha na sa pa/ b+hai ro g+ho ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ ba~M d+hi ri bi d+hi ra~M/ bi ri bi ri/ bi bi ri ba bi ri/ tsi tsa ri/ si ra sa ra~M/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu la~M mu yA/ mAn su \u0f7f/ d+hun d+hu na/ bi d+yAn bad+d+ha
52b7(rgyud): nang d+ha dradra du/ gsas/ gtul gargyas/ bamangs thams grangs dra nab ba dz+ra krig bas/ cing / mtshar macing / d+ha kro d+ha tsa/ mang mni/ mam /
53a1(rgyud): sha ta pra se ka/ a ba b+ha si tA ma hA bi Sha sha ma ka/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba rang swAt+ma/ bcom ldan 'das lag na pad+ma'i lus kyi dbyibs mdzes zhes bya ba'i gzungs byang chub
53a2(rgyud): dpa'i khang bzang dam pa/ rdo rje chen pos legs par gsungs pa/ lha dang / klu dang / sbyin byed ma'i bu dang / mi 'am ci dang / lha ma yin chen pos bstod pa/ re ba thams cad phun sum tshog
53a3(rgyud): par byed pa 'di sgrib pa chen pos bsgribs pa gang la la zhig nyan tam/ 'chang ngam/ 'don tam/ klog gam/ mthong nas legs par rtogs par byed na/ de'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa
53a4(rgyud): thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// nang par langs nas lan cig 'don na lag na pad+ma phyir 'brang bar 'gyur ro// yid la gang dag 'dod pa'i dgos pa bsam pa tsam gyis 'grub par
53a5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gcig pu rab tu dben par 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba mngon du dmigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lag na pad+ma rjes su dran par byas la lan bdun brjod na dam pa ci 'dod pa
53a6(rgyud): thob par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// de'i ngan 'gro thams cad 'gag par 'gyur ro// yud tsam zhig 'chag cing 'dug la yid la brjod na bskal pa bye ba 'bum
53a7(rgyud): phrag du mar bsags pa'i las 'byang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba stong gis bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs tshe rabs su'ang pad+ma'i rigs chen
53b1(rgyud): bor skye bar 'gyur ro// skye bo khyad par du 'phags pas bkur bar 'gyur ro// me tog dri zhim pos snyim pa bkang ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du lan bdun brjod na
53b2(rgyud): yon tan chen po stong thob par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po'i chos nyid snang ba'ang de la skye bar 'gyur ro// dam pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nyid kyi gdong du bltas te bzlas brjod byas
53b3(rgyud): na bcom ldan 'das zhal rtag tu bzhad pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur zhing / chos snang ba'i gsal ba dang po dri ma med par byed pa zhes bya ba 'thob par 'gyur
53b4(rgyud): ro tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob por 'gyur ro// sems mnyam par bzhag bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs thams cad du tshe rabs dran par
53b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par byed par 'dod na/ tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya ba la spyang ba byas la gos dkar po bgos te/ ring bsrel dang
53b6(rgyud): bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsan dan dkar pos dkyil 'khor bskus la/ dkyil 'khor de dang bcom ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs gtor te/ bcom ldan
53b7(rgyud): 'das dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri zhim po'i bdug pa dang / mar me dang / spos kyis bsti stang byas te/ de nyid du 'dug la lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na/ des
54a1(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa byed pa'ang sdig pa byang zhing shin tu yongs su dag pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang ldan pa dang / shin tu yongs su
54a2(rgyud): dag pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi spyod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rtag par rgyun du ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / dbang bskur ba'i stobs dang /
54a3(rgyud): sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs dang / ye shes khyad par can gyi stobs sgrub par mdzad do// gnam la gyen du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na char 'bab bo// sa la bltas te bzlas brjod
54a4(rgyud): byas na lo tog thams cad legs par 'gyur ro// 'bab chu dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing bu'i shul du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na chu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad la lag
54a5(rgyud): pas bya ba cing bzlas brjod byas na sos par 'gyur ro// dran pa nyams pa'i mdun du bzlas brjod byas na dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ro// bkres pa dang skom pa'i gdong du bltas te bzlas brjod/
54a6(rgyud): byas na phyid par 'gyur ro// mi ngas chen po byung na ras la bris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags te/ dpag tshang tshun chad mtshams bcad pa dang bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa
54a7(rgyud): lus kyi dbyibs mdzes zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab
54b1(rgyud): ba'o @/ rgya gar snang du/ Ar+ya a b+ha ya pra dA nA ma a ba ra d+hi ta/ bong sa dadu/ 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa mi 'jigs pa stan pa zhes bya/
54b2(rgyud): ba sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// grub pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la
54b3(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal
54b4(rgyud): sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal las grol bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can thams cad kyi bcings pa gcod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sems
54b5(rgyud): can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas 'jigs pa med pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po 'di brjod par bya'o// wa
54b6(rgyud): kun byed pa dge ba ste// 'byung po kun gyi 'jigs pa med// bdud rtsi'i las ni bdud rtsi 'byung // 'di ni las kun byed pa yin// dgra kun 'jigs par byed pa ste// brjod dang de bzhin 'thab
54b7(rgyud): ba dang // gzhan yang dgras ni 'khor ba dang // rtsod pa'i nang du rtsod byed dang // rtag tu dgra dang phrad pa dang // rmugs par byed cing rengs par byed// rmongs par byed cing sdig pa sel//
55a1(rgyud): drug dang me ni dengs par byed// rims dang nyes sdig thams cad sel// chom rkun dang ni chu dang sbrul// rmi lam ngan pa thams cad sel// 'byung po thams cad zlog pa yin//
55a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub 'dren pa dang // chos kun rab tu ston pa ste// 'di ni rig sngags mthu stobs can// gzhan gyis mi thub srin po 'joms// gang tshe rig sngags 'di 'chang ba// de nas
55a3(rgyud): 'di g.yo bar 'gyur// 'jigs med ldan pa zhes bya ba'i// rig sngags rgyal po bla na med// 'jig rten mgon pos gsungs pa ste// 'jig rten gsum po kun gyis mchod// de nas
55a4(rgyud): 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran par byas nas/ rang gi snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
55a5(rgyud): gsung ba 'di smras so// au ta rA ta ra/ tA raM tA re/ mo ri ke/ tsan+da pra b+he/ b+hI ri b+hai ri/ tsi rau tsi rau/ sUr+ya kan te/ he ma pra b+hUH/ bu d+ha bu d+hA/ bo d+ha ni/ sarba pA pa pra sha ma ni/
55a6(rgyud): tsa ra tsa ra/ bi Sha pra sha ma nitsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ sarba bi d+hA rA na ma kri te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ sarba ta thA ga taM b+ha Shi ta/ ba ra ba ra/ pi ri bi ri/ pu ru pu ru/ pradz+nyA
55a7(rgyud): bA ra mi tA/ a nu drA te/ Sha Ta pA rA mi tA/ ba ri pU re/ ga ga na/ d+hi ba lo ko ba ma/ ta thA ga ta/ ba shi ta/ prA ti ka ri/ shud+ha ka ri/ ba bi tra/ mang ga la d+hA ri Ni/ sarba de ba ta ya
55b1(rgyud): d+hiSh+Thi te/ sarba ma ho ra ga a d+hiSh+Ti te/ sarba kin na ra a d+hiSh+Thi te/ sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa/ a d+hiSh+Ti d+he pra sA d+ha b+ha Shi te/ in+d+ra b+ha Shi te/ tsa tur ma hA rA dzA b+hA Shi te/ tsan+d+ra sUr+ya b+hA Shi te/ oM ti ri ti ri/
55b2(rgyud): tsan+dan+d+ra kA ri Ni/ ki li ki li/ sarba sha dz+nyA bi na sha ni hUM phaT swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ byang
55b3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ de bzhin gsheg
55b4(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten
55b5(rgyud): du byung ste/ de las bdag gis 'di dag thos so// de las bzung nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / sems can thams cad la'ang bsnyad do// mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa gzhan gyis mi thub
55b6(rgyud): pa'i snying po 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / 'khor ba 'jig dang / gser thub dang / 'od srungs dang /
55b7(rgyud): shAkya thub pa rnams kyis gsungs so// gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po 'dini bdag srung ba dang / gzhan srung ba dang / gnyis ka srung ba dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljong/
56a1(rgyud): dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang srung ba dang / srog sbyong ba dang / tshe sbyin pa dang / lag pa rengs par byed pa dang / 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang /
56a2(rgyud): 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa thams cad zlog par byed pa/ dgra thams cad zlog pa/ 'ching ba thams cad grol bar byed pa/ thams cad du gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o// shud d+he muk+She pra/ b+hA swa re
56a3(rgyud): shA te bad bA ra bA si ni// sarba duSh+TA na dzaM b+ha yA mi/ stam b+hA yA mi/ mo ha yA mi/ oM swA hA/ sa bi tre swA hA/ shwe te swAhA/ shA te pa ta pra bi ti swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ ta re ra re/ ta ri Ni rak+Sha rak+Sha/ sarba
56a4(rgyud): ka li/ ka la ha/ bi gra ha/ bau b+ha ta/ duHsrab na/ b+ha ye b+h+yaHswA hA/ rtag tu le lo med par ni gang zhig gzungs 'di 'chang byed pa// de la lha tshogs thams cad kyang /
56a5(rgyud): dus kun tu ni srung bar byed// de ni 'jigs par 'gyur ba med// de ni rtag srung lhan ner 'dug/ ji ltar nyi ma sa steng na// gzi brjid grags 'chang lhan ne bzhin// de la gshed byed byed stems dang /
56a6(rgyud): srul po dag gis mi tshugs te// de la dpal yon 'jug par 'gyur// kha dog dang ni tshe yang 'phel// 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// /
56a7(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// dkon
56b1(rgyud): mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
56b2(rgyud): snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM dzi ye dza ye/ ma hA dza ye/ dza yA ba hi ni/ dza yota ta ri/ ka la ka la/ ma la ma la
56b3(rgyud): tsa la tsa la/ k+Shi nak+Shi na/ sarba karma/ A ba ra Na ni/ me sarba dz+nyA na a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ na mo b+ha ga ti ha sa pra b+ha d+ha/ sarba bud+d+ha a ba lo ke ta tsak+Shu/ shro tra g+hA Na dzi hA kA ya ma no bi d+ha dz+nyA na bi sho d+ha
56b4(rgyud): ni swAh+ma/ phu ru phu ru su ru su ru/ phu rA phu rA pra phu rA pra phu rA / sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te swAhAd+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he swA hA/ a b+hA ba swA hA/ sarba d+harma a ba bo d+ha ni sA hA/ gzungs 'di'i
56b5(rgyud): cho ga ni 'di yin te/ lan cig brjod pas kyang bskal pa stong gi bar du las kyi sgrib pa bsags pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas stong gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa thob par 'gyur/
56b6(rgyud): ro bskal pa stong gi bar du 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro// tshe brjes nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas stong mthong
56b7(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum nyi shu rtsa re re brjod na ci 'dod pa rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
57a1(rgyud): sku gser gyi mdog can yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yul rnams la'ang mi phyed pa'i sems dad pa can du 'gyur te/ de la sogs pa
57a2(rgyud): phan yon tshad med pa dag 'byung ngo // stong 'gyur zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems
57a3(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ a ba lo ki ni/ ba lo ki ni/ pra b+hA lo ki ni/ dz+nyA ba ha pa ri sho
57a4(rgyud): d+ha ni/ d+hi da ni ya ga me/ A shA pa ri sho d+ha ni/ sarba satwa ma no ra thaM/ kA ya sid d+he shru ti d+hA ra NI smi ti d+hA ra Ni swA hA/ cho ga zhag bdun gyi bar du shing a pa marga'i so shing la lan bdun bzlas brjod
57a5(rgyud): byas te nang re zhing zos na/ nyin gcig la sho lo ka brgya brgya lobs so// zla ba drug gi bar du byas na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sho lo ka brgya lobs pa rdzogs so//
57a6(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
57a7(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ kha li kha li ba li te swA hA/ gdong 'khru ba'i tshe chu khyor gang la sngags 'dis lan gsum ma ma lan bdun bzlas te 'thungs na/ nyin gcig kyang yi ge sho lo ka
57b1(rgyud): brgya longs par 'gyur te/ sngon lobs pa rnams kyang brjed par mi 'gyur ro// sho lo ka brgya lobs pa rdzogs so// / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub
57b2(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// bI ri bI re/ ma hI te dze te dza ma ti d+hA ra Ni/ shru ta d+hA ra Ni dza san te badz+ra/
57b3(rgyud): yan ti ma ti d+hA ra Ni swA hA/ sman bram po zho gnyis zhib tu btags te/ 'o ma'i nang du bskol la sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te zhag bdun gyi bar du 'thungs na/ gdon mi za bar thos pa
57b4(rgyud): 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'am/ bstan bcos kyang rung ste/ thos pa nyin zhag gcig la sho lo ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro// sho lo ka stong lo bsra pa'i gzungs
57b5(rgyud): rdzogs so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
57b6(rgyud): dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ tri shA tri shu la shA khi/ Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ ba re na bu ha la/ mrid d+hA tu swA hA/ cho ga ni 'phags pa spyan ris gzigs dbang
57b7(rgyud): phyug gi zhabs drung du dkyil 'khor byas te/ ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas la/ chu la sngags kyis btab ste bzhag nas/ nang par tshul lan bdud bzlas brjod byas te dro khar kha zas 'o ma dang
58a1(rgyud): spags te zos mnag bdun lonan nyin gtsug kyang na log stong lobs par 'gyur ro// yid ches pa'i rtags yod do// nam ka slong lobs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
58a2(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kun nas thogs med ston la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa
58a3(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ ka ba tsa karna la la te swA hA/ tshu la lan bdun bzlas te gdong bkrus na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// de'i cho ga la 'phags
58a4(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar chu bzhag la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te 'thungs la/ dro khar kha zas 'o ma dang spags te bza' ba de lta bur zhag bdun gyi bar du byas na nyin gcig kyang
58a5(rgyud): yi ge sho lo ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro// sho lo ka stong lobs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang
58a6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ smi ti ma ti ma ti/ te dzA bi d+yA/ hU ru me ha ra hu ru kr-iSh+Ta hu ru me swA hA/ shu
58a7(rgyud): dag dkar po la sngags 'di bzlas brjod byas te zos na gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// mi brjed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// /
58b1(rgyud): gar sang du/ pradz+nyA bar d+ha ni na ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya TA ma hA satwa ya
58b2(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ sA la te/ sA la te/ ma ni te swA hA/ rigs sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ khyor tshul lan gsum bzlas te 'thungs na zhag bdun nas thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro//
58b3(rgyud): shes rab bskyed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang / lo tsa ba ban d+he klu'i dbang pos bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA kA ra sa~M ha
58b4(rgyud): dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he de ba tsan dras zhus te gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA bar d+hi na nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad
58b5(rgyud): duHshes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ e bi ba bi ba/
58b6(rgyud): pradz+nyA bar d+ha ni/ dza ra dza ra/ me dz+nyA bar d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+ha ri/ bud d+hi bar d+ha ni swAhA/ rig sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ nang re zhing rtsab mo khyor gang la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ zla ba
58b7(rgyud): gcig gi bar du 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / dkon mchog
59a1(rgyud): gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ s+thi ti ma ti ma ti/
59a2(rgyud): te dza bi d+ha/ hu ru me hu ru hu ru me/ kriSh+Ta hu ru me swA hA/ shu dag nag po la sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te zos na/ gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// thos pa
59a3(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba ta thA ga a d+hiSh+Tha na/ satwa A lo ka na/ bud d+ha k+She tre san deR+shan byA ha nA ma
59a4(rgyud): ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
59a5(rgyud): mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri gru 'dzin na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
59a6(rgyud): phyag gi gnas/ lha'i nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po dang / me tog rgyas pa dang / lha'i seng ge'i khri bkod pa nA/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra
59a7(rgyud): bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang snying rje chen po'i shes pa la gnas pa thams cad
59b1(rgyud): kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dang / sde ba gnyis dang / skye ba gsum dang / skye ba bcu dang / skye ba nyi shu dang / ste ba sum cu dang / sde ba brgya'i bar dag gis thogs pa/ thams cad kyangs brgyang
59b2(rgyud): ba dang / sa bcu pa la gnas pa sha stag ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / 'jam dpal dang / dri med tog dang / nor dpal dang / glog gi tog dang / dri med 'ong dang / can
59b3(rgyud): ngan dang / bdud rtsi tog la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun brgya dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma thams cad kyang lung bstan pa dang ldan pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/
59b4(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas 'dus pa lnga stong dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za thams cad kyang sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho
59b5(rgyud): 'phrul mthong ba brgyad stong dang / gnod sbyin mo chen mo thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes thob pa/ lung bstan pa thob pa/ phyir mi ldog pa/ dpe med ma dang / dri med 'od dang
59b6(rgyud): 'od can ma dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / dpal ldan ma dang / 'phrog ma dang / dung can ma la sogs pa gnod sbyin mo chen mo brgyad cu dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rnam thos kyi
59b7(rgyud): bu dang / yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / nor bu bzang po'i bu dang / gang ba bzang po la sogs pa 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi bar dag dang thabs
60a1(rgyud): gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i khri la bzhugs par rig nas/ rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la/
60a2(rgyud): lha'i rgyan dang / na bza' dang / me tog dang / me tog 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis mchod par byas/ ri mor byas so// kha cig gis ni lan 'bum phrag du
60a3(rgyud): mar bskor ba byas te bstod ngo // de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la dmigs pa snying rje chen po'i shes pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//
60a4(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'od kyis snang bar gyur cing / gzugs thams cad kyang snang bas khyab par gyur nas/ sems can dmus long
60a5(rgyud): gang yin pa de dag gis ni mig gis gzugs rnams mthong bar gyur to// 'on pa rnams kyis ni rna bas sgra dag thos par gyur to// nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad dag dang bral bar gyur to// gos
60a6(rgyud): med pa rnams ni gos dag thob par gyur to// smyon pa rnams ni dran pa thob par gyur to// lus nyams pa dang dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni lus dang dbang po yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// dbul po
60a7(rgyud): rnams kyis ni nor dag thob par gyur to// sems can gang dag nor dang / yo byad dang / longs spyod med pa de dag ni nor dang / yo byad dang / longs spyod dag dang ldan par gyur to// sems
60b1(rgyud): can thams cad kyang bde ba thams cad dang ldan zhing bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur // slong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang yin pa de dag thams
60b2(rgyud): cad la'ang bskul nas/ chos thams cad mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/ sems can gang dag lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de dag thams cad kyis ni lha'i bde ba yongs su
60b3(rgyud): spangs nas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran par byas te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// sems can gang dag mi rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de dag gis kyang mi'i bde
60b4(rgyud): ba yongs su spangs nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// sems can gang dag klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za rnams kyi
