60b5(rgyud): nang du skyes pa de dag gis kyang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa so sor thob nas/ sems can thams cad la byams par gnas pa dang / lus dang sems bde bar gyur nas/ chos mnyan pa'i
60b6(rgyud): phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// sems can gang dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su mun pa mun nag gi nang du skyes pa de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus yud tsam zhig dran pa so
60b7(rgyud): sor thob nas/ gcig gis gcig kun tu shes par gyur te/ de dag mun pa chen po de nas yongs su thar par gyur to// sems can thams cad gcig la gcig byams par gnas shing nye ba'i
61a1(rgyud): nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral bar gyur to// de nas de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ mtho ba dang dma' bar yang gyur to// de nas 'khor 'dus pa
61a2(rgyud): der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dus te 'dug par gyur to// des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi
61a3(rgyud): bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa chen po kun tu snang zhing / 'dus pa chen po'i snga ltas kyang kun tu snang la/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag lung
61a4(rgyud): ston pa'ang kun tu snang zhing / chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam chen po'i snga ltas kyang kun tu snang ba las na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gi re ba thams
61a5(rgyud): cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / ye shes chen po'ang 'thob par 'gyur gyis/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis sems can thams cad la snying rje skyed la phan pa dang / bde ba dang /
61a6(rgyud): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhus shig/ rigs kyi bu phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/ sems can sdig pa byed
61a7(rgyud): pa ra dbul ba/ nyam chung ba/ lus mdog ngan pa/ rga ba dang na bas yongs su gzir ba/ longs spyod chung ba/ lus yongs su ma bsgoms pa/ tshe thung ba/ blo chung ba/ 'dod chagra
61b1(rgyud): dang / ne sdang dang / gti mug gis yongs su gzir ba dga'abyung ba yod de/ rigs kyi bu de dag gi don du chos bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba thob cig dang /
61b2(rgyud): rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis yun ring por sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sdig pa thams cad bzlog par bya ba dang /
61b3(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dag byas par 'gyur ro// de nas
61b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dag yid
61b5(rgyud): la byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
61b6(rgyud): to bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na sems can rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan gyis non par gyur pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum pas yongs su gzir ba/
61b7(rgyud): nyam chung ba/ mdog ngan pa/ tshe thung ba/ longs spyod chung ba/ lus yongs su ma bsgoms pa dag 'byung ba mchis te/ de dag ni ser sna dang 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems kyis gcig
62a1(rgyud): la gcig 'gums par 'gyur la/ gcig gis gcig gi nor dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dag 'phrog par 'gyur zhing / gad mo dang / 'jo sgeg dang /
62a2(rgyud): khro gar dang / rtsed mo dag gis mngon par rtse ba dang / mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang / mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes par bgyid lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de dag rgyu de dang
62a3(rgyud): gzhi des sems can rnams la mi dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis gtses nas/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu'ang skye bar
62a4(rgyud): 'gyur lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag gis de dag gi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba dang / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
62a5(rgyud): pa'i ye shes thob par bgyi ba'i bar dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar bgyi ba dang / sdig pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs par 'tshal
62a6(rgyud): gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mi mkhyen pa dang / ma rtogs pa dang / ma gzigs pa dang / ma gsan pa dang / rnam par mi mkhyen pa ci'ang mi mnga' bas
62a7(rgyud): chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam nyan par 'tshal ba dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin gyis byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge slong
62b1(rgyud): dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci drang / g+ho
62b2(rgyud): chen po mang po lpags pa 'di dag re ba ma mchis par gyur cing slar mchi bar mi 'gyur bar/ bcom ldan 'das bshang du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bshang du gsol/ de nas thamapa
62b3(rgyud): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji ltar lhags pa de dag gis kyang yan lag lngas phyag byas te tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs par bshad du gsol/ bde
62b4(rgyud): bar gshegs pa legs par bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab pa thugs su chud nas/ phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs
62b5(rgyud): te snyan cing 'jebs la yid du 'ong ba'i gsungs dbyangs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
62b6(rgyud): to rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/
62b7(rgyud): ngas sngon dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog snang ba kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i spyan sngar de thos so// rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin de'i ming thos ma thag tu sems
63a1(rgyud): can bye ba phrag dgu bcus de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thos par gyur nas/ thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi ning tha dad pa dag tu lung bsdur
63a2(rgyud): tengs kyang lung bstan pa thob bo// rigs kyi bu ngas de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mkhyen pas sngon de bzhin gshegs pa sum khris sems can thams cad kyi don du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
63a3(rgyud): bshad de/ thams cad du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khyod nyid dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yin la/ byang chub sems
63a4(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor rnams dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor ji ltar lhags pa 'di dag gis kyang thos nas ri mo dang mchod
63a5(rgyud): pa dag byas te/ de'i 'og tu sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis lung bstan pa thob cing / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dag kyang thob par gyur nas/ 'dod pa thams
63a6(rgyud): cad du 'gro ba dang / re ba thams cad grub pa dang / nang rnams dang bral bar yang gyur la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa dang / gzugs bzang
63a7(rgyud): zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba rnams 'byor pa dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po rnams kyis mngon par bstod par 'os pa dang /
63b1(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyis phyag bya bar 'os pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul
63b2(rgyud): dang ldan pa dang / tshe dang / kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / mthu stobs dang ldan zhing rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par gyur te/ nam yang sdug pa dang bral bar ma gyur cing / sdug pa'i sdug
63b3(rgyud): bsngal med par gyur pa de dran te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos smra ba de la mchog tu gus pa'i sems bskyed de/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yan lag lngas phyag
63b4(rgyud): byas shing / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ngag gis legs par brgyan nas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes
63b5(rgyud): brjod cing phyag 'tshal bar byed pa dang / legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par byed pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa de dag ni yon
63b6(rgyud): tan mang ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de dag ni tshe 'di nyid la'ang yon tar mang po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa dang / rang rnams dang bral ba dang / tsho
63b7(rgyud): ba dang / blo brtan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / brtan pa dang ldan pa dang / rgyal po thams cad dang / rgyal po'i btsun mo thams cad dang / rgyal bu thams cad dang / blon po thams
64a1(rgyud): cad dang / dgra thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyis mngon par bstod par 'os pa dang / phyag bya bar 'os pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'os par
64a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// nor dang yo byad mang bar yang 'gyur ro// de dag gi kha nas tsan dan gyi dri'i ngad 'byung bar yang 'gyur ro// mig ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra bar yang 'gyur ro// de dag
64a3(rgyud): gis nyin mtshan du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dag mthong bar yang 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa byas pa'i sgrib pa thams cad zad par yang 'gyur ro// de dag la
64a4(rgyud): lha rnams srung bar 'gyur ro// de dag 'chi ba'i dus na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dag mthong bar yang 'gyur ro// phrag dog med pa dang / sems rnam par g.yengs pa med
64a5(rgyud): par 'chi ba'i dus byed par yang 'gyur ro// shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye ba'i bar du 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang
64a6(rgyud): bsnyen bkur byas te/ yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang / mchod par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / ming tsam thos par gyur pa de dag ni ngas mngon sum
64a7(rgyud): du lung bstan par lung bstan pa yin te/ de dag gis nga mthong nang bsnyen bkur byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas pa'ang yin pas/ de dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la tha
64b1(rgyud): chom bskyed par mi bya'o// gang dag gi rna lam du grags par gyur pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin par yid la byas la bsnyen bkur bya'o// de'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin
64b2(rgyud): pas gzugs mi mdzes pa dang / longs spyod med pa dang / blo med pa dang / srid pa che ba dang / sdug pa dang bral ba dang / rgyal srid 'khrugs par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag dang / glang
64b3(rgyud): pa na ba gang yin pa dang / zan chad pa gang yin pa dang / gos ngan par gyur pa gang yin pa dang / lus dang sems la gnod pa gang yin pa dang / reg na mi bde ba'i mal bcas pa gang
64b4(rgyud): yin pa dang / spro ba gang yin pa'i las kyi sgrib pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di thos pa'i mthus yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// des kyang 'di ltar sems bskyed par byas
64b5(rgyud): te bdag gis sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ sems can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs bsags pa de dag so sor bshags par bya'o// bsal bar bya'o//
64b6(rgyud): mi bcab par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i longs spyod
64b7(rgyud): kyi 'bras bu meng par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa dang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / nyan thos dang / sangs rgyas ngag dang pha ma dag la sdig pa'i
65a1(rgyud): las byas shing / bsags par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su zad par 'gyur zhing / dbang phyug chen po dag kyang yang dag par 'grub par
65a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa dang / sdug pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang / dmus long
65a3(rgyud): du 'gyur ba dang / bud med kyi dngos por 'gyur ba dang / mtshan gnyis par 'gyur ba dang / phrag dog dang / nga rgyal dang / khro ba'i dbang gis gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi
65a4(rgyud): dgas dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su zad par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na ting nge 'dzin 'di ni yon tan thams cad kyi
65a5(rgyud): 'byung gnas yin no// rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par byed pa dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la srung ba dang / skyob pa dang
65a6(rgyud): sbed par byed pa dang / de dag thams cad kyi yon tan dang re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / bde ba chen por byed pa dang //
65a7(rgyud): bsams pa dang 'dod pa thams cad yang dag par 'grub par byed pa dang / las thams cad zad par byed pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad
65b1(rgyud): dang / nang thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / g.yul thams cad las rgyal bar byed pa dang / tshe dang / mdog dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / mthu che bar byed pa dang
65b2(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dbang du byed pa dang / rims dang / dug dang / me dang / chu thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / lung bstan/
65b3(rgyud): pa'i bar dag thob par byed pa'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag yod de/ de dag mnyan cing bzung ste bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger
65b4(rgyud): 'drir 'jug pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni yon tan de dag thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos pa dang / ji ltar lhags
65b5(rgyud): ba'i 'khor dag gis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng ba dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / ras bcos bu zung dag gsol
65b6(rgyud): te legs so zhes bya ba gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam
65b7(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga tA nAnA/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+he/ su bud d+he/ bud d+ha ma te/ lo ke bi lo ke/ lo ka a ti kr-i te/ satwa a ba lo ka ne/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ sarba A shA pa ri pU ra
66a1(rgyud): Ni d+hu tid+ha re/ nar de ba drA dzi te/ ta thA ga tA dz+nyA na de/ ta thA ga tA a b+hi nen/ sarba lo kAm su khri b+ha ba tu pra r+d+ha kar+m+ma k+ShA pa ya d+hA/ ra// d+hAb tu/ sarba b+ha ye b+hU ta thA/
66a2(rgyud): ta a d+hiSh+ThA ne na swA hA/ kye rigs kyi bu dag gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa sum khris gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// ngas kyang da ltar sems
66a3(rgyud): can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar bya ba'i phyir bshad
66a4(rgyud): de grogs po dag gang la la zhig 'di snyam du bdag gis ji ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i yon tan de dag thams cad 'thob par 'gyur snyam du sems pa des nang par sngar
66a5(rgyud): langs te/ sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang / snying rje ba'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / phrag dog dang / nga rgyal dang / 'chab pa dang / khro ba yongs su
66a6(rgyud): spangs pa'i sems dang / rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa shin tu rgya cher byas la/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag
66a7(rgyud): byas te/ gang 'dod pa yid la byas nas me tog la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa la re re nas dbul bar bya'o// de nas de'i re ba thams cad yang dag par 'grub
66b1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// rmil ma na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar yang 'gyur ro// ngam pa gang 'dod pa thob par yang 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i tshan de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar yang 'gyur ro// shi 'thong dam/
66b2(rgyud): kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang / stobs dang / mdog dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro// dgra thams cad kyang de'i dbang du 'gyur ro// gzungs/
66b3(rgyud): 'di bshad pa na srog chags drug khris mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur nas/ de dag thams cad las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol zhing bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
66b4(rgyud): gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub
66b5(rgyud): sems pa rnams kyi dam bca' ba mi 'jigs pa gzi brjid ces bgyi ba'i gzungs mchis te/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med bkod pa gzi brjid rgyal po'i spyan sngar de bzung
66b6(rgyud): lags so// bzung nas kyang sems can thams cad la bshad lags so// bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad bdag gis mngon par 'tshal te/ gang gi rna lam du gzungs de grags par
66b7(rgyud): gyur tam/ gro bar chung bar gyur pa de'i lus la nyam chung ba'am/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs sam/ bro nang ngam/ rims sam/ lus bro 'chal ba'am/ sems gdung ba'am/ dus ma
67a1(rgyud): lags par 'gum pa 'am/ chab kyis 'jigs pa 'am/ mtshon gyis 'jigs pa'am/ dug gis 'jigs pa 'am/ dug sbyar mas 'jigs pa'am/ mkha'
67a2(rgyud): 'gro ma dang 'byung pos 'jigs pa 'am/ gnod sbyin nam dgra rnams sam/ mi dang mi ma lags pa dag gis mtho ba tsam pa 'am/ rnam par gtse ba 'am/ gnod pa bgying bar 'gyur ba
67a3(rgyud): de ni gan sa ma mchis lags so// de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang ba stsol cig dang / bdag gis chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa de dag gi don du nyan pa rnams dang /
67a4(rgyud): ri mor bgyis pa rnams dang / mchod par bgyis pa rnams dang / 'dzin par bgyid pa rnams kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam
67a5(rgyud): ba tsa' ba'i phyag rgya dag su la bar bgyi'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAn/ sarba bo d+hi satwa nA ra/ a ri ha tAn/ tad+ya thA/ oM badz+ra d+ha ra/ badz+ra kA ya/ badz+ra ba la/ badz+ra te dza/ hUM hUM/ badz+ra
67a6(rgyud): pA Ni/ ta thA ga ta A dz+wA lA ya/ s+phA ra pra tI dzA/ sarba byA d+hi ni sarba pA pa ni nA sha ya/ de hi me/ ya thai ba si ta ma ba ram/ yan ya me ba a b+hi pra yan+na me/ tan+t+ra ma ba sa mr-i d+h+r-i tu/ he he/ tuM ru \u0f7f
67a7(rgyud): ru A gats+tsha A gats+tsha ma bi lam ba da ri shi ya/ badz+ra kA ya ma/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Tha ne swA hA/ gzungs 'di brjod pa na sa chen po 'di mtho ba dang dma' bar gyur to// gnod sbyin dang srin po tham
67b1(rgyud): cad kyang rab tu spangs so// lnga thams cad dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i bar dag kyang ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ sems can chen po rab tu grub par byed pa'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi ga'i 'ji
67b2(rgyud): dag shad pa ni legs so legs so// legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//
67b3(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'am/ nor dang / 'bru dang / longs spyod kyi dbang phyug gam/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gam/ rig sngags 'chang nyid
67b4(rgyud): dam/ tshe dang / stobs dang / mdog dang / brtson 'grus dang / tshe ring po nyid 'tshal ba des snga nas bskon pa bgyis la/ dgung zla yar gyi ngo ches brgyad la tsan dan dkar po las rdo rje
67b5(rgyud): 'dzin pa rta gang du dgod cing / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ snying khar sku gdung stsal pa sku gdung dang bcas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa/ rig sngags 'chang yang dag par dbugs 'byin par bgyid/
67b6(rgyud): par bgyis lagatsang mas bdug spos kyi sa bdug cing / gdugs mtshan gcig tu smyung ba bgyis la/ de nas tshes brgyad nas/ tshes bco lnga'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzug
67b7(rgyud): bzhugs pa'i gnas gtsang mar tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ bum pa gang ba bzhi'ang gzhag par bgyi/ phyogs bzhir yang ro dang ldan pa dang / dri dang ldan pa dang / skyems
68a1(rgyud): dang / 'o thug gi gtor ma dag stsal la/ gos rin po che dkar po bgos te sems rtse gcig tu bgyis nas/ dus gsum du bdug spos dang / me tog dang / spros
68a2(rgyud): dang / mar me dag gis mchod pa chen po bgyi zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'ang mchod pa bgyis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag bgyis nas sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad la bzlas brjod
68a3(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing / re re nas lag na rdo rje la bsnun par bgyi'o// des na sgra skad chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / dogs g.yo ba dang 'od zer dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de nas
68a4(rgyud): dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyis las thams cad dang / dgos pa thams cad kyang yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur lags so// bro nad ma
68a5(rgyud): mchis pa dang / tshe ring ba dang / sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar yang 'gyur zhing / yon tan stong yang 'thob par 'gyur lags so// 'gum pa'i tshe na'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
68a6(rgyud): stong mthong bar 'gyur lags so// bdag mthong ba'ang stsal bar bgyi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo rje legs
68a7(rgyud): so legs so// phyag rgya 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te/ 'di la som nyi med pa dang / yid gnyis med pa dang / the tshom med par bya'o// de nas bcom
68b1(rgyud): ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon dur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i srang du ting nge 'dzin 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la
68b2(rgyud): gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems
68b3(rgyud): dpa' thams cad kyis de las ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / mi rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams
68b4(rgyud): dang / dri za rnams dang / yi dag sa rnams dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i
68b5(rgyud): lhag par g.yo ba dang bral bar g.yo ba dag rab tu shes shing / sems can 'di dag ni bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba ste/ legs par spyod pa'i las byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang //
68b6(rgyud): dge 'dun dag la dang ba 'thob par 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba ste/ nyes par spyod pa'i las byed pa/ sdig pa spyod par byed par shes nas/ sdig pa'i lta bar gyur/
68b7(rgyud): pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston par byed cing / sdig pa thams cad las zlog par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la 'god par byed pa dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su
69a1(rgyud): rdzogs par byed pa dang / phrag dog dang / nga rgyal dang / khro ba dang / ser sna dag sel bar byed pa dang / sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge
69a2(rgyud): 'dun dag la dang ba rab tu thob nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye zhing / nam du'ang sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur la/ yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur bas na/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir ting nge/
69a3(rgyud): 'dzin 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ste/ 'di thos pa'i sems can rnams ni phyir mi ldog
69a4(rgyud): par nges pa'i sa 'thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag lung bstan par 'gyur lags bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa
69a5(rgyud): nyid kyang dga' ba lags te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags na/ de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po dang dka' ba spyod pa ci tsam zhig tu 'gyur lag
69a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ngas dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod
69a7(rgyud): ba'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab gro pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa gang yin pa dang /
69b1(rgyud): mgo dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / lus dang / sdug pa'i bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / bran mo dag yongs su btang bar gyur pa gang yin pa'i bsod nams
69b2(rgyud): mngon par 'du bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma 'dis ni/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug
69b3(rgyud): pa dang / klog pa dang / 'dzin pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang / gzhan dag la'ang yang dag par ston par byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin pa dang / chos smra ba de dag
69b4(rgyud): la'ang mchod pa byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin pa de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu ngas kun chub par byas shing bshad pa'o chos de
69b5(rgyud): dag ga thams cad la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas te yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa gang yin pa de bas ni
69b6(rgyud): gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang / mchod par byed pa dang / yang dag par ston par byed pa dang nyan par byed na/ de las bsod nams
69b7(rgyud): mngon par 'du bya ba ches mang du yongs su sdud par 'gyur te/ des na de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi rnam grangs
70a1(rgyud): 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa'i bsod nams ni de ltar dka' ba yin pa'i
70a2(rgyud): phyir ro// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag sdig pa kun du spyod pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bro gar la mngon par dga' ba dang / mi sdug pa la sdug par shes pa dang / 'dod pa dang / khro ba dang /
70a3(rgyud): gnod sems mang ba dang / mi bde ba la bde bar 'du shes pa dang / mtshon cha dang / spro ba dang / bsdigs pa dang / rdeg pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / shes par mi 'gyur ba dang / yid la byed par mi
70a4(rgyud): 'gyur ba de dag ni sdig pa'i las kyi gzhi de dang mi shes pa des mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin cing / rga ba dang / na ba dang / mya ngan dang / 'chi bas yongs su zin pas 'chi ba'i tshe na yong
70a5(rgyud): su gdung bar 'gyur te/ dmigs pa na so so nas dur khrod dang 'dra ba kho nar mthong ba dang / dge ba'i sems bskyed par yang mi 'gyur la dad pa mi phyed pa thob par yang mi 'gyur te/ de dag de nas shi 'phos/
70a6(rgyud): nas kyang yang sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur bas na/ lung bstan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong ba dang / lung bstan pa ma thob pa dag gis ni chos kyi rnam gras/
70a7(rgyud): 'di mnyan pa dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / gzung ba dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ge 'drir 'jug pa dang / dad par yang mi nus la/ chos smra ba de la'ang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / bla/
70b1(rgyud): mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar yang mi nus so// rigs kyi bu gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i yul der ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad ba 'byung
70b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// de nas ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cig
70b3(rgyud): gis kyang chos smra ba de dang / chos nyan pa de dag la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pas bsnyen bkur bgyi/ bla mar bgyiri mor bgyi/ mchod par bgyi zhing / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad
70b4(rgyud): kyang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi lags so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang rgyas par bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi ste/ des na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par yang 'gyur lags so// de nas
70b5(rgyud): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor rnams la rnam par gzigs te bka' stsal pa/ kye rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so// khyed cag gis de bzhin du gyis shig
70b6(rgyud): gnod pa byed pa dang / brnyas pa dang / gshe ba dang / sdigs pa dang / mtshon 'byin pa dang / rgyal bar byed na'ang lus dang srog la mi blta bar byas nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/
70b7(rgyud): yi ger bri bar bya/ yi ger 'drir bzhug par bya/ bklag par bya'o// chos smra ba de la'ang bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro bya'o// yul phyogs de dang / gling de dang / grong khyer de dag kyang
71a1(rgyud): 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nang dang / 'khrugs pa dag las bsrung bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la'ang rtag par rgyun du bsam
71a2(rgyud): bar bya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcas pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// bskal pa grangs med stong phrag ji snyed du// sangs rgyas 'byung ba lan 'ga' rnyed pa la// phyi ma'i dus na
71a3(rgyud): 'gyod par mi 'gyur bar// rigs kyi bu rnams bag yod chos nyon cig/ yon tan nyan cing mngon par dad byed pa// de dag gis ni ting 'dzin rnyed mi dka'/ gang gis rkang gnyis gtso bo rnams la
71a4(rgyud): ni bskal pa bye ba gang+gA'i bye snyed du// nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos dang rgyan// spos dang 'phreng ba byug pa phul ba bas/ gang gis mdo sde 'di la dang byas te// nyan cing klog la yi ger 'dri byed pa//
71a5(rgyud): de la bsod nams tshad ni yod min te// bde bar gshegs pas de snyed tshad ma gsungs// rtag tu bag yod dgon par sten byed cing // sems gzhan med par bsam gtan rtag sgom dang // sdug
71a6(rgyud): pa'i bu dang bu mo sbyin byed cing // lag pa rkang pa yongs su gtong ba bas// gang su mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin byed pa// de ni debs bsod nams mang po 'thog/ mdo mchog 'di ni nor sbyin byed pa ste// 'ong
71a7(rgyud): mis ngan sang kun kyang rtag tu spangs// 'di na nor dang 'bru smin byed pa ste// gang zhig mang sde rnam dag 'di 'dzin pa ga de la yon tan kun kyang mi dkon zhing // de la tshe stobs brtson 'grus mong ma
71b1(rgyud): yin// 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'od dpag med mthong zhing // ngas de sangs rgyas byang chub lung bstan na// de la nam yang sdig pa yod meng zhing // bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams kyang mdzod/ dang /
71b2(rgyud): la rtag tu las gang 'byung 'gyur ba// sems gdung lus na ba 'am de bzhin du// klang phan pa thams cad zad 'gyur zhing // de ni nams kyang rnam par lhung mi 'gyur// de ni mthong ba'i chos
71b3(rgyud): la'ang yon tan kun// ji ltar bsams shing 'dod pas 'thob par 'gyur// de ltar rtag tu dge slong po mo dang // dge bsnyen rnams dang rgyal pos rtag tu ni// mi yi dbang po de bzhin gshegs
71b4(rgyud): pa ltar// chos smra ba la rjes su gus byas te// mdo sde 'di ni rtag tu gzung bya zhing // 'dzin pa la yang rtag tu bsnyen bkur bya// spros dang 'phreng ba byug pa rnam dag gis/ bsnyen bkur byas te/
71b5(rgyud): yi ger 'drir yang gzhug/ phyi ma'i dus la rga nad gdung 'gyur la// 'khrug pa stong phrag rab tu g.yen 'phyo zhing // sems dmyal yi dag sa rnams su yongs 'khyam dang // za ma ma ning smad par
71b6(rgyud): bya ba dang // dmus long nyid dang ro dang khyi yi dri// rigs dma' bud med rnams su skye mi byed// phrag dog che zhing rtag tu sdig byed la// khro bas zil non rtag tu ser sna can// sangs rgyas chos
71b7(rgyud): la gus par ma byas pas// de ni de 'dra'i rigs su skye 'gyur la// der yang sdug bsngal tshor ba myong 'gyur zhing // de ni phyi ma'i dus la'ang gdung bar 'gyur// de phyir gang dag 'dzin cing stor
72a1(rgyud): byed pa// de dag gis ni rtag tu mchod par bya// gang gis de la yongs su spyo ba dang // smad cing brdegs la bcings pa byas gyur la// des ni nga yang yongs su spyos pa
72a2(rgyud): yin// 'dzin la phu dud byas na nga la'ang byas// de'i phyir de dag gis ni chos smra dang // gang zhig 'di 'dzin 'dri zhing klog byed pa// de dag la ni rtag tu bsnyen bkur zhing // tshig 'jam snyan pa'ang
72a3(rgyud): rgyun du brjod par bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ bcom ldan
72a4(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rnam par lta ba'i cho 'phrul zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs mchis par rjes su dran te/ bdag gis sngon de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad
72a5(rgyud): ye shes tog ces bgyi ba'i spyan sngar de thos shing bzung lags so// de mnyan cing bzung la bcangs shing bklag te/ gzhan dag la'ang bsgrags shing bsnyen bkur bgyis nas yi ge ra bris sam//
72a6(rgyud): yi ger 'drir stsal na phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i yon tan de dag thams cad kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ de ji ltar bsam pa thams cad
72a7(rgyud): kyang yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ bro nad rnams dang bral bar yang 'gyur/ sangs rgyas
72b1(rgyud): mthong ba dang byang chub sems dpa' yang mthong bar 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
72b2(rgyud): la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs zin gyis shod cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
72b3(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras so// na maHsarba ta thA ga tA
72b4(rgyud): nAn/ sarba A shA pa ri pU ra kA nan/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ha ha ha/ ma ma ma/ d+hi ri d+hi ri d+hi ri/ shAn te pra shAn te/
72b5(rgyud): sarba pA pa kA yaM ka ri/ a ba lo kI ya/ kA ru Ni ka/ bo d+hi tsi ta mi ma na si ku ru/ byA ba lo kA ye mAM/ sma ra sma ra/ yan tra yA pAr+the/ sat+ya a d+hiSh+Tha na kr-i tan te na/ sat+ye na sa te bA tsa ne na/ sarba
72b6(rgyud): A shA me pa ri pA ra ya/ bud d+hak+She trem/ pi raM sho d+ha ya mA me ka sh+tsi be he dAM ka ro bud d+hiSh+Tha ne na swAh+ma/ tad+ya thA/ te dze te dze/ ma hA ti dze/ ya mA ma kA ya dush+tsa ri ta ma bA/ bAg dug+ha ri ta bA/ ma
72b7(rgyud): no du sh+tsa ri tI baM/ dir d+ya ma bA/ ta ta sarba dak+Sha ba ya/ a lo kA ya/ bi lo kI ya/ ta thA ga tA da raM sha na sh+tsa/ a ha ma hi kAM kA ma ya bo d+hi satwa da ri sha na ma/ d+hu d+hu ma/ da dra swa maM da ri sha nam/
73a1(rgyud): sarba me ku sha la a b+hi bar d+han+tu/ sarba ta thA ga ta nAn/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ sma ta pra ti dz+nyA ma ma hA satwa/ sid d+h+yan tu man+ta pA dA swA hA/ gzungs
73a2(rgyud): sngags 'di brjod pa na sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos shing / ga zha'i sgra chen po dang / lha'i me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur to// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de sa legs so//
73a3(rgyud): zhes bya ba byin nas/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// sems can chen po khyod sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i phyir re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ 'jigs pa
73a4(rgyud): thams cad las srung bar byed pa/ las thams cad byang bar byed pa/ sdang ba dang rmi lam ngan pa'i dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs 'di legs par smras so// bdag
73a5(rgyud): cag thams cad kyis kyang gzung bar bya/ bsnyen bkur bar bya'o// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag gang la la ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su
73a6(rgyud): bsgrags pa'i yon tan de dag mngon par 'dod cing lung bstan pa dang / kho bo'ang mngon sum du mthong ba dang / ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba
73a7(rgyud): dang / longs spyod dang dbang phyug 'thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'dod pa des/ zla ba yar gyi ngo la lus legs par khrus byas shing gtsang la bsnyen te gnas pa 'phags pa yan
73b1(rgyud): lag brgyad pa la gnas par byas la/ tshes brgyad nas brtsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa phyogs su spos dang / me tog dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ngag dang /
73b2(rgyud): bum pa gang ba dag gis sa phyogs de dang / chos smra ba de la'ang mchod pa byas nas/ lus legs par khrus byas pa gtsang mas gos dkar po bgos te/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang /
73b3(rgyud): me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas nas yi ger 'dri bar bya'o// 'dri ba'i tshe na nyin gcig bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas la/
73b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa la bla ma dang gus pa'i sems nye bar bzhag nas sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / snying brtse ba'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems kyis nyi ma phyed tshun chad kyi bar de/
73b5(rgyud): tsam du bri bar bya'o// tshes brgyad nas brtsams te/ tshes bco lnga'i bar du nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa'ang de bzhin du bya'o// cho ga 'di kho na bzhin du byas te bris na/ de ma thag tu mtshams med pa lnga la/
73b6(rgyud): sogs pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis 'phel bar 'gyur/ brtson 'grus 'bar bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di nyid la'ang
73b7(rgyud): lus bde ba 'thob par 'gyur/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / khro ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dag srab mor 'gyur ro// des yi ger 'drir bcug
74a1(rgyud): nas kyang / sku gdung dang bcas mchod rten gyi gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs sku gdung dang bcas pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs sku gdung
74a2(rgyud): dang bcas pa zhal shar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / mar me dag gis mchod pa shin tu rgya cher byas la/ tshes brgyad nas brtsams te/ tshes bco lnga'i bar du
74a3(rgyud): sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par bya zhing / gtsang ma kha zas dkar po za ba bsnyen te gnas pa 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa yid bcugs pa dang ldan pa/
74a4(rgyud): nga rgyal dang / khro ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna yongs su spangs pas nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ dus gsum du bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// me tog dang
74a5(rgyud): kha dug spos dang / spos dang / mar me dag kyang phul la/ dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs la dor bar bya'o// lag na rdo rje la'ang
74a6(rgyud): bdug spos kyis bdug par bya'o// phyogs bcur phyag byas la/ nub phyogs kyi lha mo 'jigs byed ma dang / shar phyogs kyi dpe med ma dang / steng gi phyogs kyi dung can ma la sogs pa la
74a7(rgyud): phyogs bzhir gtor ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / 'o thug dang / zho dang / 'bras chan dag kyang gtor bar bya'o// des na de la rnam par g.yeng ba dang / 'jigs pa 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi
74b1(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / sems 'khrul par yang mi 'gyur ro// sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad po thams cad la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas la bskul bar bya'o// cho ga 'di kho na bzhin du sngar bsnyen pa bya sa la/
74b2(rgyud): de nas tshes bco lnga'i nang par sa phyogs der bum pa gang ba bzhi bzhag la/ bdug spos dang / tsan dan dang / pog dkar po dang / ga pur dag kyang gzhag ga mar ma kha bzhi me tog dang / bdug
74b3(rgyud): spos dang / spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dar dang / ba dan sna tshogs dag dang / gser dngul gyi snod dag gis legs par brgyan la/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i 'o thug dang /
74b4(rgyud): zho dang / 'bras chan dang / gzhan yang ci 'byor pa'i lha bshos dang / gtor ma dag kyang phyogs bzhir gzhag go// sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad la snga ma bzhin du bzlas brjod lan re byas
74b5(rgyud): la phyogs bzhir dor ro// de nas snga ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum la bzlas brjod lan re byas la/ re re nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs la bsnun par bya'o//
74b6(rgyud): de nas gzugs de 'gul bar 'gyur zhing sgra skad chen po'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'od zer dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ sa'ang g.yo bar 'gyur ro// de nas las thams cad dang dgos pa thams
74b7(rgyud): cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob par yang 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os su'ang 'gyuranor
75a1(rgyud): dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba rnams 'byor par yang 'gyur/ nad thams cad yongs su spangs pa dang tshe ring bar yang 'gyur/ dgra thams cad dang / rgyal
75a2(rgyud): po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po rnams kyang de lta 'dod cing gces smras byed par yang 'gyur/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spang bar yang 'gyur//
75a3(rgyud): nam du'ang sdug pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// brtan pa dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa dang / gzi brjid dang / dbang po rno ba dang / blo dang ldan pa dang / sems
75a4(rgyud): can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / chos shes pa dang / 'chi ba'i tshe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
75a5(rgyud): kyang mthong ba dang / byams pa la gnas shing chos ston bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus bya ba'i bar du'ang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bu 'dod pa dag gam/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs chen po
75a6(rgyud): 'am/ gang du rjes su dran par byed pa der skye ba dang / gzhan yang yon tan stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang /
75a7(rgyud): gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni yon tan mang po'i 'byung gnas lags te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ma mchis par mnyan par yang rngo mi thogs/
75b1(rgyud): la gzung bar yang rngo mi thogs bklag par yang rngo mi thogs/ mchod par yang rngo mo thogs/ yi ger bri bar yang rngo ma thogs/ yi ger 'drir su la bar yang rngo ma thogs/ ngang par yang
75b2(rgyud): rngo mi thogs lags so// gal te mthong bar gyur na'ang nyan par mi 'gyur la/ gal te nyan par gyur na'ang de sems rnam par g.yeng bas nyan par 'gyur zhing dad par mi 'gyur/ bsnyen
75b3(rgyud): bkur bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so// gal te bsnyen bkur bgyid par gyur na'ang nyon mongs pa dang gnod sems dang bcas pa'i sems kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur lags so//
75b4(rgyud): gal te yi ger 'dri'am yi ger 'drir stsol bar 'gyur na'ang de gzhan dag yid la bgyid par 'gyur lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu'i slad du de ni nyams su
75b5(rgyud): myong bar bgyid cing the tshom skye bar 'gyur lags so// mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyid pas kyang lan gsum bsgrubs na/ re ba thams cad yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur lags te/ de la nem
75b6(rgyud): nur ma mchis pa dang / yid gnyis ma mchis pa dang / the tshom mi bskyed par bgyi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
75b7(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu logs so legs so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro// /
76a1(rgyud): de nas gnod sbyin ma chen mo dpe med ma bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste byin nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos sna tshogs dang /
76a2(rgyud): ras bcos bu zung dag gis mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'di ltar
76a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das yul ko'u sham bi na dbyangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar sems can thams cad kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du dam bcas pa brjod pa rjes su
76a4(rgyud): dran lags te/ bcom ldan 'das pa dag gis kyang rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi snying po dag 'tshal lags so// de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang //
76a5(rgyud): po la bde ba dang / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams kyi don du bdag rjes su gzung du gsol//
76a6(rgyud): namaHsarba ta thA ga tA nA na/ s+yAd ya thA dan/ hA hA/ hI hI/ hU hU/ sa ra sa ra/ la hUM la hUM/ shI g+h+raM shI g+h+raM/ ma hA bi d+yA/ sarba bi d+yA da ra Na saM s+thi te/ ha sa ha sa kyin+tiSh+Ti sa king
76a7(rgyud): gin+tiSh+Tha si/ ka na ka biM tsa tra A ba ra na ba hu/ shi ting ge/ pa Ta pa Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ sarba an+ma na me swA hA/ sA d+ha ya/ tu ru tu ru an+d+ra na swA hA/ an+d+ran
76b1(rgyud): de tsam/ sar+b+ba sata tA nA na sing d+hi/ sa hA hA/ pad+me pad+de/ ma hA pad+he/ bi shi bi shi / ma hA ba~M sha de/ b+hA bad+ha ba/ b+ha bong \u0f7fbA s+ya/ ta mA hA b+h+yor tamA hA g+hor/ ta ma me bi d+ya ma tha maH
76b2(rgyud): pa sing d+hi pra ru/ sarba A shwam pa pU ra ya/ bung d+ha a d+hiny+dza ne na swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la yon 'tshal ba dang / nor dang 'bru 'tshal ba dang / sems can thams cad dbang
76b3(rgyud): dubagyi bar 'tshal ba dang / nor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal srid dang / rig sngags 'chang chen po nyid dang / bdag mngon sum du mthong bar 'tshal ba des tshes brgyad kyi gdugs
76b4(rgyud): la ras dkar po gsar pa kha tshar ma gum bai sgra ma stsal ba ri mo mkhan gtsang ma bsnyen te gnas pa 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pas/ tshon rtsi sbyin dang ma 'bags pa snod gsar
76b5(rgyud): pa'i nang du stsal bas/ dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs chos ston pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o// g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo gos dkar po 'tshal ba
76b6(rgyud): rgyan thams cad dang / me tog 'bring dang zla gam dang / sa mo ngos brgyan pa rdo rje gsor zhing mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o// g.yon phyogs su ni gnod sbyin mo chen mong pe med ma 'dam bu
76b7(rgyud): mnga' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar sham du mchis la/ rang pa dkar po 'tshal ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sug pa na pad+ma thogs shing / yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul du
77a1(rgyud): mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma bsnyen te gnas pa 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa/ rad pa dkar po 'tshal ba/ grogs
77a2(rgyud): dang ldan pa nas cha na 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'tshal bas sngar bsnyen pa bgyis la/ tshes brgyad kyi gdugs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dang bcas pa'i gnas gtsang mar dang po kho nar//
77a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dang lag na rdo rje la me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos ngag gsol bar bgyi zhing / phyogs bzhir yang 'o thug dang / zho dang / 'bras chan dang / ro sna tshogs
77a4(rgyud): dang ldan pa dang / chang sna tshogs kyi gtor ma dag gtor la/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang mar me sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa bgyis nas/ dus gsum du sna
77a5(rgyud): ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum gyis shing / re re nas gnod sbyin mo dpe med ma'i gzugs de la bsnun par bgyi'o// de nas zla ba nya
77a6(rgyud): ba'i tshes bco lnga'i gdugs la'ang cho ga 'di nyid dang / gzhan yang ci 'byor pa dag dang / bdug spos dang / ga pur dang / po ga dkar po dang / tsan da na dang / shing mu sa dag kyang
77a7(rgyud): dbul/ 'bru mar dri bda' ba'i zhugs mar kha gnyis kyang dbul bar bgyi'o// des na bdag der rang gi gzugs kyis gnas par bgyi zhing dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi ste/
77b1(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa dpa' nam mkha' la mchi ba dang / lus mi snang bar bgyi ba dang / rgyal srid dang / stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dang / rig sngags 'chang nyid dang / gte
77b2(rgyud): lta 'tshal ba dang / nor bsgyur 'tshal ba dang / pha rol gyi sems 'tshal ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi lags so// des kyang sems can thams cad la
77b3(rgyud): byams pa'i sems dang / nga rgyal dang / khro ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna yongs su spang ba'i sems su bgyi'o// mchod rten dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi nor 'brog pa yongs su
77b4(rgyud): spang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dad pa mi phyed par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das gal te mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa zhig gis kyang lan gsum bsgrub ste/ bdag gis ma
77b5(rgyud): bsams par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ gal te sangs rgyas la dad par ma gyur pa dang /
77b6(rgyud): yid gnyis su gyur pa gang lags pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos bgyis nas 'gyod pa mi bgyid pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang lags pa de dag
77b7(rgyud): la'ang ba dag mthong bar stsal bar bgyi zhing / thob par yang bgyi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnod sbyin ma dpe med ma la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sring mo legs so//
78a1(rgyud): legs so// sring mo khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi don du sdig pa kun tu spyod pa'i sems can rnams la gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bu dag smras shing / dam bca'
78a2(rgyud): ba'ang byas pa ni'ang khyod legs so// khyod snying rje chen po 'di lta bu 'dis sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu 'gong nus par 'gyur gyis/ khyod kyis de
78a3(rgyud): bzhin du gyis shig/ de nas lha mo chen mo dung can mas bcom ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas te bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
78a4(rgyud): gnyis la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yun
78a5(rgyud): ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang / chos smra ba de dag kyang srung ba'i slad du dam bca' bar bgyis shing / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams stsal bar bgyid
78a6(rgyud): lags kyis/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAn/ tad+ya thA/ oM shaM khi ni de bi/ A gats+tsha A gan+d+ha/ tiSh+Tha d+ha ne/
78a7(rgyud): na dza ye/ bri bi/ pri ti ka ri/ d+hI d+hI d+hI ti ri/ nA nA/ bi bi d+ha/ be Sha ba tra a yu d+ha d+ha ri Ni/ yu yu A yuSh+ma la ne/ ta thA ga tan/ sma ra bo d+hi tsita tan/ mA bi lam+ba/ de hi mai ba ran/ shaM
78b1(rgyud): ka ni swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag lus la gnas par bgyis na de'i snyan pa 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / gzi brjid 'phel ba dang / longs spyod 'phel ba dang dbang /
78b2(rgyud): drug 'phel ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / dgra rnams dbang du bgyi ba'ang 'phel 'phel bar 'gyur lags so// sa'i phyogs gtsang ma 'am/ lha'i gnas su ci 'byor pa'i gtor ma phyogs bzhir stsal/
78b3(rgyud): la de bzhin gshegs pa la bdug spos dang pog dkar po dag gis mchod pa rgya cher bgyi zhing zhugs mar dag kyang phul la/ dgung nyi shu rtsa gcig tu byams pa la gnas pa dang / nges par gan+da
78b4(rgyud): shing bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis na/ dam pa'i chos spong ba ma gtogs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dang ji ltar
78b5(rgyud): lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis/ lha mo chen mo dung can ma la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sring mo legs so legs so// yon tan mang po dang ldan pa'i dam bca' ba 'di ni legs par smras
78b6(rgyud): so/ sring mo khyod kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin du gyis shig/ de nas lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed mas bcom ldan 'das la gser gyi me tog dag gis mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan
78b7(rgyud): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos smra ba de dag dang / chos nyan pa de dag dang / yi ger 'dri
79a1(rgyud): pa de dag dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de dag gi don du re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa/ dbyig dang / nor bu dang / mu tig
79a2(rgyud): dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / rgyal srid dang / tshe ring bar bgyid pa/ dgra thams cad dbang du bgyid pa'i gsang sngags rnams stsal bar bgyi ste/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i
79a3(rgyud): btsun mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ bsnyen bkur bgyid dam/ yi ger 'dri'am/ yi ger/
79a4(rgyud): 'drir stsol tam/ mchog tu gus pas ji skad gsungs pa'i sgrub par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyab par bgyi zhing / dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang
79a5(rgyud): stsal bar bgyi ste/ longs spyod dang dbang phyug dag gis mi brel bar bgyi/ 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa dang / khrag khrug dang / 'khrug long dag las rgyal bar bgyi/ tshe phun sum tshogs
79a6(rgyud): pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi/ de'i yul dang grong khyer dag kyang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi lags kyis/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ na maHsarba/
79a7(rgyud): ta thA ga tA nAn/ sarba bo d+hi satwa nAn/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra/ badz+ra pA Ni pra b+hA tI nAn/ tad+ya thA/ oM ma hA de bi/ b+hI me b+hI ma pa te/ dza ye dza ya ba he/ ya sho ba hi/ ya sho dza be ka te
79b1(rgyud): dzadzA be/ byA ka ra Na prap+te/ sarba satwa a ba lo ka ne/ kri ba te dza ba hu le/ ta thA ga ta a nu dzA taM pA lA ya/ s+phA ra pra ti dzAM/ bud d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA ne na/ de hi me ba rad/ sid d+haM ku ru/ de bi/ ma hA de bi
79b2(rgyud): t+ya bA tsa na de bo/ b+hI ma~M/ sa t+ya bA tsa na pra tiSh+Thi te/ gu h+ya na bA si ni swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don du/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs shing
79b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pas rjes su gnang ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / mar me dag gis
79b4(rgyud): mchod pa bgyis la/ phyogs bzhir yang 'o thug dang / ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gtor ma dag stsal te/ ci dang ci 'tshal ba yid la bgyis shing bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mchod
79b5(rgyud): pa bgyid na/ re ba de dang de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid lags so// gang la la bdag gi rang gi gzugs mthong bar 'tshal ba des/ tshes brgyad kyi gdugs la ras dkar
79b6(rgyud): po gsar pa kha tshar ma 'gum pa/ ska ma mchis pa la ri mo mkhan gtsang ma 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad yongs su bzung ba tshon rtsi sbyin dang ma 'bags pa snod gsar pa'i nang du stsal bas
79b7(rgyud): dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs chos ston pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa bri bar bgyi'o// g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam ston pa bribar
80a1(rgyud): bgyi'o// g.yon phyog su ni lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar sham du mchis la/ rang pa dkar po 'tshal ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
80a2(rgyud): pa rnga ril ba dang bgrang 'phreng thogs shing / yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul du mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas sngar bsnyen pa bgyis la/ tshes brgyad nas/
80a3(rgyud): bco lnga'i bar du mchod rten sku gdung dang bcas pa'i gnas su me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dag gis mchod pa bgyi zhing / phyogs bzhir yang 'o thug dang
80a4(rgyud): dang / 'bras chan gyi gtor ma dag gtor la/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / mar me sna tshogs ngag gis mchod pa rgya cher bgyi zhing lha bshos dkar po dag kyang phul la
80a5(rgyud): gtor ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / gzhan yang ci 'byor pa dag stsal nas/ sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems kyis sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad
80a6(rgyud): la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bgyi zhing / re re nas lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma'i gzugs de la 'phang bar bgyi'o// de nas bdag der rang gi gzugs kyis gnas par bgyi zhing /
80a7(rgyud): dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi ste/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dang / nam mkha' la mchi ba dang / gter lha 'tshal ba dang / nor bsgyur 'tshal ba dang / rig sngags 'chang nyid dang /
80b1(rgyud): dus ma lags par 'gum pa bzlog pa dang / bro nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rab tu gzhom pa dang / bu mchis par bgyi ba dang / nor 'du bar
80b2(rgyud): bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad la byams pa skye ba dang / gzhan yang ci 'tshal ba'i las dag kyang bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / sangs
80b3(rgyud): rgyus dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dag la the tsom du gyur pa gang lags pa ma gtogs par mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyid pa zhig lags na'ang / bdag gis re ba thams cad yongs su
80b4(rgyud): rdzogs par ma bgyis par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
80b5(rgyud): stsal pa/ sring mo legs so legs so// sring mo khyod sems can thams cad kyi dor dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs shing / chos kyi rnams grangs 'di'ang yun ring du gnas
80b6(rgyud): par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ni'ang khyod legs so// sring mo de'i phyir khyod kyis rtag tu dam bcas pa 'di dran par gyis shig/ de nas de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos shing / lha'i me
80b7(rgyud): tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag gis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sring mo legs so legs so// khyod kyis sems can
81a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i dam bca' ba 'di ni legs par smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sem
81a2(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi/
81a3(rgyud): ger 'drir stsol ba dang / klog pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / 'don pa dang / mchid ston du bgyid pa des bsod nams ji tsam 'thob par 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das
81a4(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i phyir de khyod nyid la dri yis/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis
81a5(rgyud): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la ni ma gzigs pa 'am/ ma gsan pa 'am/ mi dgongs pa 'am/ rnam par mi mkhyen pa mi mnga' bas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis
81a6(rgyud): bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa
81a7(rgyud): dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / 'don pa dang / kha ton du byed pa las bsod nams 'thob par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni dpes brjod par yang mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
81b1(rgyud): gos dang / rgyan dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dag gis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byas te rtser bcug kyang / sems
81b2(rgyud): can de dag skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag las yongs su thar par mi
81b3(rgyud): 'gyur ba nyid yin zhing / lo 'bum du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtser bcug kyang sems can de dag sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten
81b4(rgyud): dang yi dgas kyi yul dag las yongs su thar par mi 'gyur ba nyid de/ sems can rnams kyi phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan cing mchod pa byed pa dang yang dag par bstan te/ de'i don/
81b5(rgyud): kyang mnyan cing nan tan gyis sgrub par byed pa ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug
81b6(rgyud): pa dag dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad las yongs su thar pa kho nar gyur pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas 'di'i
81b7(rgyud): bsod nams kyi tshad kyi dpe mi mdzad do// rigs kyi bu gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang / chos smra ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag gi
82a1(rgyud): phyir/ dbyig nyungs 'bru tsam yongs su gtong bar byed dam/ me tog gcig gama'abras bu gcig gam ba ngan nam/ rol mo'i sgra'am/ smos sam/ gos
82a2(rgyud): sam/ rgyan gcig tsam zhig yongs su gtong bar byed ngam/ yi ger 'dri'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam mchod par byed dam/ yang dag par ston tam/
82a3(rgyud): bsnyen bkur byed dam/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa gang yin pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa mngon sum du bzhugs pa la lo 'bum du me
82a4(rgyud): tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / gdug sa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ngag gis mchod pas mchod par byed/ rjed par byed cing / bde ba'i yo
82a5(rgyud): byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang / 'chag sa dang / skyed mos 'tshal dag byed du bcug gam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'phang
82a6(rgyud): du dpag tshad byed pa brgya'am stong byed du bcug ste/ de dag la lo 'bum du mchod pa dag gis mchod par byed pa bas/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dong / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /
82a7(rgyud): 'a'achang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / mchod pa byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa de ni de bas bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba ches mang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
82b1(rgyud): mngon sum du mchong ba byed pa de ni de lta ma yin pa// sems can thams cad la sbyin pa byim zhing / 'dod pa'i yon tam lnga ba dag gis rtser bcug pa'ang de lta ma yin no// de smra bsar rigs kyi bu
82b2(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po chen po dang / blon po chen po dang / blon po de dag gis rtag par rgyun du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod par bya'o// gang chos kyi rnam grangs
82b3(rgyud): 'di sgrog par byed pa dang / rjod par byed pa dang / don yang nye bar sgrub par byed pa'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen de dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing / de dag gis bsnyen
82b4(rgyud): bkur byas te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ gtsang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ yid la bya zhing / 'di ltar sems bskyed par yang bya ste/ bdag cag don med pa la don du
82b5(rgyud): 'du shes pa dang / mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes shing / lam ma yin par zhugs pa la lam nye bar ston pa gang yin pa dang / bdag cag sems
82b6(rgyud): can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten las yongs su thar par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs/
82b7(rgyud): par rnyed do snyam du sems bskyed par yang bya'o// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can thams cad la/ de bzhin gshegs
83a1(rgyud): pa'i mdzad pa chen po mdzad pa pos yang dag par bshad lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni phyi ma'i dus bye ma'i
83a2(rgyud): tshen lho phyogs kyi rgyud na spyod par 'gyur te/ der yang dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po chen po dang / blon po snod
83a3(rgyud): du gyur pa dag mchod par byed pa/ 'dzin par byed pa/ klog par byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / dad par 'gyur/ yid ches par 'gyur ro// gal te byang dang / sha ra dang / nub phyogs/
83a4(rgyud): kyi rgyud na spyod par yang 'gyur na/ de na gang dag nyan par mi byed pa dang / dad par mi byed pa dang / yid ches par mi byed pa dang / mchod par mi byed pa dang / brtson 'grus gzhan pa dang /
83a5(rgyud): brjed ngas pa dang / bu smad dang / bran dang / bran mo dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / gzhang gang dang / 'jo sgeg dang / bro dang / gar dang / glu sna tshogs kyis rnam par
83a6(rgyud): g.yengs shing phrag dog dang / ser sna'i dran pas nyan par mi byed/ yid ches par mi byed pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi las la mngon par brtson pa yin te/ de dag gi skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na
83a7(rgyud): ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dung 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshis
83b1(rgyud): 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul rnams las yongs su ma thar pa kho nar 'gyur ro// de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bdag nyid ngan song thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'dzad/
83b2(rgyud): ba de dag gis bstan bkur byas te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mdzod par bya zhing / gzhan dag la yang dag par bstan par bya/ yid la gzung bar bya'o// khrag drug dang / 'khrug byeng dang /
83b3(rgyud): lam ngan pa dang / lhas ngan pa dag dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / gnag nang dang / phyugs nang dang / mi nad dag dang / nad dang / 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa sna tshogs dag
83b4(rgyud): la'ang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod pa byas te bklag par bya'o// rgyal mtshan la btsugs la me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dag gis mchod cing phyogs/
83b5(rgyud): bzhir gtor ma gtor la/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos ngag gis phyag byas te 'jug par byas na/ der yams kyi nang dang / gnod pa dang / 'gro ba'i nang thams cad kya
83b6(rgyud): rab tu ni bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcang ba 'di dag bka' stsal to// sngon gyi srid par 'dren pas legs gsungs shing // sems can thams cad
83b7(rgyud): rjes su gzung ba'i byor// dalta ngas kyang khyod la ba gang ba y-i/ ting 'dzin 'dzim zung zhig kun dga' bo/ sangs rgyas chas dang ge 'dun dpom mtshags// gang gis khams gsun
84a1(rgyud): sbyin par byin pa bas// mdo sde 'di la mchod pa byas na ni// sbyin pas de yi dper yang mi bong ngo // gang gis sangs rgyas la ni dang byas te// tshad med gtsug lag
84a2(rgyud): khang dag brtsigs pa bas// gang zhig mdo 'di 'dzin pa gang yin pa// de ni de bas bsod nams mang por 'gyur// gang zhig me tog gcig tsam 'dor byed cing // gos dang 'phreng ba byug pa
84a3(rgyud): de bzhin te// ting 'dzin 'di la bsnyen bkur byed gyur na/ bsod nams tshogs char snga ma de mi 'gyur// gang gis mdo sde 'di la mchod pa'i phyir// kar sha pa Na'i sbyin pa sbyin byed cing /
84a4(rgyud): byang chub phyir ni byams pa'i sems bskyed na// de na de bas bsod nams mang po 'thob// byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sems can la// ting 'dzin 'di bshad lung phog de bzhin du//
84a5(rgyud): bla med byang chub phyir ni bkod gyur na// de yi bsod nams dper yang mi 'gyur ro// de ltos phan yon 'di dag thos nas kyang // sems can kun la de bzhin byams byas te// mdo 'di
84a6(rgyud): gzung zhing yi ger bri bar bya// bklag par bya zhing de bzhin bshang bar bya// rga dang de bzhin na 'chis gnod gyur cing // sdug bsngal rab grag brgya yis yongs gdungs la// sems
84a7(rgyud): dmyal yi dgas rnams su skye ba na// phyi ma'i dus na 'gyod par gyur ta ra~M// 'chi ba'i dus na yid skrag 'jigs gyur la/ yang dang yang du rngam pa 'don byed cing // bdag gi dpung gcen
84b1(rgyud): skyabs su su 'gyur zhes// byis pa'i bro can par tshur rtog ga re// gang pyir de bzhin gshegs pa ma mchod cing // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun nor grags pa// mi ba bdag shing rje'i 'dzin
84b2(rgyud): rjen 'khring 'gyur zhing // phyin chad rtag tu skyabs gyur 'ga' yang med// bu smad yod min nye du rtsa lag med// yul 'khor yong min bzhang gang 'jo sgeg med// nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos
84b3(rgyud): dang rgyan// kun spangs sdug bsngal yang dang yang mi bzang // ting 'dzin 'di la dad par ma byas pa// de 'dra'i sdug bsngal mi bzang myong 'gyur bas// sdug bsngal 'di la phan yon de thos na/
84b4(rgyud): byis pa'i blo yang su zhig dang mi skyed// dang phyir rtag tu dge slong pho mo dang // dge bsnyen rnams dang rgyal pos khor zug tu// mdo sde 'di ni rtag tu gzung bya zhing // 'dzin pa la yang rtag tu
84b5(rgyud): bsnyen bkur bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags te/ ston pa'i 'du
84b6(rgyud): shes kyis bcang bar bgyi zhing / sems can thams cad la yang dag par bstan par bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gal te khyod kyis ngas chos
84b7(rgyud): gang bstan pa mnyan te kun bzung ba de dag thams cad 'chang bar mi byed/ klog par mi byed/ rgyas par mi byed kyang des ni khyod kyis ngal nyes pa byas par mi 'gyur zhing / gus par ma mnyan
85a1(rgyud): par mi 'gyur la/ nyan thos nyid ma yin par mi 'gyur gyi/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang bar mi byed/ klog par mi byed/ mchod par mi byed/ yang dag par ston par mi
85a2(rgyud): byed/ yid la gnas par mi byed na ni/ des na khyod kyis nga la nyes pa byas par 'gyur zhing / gus par ma mnyan par yang 'gyur la/ nyan thos nyid yin par yang mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de
85a3(rgyud): lta bas na khyod kyis phung dung du byas te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcang bar bya'o// 'di ni phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
85a4(rgyud): pa'i byang chub kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags drug khri len pa med par zag pa rnams las
85a5(rgyud): sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' bdun brgyas ni ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// lnga brgyas ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par skye bar lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro// srog
85a6(rgyud): chags dgu khri ni nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol te mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro thams cad spangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
85a7(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni slad ma'i dus spang ma'i tshe na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs/
85b1(rgyud): kyi bu mo nyan par bgyid pa dang / 'dzin par bgyid pa dang / ri mor bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa de dag dang / yi ger 'dri bar bgyid pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa bgying bar
85b2(rgyud): 'gyur te/ de dag kyang ji lta bu tshal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu lung bstan pa lags so// srang ma'i dus slang ma'i tshe na sems can gang bzhad gang dang / 'jo sgeg dang / gar dang /
85b3(rgyud): khro dang / glu dang / rol mo'i sgra dag la sna tshogs su g.yeng ba/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mun pa che ba rtsed mo la dga' bar 'du shes pa/ mi rtag pa la'ang rtag par
85b4(rgyud): 'du shes pa/ phrag dog dang / ser snas yongs su 'dzin cing / mchod par mi bgyid ri mor mi bgyid dad par mi bgyid/ glo ba ches par mi bgyid/ 'chang bar mi bgyid
85b5(rgyud): klog par mi bgyid/ nyan par mi bgyid / nan tan gyis sgrub par mi bgyid pa de dag ni/ ngal ba 'di yid byung bar bgyis shing / sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu de yongs su bas par bgyis nas pa sdug
85b6(rgyud): bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba sna tshogs dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing / der yang bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag du mar sdug bsngal nyams su myong nas
85b7(rgyud): yang ma sems cad dmyal ba deng / dung 'gro'i skye gnas dang / ga gi ni rdo'i 'jig cen rnams sa skye bar 'gyur lags te/ mi ge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang gis sur ring por rjes su 'byong
86a1(rgyud): par 'gyur lags so// de lnga lags pas na lus dang / ngag dang / yid legs par bsdam par bgyi zhing / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dag la'ang /
86a2(rgyud): dad pa mi phyed par bgyi/ sems can thams cad la'ang byams pa'i sems dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims yongs su spangs pa'i sems dang / khro ba yongs
86a3(rgyud): su spangs pa'i sems su bgyi lags so// de nas ji ltar lags so// de nas ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis yang rang gi bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs
86a4(rgyud): pa la lha'i me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / rgyur dag dang / a la la zhes ca co dang / ga zha'i sgra dag dang / lha'i sil
86a5(rgyud): snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs dag gis mchod pa byas nas legs so zhes bya ba gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// sems can thams cad kyi don dang
86a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yuni ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs chen po 'di shin tu legs par bka' stsa la lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang /
86a7(rgyud): ldan pa kun dga' bos 'ang skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming tsa lags/ 'di'i lha gzungs par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ na
86b1(rgyud): dga' ba da phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'did bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su gnang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnon pa zhes bya bar zu zhig brdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'jug
86b2(rgyud): pa 'dus pa chen po zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig
86b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / 'jam dpal dang / lag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
86b4(rgyud): ngag thams cad dang / nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin mo chen mo
86b5(rgyud): dpe med ma dang / dri med 'od dang / 'od can ma dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / dpal ldan ma dang / dung cen ma dang / 'phrog ma la sogs pa de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod
86b6(rgyud): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag thams cad dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji ltar lpags pa de dag dang / dge
86b7(rgyud): slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod // 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/
87a1(rgyud): kyi byin gyirlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya batheg pa chen po'i mang rdzogs sa/
87a2(rgyud): gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing nus te gtan la phab pa ban d+he klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur/
87a3(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ma Ni tsin+ta kalpA pra Ni d+hirba ba/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rtog pa
87a4(rgyud): las smon lam 'byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags
87a5(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo// btsun pa spyan ras gzigs
87a6(rgyud): dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sdug
87a7(rgyud): bsngal mi bzang ba thams cad zhi zhing rgyun chad par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis
87b1(rgyud): rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang gnod pa phyir rgol pa thams cad chu chad par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyad ras gzigs dbang phyug zam/
87b2(rgyud): rje chen po dang ldan pa phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags bzugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi las dang / nyon mongs pa
87b3(rgyud): thams cad dang / mi dge ba'i chos dang / bdud kyi las skyes pa thams cad byang zhing grol bar gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag
87b4(rgyud): 'tshal lo// 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal rtag tu
87b5(rgyud): mthong zhing / smon lam ji skad btab pa thams cad kyang myur du grub par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa thugs
87b6(rgyud): rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'phags pa gang dag zhal mngon sum du lta zhing / dam pa'i mchog gsol ba tham/
87b7(rgyud): cad kyang de bzhin du grub par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran
88a1(rgyud): pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis 'jig rten dag na 'phongs shing nyams thag pa thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bgyid pa la
88a2(rgyud): mthu chen po thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan
88a3(rgyud): nas brjod pas/ 'jig rten dag na mu ge'i dgon pa chen po dang / me dang / chu dang / rlung la sogs pa'i gnod pa gang dag 'byung bas/ skye bo mang po nyam thag pa de dag zhi ba dang ma mchis
88a4(rgyud): par bgyid par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan
88a5(rgyud): nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can gang dag 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol tu 'chi 'pho ba'i 'jigs pa chen po nye bar gnas pa na'ang / 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug khyod zhal mngon
88a6(rgyud): sum du mngon du mthong zhing dbugs 'byin pa chen po mdzad par gyur cig bdag dang sems can gzhan 'chi 'pho ba dag gis kyang nyon mongs pa dag gis ma spros pa chos bdag med pa / dran pa
88a7(rgyud): dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi sems tshang mang bar brtan pa/ sems ma zhum pa spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan zhing / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad nye bar zhi zhing dran pa nye bar
88b1(rgyud): gzhag bzhin du 'chi 'pho bar gyur cig/ tshe rabs thams cad du'ang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du ste zhing tshe rabs rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems
88b2(rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas/ 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug la sogs pa mnyes par bgyid cing ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa'i mthu dang ldan par gyur cing / ji ltar thugs rje'i
88b3(rgyud): dbang phyug des thugs rje chen po rnam par thar pa'i sgo lhun gyis grub pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rje dang ro gcig par gyur cig/ ji ltar thugs rje'i dbang phyug gis sems
88b4(rgyud): can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de bzhin du/ bdag dang sems can thams
88b5(rgyud): cad kyis kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid
88b6(rgyud): bar gyur cig/ ji ltar dus gsum spangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod
88b7(rgyud): pas/ dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad mtshan nas brjod cing bsnyen bkur bgyis par gyur cig/ ji ltar dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi thugs
89a1(rgyud): rje'i rang bzhin 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod cing mchod pa bgyis pas/ thugs rje chen po'i yul du gyur pa sem/
89a2(rgyud): can thams cad la'ang snying rje chen po'i thabs kyi sbyor ba rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung bar gyur cig/ ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe// de snyed bdag gi lus skyes par// de srid mgon po mchod
89a3(rgyud): bgyid cing // de snyed lus sbyor tshogs bgyid shog/ ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe// ji skad bdag gis ngag skyes par// de srid mgon po'i mtshan brjod cing // ngag gi sbyor ba'i cho gas
89a4(rgyud): bgyid shog/ ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba na// de snyed bdag gi yid 'byung ba// de snyed mgon po rjes dran zhing // yid sbyor tshogs par bgyid gyur cig/ de ltar lus dang ngag yid kyis//
89a5(rgyud): thugs rje'i dbang phyug brten bgyis pas// lus dang ngag yid skyon bral zhing // yon tan phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ de ltar lus ngag yid kyis su// thugs rje'i dbang phyug sku gsung lags/
89a6(rgyud): rtag tu sbyor ba bgyis pas na// thugs rje'i dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs// srid gsum re ba'i gnas gcig pu// yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa// de 'drar bdag kyang grub gyur te// srid
89a7(rgyud): gsum re rdzogs bgyid gyur cig/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya~M/ na maHAr+ya ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsakra brti/ tsin+d+ra ni/ ma hA bad+me ru ru
89b1(rgyud): tiSh+Tha/ dz+wa la A kArA ya hU phaT/ rtsa ba'i sngags rdzogs so// / oM pad+ma tsin+ta maNi dz+wa la hUM/ snying po'o// oM brda padA dzA/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM mchi badz+ra gaNan+d+ra
89b2(rgyud): gsang ba'i snying po'o// sngags snying po bzhi 'byung ba dang / smon lam dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / sngags su bcas pa rdzogs so// / spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs
89b3(rgyud): rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis chos rnams thams cad myur du rtogs par shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis ye shes mig ni myur du thob par
89b4(rgyud): shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis sems can thams cad myur du sgrol bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag
89b5(rgyud): gis thabs mkhas pa dag myur du thob par shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni myur du shes rab gru yis sgrol bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje
