117b5(rgyud): le tse brgyad pa la ni/ a oM a/ a tA a/ a re a/ a tuta a/ a tA a/ a re a/ a tu a/ a re a/ zhes bris nas thod pa la sbyor du bcug nas skud pa sngon pos bkris
117b6(rgyud): nas me tog dmar po dang / mchod pa lngas dus bzhir zla ba kham pa'i dus su mchod na thams cad dbang du 'du'o// dbang drag gi 'khor lo'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// / de
117b7(rgyud): nas dbang du 'du bar byed pa ni srin lag gi khrag ngur khrod kyi sol ba dang gan ka'i khub rnams kyis bris te/ dur khrod kyi sol ba dang mi shi ba'i gos la'o kho ro lo lo tse dgu pa bri'o// dbus su
118a1(rgyud): a mo g+hahrIha/ zhes bya ba bri'o// rtsibs brgyad la/ oM de yau/ tA ba tA re data re/ tut+ta tuta/ tA sa twA/ re mo ra/ tug+hA tu re hrI re/ zhes bya ba bri'o// ga'u/
118a2(rgyud): srin mgo dmar po dang / 'khor lo phral nas gtsang po phar 'gram tshur 'gram du sbas na 'bye zhing dbang du 'gyur ro// dbye zhing dbang du bsdu ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o//
118a3(rgyud): de nas bskrad par 'dod na dug dang / khrag dang / rams rnams sbyar te dur khrod kyi ras la 'khor lo gnyis bris te/ le tsa dgu pa'i dbus su/ ha sa u tsa ha ha ha/ bri bar bya'o//
118a4(rgyud): le tse brgyad la/ ha oM ha/ hatA ha/ ha re hA/ ha tuta ha/ hatA ha/ ha re ha/ ha hu ha/ ha re ha/ zhes pa bris te/ kha sbyar ka pA lar bcug ste srud pa sngon pos bcings te dur khrod du sras na
118a5(rgyud): bskrad par 'gyur ro// bskrad pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas dbye ba'i 'khor lo ni dur khrod kyi sol ba dang / bya rog dang / 'ug pa'i khrag dang /
118a6(rgyud): dug mnyam por bsres pa'i snag tshas 'khor lo phyi nang dang bcas pa le tse dgu pa bris te/ dbus su/ phaT swA he ba data ta ha phaT/ ces bya ba bri'o// le tse nang ma brgyad la/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT
118a7(rgyud): phaT phaT phaT/ ces pa bri'o// le tse phyi ma brgyad la/ phaT oM phaT/ phaT tA phaT/ phaT re phaT/ phaT tu te phaT/ phaT tA phaT/ phaT re phaT/ phaT tu phaT/ phaT re phaT/ ces bya ba bris te/
118b1(rgyud): bya rog dang 'ug pa'i sgo ngar bcug ste brag dang chu 'thab sar sgo ngasbas na 'bye bar 'gyur ro// dbye ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// / de nas gsang ba'i 'khor/
118b2(rgyud): lo ni dug dang / khrag dang / ske tshe rnams mnyam par sbyar bas le tse dgu pa'i 'khor lo phyi nang dang bcas pa bris te/ dbus su/ hUM sA mA ra ya hA phaT/ ces bya ba bri'o// le tse nang ma la
118b3(rgyud): hUM phaT hUM/ phaT hUM phaT/ hUM phaT hUM/ phaT hUM phaT/ hUM phaT hUM/ phaT hUM phaT/ hUM phaT hUM/ phaT hUM phaT/ ces bya ba bri'o// li tsa phyi ma la/ tsA oM phaT/ hUM trA phaT/ hUM re phaT/
118b4(rgyud): hUM t+yA ta phaT/ hUM tA phaT/ hU raM phaT/ hU tu phaT/ hU re phaT/ ces bya ba bris te/ rabs chad pho mo'i thod pa la bris te sngags mang du bzlas nas dur khrod du sbas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// gsang
118b5(rgyud): pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// // myos pa'i 'khor lo ni da du ra'i chus ras sa ma shog shog la le tse dgu pa phyi nang dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo bris te/ dbus su/
118b6(rgyud): ha ha de ba tad ha ha/ zhes pa bri'o// le tse nang ma la/ hA hA hA hA hA hA h+ya h+yA/ bri bar bya'o// phyi ma brgyad la ni/ hA oM hA/ hA tA hA/ hA re hA/ h+ya tuta hA/ h+ya tA hA/ hA re hA/
118b7(rgyud): hA tud+ha/ d+ha re d+ha/ zhes bya ba bris te/ rtswa'i ga'ur bcug nas bzlas pa ci nas kyang myur bar byas te lam rgya gram du dong dang bcas par sbas te dadu ras spungs na myos par 'gyur ro// gson
119a1(rgyud): mar sbrang rtsi 'o mas ling ga bkrus na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// myos byed kyi 'khor mo'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas mnan pa'i 'khor lon
119a2(rgyud): g.yam pa la le tse dgu pa'i 'khor lo bris te/ yung ba'i chus le tse dgu pa la/ dbus su/ ga swa staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya g+ha ha/ zhes bya ba bri bar bya'o// le tse brgyad pa la/ ga oM ga/ ga tA ga
119a3(rgyud): ga reg/ gtutag/ ga tA ga/ ga reg/ ga tu ga/ ga re ga/ zhes bya ba bris te/ 'khor lo kha sbyar nas lam rgya gram du sbas na 'gul mi shes par 'gyur ro// mnan pa'i 'khor lo
119a4(rgyud): le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas mnan pa chen po ni yung ba'i khu bas snag tsha byas te kham pa'i ga'u'i nang du phyi nang le tse dgu pa'i 'khor lo bris la/ sngags
119a5(rgyud): dgod pa ni/ dbus su/ rga swa staM b+ha ya b+ha ya rga ha/ zhes bya ba bri'o// nang ma la/ ha ha hA ha/ ha ha ha ha/ zhes bya ba brgyad bri'o// de'i phyi rol gyi le tse dgu la ni/ rga oMrga
119a6(rgyud): na tAn/ rga re na/ rga tu taH/ rga tAn/ rga ren/ rga tun// na reH/ zhes bya ba bris te/ sgrub pa 'phags ma la byas la dgra gang nas 'ong ba'i phyogs su sbas na srung bar 'gyur
119a7(rgyud): ning / dgra'i skor sras na mnan par 'gyur ro// dgra mnan pa'i 'khor lalo le'u rtse sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas rigs sngogs kyi sbyor ba gnon par byed
119b1(rgyud): pa'i 'khor lo ni lung ba'i khu bas g.yam pa 'am/ lhang tsher gnyis gang yang rung ba la 'khor lo bris te/ le tse dgu pa la phyi nang dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// sngags dgod pa ni/ dbus su
119b2(rgyud): niwa sA staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya ha/ 'khor lo nang ma la/ wa wa wa wa/ wa wa wa wa/ zhes bya ba bri bar bya'o// phyi ma la/ wa au wa/ wa twA wa/ wa re wa/ wa tuta wa/ wa tA
119b3(rgyud): wa wa re wa/ wa tu wa/ wa re wa/ zhes bya ba bris te/ phan tshun g.yas g.yon du 'khor lo re re sbas na mnan par 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi sbyor ba mnan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa
119b4(rgyud): bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nus/ me tog man dA ra ba dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da la sogs
119b5(rgyud): pas bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra du ma'ang bsgrags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ dam tshig kyang gang gis 'grub par 'gyur zhes zhus pa
119b6(rgyud): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ so so'i dam tshig sdom gnas te// lha yi 'khor lo dang ldan pas// srog chags dag ni gsad pa spang // ma byin pa dag mi blang zhing //
119b7(rgyud): bud med mi bsten smad mi bya// brdzun ni rnam pa kun tu spang // myos gyur dag dang sha dag dang // dgu zhing rnam pa rtag tu spang // mo rnams thams cad kun la ni// chags pa'i sems kun
120a1(rgyud): spang ba ste// ma bzhin du ni kun la ni// phan pa'i sems kyis kun la bkur// dam tshig sdom pa gnas pa yi// las rnams kun la mthu yod 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan/
120a2(rgyud): 'das kyis gsungs so// dam tshig dang sdom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha dpag tu med pa
120a3(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nu la sogs pa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa rjes su yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
120a4(rgyud): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i rgyud las sna tshogs bstan pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA shrI mi tra dang //
120a5(rgyud): lo tsa ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bskur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya tA ra b+ha dra nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka/ bod skad du/ rje btsun ma
120a6(rgyud): 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan yid 'ong po Ta la// sna tshogs khams kyis rnam par spras// sna tshogs ljon pas
120a7(rgyud): bkram pa ste// skye gnyis du ma sgra 'byin pa// 'bab chu sna tshogs ku co che// ri dgas sna tshogs 'khrugs pa ste// me tog sna tshogs rigs rnams kyis// kun tu dri yis bkang ba ste// sna tshogs
120b1(rgyud): yid 'ong 'bras bur ldan// rkang pa drug pa klu yi sgra// mi 'am ci yis glu snyan len// glang chen smyon pas yang dag khengs// rigs 'dzin grub pa'i tshogs rnams dang // dri za rnams kyang glu len pa/
120b2(rgyud): thub pa 'dod chags bral rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs gzhan dang // sa bcu'i dbang phyug rnams dang ni// 'phags ma sgrol sogs lha mo rnams// rig pa'i rgyal mo steng rnams kyis//
120b3(rgyud): rtag tu legs par bsten pa'o// khro bo'i rgyal po tshogs gzhan dang // rta mgrin la sogs kyis bskor ba// sems can kun la phan par brtson// bcom ldan 'das ni spyan ras gzigs// bzhugs
120b4(rgyud): te de phyir dpal dang ldan// pad+ma'i snying po thub pa'i gdan// dka' thub chen po dang ldan pa// byams pa dang ni snying rje ldan// lha yi 'khor ni chen po la// chos gsung po ni yang dag bzhugs// de ru
120b5(rgyud): nyer 'dug yang dag langs// phyag na rdo rje stobs po che// mchog tu snying rje dang ldan pas// spyan ras gzigs la zhus pa ste// rkun po sbrul dang seng ge dang // glang po stag dang chu 'jigs pas/
120b6(rgyud): zhi mdzad thub pas sems can rnams// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba rnams// 'khor ba'i zhabs pas bcings pa rnams// chags sdang gti mug dri ma las// gang gis sems can grol 'gyur ba//
120b7(rgyud): de gsungs bdag la thub chen po// de skad zhus nas bcom ldan 'das// 'jig rten mgon pos 'di skad gsungs// dpal ldan de ni spyan ras gzigs// phyag na rdo rje rab rtogs byed// snyan pa'i
121a1(rgyud): tshig ni 'di skad gsungs// nyon cig gsang ba'i rgyal dbang po// skyob pa 'od dpag med pa yi// smon lam stobs kyis byung ba ste// nga yis 'jig rten ma ru shes// snying rje
121a2(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa yis// 'gro ba 'don par brtson pa mo// nyi ma shar ba dang 'dra ba// zla ba nya 'dra byed kyi 'od// lha bcas mi dang lha min dang // mi rnams thams cad gsal bar byed// 'jig rten gsum po/
121a3(rgyud): g.yo bar byed// gnod sbyin srin po 'jig par byed// phyag na ut+pal sngon po ste// ma 'jigs ma 'jigs zhes brjod ma// bar snang du ni 'bar bar gnas// 'gro ba yang dag gzung don du/
121a4(rgyud): mtshon gyi bskal pa byung ba dang // 'jigs pa sna tshogs 'khrugs don du// rgyal ba rnams kyis bdag bskyed do// ming rnams dran pa nyid kyis ni// sems can thams cad bdag gis srung /
121a5(rgyud): sna tshogs 'jigs pa'i rgya mtsho las// sems can thams cad bdag gis bsgral// des na bdag la 'jig rten du// rgyal ba'i tshogs kyis sgrol mar bsgrags// thal mo sbar ba byas nas ni/
121a6(rgyud): spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol// gsung gcig mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' rab dga' ba'i// sdig pa spong byed bsod nams
121a7(rgyud): dang // bkra shis grags pa 'phel bar byed// gter dang nor rnams 'phel byed nyid// nad rnams thams cad rlag par byed// dpal dang shis pa 'jog par byed// nad med tshe ni 'phel bar
121b1(rgyud): byed// sems can rnams la byams bsgoms la// de dag sgrogs shig thub chen po// spyan ras gzigs dbang rab tu bshad// mchog rnams rab tu rnam gzigs nas// 'di lta bu yi byams pa spro//
121b2(rgyud): phyag ni g.yas pas phyag thabs mdzad// bsod nams mtshan nyid ldan pa yis// de gsungs shes rab shin tu che// legs so legs so dka' thub che// sems can kun la gcig tu brtse
121b3(rgyud): bskal pa chen po mi rnams nyon// mi rnams gang zhig 'di sgrog pa// nor gyi dbang phyug yang dag 'gyur// nad rnams thams cad yang dag grol// dbang phyug kun dang yang dag ldan// dus min
121b4(rgyud): 'chi ba nges par bsregs// 'chi ba bde ba can 'gro ba// de rnams bdag gis bshad par bya// lha yi dge 'dun bdag la nyon// 'di la rjes su yi rang gis// legs par bsdams par 'gyur la
121b5(rgyud): bstod// oM dge ba can ni gzi brjid che// 'jig rten gso byed snyan pa che// dbyangs can ma ni spyan yangs ma// shes rab dpal dang blo 'phel ma// gso byed ma dang rgyas 'debs ma// swA hA/
121b6(rgyud): oM gyi rnam pa 'dod gzugs ma// sems can kun la phan par brtson// g.yul las sgrol byed rgyal ba mo// lha mo shes rab pha rol phyin// 'phags ma sgrol ma yid 'ong ma// rdza rnga dung can rgyas
121b7(rgyud): pa mo// rig pa'i rgyal mo tshig snyan ma// zla ba'i gdong can dkar mo che// mi pham gos ni ser mo can// sgyu ma chen mo dkar mo che// stobs po che la pha rol phyin/ rtsub mo chen mo gtum chen mo//
122a1(rgyud): sdang ba'i sems kyis rlag byed ma// rab tu zhi bzhi pa'i gzugs// rnam par rgyal ba 'bar ba'i 'od// glog gi 'phreng ba rgyal mtshan can// ral gri 'khor lo gzhu thogs
122a2(rgyud): mtshon// 'chol byed rengs byed nag mo ni// mtshan mo nag mo mtshan spyod ma// srung byed rmongs byed zhib mo// mdzes ma dge ma 'dra ba'i lding // tshangs pa mo dang rig byed mo// gsang ba mo ni brag phug
122a3(rgyud): gnas// bkra shis don byed zhib mo// skyes nas rig byed yid mgyogs ma// thod pa can ni shugs chen mo// tshangs ma bden ma gzhan mi rgyal// ded dpon chen mo snying rje gnas// chud zos pa
122a4(rgyud): la lam rab ston// mchog ster ster byed ston pa mo// bud med gzugs la dpag med gnon// ri khrod ma dang rnal 'byor mo// grub ma gtum ma bdud rtsi ma// des ma nor ma bsod nams ma//
122a5(rgyud): skal chen skal bzang mdzes ston ma// mthar byed skrag byed 'jig byed ma// drag dang brtul zhugs chen mo ma// 'gro la gcig tu phan par brtson// skyabs byed gus la song po ma// ngag gi dbang phyug
122a6(rgyud): zhi phra ma// rtag ma kun 'gro rjes 'gro ma// don kun sgrub byed bzang mo ma// gsang byed gso byed nor ster ma// mi 'jigs bsod nams gau ta ma// spyan ras gzigs dbang bdag nyid skyes//
122a7(rgyud): mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni// phan par byed par grags pa ste// mchog tu rmad byung gsang ba'o// lha yul na yang rnyed dka' ba// skal bzang skal ba dang ldan byed// dug ni thams cad nyams
122b1(rgyud): byed la// nad ni thams cad zhi byed ma// sems can kun la bde ster ma// blo ldan gang zhig lan gsum klog/ mnyam bzhag gtsang sbra byas pa yis// des ni dus mi ring ba ru// rgyal srid dpal//
122b2(rgyud): yang thob par 'gyur// rtag tu sdug pa'ang bde bar 'gyur// bkren pa phyug por 'gyur ba'o// rmongs pa shes rab chen por 'gyur// yid gzhungs 'gyur ba the tshom med// bcings pa bcings
122b3(rgyud): las grol bar 'gyur// tha snyad las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur// dgra bo bshes por 'gyur ba ste// rwa can dang ni mche ba can// dog pa'i 'thab mo rgyal dka' dang // sna tshogs 'jigs pa 'khrug pa
122b4(rgyud): las// mtshan ni 'di rnams dran pa yis// 'jigs pa kun las sgrol bar byed// dus min 'chi las sgrol bar byed// skyes bu snyan pa thob par byed// mi ni skye ba don dang bcas// de gcig/
122b5(rgyud): bu yi phan yon gyis// gang zhig 'di ni sngar langs nas// skyes bu gang zhig sgrog byed pa// de yi dus ring tshe dang ldan// mi ni dpal gyis dga' 'gyur te// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za
122b6(rgyud): dang ni lus srul po// 'byung po gshed byed srin po dang // ma mo rtsub pa'i sems ldan pa// gnod sbyin mo dang yi dgas byed// smyo byed dang ni gdon chen rnams// grib gnon dang ni brjed byed dang //
122b7(rgyud): sha za la sogs pa rnams dang // ro langs la sogs sna tshogs rnams// skul byed gzhan sems sdang ba rnams// grib ma yang ni 'gom mi 'gyur// ji ltar slar ni mchod par 'gyur// sdang
123a1(rgyud): ba'i sems can 'ching bar 'gyur// nad la sogs pas thebs mi 'gyur// phyug dang longs spyod yon tan ldan// bu dang tsha bo 'phel bar 'gyur// blo ldan skye ba dran par
123a2(rgyud): 'gyur// rigs dang ldan zhing mthong dgar 'gyur// gzi brjid ldan zhing tshig gsal ba// bstan bcos thams cad rig par 'gyur// dge ba shes bsnyen bkur yang dag bsten// byang
123a3(rgyud): chub sems kyis brgyan pa dang // gang dang gang du skyes pa der// rtag tu sangs rgyas kyis mi spong // dpal ldan 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa/ rje btsun ma
123a4(rgyud): 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/ tA ra de bI na ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka na/ bod skad du/ lha mo sgrol
123a5(rgyud): ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ lha mo chen mo sgrol ma rnam par rgyal ba'i nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi do shal dang / na bza' dang / sham thabs kyi ga shal kas 'jig rten gyi khams chen po'i bla
123a6(rgyud): re byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas lha mo sgrol mas de'i tshe sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i gzungs kyi mchog brjod pa/ oM trai lokya bi dza ya/ a tsit+ta dzA ya/ a ni ra tsi dza tA ya/ su dza ya/ bi dza ya/
123a7(rgyud): ma hA dza ya/ bi dza ya/ dza ya dza ya/ he he/ sma ra sma ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba rad/ ma hA de bi/ bi la sa/ bi la sa/ bi la sa ba dza a mo ta ka ri bi dza ya de bi hI hI/ ki na ki na bi la ma ba se//
123b1(rgyud): spar s+phur/ ma ya pradz+nyA a ni ba ta/ badz+ra ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ bA gi ni d+hu hUM/ s+phuta sU ta/ spyota s+pho ta/ a be sha ya/ a be sha ya/ d+hun d+hu na/ bid+h+wa nA bi d+hun/ kam+ba kam+ba/ kam+ba ya/
123b2(rgyud): su ra b+hi gan d+hA/ a ti si ta/ mu khe ha la da ba la/ saM ga rA dzA na bi ma bi gi/ bi nA sha ya/ bi nA sha ya/ he b+ha ga ba ti/ san trA sa ya/ bi gi nA na/ pa ri ba lA ya/ asma kaM asma ka
123b3(rgyud): mA da ni mA da ni/ saM bo d+ha ya saM bo d+ha ya/ ha ra ha ra/ hi ri hi ri/ hu ru hu ru/ bi ta ra ka ba ra dzahaM haM/ tro tA ya haM haM/ san tri tA ya/ san tro ya/ man+ta man+ta/ marda marda/ tsa ra tsa
123b4(rgyud): rasaM tsa ra saM tsa ra/ be ga be ga be ga pa ti/ na mo na mo na ma swA hA/ de nas lha dang lha min tshogs// srin po gnod sbyin mi 'am ci// lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams dang // 'byung po dri za log
123b5(rgyud): 'dren rnams// 'jig rten gsum du grags pa'i mchog/ gsang sngags chen po 'di thos nas// skrag cing mgo bo smad gyur te// lag pa chen po yongs bskyod nas// gang gis 'di na sa sa
123b6(rgyud): gsum 'di// mtshan dag khyab par bya ba'i phyir// 'dod pa'i lha yi ngag zlog pa// sgrol ma spyan yangs phyag 'tshal lo// spyan ras gzigs kyi rigs smos pa// che ba nyid kyi grags pa'o//
123b7(rgyud): spyan yangs khyod ni sems can rnams// phan bzhed slad du 'byung ba lags// de nas dbang phyug la sogs pa// lha dang lha min 'dus kun dang // rig sngags 'chang gi bdag po dang //
124a1(rgyud): bzhin rig sngags 'chang ba rnams// bla gos phrag pa gcig gzar te// bskor ba mchog ni byas nas kyang // pus mo'i lha ngas steng du// btsugs nas tshig ni 'di skad/
124a2(rgyud): smras// sgrol ma 'od 'bar de la ni// phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal lo// ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yi// dpe med ming ni brjod par bgyi// bkra shis rnam rgyal dpal bzang ba// skye dgu'i
124a3(rgyud): dbang phyug mngon shes myur// dbang phyug rab dga' 'jigs la drag/ rgod bag med cing dregs pa med// pad+ma'i spyan dang pad+ma'i zhal// pad+ma'i lte ba rab gtsang sbyin// spyan bzang spyan ni yangs
124a4(rgyud): pa ste// sngo ba ut+pal sngon po'i 'od// skyob pa skyabs 'os bde ba sbyin// de bzhin stobs sbyin gzugs sbyin pa// mgon po mgon mdzad drag mo ste// dkon mchog gsum po rgyal mdzad ma/
124a5(rgyud): sgros dmar sen mo dmar ba ste// spyan rtsa dmar pos gzigs par mdzad// dga' mdzad dga' stobs pad+ma lags// pad+ma'i mdog can pad mdog dgyes// 'jig rten gsum 'dul zhi ba
124a6(rgyud): ste 'jigs pa'i cha lugs stobs mo che// 'dul du 'jug ma 'dul mdzad ma// bstod ldan mi mchog dam pa lags// rab gsal 'dul ba rdo rje can// rnam par rgyal ba 'od gsal ba/
124a7(rgyud): byang chub rdul med dri ma med// zla ba lha mchog rnams kyi rje// sred bya dang ni sred bya'i bar// rgyu zhing gshegs la 'od zer mdzes// chu lha g.yul 'gyed 'gying bag can// skyes mchog rang
124b1(rgyud): bzhin yid 'phros rgyas// gtsug phung gsum po lho tshil gsum// spyan gsum dri ma gsum sel ba// sred pa sel mdzad long dge ba// tshig ldan mar yang de bzhin grags// rgyal ba sbyin pa
124b2(rgyud): bsod nams sbyin// sdig pa 'joms ma 'jigs pa med// nor sbyin mdog sbyin zhi ba ma// gzugs bzang phyal bzang nu ma bzang // sgyu 'phrul sgyu 'phrul ldan zhing 'dul// dul ba srung ba rdul
124b3(rgyud): sel ba// 'phreng ba thogs ma rgyags mdzad ma// rgyags pa sbyin ma dregs spong ma// drag mo lags te gzi bskyed ma// dkar mo zhi mdzad bde ba mo// skye dgu'i bdag mo tshangs par ldan//
124b4(rgyud): tshangs sbyin dbang phyug dam pa lags// zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i zhal// zla ba'i gzi ni 'phrog par mdzad// nyi ma'i gzi 'phrog dgyes pa mo// yid 'ong bzang zhing zhim mo// bde ma bde ldan
124b5(rgyud): mu dang stegs// bkra shis bgegs rnams sel mdzad ma// nor spel bsod nams rnam par rgyal// 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser dngul 'od// 'jigs pa sel ba 'jigs med sbyin// sgrol ma
124b6(rgyud): lags te zla ba'i zhal// sems can kun la med mi 'gyur// mchod gnas phyag gnas dga' mdzad ma// cha lugs sngo ba cha lugs bzang // rgyan dmar rgyan du thogs pa ste// na bza'
124b7(rgyud): gser mnabs gad+hA ma// dkar mo 'bar ba rnam par 'jigs// gi'u wang gi thig le spos// 'khor ldon rdo rje nu lha nyid// dkyil 'khor mchog mnga' 'jigs mdzad ma// tshems
125a1(rgyud): dkar bzhad cing tshems dkar 'dzum// dpung rgyan snyan cha gdub kor thogs// do shal 'bar ba'i chun po can// 'og pag bzang ldan zhal bzang ma/ grog ni nim pa'i lo/
125a2(rgyud): mthogs// nor bu'i cod pan nor bu 'chang // nor bu'i rgyan rnams rgyan du thogs// nor bu'i 'od zer snang ba can// nor bu'i dkyil 'khor rgyan mnga' ba// 'bar ba'i mdog mnga' rdo rje can/
125a3(rgyud): skyes pa bud med sad par mdzad// zhi ba dbyig thogs mche ba can// tshangs pa'i zhugs can rlung dang ldan// bud med lags te mkha' las gshegs// lha mo mchog gi 'od 'phro ma// 'od dang /
125a4(rgyud): ldan pa 'dod pas 'dul// 'dod pa'i khro bo rab 'joms ma// drag po thor tsugs gtsug pud can// tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gsung ldan rgyal// ping ka'i skad 'dra pheg bzang ma// 'jig
125a5(rgyud): rten dbang phyug rigs mchog skye// dbyig pa'i shing lo rdo rje thogs// drag mo rin chen 'od kyis brgyan// gshegs na snyan cha dri med g.yo// gshin rje ba yi yid la 'jug/ rig sngags 'chang /
125a6(rgyud): ma gzugs 'chang ma// stobs lnga stobs dang ldan par mdzad// stobs dang stobs med mnga' ba ste// shes rab mtshon gyis gcod par mdzad// sgyu rtsal lags te sgyu rtsal ldan// de bzhin
125a7(rgyud): brjod dang smra ba lags// steng nas khyams dang khyams bza' tshul// tsam pa ka yi chun pos gsal// ser mo tsan pa legs pa'i rten// drag mo phyag na chun po thogs// skal ba bzang mo gshal
125b1(rgyud): ka can// de bzhin shin tu shas cher dgyes// rigs mtshan shin tu stobs dang ldan// rdo rje khro bo dga' mdzad ma// bde ldan blo ldan rdo rje'i thogs// blo mdzad shes rab bskyed par mdzad// lha mo lam/
125b2(rgyud): mechod pan can// lha rnams kun la tshul lhag ma// sred med bu mo sdig pa sel// bkra shis ngo tsha shes dang dgyes// rab tu dga' ma 'grogs na dga'// spyod tshul dga' la dga' dang ldan//
125b3(rgyud): dga' ma dga' bar mdzad pa ste// chos rnams kun gyi legs pa'i rten// sangs rgyas sprul pa sprul mdzad ma// nga rgyal sel bar mdzad pa ste// las dang nyon mongs rab 'joms shing //
125b4(rgyud): 'dod pa'i sde rnams rab 'joms ma// shes pa bcu mnga' sangs rgyas pa// pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas// sa bcu dag la mnga' brnyes pa// stobs rnams bcu pos cher gsal ma// rdo rje
125b5(rgyud): cod pan rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje phra mo lha min sel// dus kyi rdo rje rab tu rgyags// rdo rje lcags kyu bde ba dpal// rdo rje zhags pa zhags pa bzang // sgeg mo rdo rje phyag na bsnams// yid 'ong yid
125b6(rgyud): la tshim par mdzad// pha rol bgegs rnams sel mdzad ma// tshim mdzad shas cher bde ba ste// rol cing gar thabs ston par mdzad// chos can ha la ha la'i 'od// chos sbyin rnam par
125b7(rgyud): gzigs pa lags// khyod ni rdo rje 'phro ba dang // bdud rtsi rdo rjer brjod pa ste// rdo rje 'bar ba stobs mo che// lha mo chen mo khyod phyag 'tshal// bdag cag rnams kyis bstod pa yi// mtshan brgya rtsa
126a1(rgyud): brgyad mchog 'di brjod// rtse rtse bcom ldan mchog ta na// smra ba rnams kyi mchog lpags gsungs// de nas zla ba'i 'od 'dra nang // 'bar la 'phro bar ldan pas/
126a2(rgyud): lha mo sgrol ma brjid bag can// 'dzum bzhin du ni rab smras pa// dbang phyug chen po la sogs kun// nga yi tshig ni mnyan par gyis// thams cad rtag tu 'thun par ni// stobs bcu dag la
126a3(rgyud): brtson par gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul chen yang // dus kun tu ni srung bar gyis// zhi ba'i lam la dmigs pas ni// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mi bzad cing // 'jigs pa chen po'i
126a4(rgyud): gzhir gyur pa// rgal dka' khyed kyis rgal bar gyis// mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer la// dmigs nas brtson te 'jug par gyis// de nas nyi 'od 'bar ba yi// 'phreng ba lta bur mdzes pa'i
126a5(rgyud): zhal// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'brug gi sgra// 'dra ba'i tshig ni bka' stsal pa// kye ma rig sngags sgrol ma'i mchog/ mun pa sel bar byed pa dang // mthu stobs rgya chen skyeng byed pa/
126a6(rgyud): sgrib pa thams cad gcod byed pa// tshogs rnams bskyed pa'i gzi brjid kyis// dag par byas pa ma yin pas// shas cher dga' bar byed pa yi// gzungs 'di thos par mi 'gyur ro//
126a7(rgyud): sngon chad sangs rgyas brtson byas pa'i// brtan po gzi brjid dag rnams la// dam tshig chen po rig sngags kyi// dam tshig 'di ni 'byung bar 'gyur// nyon mongs mtha' dag rab 'joms
126b1(rgyud): shing // sdig pa thams cad sel byed pa// sems can thams cad rab 'byed pa'i// gzungs sngags rdo rje mchog 'dzin dang // su zhig mnyam par bzhag pa yis// nyan tam 'chang ngamagron/
126b2(rgyud): byed na// rang byung gis ni gsungs pa bzhin// de yi don kun 'grub par 'gyur// nyon mongs kun las rnam grol zhing // sems can kun las lhag pa'i mchog/ 'jig rten dag tu
126b3(rgyud): chos shes la// 'dzud pa'i de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs// su zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di// 'don cing sgrol ma zla ba'i zhal// de bzhin bstod byed de dag ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang
126b4(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// de yi don yang 'grub 'gyur zhing // rgyal po rnams dang stobs chen mi// gzhan yang sems can bgrang ba gang // thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur// lha mo sgrol ma
126b5(rgyud): zhal bzang ba'i// ming brgya rtsa brgyad grags pa 'di// 'jig rten dag na rgyags pa dang // nyon mongs mi rigs kun sel ba'o// de nas bdud ris gyen du g.yos pa'i ri bo 'khrug byed pa//
126b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ri bo mchog dang 'dra ba'i sku mnga' ba// 'od gsal lha dang mi rnams legs par sad par mdzad pa po// rgyal sras thu bo rnams kyis khyad par stobs kyis brten pa yi/
126b7(rgyud): gsung rab rtag tu tshogs chen brda sprod la// don chen grags shing phan phyir zhugs pa gang // rab des chos de dang ni sdud byed dang // de bzhin khyad par sems pa'i rims sel bas/
127a1(rgyud): bzod med nyon mongs sel ba dang // zhi ba'i yid ni skyed pa'i tshig/ rgyal ba mchog gis bka' stsal nas// gzhes par gyur te mi gsung bzhugs// de nas sgrol mchog lha
127a2(rgyud): mos gtsor gyur dga' bar byed cing yid 'phrog la// dga' ba rgya chen skyed cing tshe dang bde sbyin bstan pa'i tshig thos pas// lha tshogs lha min tshogs bcas mtha' dag dga' ba rgyas shing rmad byung nas/
127a3(rgyud): rab tu dga' zhing spyi bos thal mo sbyar te smra ba zhi bar gyur// sgrol ma'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs te/ lha mo sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so//
127a4(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ b+ha Ta tA rA aSh+Ta shad ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ rje btsun sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan dge ma
127a5(rgyud): gzi chen ma// 'jig rten ma ma grags chen mo// dbyings can spyan ni dkyus ring la// blo dpal shes rab 'phel mdzad ma// swA hA brtan phyir rgyas sbyin zhing // 'dod pa'i gzugs can yi ge oM//
127a6(rgyud): sems can kun la phan brtson zhing // g.yul las sgrol bar mdzad pa mo// lha mo shes rab pha rol phyin// 'phags ma sgrol ma yid 'ong ma// rnga chen dung gi sgra sgrog cing // rig sngags rgyal
127a7(rgyud): mo snyan spra mo// zla ba'i zhal can dkar mo che// mi thub na bza' ser mo bsnams// sgyu 'phrul chen mo dkar mo che// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa mo// nag mo chen mo gtum pa che// gdug/
127b1(rgyud): pa'i sems can 'dul ba mo// rab tu zhi zhing zhi ba'i sku// rnam rgyal 'bar ba'i 'od ldan ma// glog 'phreng rdo rje 'khor lo dang // gzhu dang mda' yi phyag mtshan can// nag mo gnon dang sdom byed
127b2(rgyud): cing // mtshan mo nag mo mtshan spyod ma// srung mdzad rmongs mdzad ni mdzad ma// mdzes ma dge ma 'gro lding ma// bram ze mo sde rigs byed yum// zab mo'i phug na bzhugs pa mo// zhi ba bkra
127b3(rgyud): shis ri khrod ma// rig pa bskyed cing yid ltar mgyogs// thod pa can te shugs chen zhing // gzhan gyis mi thub dus bden ma// ded dpon snying rjes gnon pa mo// lam brgyad ston par
127b4(rgyud): mdzad ma ste// mchog sbyin ston mdzad bstan chos ldan// ma pham bud med gzugs kyis gnon// grub pa rnal 'byor ra khrod ma// gtum mo bdud rtsi rtag pa mo// nor ldan bsod nams skal
127b5(rgyud): ba che// skal bzang mthong na dga' ba mo// mthar byed skrag byed 'jigs pa mo// shin tu drag cing cher 'bar ma// 'gro la gcig tu phan brtson zhing // skyabs 'os mos la byams pa mo//
127b6(rgyud): tshig gi dbang phyug phra ba mo// rtag par kun tu 'dod sbyin la// don kun grub pa bzang mo ste// sbas ma ma ma nor sbyin ma// 'jigs byed bsod nams go'u ta ma// dpal ldan 'jig rten
127b7(rgyud): dbang phyug yum// sgrol ma yon tan mtha' yas shing // bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad ma// ming ni brgya dang brgyad po 'di// tho rangs langs te gang zhig glog/ sgrol mas 'dod pa'i don/
128a1(rgyud): thams cad// phun sum tshogs pa thob par byed// 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// / kha che'i paN+Di ta bud d+ha A kar
128a2(rgyud): dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba ga rub chos kyi shes rab kyis kha che'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// @dkon mchog gsum la phyag
128a3(rgyud): 'tshal lo// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA re tuta tA re tu re sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA na ma/ ma kri te dzaM b+ha ya
128a4(rgyud): sta b+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ bin d+ha ya/ hA tsA hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ sarba duSh+TAts+tsha b+he ni tA re swA hA/ 'phags ma skal ma'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar skad/
128a5(rgyud): du.Ar+ya tA rA swa pra ti dz+nyA nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma rang gis dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas sgrol ma rang gis dam
128a6(rgyud): bcas pa'i gzungs smras pa/ ted+ya thA/ oM tA te tA re ye/ hUM hUM hUM/ sa ma ya s+thi te/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sarba b+ha ra Na/ bi b+hu Shi te/ pad+ma ni pad+ma/ ma hA pad+mA/ a sa na s+thi te/ ha sa ha sa/ trai lo kya
128a7(rgyud): ba ra de/ sarba de ba da na pa/ pU dzaM te sma rA hI/ b+ha ga ba te tA re/ sma rA hI/ b+ha ga ban ta/ ta thA ga tA s+ya/ bu ra taHsa ma yaM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA satwA a ba lo ki te/ ma Ni ka ni ka/ bi tsi tra b+ha ra Ne
128b1(rgyud): oM bi lo kA ya/ che ge mo/ b+ha ga bAn te/ tA re/ dzA hU~M tra~M phaT swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di yid kyis dran pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro// dngos grub thams cad thob par
128b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// dkar po'i tshes brgyad dam bco lnga la 'phags ma sgrol ma la mchod pa chen po byas te/ sgrol ma mngon sum du mthong gi bar de tsam du bzlas
128b3(rgyud): bar bya'o// gang 'dod pa de sbyin no// mchog thams cad ster ro// ma byin na bdag gis mtshams med pa lnga byas so// gzhan yang phan yon dpag tu med pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje mchog
128b4(rgyud): gi rgyud las btus// 'phags ma sgrol ma rang gis dam bcas pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ya sho ba ti d+hA ra Ni/ khong/
128b5(rgyud): skad du/ 'phags pa grags ldan ma'i gzungs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa la/
128b6(rgyud): ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ dz+wa re ma hA dz+wa re/ du khe mu khe ma su pan ne/ ma hA saM pan ne/ saM pa ta ti/ ma hA sa pa ta ti/ ka se ma hA ka se/ kats+tsha dz+wa ra muka te si swA hA/ skud pa 'am chu la lan gsum
128b7(rgyud): bsngags na rims las thar par 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tsi li tsi li/ mi li mi li/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM/ Ar+yA/
129a1(rgyud): ba lo ki te shwa ra swA hA/ gdon thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i skud pa 'am/ skud pa dmar po la lan gsum du bsngags te mdud pa gsum bor la bcings na bar du gcod pan
129a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ki li ki li/ tsi li tsi li// ni gi li sA hA/ 'bru mar la lan gsum bsngag te/
129a3(rgyud): bskus na sman 'tsho'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sa re sa re/ bi sa re bi sa re/ bi sa ra Na/ sha ni swAhA/ shi ba'i rma
129a4(rgyud): bar lan gsum bzlas na sos par 'gyur ro// na maM rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo kau te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ni si ri ni si ri/ ka la ni mi re/ ka la ri
129a5(rgyud): tsi rI bi tsi la swA hA/ lba ba dang / lkog ma'i lha gor dang / lce'i kyi ba na ba dang / gdon nad thams cad la 'jim pa la lan gsum du bsngags te bskus na phan no// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na
129a6(rgyud): ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ badz+ra pA Ni d+ha ma/ oM oM kA ra pra b+ha be/ b+ha ga ba ti bud de/ shud d+he shAn ti ki ri/ ha na ha na/ ma ma pA pa maM/ da ha da ha/ ma ma pA pa daM/ pa tsa ba tsa
129a7(rgyud): ma ma pA pi kan/ oM oM Te/ gra sa pra sa/ ri te Te ri ti Te/ shAn ti ka ri ye swA hA/ shu b+ha ka ri ye swA hA/ k+She ma ka ri ye swAhA/ rims nad kyis btab pa la byab pa byas na rims nad sos par/
129b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sman la sngags kyis btab ste brud na nad pa sos par 'gyur ro// zas la sngags kyis btab ste zos na dug mi gnod par 'gyur ro// 'byung po'i gnod pas zin pa rnams la bu mo/
129b2(rgyud): bkal ba'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags te bcings na thar par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa grags ldan ma'i gzungs rdzogs so// @d+hu/
129b3(rgyud): gar skad du/ Ar+d+ha dza TA ma hA kalpa ma hA bo d+hi satwA bi ku naR+Wa Na pa Ta la bi sa rA b+ha ga ba tI Ar+ya tA ra mA la kalpa nA ma/ bod skad du/ ral pa gyen brjes kyi rtog pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i
129b4(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul pa le'u rab 'byam las/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog pa zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
129b5(rgyud): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma'i gru'i steng gi nam mkha'i mthil na rab tu bzhugs te/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas rab tu phye ba'i byang chub sems
129b6(rgyud): dpa' 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan par bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu khyed rnams nyon cig
129b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i cho 'phrul gyi spyod pa ting nge 'dzin dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi khyad par rnam par thar
130a1(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar byed pa dang / tshe dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang yid
130a2(rgyud): kyi shing rta yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi gzhi sems can thams cad la phan pa'i ched du bshad kyis/ de legs par nyon la legs par yid la gyis shig
130a3(rgyud): ngas bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes so// de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de rnams thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
130a4(rgyud): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par sa so sor thob par byed pa/ rdo rje'i gdan gnon par byed pa/ bdud 'dul bar byed pa
130a5(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar byed pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad nges par 'byung bar byed pa/ lha dang mi rnams su skye bar byed pa/ sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu
130a6(rgyud): zhi bar byed pa/ dbul ba dang nad kyis btab pa thams cad kyi nad sel bar byed pa nyid dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi/
130a7(rgyud): spyod pa zil gyis mi non pa nyid dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de gsung du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad ni don med par gsung bar byed pa
130b1(rgyud): ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das byams pa'i sems dang / bdag cag dang / sems can thams cad la rjes su brtse ba nye bar gzungs nas de gsung du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
130b2(rgyud): shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs nas/ rnam par dag pa'i yul la 'od zer rnam par 'gro ba rnam par 'joms
130b3(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nas me tog lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kun tu skul bar byed pa zhes
130b4(rgyud): bya ba'i 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor ba nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa
130b5(rgyud): 'das nas nub phyogs kyi char gang+gA'i klung brgya stong phrag gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams las 'das pa na/ bde ba can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rjes su zhugs te
130b6(rgyud): gang du de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med bzhugs pa der/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems
130b7(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa la so sor gnas pa rnams kyis thabs cig tu bzhugs pa de 'od zer gyi snang ba mthong bas cung zad rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal de nyid kyis
131a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la bka' stsal to// kye rgyal ba'i sras rnams de ni bdag cag rnams kun tu skul bar byed pa'i 'od zer 'dir 'ongs pa yin par khyed
131a2(rgyud): cag gis shes par gyis shig/ de nas yang sems dpa' chen po de rnams spyan 'dzum pa med par spyan gdangs nas 'di'i 'od zer gyi snang ba gang yin pa der mngon par phyogs te gnas so// de nas kun
131a3(rgyud): tu skul bar byed pa'i 'od zer des bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams chen po kun tu snang bas kun tu snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med la lan gsum bskor ba
131a4(rgyud): byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi ye shes kyi spyi bor nub par gyur to// de nas sems dpa' dpa' chen po de stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan
131a5(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mgo bos rab tu phyag 'tshal te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
131a6(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dgongs su gsol/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste
131a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / rig sngags dang gsang sngags thams cad kyi
131b1(rgyud): spyod pa dang / sgrub thabs kyi cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rtog pa dang / gsang ba'i ras ris kyi cho ga dang / bzlas pa dang / rig pa'i dbang bskur ba thams cad khyad par du bstan pas sem
131b2(rgyud): can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'tshal lo// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
131b3(rgyud): chen po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems dpa' chen po gang da lha de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/ nga'i tshig gis kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam
131b4(rgyud): nga ba chung ngam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ reg par gnas sam zhes rmed par bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
131b5(rgyud): dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i bye ma la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
131b6(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang khyod kyi rigs dang / gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa dang / gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba dang / phyag rgya dang / ras
131b7(rgyud): ris kyi cho ga dang / sbyin sreg dang / bzlas pa'i nges pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ sems can thams cad kun nas dga' bar byed pa/ rin po che snang ba'i le'u
132a1(rgyud): rab 'byams 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i ye shes rnams kyis rang gi rig sngags dang gsang sngags la 'jug par byed pa ston pa mthar thug par/
132a2(rgyud): zin pa dang / nang gi dus dang ldan pa dang / dam tshig rab 'byam gyi le'u dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa mtha' dag ma lus par bsdus pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
132a3(rgyud): dpa' thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la zhugs pa dang / spyod pa mthar thug pa gsung ba dang ldan pa dag gsungs pa la'ang
132a4(rgyud): 'di la rjes su yi rang ba kho na'o// sems dpa' chen po da lta de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod song zhig/ shAkya thub pa'i drung du de la mngon du phyogs pas dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyon la khyod
132a5(rgyud): kyang smra bar 'gyur ro// 'di la'ang rtsa ba'i rig sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyaka se bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa rA
132a6(rgyud): pa bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba t+yaM Ar+ya tA rA ya~M/ bo d+hi satwA yai/ tad+ya thA/ tA re ri dzA ka d+hAmA ni t+yat+te/ tA ra tut+tAre/ shAn+ta d+harma ni t+yat+te/ tAr a na b+hil bya/ d+ha ma nin+na te/
132a7(rgyud): tu tu tsho / rjes rnaMngs ni/ mtshan/ ma \u0f7fna/ m+b+ha/ swam+b+hanaM/ thed+he/ n+dapraH/ ma/ tsam / rigs san/ kuN+Di su N+Di me sa / d+ha d+har/ d+ha neb ti
132b1(rgyud): hu ha / kur kucu/ atsam su/ tsan mam can rnam bcu sA dA ya mAn/ 'dzan sems dpa' chen pa rgyad kyi 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba rig pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams/
132b2(rgyud): cad kyi snying po'o// de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyis gsungs shing gsung bar 'gyur te/ khyod kyis kyang da ltar smra bar 'gyur ro// mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dri rgyas pas rnam
132b3(rgyud): par phye ba'i mthar shAkya thub pa byon te/ shAkya thub pas rjes su gnang ba'o// 'di la mchog gi snying por 'gyur ba'ang / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA
132b4(rgyud): satwA ya/ tA re tut+tA raM tu re swA hA/ 'di la nye ba'i snying po'ang / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ oM ku ru kul+le swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
132b5(rgyud): papa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu 'thun pa byang chub kyi snying po kun tu thob par byed pa thams cad kyi bkod pa'i rgyan ces bya
132b6(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu phyogs bzhi rnams dang / steng dang / 'og dang / thad ka'i mthar thug pa'i thams cad du thams cad dang ldan
132b7(rgyud): pa'i phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kun tu gang bar gyur to// rgyal ba'i sras po legs so legs so// gang khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin khyad
133a1(rgyud): par 'di lta bu la snyoms par zhugs pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi nus te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la rab tu zhugs pas bcu la rab tu bajug/
133a2(rgyud): brnams kyis kyang snyoms par 'jug par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyis thabs gcig byams pa dang bcas
133a3(rgyud): pabacom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mchog gi snying po mchog tu gsang ba don thams cad sgrub par byed pa yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba'i sems can thams cad kyis las/
133a4(rgyud): thams cad byed ma/ rig sngags gzhan rnams kyis kyang rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i khyad par gyis sgrub par byed pa dang 'thun pa'i rig sngags gsung bar gyur to// de nas bcom
133a5(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med yud tsam zhig ci'ang mi gsung bar gyur to// thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis kun tu gzigs nas//
133a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dgongs pa byams pa'i bdag nyid kyi sems kyis rig sngags gsungs par gyur to// na maHsarba bud+d+hA nA~M/ oM hrIH'dzin bcom ldan 'das ma
133a7(rgyud): mchog gi snying po las thams cad byed pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas 'di lta ste/ skyes bu spobs pa
133b1(rgyud): ldan pa zhes bya ba de lag pa bsrum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa dang se gol btogs pa tsam gyis kyang mig 'byed 'dzums sam/ ska cig tsam gyis ting nge 'dzin rdzu 'phrul rgya/
133b2(rgyud): stobs mgyogs pa'i blo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par rnam par 'phrul pa nyid ces bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'ongs nas kyang slar 'khod de steng gi nam
133b3(rgyud): mkha'i mthil du nor bu rin po che chen po la so sor 'khod pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen por slar 'khod nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'od zer chen po'i kun tu snang
133b4(rgyud): bas kun tu snang bar byas nas/ rin po che'i snang ba'i bdag po'i rgyan gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
133b5(rgyud): bo spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che du mas rnam par phye ba dang / rin po che'i gdugs du mas dpag tshad brgya stong phrag tu khyab
133b6(rgyud): pa dang / lha'i gos dang dar gyi rgyan gyis nye bar mdzes par spras pa dang / lha'i me tog dang / ba dan dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'phreng ba dang / rin po che'i g.yer kha'i dra ba bcings pa
133b7(rgyud): sgra snyan pa 'khrol ba 'jug pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' so sor gnas par byed pa/ lha'i dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma'i char 'bebs par byed pa mngon par sprul/
134a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shA thub pa la mchod pa'i las ngomatshar rmad du byung ba'i tsho 'phrul byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul mthong // de nas gnas gca
134a2(rgyud): ris kyi lha'i bu de rnams dga' ba dang bcas pas spu zing zhes byed do// lha'i gnas thams cad rab tu g.yos pa dang ldan pa mthong nas skrag cing snying 'dar te/ 'on te 'byor pa yongs su nyams
134a3(rgyud): sam ci zhes phan tshun rings thabs su skad mthon pos smra bar rtsom zhing / 'di skad ces kyang smras so// bcom ldan 'das yongs su skyobs shig/ shAkya thub pa yongs su skyobs shig
134a4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i lha'i 'khor la bka' stsal to// ma 'jigs shig/ ma 'jigs shig/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
134a5(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyis zhing kun nas me tog can lta bu nas nga nyid lta ba dang phyag 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur bar 'dod de/ don chen po spyod pa dang /
134a6(rgyud): rig sngags kyi chog dang / chos kyi chog rmad du byung ba yangs pa nges par bstan pa'i phyir 'ongs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das
134a7(rgyud): la mig mi 'dzum par bltas te nabs gnyis la btung nas yi ge'i tshig rab tu smras pa 'di rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod ngo // phyag 'tshal skyes bu mkhyen khyod la// phyag
134b1(rgyud): 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyed la// spyod pa'i don kun grub pabo// phyag 'tshal skyes bu gtso khyod la// don med thams cad klog pa 'o// phyag 'tshal skyes bu seng ge khyod// ngan song thams
134b2(rgyud): cad 'joms pa po// dpa' bo chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// bsod nams dri ni mtha' yas pa// phyag 'tshal skyes bu pang dkar khyod// sring gsum 'dam ni rnam stong ba// phyag 'tshal skyes bu
134b3(rgyud): pad+ma khyod// sdug bsngal thams cad rnam grol byed// thams cad grol khyod phyag 'tshal lo// gdung ba thams cad legs 'dul byed// zhi ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sngags kyi spyod
134b4(rgyud): don sgrub pa po// thams cad grub khyod phyag 'tshal lo// bkra shis kun gyis bkra shis pa/ bkra shis khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chos rnams thams cad kun tu rtogs// sangs rgyas dam tshig
134b5(rgyud): khyod phyag 'tshal// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid// spros pa med pa'i rnam pa ni// yang dag rjes 'jug ston pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod phyag 'tshal// shes dang shes bya'i dngos po
134b6(rgyud): kun// legs par byas shing yang dag thos// theg gsum lam dang myang 'das la// rab tu gnas 'jug rab gnas pa// kun mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes yi ge'i tshig rab tu smras
134b7(rgyud): pa 'di rnams kyis bstod pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mngon par bstod nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di nas gang+gA'i klung brgya stong phrag gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i
135a1(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas nub phyogs kyi char kun nas me tog ldan zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gyur pa der/ bde ba can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na bcom
135a2(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo
135a3(rgyud): sbyar ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa tshe dpag tu med pa bzhugs te/ de chos ston par mdzad pa ni thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa
135a4(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba'i tshangs par spyod pa/ yang dag par ston par mdzad cing / de 'di ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston par mdzad do// rig
135a5(rgyud): sngags dang gsang sngags kyi don gyi spyod pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod dang / lam gsum gyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i lam dang / skyob pa dang / gnas dang / skyabs dang /
135a6(rgyud): dpung gnyen dang / bde ba dang / shin tu mthar thug pa dang / shin tu yongs su mthar gtugs pa'i sems can thams cad la ston te/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mdzad pas rjes su gnang nas bcom
135a7(rgyud): ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung dang nye ba 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med nges bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ ldang ba
135b1(rgyud): yang ngam/ bskrun mi mnga' ngam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes yongs su 'dri bar byed de/ 'di skad ces kyang gsung ngo // ga rnam pa 'dis bu'i snyigs ma'i dus gang dubacom ldan 'das
135b2(rgyud): shAkya thub pa'i sku de'ang chos ston par mdzad cing rjes su rtogs par bya ba'i skye bo la lam gsum gyi byang grol dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye ba rnyed par mdzad pa de ni ngo mtshar ro// bcom ldan 'das shA
135b3(rgyud): thub pa de'i brtson 'grus kyis gang du skal ba med pa'i sems can gyi tshogs srid pa gsum yang dag par 'joms pa'i lam du mthar thug par 'jug par byed pa gtan du grub pa dang bde ba'i rjes su 'thun
135b4(rgyud): pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la sems can rnams rab tu 'god par mdzad pa ni ngo mtshar ro// bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kho nas
135b5(rgyud): mkhyen gyis/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi rnam 'phrul du shes par 'dod pa 'am/ thug
135b6(rgyud): kyi spyad pa spyod pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i sgrub pa dang sems pa shes par 'dod pa 'am/ mtha' dag nges par ston pa ni bskul pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag rnams kyis kyang brjod par yang ga la nus
135b7(rgyud): gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sgrub pa bsdus pa dang / so so ba ma lus pa'i ngo bo 'dus ma byas pa'i chos nyid du blta bar bya ste/ mthong bas spang bar bya ba spong ba
136a1(rgyud): dang / ring por mi thogs par spyod pa smra bar 'dod pa'am/ yon tan ston par 'dod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das kho nas mkhyen gyis/ bdag gis ni ma yin
136a2(rgyud): node nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa sprul te/ rin po che chen po'i pad+ma la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lta
136a3(rgyud): bzhin du bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang la rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gtam gyis rjes
136a4(rgyud): su 'brangs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtam gyis mthar gyi dri ba sngon du 'gro bas phan tshun chos bstan pa'i mthar rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sgrub pa'i don du nye bar tshogs pa rnams la
136a5(rgyud): tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / ka la bing ka dang / ku ta ra dang / bi ta ras bsgrubs pa'i rnga bo che'i dbyangs su grags pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
136a6(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po khyod legs par 'ongs sam/ sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin rlabs sgrub pa dang /
136a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad don yang dag par thob par byed pa dang / rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig thams cad dang / gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba dang bcas pa dang / phyag rgya
136b1(rgyud): dang / dkyil 'khor dang / rdog pa'i dbang bskur ba dang / tshe dang / nang med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sgrub thabs thapa bcung/
136b2(rgyud): kyi cho ga'i rgyud dang / shes pa dang shes bya dus kyi mthar nub pa dang / rgyal sring dang / zhing 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / ngal byung ba mdor bsdus pa las/ sems can thams cad kyi
136b3(rgyud): bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / rang gi yon tan 'byung ba/ gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i mthar 'jug par byed pa/ sems can gzhan dga' bar byed pa/ mi snang ba
136b4(rgyud): dang nam mkhar 'gro bar byed pa/ rkang pa rab tu rgyu ba/ yid gzhungs par byed pa 'gugs par byed pa/ sa 'og tu 'jug par byed pa/ mngon par spyod par byed pa/ don thams cad thob
136b5(rgyud): ba 'bras bu dang bcas pa/ gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin mo dang / ci bgyi dang / sha za dang / 'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed pa/ byis pa dang / rgan po dang / lang tsho ji
136b6(rgyud): lhar gnas pa bzhin du gnas par byed pa ste/ mdor bsdus na las thams cad byed pa/ yid kyi shing rta thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ rgyas pa can dang ni ba can gyi las thams cad
136b7(rgyud): rab tu byed pa/ ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar bar bya bzhin pa/ de lta de ltar bsgrub par bya bzhin pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde sdod dang ldan pa phal po che rtog pa chen po rin po che'i le'u rab 'byam ngas
137a1(rgyud): rjes su gnang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ dag pa'i sems can rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don/ chos kyi mdzod/ skye bo mang po la pan
137a2(rgyud): pa'i ched dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i ched du lha dang mi rnams dang / sems can thams cad la ston cig/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang
137a3(rgyud): phyug sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis kun tu skul bar byed pa rgyan bkod pa'i 'od zer snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu dag pa'i
137a4(rgyud): sems can du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'od zer gyi snang bas ji srid 'og min gyi srid pa nas ji srid mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen po'i
137a5(rgyud): bar gyi sems can gang la la sdug bsngal gyis shin tu gdungs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i 'gro ba rnams zhi ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
137a6(rgyud): dpa' dang / sangs rgyas rnams thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par bskul nas/ slar yang 'od zer de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
137a7(rgyud): gigi spyi bor nub par gyur to// 'di la gzhan shar phyogs la sogs pa rnam par gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang yin pa der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bskul ba'i 'od zer des rlung
137b1(rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor yang dag par bskul bas sgrub pa 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba nyid kyi snang ba dri kun tu gsal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla be DUr+tha 'od kyi rgyal
137b2(rgyud): po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i dbang

137b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bai DUR+Ya'i snang ba'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i dbang po zhes bya ba dang / de lta bu la sogs
137b5(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas yongs su bskor ba mtha' yas shing mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
137b6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su sgrol ma'i gru'i tshal na gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang /
137b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa nges par ston pa'i tshig gi don gyi le'u rab 'byam gsungs pa de la/ sangs
138a1(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams 'dzum pa yang dag par ston par mdzad do// de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs rnams su dang / phyogs bral rnams su zhes pas
138a2(rgyud): steng dang / 'og dang / thad ka thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su snang bar byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams thams cad du'ang bdud kyi gnas thams cad spa bkod
138a3(rgyud): par byas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pas mdun du bdar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa
138a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid chen po nyid blta bar 'dod pa/ mchog gi rig pa'i rjes su spyod pa/ sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gyi le'u rab 'byam de bzhin
138a5(rgyud): gshegs pa'i bstan pa thogs pa med pa yang gsal bar byed 'dod pas so sor 'khod par gyur to// 'di lta ste/ lag bzang dang / rin chen bzang po dang / brtul zhugs bzang po dang / spyan
138a6(rgyud): bzang po dang / dga' ba bzang po dang / chos bzang po dang / dngos grub 'char bzang dang / thams cad 'phags dang / chos 'phags dang / rin chen 'phags dang / rin chen dpal dang /

138b7(rgyud): snang ba dang / kun tu lta ba'i snang ba dang / 'od dpag med dang / dpag yod snang ba dang / spyan bzang snang ba dang / legs 'byung snang ba dang / mtha' yas snang ba dang / mi tshugs snang
139a1(rgyud): ba dang / ma bsgyur ba dang / 'og min dang / dri med dang / me dang / snang ba dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / bde ba dang / bde ba'i mu khyud dang / mu khyud

139a3(rgyud): bzod dka' la gdul dka' ba dang / gsal dka' ba dang / ring du song ba dang / ring por len dang / ring por gnas dang / mtho zhing mtho ba'i mun pa dang / mkha' snang dang / kun nas
139a4(rgyud): snang dang / snang min dang / khyu mchog dang / kun nas snang ldan dang / nges par mnyam pa dang / lha chen po dang / shin tu nges pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / dri ma mthar thug pa dang / mnyam
139a5(rgyud): pa'i mtshan ma bzang po dang / dkar po dang / i mi ki ma~M dang / tha chung dang / dka' bas 'tsho ba dang / bde bar 'tsha ba dang / legs par skyes pa dang / du ba'i tog dang / mchod sbyin
139a6(rgyud): tog dang / dkar po'i tog dang / tog bzang po dang / dbyig gi tog dang / nor dpag tu med pa dang / pha chen po dang / do shal byed pa dang / 'jig rten grags pa dang / kun tu grags
139a7(rgyud): ba dang / chen por grags pa dang / mchog tu bgrang ba dang / skyes pa dang / snang ba dang / ci bgyi dang / mnyam par byed pa dang / 'jig rten byed pa dang / snang ba byed pa dang / nyin mor byed/
139b1(rgyud): ba dang / 'byung bar byed pa dang / don thams cad byed pa dang / grub par byed pa dang / 'od byed pa dang / kun tu gsal bar byed pa dang / rnga bo che'i dbyangs dang / sgra dbyangs dang / dbyungs/
139b2(rgyud): bzang dang / mtha' yas dbyangs dang / tog gi dbyangs dang / 'byung ba'i thub pa dang / gser thub dang / log par dang sel dang / 'od srungs dang / gtsug tor can ngo // thams cad stong/
139b3(rgyud): dang / rnam par gzigs dang / shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba 'di rnams kyis dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan mang po rnams kyis kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po kun tu snang bar byas

146a6(rgyud): kun tu tog dang / rin chen tog dang / rnam par grags pa'i tog dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi tog dang / mi 'pham ldan ma dang / gos shin tu dri med ma dang / gdong drug ma dang /
146a7(rgyud): dri bral ma dang / 'jig rten grags ma zhes pa 'di dag dang / gzhan yang gzungs ma brgya stong phrag bye ba du mas yongs su bskor ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de nyid du 'dus par gyur to//
146b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas mtha' yas pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan sangs rgyas kyis rnam par spangs/
146b2(rgyud): pa na rang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bse ru lta bu dang / tshogs dang spyod pa rnams sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa ni cang mi gsungs par gyur pa lhag par gnas pas chos kyi tshul yang dag
146b3(rgyud): par ston par mdzad de 'khor ba'i rjes su 'jug pa rtag tu yid skyo ba rgyud la snying rje chen po spangs shing ma 'dres pa'i sems kyi bag chags kyis yongs su bsgos pa/ sngon byang chub tu sems
146b4(rgyud): bskyed pa yongs su bsgos pa'i sems pas sa gcig dang / sa gnyis dang / sa gsum dang / ji srid byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa'i bar la yid mi 'jug pa/ 'khor bas

159a1(rgyud): rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don du chos kyi tshig gsungs pa/ chos gcig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gsang sngags

159a3(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ gnyis po dag gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems yongs su mi gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid do//
159a4(rgyud): chos gsum rnams kyis rang gi gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don nges par bstan pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba nyid dang /
159a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa srung ba nyid dang / rang gi gsang sngags yongs su mi gtong ba nyid do// chos bzhi dang yang dag par ldan na sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems
159a6(rgyud): dpa'i rig sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ gzhi gang zhe na/ rang gi gsang sngags rdzogs pa yongs su mi gtong ba nyid dang / gzhan gyi gsang sngags nye bar gcod pa min pa nyid dang / sems
159a7(rgyud): can thams cad la byams pa'i sems nye bar gnas pa nyid dang / snying rje chen po sgom pa'i sems te/ chos bzhi po 'di dag dang yang dag par ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags
159b1(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur ro// chos lngas byang chub sems dpa' sde snod la yang dag par 'jug cing gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i sgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ rnam pa sna tshog pa
159b2(rgyud): pa'i yul bsten pa nyid dang / bas mtha'i dgon pa bsten pa nyid dang / sems can gzhan la zhe sdang med pa nyid dang / 'jig rten pa'i sngags la mi lta ba nyid dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang /
159b3(rgyud): spyod pa la gnas par byed pa nyid de/ chos lnga po 'di dag gis sngags kyi spyod pa'i don gyi dngos grub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos drug ni gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i dngos grub yongs
159b4(rgyud): su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ drug gang zhe na/ dkon mchog gsum la dad pa nye bar gcod pa med pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' la dad pa gcod pa med pa nyid dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten
159b5(rgyud): las 'das pa'i sngags la kun tu dga' ba nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings spros pa med pa la lta ba nyid dang / theg pa chen po'i mdo sde zab mo'i tshig gi don mi 'dor ba nyid dang / skyo ba med pa
159b6(rgyud): sems nyid kyis gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don yongs su tshol zhing dge ba'i phyogs yongs su mi spong ba nyid de/ chos drug po 'ang ni rig sngags kyi spyod pa dang / gsang sngags kyi dngos grub la yang
159b7(rgyud): dag par kun tu 'jug pa nyid du 'gyur ro// chos bdun rnams ni rig sngags grub pa'i dus kyi cho ga dang / gsang sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su 'jug par byed pa nyid du 'gyur te/ bdun gang zhe na/
160a1(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul zab mo sgom pa dang / zlos pa dang / nyan pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / 'dri bar byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la
160a2(rgyud): mos pas dus gsum du ston pa dang / nges par sdom pa dang / bzlas pa dang / spyir sreg dang / smra bcad dang / dka' thub la ma thogs pa dang / blo gros dang / dran pa dang / shes rab dang /
160a3(rgyud): brtan pa dang du len par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang theg pa chen po'i chos zab mo'i tshul la yang dag par rab tu 'jug pa'i tshul dang / rang gi gsang sngags dang / sngags
160a4(rgyud): dgug pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa'i bya ba la mkhas pa nyid dang / snying rje chen po dang / byams pa chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / dga' ba chen po yongs su sgom par byed pa
160a5(rgyud): las dang / sems can gyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings spros pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid la yang dag par 'jug pa/ gnyis su med pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su tshol ba
160a6(rgyud): las dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la theg pa dman pa la dga' ba med pa las te/ chos bdun po 'di rnams ni rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi dngos grub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
160a7(rgyud): ro/ chos brgyad ni rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don gyi dngos grub yang dag par 'jug pa nyid du 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ mthong ba dang ma mthong ba'i 'bras bu la dang
160b1(rgyud): pas ngo mtshar bar sems par 'dod pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ngang pa'i 'bras bu rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa the tshom med pa las dang / phyin ci ma log pa'i gsang sngags
160b2(rgyud): 'dzin pa las bla ma la gus pa las dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rang gi sngags dang / rgyud dang / spyod pa nye bar bstan pa mi slu bar 'dzin cing bdog pa thams
160b3(rgyud): cad yongs su gtong ba las dang / dngos grub kyi zhing gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rmi lam du mthong ba ston pa la mkhas pa nyid dang / ser sna dang / gnyid dang / rmugs pa mtha'
160b4(rgyud): ngag dang bral bar byed cing / rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid 'bul bar byed pa las dang / mdor bsdus na dge ba'i rtsa ba
160b5(rgyud): la ngoms mi shes pa'i go cha bgos te bgegs thams cad rab tu sel bar 'dod pa las dang / byang chub kyi rgyud gnon par byed pa dang / longs spyod chen po dang / dbang che bar grags
160b6(rgyud): pa bdag nyid so sor 'dod pa dang / dbang che bar grags pa'i gang zag la yang dag par 'grogs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po
160b7(rgyud): dang yang dag par 'grogs par byed pa ste/ chos brgyad po 'di ni gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don gyi dngos grub la yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur ro// thogs po dag mdor na byang chub kyi se
161a1(rgyud): dang mi 'bral zhing / dkon mchog gsum la lhag par mos la mchog tu tshul khrims 'tshal pa la'ang skyo ba med pa'i yid kyis rtag tu mngon par brjod pas nga'i sngags kyi le3
161a2(rgyud): rab 'byam mtha' yas shing rmad du byung ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i yid las byung ba 'grub par 'gyur te/ de las gzhan du rtogs par bya ba ma yin no// rnam par rtog pa med
161a3(rgyud): pa'i yid du gyur pas nyams sad pa'i rgyur yang bsgrub par bya ba yin no// de nas yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs/
161a4(rgyud): rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams tshig 'di skad du rjod par byed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras sems can thams cad kyi don gyi ched du gsang sngags kyi spyod pa sna tshogs pa'i
161a5(rgyud): don gyi bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la rab tu 'jug pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i chos ston cing legs par bstan pa ni legs so legs so// e ma byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i chos ston
161a6(rgyud): pa'i rjes su 'jug par byed pa gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dge ba legs par gsungs so// rgyal po chen po gang la la zhig 'dus pa'i le'u 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / yid la byed par 'gyur ba dang /
161a7(rgyud): g.yul du'ang thog mar glang po che'i steng du 'jog par 'gyur ba dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs pas mchod par 'gyur ba de la bdag cag mtshungs par brtag par
161b1(rgyud): bgyi/ phyir rgol ba dang dgra bo dag dbang du bgyi/ pha rol gyi dmag dpung dag 'jog cing bzlog par bgyi/ glegs bam du bris nas rang gi khyim du 'jog par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi/
161b2(rgyud): bu mo 'am/ rgyal po chen po 'am/ rgyal mo chen mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma de la bsrung ba chen po dang / longs spyod chen po dang / tshe ring por 'gyur ba
161b3(rgyud): dang / nad med pa dang / rtag tu longs spyod 'phel ba nyid kyang bgyi'o// de skad smras nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ci'ang mi gsung bar gyur to// theg pa chen po'i rig sngags dang gsang
161b4(rgyud): sngags kyi spyod pa nges par bstan pa las/ ral pa gyen brjes kyi rtog pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u rab 'byams las/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags
161b5(rgyud): ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog pa las 'dus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thams cad dang ldan
161b6(rgyud): papa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas/ sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjes su 'jug cing kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan
161b7(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu lte ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba'i 'od zer phyung ste/ sems can gyi khams
162a1(rgyud): thams cad kun nas snang bar byas nas/ sngar nyid du 'khor 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po kun tu snang bar byas nas 'khod par gyur to// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sem/
162a2(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjesadag pa'i sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la smras pa/ sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig la rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u rab
162a3(rgyud): 'byam gyi spyad pa sgrub pa/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du gyur pa/ khyod kyi sngags kyi tshogs gang du sems can rnams yang dag par rjes su zhugs nas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
162a4(rgyud): rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi dngos grub yang dag par thob pa dang ldan pa khyod smros shig smros shig/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
162a5(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyud gsungs pa/ rig sngags thams cad yang dag par skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul
162a6(rgyud): pa rnam par ston par byed cing lag pa g.yas pa bteg nas sor mo'i rtse mos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la ston par byed cing / sor mo'i rtse mo der rig pa'i rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma nges par phyung
162a7(rgyud): ste/ phyung nas kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de snang ba chen pos kun tu snang bar byas nas gnas par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
162b1(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gis khro ba'i rgyal ba sgrol mas non pa'i snying po las thams cad pa dpa' bo gcig pa spyan drangs pa dang / gshegs su gsol ba dang / zhi ba can dang / rgyas pa can dang / mngon/
162b2(rgyud): spyod can dang / mi snang ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / sa 'og tu 'jug pa dang / rkang pa rab tu rgyu ba dang / dgug pa dang / rnam par snang ba dang / dbang du byed pa dang / dri dang / 'greb
162b3(rgyud): ba dang / mar me thams cad rang gi rgyud kyi sngags kyis rab tu sbyin par byed de/ mdor na ji ltar sbyar ba de bzhin de lta de ltar bsgrub par bya bzhin pa ni yi ge gsum zhes bya ba brtson 'grus chen pos don
162b4(rgyud): thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'o// de gang zhe na/ oM AHhUM/ 'di ni khro bo chen po de'i snying po las thams cad pa ste/ dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / gsang sngags
162b5(rgyud): thams cad spyod pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nges par bstan te bgegs thams cad 'jig par byed pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan
162b6(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyag g.yas pa bteg nas khro bo'i spyi bor bzhag ste 'di skad ces kyang smras so// sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rngams/
162b7(rgyud): dgongs su gsol// gang la la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rnam par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas shing mu med pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams dam tshig la
163a1(rgyud): lhag par gnas par gyis shing / de skad ces smras nas khro ba'i rgyal po bskyor nas btang bar gyur to// khro bo'i rgyal po chen po btang ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'dzim
163a2(rgyud): rten gyi khams ngag tu song nas skad cig tsam gyis gdug sems can gyi sems can rdzu 'phrul chen po de rnams tshar bcad cing bkug nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dag pa'i sems can la yang dag
163a3(rgyud): par bcug ste gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gnas par byas nas/ sems can gdug pa rnams kyi spyi bor kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs par gyur nas gnas par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems
163a4(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis slar yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas sems can khyed cag thams cad nyon cig/ gang yang nga'i dam tshig 'di las 'da'
163a5(rgyud): bar byed pa de la khro bo'i rgyal pos tshar gcod par 'gyur te/ gang gi phyir na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro// rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi
163a6(rgyud): don gyi tshig gsang chen ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa 'chad par byed do// de legs par nyon la legs par yid la gzung zhig dang ngas
163a7(rgyud): bshad // na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ an te/ samyaka sa~M bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba t+yaM/ Ar+ya tA rA ya~M/
163b1(rgyud): badz+ra sa trA ya/ ma hA sadrA ya/ 63/ 'jus rnamanan+tate/ d+hU chu / gan mnan te/ tA re yan thal bya rnam ngang / mAn/ rdzun/ ma// ra//
163b2(rgyud): pra b+h+re/ tsan+d+ra pra b+he hi li hi la~M/ bi le bi le/ be ga gA mi ni/ ku ma hA kud+d+hi/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha na pa ti/ tA re hu ru hu ru/ ku ru ku ru/ a ha yA yA/ tsid+ha yA mi/ tsit+ta te me ku ru swAhA/ grogs paM ngag 'ang na
163b3(rgyud): nga'i bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rig sngags las thams cad byed ma/ srid pa gsum gyi chos nye bar gcod ma/ ngan 'gro thams cad zlog par byed pa ma'o// phyag rgya'ang
163b4(rgyud): 'dir rtsa ba'i rig sngags shes rnam par grags pa de la rab tu sbyar bar 'gyur ro// 'dir mchog gi snying po las thams cad byed pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba thob par byed pa/ zhi ba thams cad
163b5(rgyud): byed pa/ sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ rang nyid nga'i grogs po byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir mchog tu gsang ba'i rig sngags kyi ngo bo'i
163b6(rgyud): bar gnas pa/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ gang dang gang dran pa nyid kyis las thams cad thar byed pa/ 'jigs pa chen po rnams yongs su sbyong bar byed pa ste/ bzlas/
163b7(rgyud): pas lnga smos kyang ci dgos/ de gang zhe na/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tA re tut+tA re swAhA/ phyag rgya'ang 'dir ut+pa la zhes kyang rnam par
164a1(rgyud): grags pa longs spyod thams cad mngon par 'phel bar byed pa'o// 'dir nye ba'i snying por gyur pa'ang mchog tu dpal dang ldan pa'i ngag byed chen po ste/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/
164a2(rgyud): na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ oM ku ru kul+le swA hA/ phyag rgya'ang 'dir pad+ma'i 'phreng ba zhes rnam par grags par 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad dbang du byed ma'o// 'dir mchog gi snying
164a3(rgyud): por gyur pa'ang / na maMHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ oM gI/ 'di ni snying po'i mchog ste/ mdor bsdu na bya ba thams cad la yon tan chen po rgyas pa ste/ yon tan mur thug pa mthar thug par brjod par ni/
164a4(rgyud): dus bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas kyang mi nus so// phyag rgya'ang 'dir brtson 'grus chen po zhes rnam par grags pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//
164a5(rgyud): 'dir spyan drang ba'i rig sngags su gyur pa'ang / na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ oM he he b+ha ga ba ti bi shwa rU pi Ni sarba ba la/ b+ha Shi ta/ pra bo d+hi na A yA nI/ b+ha ga ba ti/ kr-I Da ut+pa la d+hi ni/ ma ma shud+d+ha
164a6(rgyud): ya tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ a pra ti ha ta/ shA sa ni hUMmA bi lam+ba ku ru ku ru phaT swAhA/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma spyan drang ba'i rig sngags te/ sangs rgyaswa thams cad dang /
164a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkhan
164b1(rgyud): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / sha ba dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi'ang yin no// tsan dan gyi tshul lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas te phyogs bzhi dang //
164b2(rgyud): de bzhin du steng dang / 'og dang / thang ka thams cad du gtor bar bya'o// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma dang / 'jig rten dang /
164b3(rgyud): 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi'ang gsang sngags 'di yin te/ 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti/
164b4(rgyud): ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ oM d+hu ru d+hu ru/ d+hU ma bA si ni ma mArtsi Sha hUM/ tiSh+Tha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/ bdug pa'i rig sngags te/ tsan dan dang / gur kum dang / ga pur gcig tu byas nas bdug pa
164b5(rgyud): dbul bar bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad byon pa rnams spos kyi bdug pas yid tshim nas khug par 'gyur ro// 'dir phyag rgyar gyur
164b6(rgyud): pa'ang pad+ma'i 'phreng ba zhes grags pa sems can thams cad 'gugs par byed cing zhi ba ste/ spyan drang ba'i rig sngags la'ang phyag rgya pad+ma'i 'phreng ba bzang po 'di nyid do// sangs rgyas dang / byang
164b7(rgyud): chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sems can thams cad byon pa la'ang mchod yon dbul bar bya ste/ ga pur dang / tsan ngan dang / gur kum chu dang sbyar nas dzA ti'i me tog dang / mA li ka
165a1(rgyud): gsar ba dang / dbyar gyi me tog dang / pun nA kA dang / bkul dang / rgya spos rnams te/ 'di dag gang yang rung ba'i me tog gas/ dus ji lta ba'i matog gam/ dri ba dang /
165a2(rgyud): bo'i me tog rnams dang bsres nas sngags 'dis mchod yon dbul bar bya'o// na maHsarba bud+d+hA nA/ oM pra ti hata shA sa nA nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ he he ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ bi shwa rU pa d+hA ra Ni an+d+ra pra tIts+tsha sa ma
165a3(rgyud): ya ma nu sma ra/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha de ba tA d+hiSh+ThA na/ ma d+h+ye pra be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ sarba bud+d+ha/ a nu kaM pa ka/ gr-ih+Na grih+Na hUM/ am+ba ri btsA ra Ni swA hA/ phyag rgya 'dir gang ba zhes grags te sems can tham
165a4(rgyud): cad kyi rjes su 'jug cing brtan pa'o// 'dir dri'i rog sngags su 'gyur ba'ang / na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ na maHsa man+ta gan+d+ha a ba b+hA Shi ta shri ye ta thA ga tA ya/ tad+ya thA/ gan+d+he gan+d+he hA de gan+d+ha ma nor ma
165a5(rgyud): pratIR+tha pra rje hU~M gan+d+ha sam hA nu tsu Ni swA hA/ 'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba'ang lo ma zhes bya ba bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'dir me tog gi rig sngags su gyur pa'adzi/ namaHsa rba
165a6(rgyud): bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA naM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ na maHsaM ku su mi ti rA dza s+ya/ ta thA ga ta s+tha/ tad+ya thA/ ku su me ku su me/ ku su ma d+ho ku su mA sU ra bA si/ ku su mA ba ti swA hA/ bdug pa'i sngags
165a7(rgyud): 'di nyid kyis sngar bshad pa'i bdug pas bdug par bya'o// rmad byung bsam mi khyab pa'i sku// sangs rgyas kun la phyag byas nas// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i// gtor ma'i
165b1(rgyud): ma / / rnam
165b2(rgyud): raT baT swAhA/ lha bshos kyang 'dis dbul bar byaste/ 'byung ba thams cad pa'i gtor mar 'gyur ro// 'dir yang phyag rgya ni dbyug pa ste/ gdug pa thams cad zlog par byed pa'o// na mo sarba
165b3(rgyud): bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA naM/ sarba ta mo an+ta kA ra bi traM si tA nA/ na maHsa man+ta dz+yo ti gan+d+ha a ba b+hA sa pri yA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ tad+ya thA/ he he b+ha ga bAn dz+nyo te rasmi sha ta sa ha sra/ pra ti madz+dza
165b4(rgyud): ta sha rI ra/ bi kurba bi kurba ma hA bo d+hi satwa man+ta dz+wa lo d+yo ta mur+d+hi/ khurba khurba/ a ba lo ka ya/ a ba lo ka ya/ maN+Da laM sarba satwA nAM swA hA/ mar me'i rig sngags te/ 'dis mar me dbul bar bya'o//
165b5(rgyud): phyag rgya ni kha bye ba zhes bya ba sems can thams cad rnam par snang bar byed pa'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ dz+wa la ya dz+wa la ya ts+tsha bi bo d+ha ka ha ri kriSh+ThA
165b6(rgyud): ping+ga swA hA/ me'i bya ba byed pa'i rig sngags su 'gyur ro// 'dir yang phyag rgya ni/ kha sbyor zhes par 'jig rten grags// sems can kun 'od kyis gsal byed// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan
