165b7(rgyud): dang // thub pa mchog gis sngon gsungs pa'o// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la spras pa
166a1(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po sngags kyi tshig 'dzin gsang tshen dang bcas gang mchog tu gsang ba yin te/ bu khrod la pan drug po'i mtha'// mi bzang pa ma rigs smra grags/ ma/
166a2(rgyud): rnams thams cad gang kho na// mkhas pa rnams kyis bsgrub bya'o// spyi bo'i gdu bu zhes grags pa// rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag kyang // de ni nges par gzhig don du// rig pa 'di ni yang dag brjod//
166a3(rgyud): na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nA/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ oM ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ ma ma kaR+ya dzam+b+ha/ dzam+b+ha/ sarba da ha da ha/ sarba badz+ra bi nA shA ka/ mAr+d+ha DA ka dzI ban+d+ha ta ka rA ma hA bi tri ta rU bi ne pa tsa pa/
166a4(rgyud): tsa sarba duSh+TAM ma hA ga Na pa ti dzI ban+taM ta ka ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ sarba gra hA/ Sha Da mu kha Sha Da b+hu dza Sha Ta tsa ra Na ru tra mA na ya/ biSh+Nu ma na ya/ brah+ma t+yaM de ba na na ya mA bi lam+ba mA bi lam+ba b+hU Sha nIHmaN+Da la ma d+h+ye pra be/
166a5(rgyud): ga ya sa me ya ma ru s+pha ra d+hur+m+mA r+m+ma hU~M hU~M phaT phaT pa~MT swA hA/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba brtson 'grus chen po sgrol ma'i yan lagazhal drug pa zhes bya ba khro ba'i rgyal po chen po thams/
166a6(rgyud): cad rnam par 'joms pa po ste/ 'di bklags pa tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa'i dbang phyug rnams kyang rnam par 'jig par byed na/ ma rungs pa'i bgegs rnams lta ci smos/
166a7(rgyud): 'di bklags pa tsam gyis srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// 'dir phyag rgya'ang rigs chen po zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ bgegs thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa'o// khro bo'i rgyal po 'di/
166b1(rgyud): nyid kyi snying bon/ a shAH po la tA na na rdzas rba sha drus s+thal pazla pa Ta swAhA/ sngags 'das dgra thams cad la gzer chen pa'i nad dang / yang na rims sbyin pa'i pas zir par 'gyur ro// rngam
166b2(rgyud): tu bzlas pas ji srid snang ba re byams pa nyid du mi 'gyur/ yang na snying rje'i sems 'thob pa mi 'gyur te/ bzlas pa zin gyi bar du grol bar mi 'gyur zhing 'ching bar mi 'gyur ro// dkon mchog
166b3(rgyud): gsum la gnod pa byed pa la bya'i/ zhi ba'i sems yod pa gzhan la ma yin no// phyag rgya mdung chen po'ang sbyar bar bya'o// 'dir nye ba'i snying por gyur pa'ang / oM hrIHkA la rA ba~M hU~M Sha swA hA
166b4(rgyud): snga ma'i mdung chen po'ang sbyar bar bya'o// gdug pa thams cad la gang 'dod pa de byed par 'gyur ro// mchog gi snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yi ge gcig pa
166b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba ni/ hUM 'di na las thams cad byed pa ste/ phyag rgya mdung chen po'ang sbyar bar bya'o// phung krol thams cad zlog par byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad dbang du byed pa ste/ mdor na
166b6(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni las thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzlas pas grub pa'i dus su'ang khyad par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gshegs su gsol ba'i
166b7(rgyud): sngags su gyur pa'ang / na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ dza ya dza ya/ su dza ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka bi shwa rU pa~M Ni/ gan+d+ha gats+tsha swa b+hA ba naM/ sarba bud+d+he swa bi sarba
167a1(rgyud): ya sa pa rI bA ra/ swa b+hA ba na tsA mu/ pra be sha la sa ma ya ma nu sA ra/ sarbA r+tha swa ma sa~Md+g+ha tu/ bi d+has papA ma nor tha tsam pa ri pU ra ya swAhA/ 'di ni gshegs su gsol
167a2(rgyud): ba'i sngags te/ las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// phyag rgya bzang po'i gdan zhes grags pa ste/ 'dis gangan yang sbyin par bya'o// yid kyis lan bdun bzlas pas thams cad gshegs
167a3(rgyud): su gsol lo// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang / sngags rnams nyid la'ang sngags kyi dngos grub dang / dam tshig dang / bzlas pa dang / dus dang
167a4(rgyud): nges par sdom pa rnams la'ang rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos slar yang gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams la kun tu gzigs te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po
167a5(rgyud): la rang gi rig pa'i tshogs sngags kyi le'u rab 'byam gsungs par gyur to// na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta ga tI nAM/ oM ni Ti swA hA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjes su spyod pa'i sgra can
167a6(rgyud): ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa las thams cad pa ste/ dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya'i snying po dug gi las thams cad la kun tu sbyar ro// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ti shwA sa nA nAM/ oM ni Ti/ 'di ni
167a7(rgyud): nye bar spyod pa'i sgra can ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa las thams cad pa ste/ phyag rgya ni kha bye ba zhes pa gza'i las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/
167b1(rgyud): a nI/ rig pa 'dzin sdong ba cam zhes bya ba stod pa'i dge ba'i las thams cad byed pa ste/ phyag rgya ni babang po'i gdan gyis gnod sbyin mo rnams dkrug par bya ba la sbyar ro// namams man badz+ra /
167b2(rgyud): a tsin+nad+b+ha ta rU pa NAM/ oMSh+NI swAhA/ mkha' 'gro ma kun 'joms pa yi// phyag rgya sbubs can yang dag sbyar// byang chub sems dbus bshad pa yi// rig sngags thong ba can zhes bya// sangs
167b3(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi pad+ma nyid // rab bsngags lnga yi gzugs can ma// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ a pri ta ha ta ga ti/ tsA ra NaM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ba ra de swA hA/ phyag rgya ut+pa la nyid ni// dpal gyi bdag
167b4(rgyud): nyid spyan la sbyar// gzugs mang 'chang ba'i lha mo ni// myur du longs spyod rab sgrub pa'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a tsin+d+rAd+hA ta rU pi Ni/ oM su ra~M swA hA/ phyag rgya mdung dang yang dag ldan// rim
167b5(rgyud): rnams thams cad rnam 'joms pa'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a tsin+nad+b+ha ta rA bi NAM/ oM tu re swA hA/ bsam pa'i sgrol ma ldan pa zhes// rab bsngags las rnams thams cad pa// dbyug pa'i
167b6(rgyud): phyag rgyar yang dag ldan// bgegs rnams 'joms byed ma la sbyar// ni maHsa man+ta bud+d+had+d+hA nAM/ a tsin+dad+hA ta rU bi NAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM bi lo ki ni sAhA/ rig pa snang ldan zhes bya ba// 'jig rten thams
167b7(rgyud): cang dbang du byed// bde ba thams cad rab sbyin pa// pad+ma'i phyag rgyas sbyar bar bya// ni maHsa man+ta bud+d+ho nAM/ a tsinId+hA ta rA bidz+dza/ tad+ya thA/ oM bi shwe/ bi shwa sa~M b+ha be bi shwa rU pi No ka ha ka ha A bi
168a1(rgyud): A bi sha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ru ru tiSh+Tha swA hA/ rig pa brtsom 'grus chen mo ni// 'jig rten 'dren pas bstan pa ste// snying po phyag rgya mnyam pa nyid// sems can thams cad 'bebs
168a2(rgyud): shing dge/ 'byung po kun la mchog sbyin ma// sna tshogs zhes bya yang dag bsgrags// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a tsin+d+rAd+hA ta rU pi nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM shwe te prA ba su swA hA/ pad+ma'i gdan gyis rnam par dgod/
168a3(rgyud): las rnams thams cad byed pa'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta gA ti prA hi ri NaM/ tad+ya thA/ oM shrIHrig po 'don dpal mo che// 'jig rten mgon gyis bstan pa ste// phyag rgya kha sbyor ldan pa
168a4(rgyud): yi rgyal srid chen po rab sbyin byed// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sarba satwa b+ha ya pra dA yi kA/ tad+ya thA/ oM a dzi te ku mA ra rU pi NI/ e hi A gats+tsha ma ma kAts+ya ku ru swA hA/ mi thub ma zhes rnam grags ma/
168a5(rgyud): gzhon nu bdud rtsi las byung ba// gang ba'i phyag rgyar ldan pa yis// dgra rnams thams cad zlog par byed// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a tsin+tad+b+ha ta rA pi dz+dza/ tad+ya thA/ oM dza ye swA hA/ bi dza ye swA hA/ a dzi ti swAH/
168a6(rgyud): sring mo bzhi zhes rnam grags pa// byang chub sems dpa'i rjes 'gro ba// sa rnams mtha' dag yongs rgyu zhing // sems can rjes su 'dzin byed pa// ming po tu ma bu ru zhes grags// 'di rnams kyi//
168a7(rgyud): ni rjes su spyod// gru yi bzhon pa mnyam zhon nas// rgya mtsho la ni nges par gnas// khu tshur phyag rgyas rnam par dgod// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ lo
168b1(rgyud): dzu brjid/ thA/ oM sa ma rim sa nga/ ma hA da/ ma ba d+has d+ha rA ma yungs ni sa// sar shus na pa d+hA d+ha ban+d+ha nul pa na tham bul/ khal 'as kyi rje pa khyu ba
168b2(rgyud): a ma du sma ra/ b+h+ra ma bA ma b+h+ra ma ma b+h+ra ma ya/ hu su hu lu mA bi lam+ba/ sarba ka rma Ni ma ku ru ku ru/ bitsi tA rU pa d+hA ra na~M/ da~M/ ti// hA hU~M sarba/ bud+d+ha ru dA tI swAhA/ sems can rjes su 'dzin byed pa'i/
168b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpas bshad pa na// sa rnams ma lus kun nas ni// rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos// sems can kun la phan don dang // gdug pa'i sems can zlog byed pa// bdag gi rig pa
168b4(rgyud): rtag tu grags// rtag tu srung bar yongs su grags// srung ba ltos 'gro de nyid kyi// 'jig rten mtshan mas legs par mtshan// snying rjes thugs ni brlan pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' de nas
168b5(rgyud): gsungs// byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che// byis pa rnams la phan don du// gang las sems can spyod gsungs pa// 'gro ba rnams la rnam spyod ldan// phyag rgya dbyug pa'i srog shing
168b6(rgyud): ldan// bdag nyid chen pos sbyar nas ni// tshangs pa la sogs 'gugs byed na// mi rnams 'bras bu smos ci dgos// gzhon nu'i sems su ma lus pa'i// rtog pa 'di ni bsdus nas su//
168b7(rgyud): srin po rnams su rnam grags pa'i// rig sngags 'di ni yang dag bstan// sems can rjes gzung 'dod pa yi// byang chub sems dpas de ltar bshad// yig gsum zhes bya'i snying po ni//
169a1(rgyud): rig sngags 'di ni yang dag bshad// sems can kun la phan don du// nye bar longs spyod 'gugs pa'i mchog/ phyag rgya dbyug pa'i srog shing ni// rnam bkod las rnams
169a2(rgyud): thams cad pa'o// oM tsU \u0f7f/ rig sngags 'di na mdor bsdus nas// mi rnams 'bras bu byed pa yin// na maHsa mahA bud+d+hA nA~M/ sa man+ta d+yo ta ta mAd+g+ha nA~M/ a bi wi ta gra badz+nyA phaT swAhA/ nye ba'i snying
169a3(rgyud): 'di yang ni// phyag rgya dgra sta yang dag ldan// de bzhin 'byung po 'gugs par byed// de bzhin gza' dang ma mor bcas// thams cad phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa// bkod na 'bras bu bcas par//
169a4(rgyud): 'gyur// 'byung po rnams ni rnam skrag byed// gdug pa zhugs pa rnam par grol// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i pho nya mo chen mo las thams cad pa ral pa gcig ma zhes bya ba/
169a5(rgyud): rjes su spyod pa las thams cad pa ste/ bzlas pa tsam kho nas las thams cad byed do// 'byung po thams cad skrag par byed pa dang / 'gugs par byed pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / rig pa
169a6(rgyud): 'dzin pa ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad rdzogs par byed do// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM bra h+ma su pra h+ma bra h+ma brtsa saM shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ sngags 'di tshangs pa chen
169a7(rgyud): bo ste// byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yin// 'byung po zhes pa rab tu 'thob// skad gcig nyid la bsil bar 'gyur// phyag rgya pad+ma yang dag ldan// myur du dge legs thob par 'gyur/
169b1(rgyud): mdzan spyod kyini las rnams la// srid srung gi na rig byed 'dod// 'di na mdor bsdus brjod pa ste// cho ga 'di ni mdor bsdus pa'o// namaHsa man+ta bad+d+hA na/ a pra ti hata shwAs nA nA/ taHthA/ maH/
169b2(rgyud): ru Da ba ha na tsakra pA Ni tsa tur b+hu dza hUM hUM/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ bo d+hi satwa A dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pas// zhi ba'i don ni myur du byed// 'byung po rnams mi rnam 'jig byed/
169b3(rgyud): khyab 'jug gzugs kyi lus can yon// phyag rgya'i 'khor lor yang dag ldan// brtan pa'i don ni myur du byed// gang 'di khyab 'jug rgyud du ni// cho ga rgyas par bstan pa de// sems can kun gyi sgrub
169b4(rgyud): byed do// byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yin// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ ma hA ma he/ shwa ra b+hU tA d+hi pa ti bri Shi b+ha/ d+ha dza pra la m+ba dza TA mu ku Ta d+hA ri NA~M/ sita b+hasa?
169b5(rgyud): d+hA sa ra ta/ mAN+Di sa aM phaT phaT bo d+hi satwa A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas// sngags 'di bdag gis rab tu brjod// mdung gi phyag rgya mnyam par ldan// 'byung po zam
169b6(rgyud): cang rnam 'jig pa// 'di yang sngar bstan cho ga 'di// sems can sa steng gnas pa la// sngon ni zhi ba'i rgyud du bstan// yon tan sna tshogs rgya che ba// zhi ba'i rgyud kyis kyang rjod do// na maHsamaH/
169b7(rgyud): brar+d+ha/ a pra ti da ta shA sa nA ra/ dang thA/ oM sha su na pi ta ta bi k+Sha Na/ sha ka Sha kha/ khA mi bgyis ma yim du sngar chu / mo d+hi satwA A dA pa ya ti swAhA/ sngags 'di brtson 'grus chen pa ste/
170a1(rgyud): nam mkha' lding zhes rnam par grags// gdul dka' 'dul ba rnams kyi mchog/ gdengs ka can gyi dug rnams 'joms// phyag rgya che dang yang dag ldan// phung krol ma
170a2(rgyud): bzang bcas pa 'joms// brtan dang g.yo ba'i drug rnams ni// gso bar byed par the tsom med// gdul bya'i sems can la brtse bas// byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag bka'// nam mkha' lding gi
170a3(rgyud): gzugs kyis spyod// 'dab chags rgyal po 'od chen ldan// ji srid nam mkha' lding rgyud du// bstan pa'i cho ga rgyas de rnams// sems can kun la phan pa'i rgyur// bdag gis kyang ni brjod pa yin/
170a4(rgyud): mkha' lding mngon par brjod rgyud du// khro bo'i rgyal po ma bstan na// gdengs can dug ni gzhom pa'i phyir// 'dab chags gzugs kyis rnam par rgyu// ji srid 'jig rten pa yis sngags//
170a5(rgyud): rnams cho ga dper brjod pa// gdul bya'i sems can don du ni// de lta de ltar rnam par spyod// gang yang de bzhin gshegs sngags dang // rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag kyang // de rnams cho ga rab 'jam/
170a6(rgyud): 'dir// snga ma kho nar gsungs pa yin// ji ltar ma ma rnams mang po// byis pa 'bad pas srung byed pa// de bzhin byis mtha'i blo can la// nga ni rig sngags gzugs kyi rgyu// stobs bcu ldan pas
170a7(rgyud): sngon gsungs pa// nga lta'ang nga yis bstan pa yin// sngags rgyud don ni ma lus pa// rtogs pas rab gsungs 'od chen po// rgyal ba mchog gis gang gsungs dang // stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras
170b1(rgyud): kyis gsungs// rmang byung bsam mi khyab gzugs can// spyan ras gzigs kyis gsungs pa'o// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thams cad dang /
170b2(rgyud): ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de la kun tu gzigs nas/ dam tshig thams cad yang dag par sprul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//
170b3(rgyud): gang du ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas sems can ma lus pa'i sgrub pa'i spyod pa'i yid sems can thams cad la rab tu gnas par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyoms
170b4(rgyud): par zhugs ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chen po gnas rnam par bkra ba'i phyag na rin po che'i snying po rgyan bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab cing rmad du byung ba'i rnam par
170b5(rgyud): 'phrul pa rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / sa bcu dang ldan pa sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa rnams
170b6(rgyud): kyis kyang dkyil 'khor de bri ba 'am 'drir 'jug par mi nus na/ so so'i skye bor gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor bzang po de'i dam tshig sgrub
170b7(rgyud): ba'i gnas skabs la gnas pa byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gzigs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos thams
171a1(rgyud): cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa rgyal chab tu mngon par dbang bskur ni dam tshig thob pa thams cad dang / spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams dang / ba
171a2(rgyud): pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i sems can thams cad spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byin gyis brlabs kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu
171a3(rgyud): 'thun pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gyis thugs las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du rab tu zhugs pa bdag nyid kyis yang dag par shes par gyur to// so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis de yid kyis dmigs/
171a4(rgyud): bar mi nus na/ bri ba 'am 'drir 'jug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig la rjes su
171a5(rgyud): rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can de rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag nyon cig/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang 'da' bar mi bya ba'i dam tshig yin na/ sems
171a6(rgyud): can rnams dang / 'phags pa gzhan rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos/ phyag na rdo rje gsang ba pa'i bdag po la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras mi las 'das pa'i dam
171a7(rgyud): tshig yid las byung ba ni nges par bstan to// mi rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das na'ang gang du sems can rnams yang dag par rjes su zhugs nas/ 'jig rten dang 'jig
171b1(rgyud): rten las 'das pa'i rig pa dang sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur bar bshad par bya'o// de nas yang gsang ba ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyar
171b2(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gang da lta dus la bab par shes na gsungs shig gsungs shig/ shAkya seng ge 'jig rten mgon// yongs su mya ngan 'das pa na// mi rnams mchog gi
171b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas zhing // sems can sa stengs khyod dkyil 'khor// mthong ba tsam gyis 'jig rten na// sngags kyi dngos grub rab tu skye// mi shes cho ga nyams pa 'am// dam tshig bdag por ma gyur na//
171b4(rgyud): tshangs pa bdag nyid chen pos kyang // rig sngags dngos grub mi 'gyur ro// sngags la mngon par mi brtson dang // dam tshig bstan pa ma mthong na// rnam pa du mar 'bad byas kyang // rig pa'i dngos grub
171b5(rgyud): mi 'gyur ro// dam tshig sbyor ba nyams pa na// brgya byin gyis kyang rab 'bad las// rig pa'i dngos grub mi 'gyur na// sa steng mi rnams smos ci dgos// dam tshig bstan bcos de nyid shes// spyod pa'i
171b6(rgyud): las rnams sgrub pa de// 'jig rten pa dang 'phags pa'i sngags// bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du// rab zhugs las rnams thams cad byed// byang chub
171b7(rgyud): sems dpa'i bstan pa la// de yi rig pa'i dngos grub rtag/ de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ sems dpa' chen po de la gsol ba btab par gyur to// kye kye sems dpa' chen pos sem
172a1(rgyud): can rnams kyi don gyi phyir dkyil 'khor gyi chog mdor bsdus pas gsungs shig ces so// gsang ba'i bdag pos de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/
172a2(rgyud): chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis sems can gyi don gyi phyir dkyil 'khor cho ga gsungs so// dang po re zhig cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed dam/ nag pa can nam/ sa ga can gyi zla ba'i dkar po'i/
172a3(rgyud): phyogs la rab tu bsngags pa'i nyi ma dang gza' bzang po bltas te/ rgyu skar dge ba dang yang dag par ldan pa'i dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig dang / zla ba nya ba 'am/ dus gzhan la dbyar gyi zla ba spangs te/
172a4(rgyud): snga dros rab tu gnas par bya'o// grong khyer chen po la brten pa 'am/ gang du dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon rang nyid gnas par te/ rgya mtshor 'jug pa 'am/ chu klung la brten pa 'am/ rgya mtsho'i ngog
172a5(rgyud): dang nye bar grong khyer chen po'i byang shar gyi phyogs kyi char ha cang yang mi ring / ha cang yang mi nyer bar dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon song nas/ nyi ma bdun nam/ zla ba phyed du mtha' gcig tu smyung ba 'am/
172a6(rgyud): nye bar byas nas so sor gnas par bya'o// gang gnas de rnams su'ang gtsang ma'i sa phyogs rdo ba dang / gyo mo dang / thal ba dang / sol ba dang / phub ma dang / thod pa dang / rus pa garma
172a7(rgyud): pa dang bral ba/ shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i sa phyogs su srog chags med pa'i tshul ba byung lnga dang bsres pa'i tsan ngan dang / ga pur dang / gur kum gyi chus khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa stong
172b1(rgyud): brag brgyad kyis mngon par bsngags pa des bcom ldan 'das ma'i phyag rgya chen po dang yang dag par ldan pas/ sa phyogs de la phyogs pa ni rnams su mngon par gtong zhing / steng dang / 'og dang / zang /
172b2(rgyud): ka dang / phyogs bral rnams su'ang kun nas gtor bar bya'o// de nas sa phyogs der kun nas gru bzhir khru bcu drug gam/ khru bcu gnyis sam/ khru brgyad bya ste/ de la chen po ni khru bcu drug go
172b3(rgyud): bar ma ni khru bcu gnyis so// chung ngu ni khru brgyad do// dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum po 'di// thams cad gzigs pas gsung ba yin// rgyal srid 'dod phyir chen po ste// bar ma longs spyod
172b4(rgyud): 'phel bar byed// chung ngu sngags kyi dam tshig ni// las rnams kun byed zhi ba yin// de la yid la 'dod pa gang yang rung ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// de la sa'i phyogs der khru gnyis tsam
172b5(rgyud): brkos la/ der rdo ba dang / sol ba dang / thal ba dang / rus pa dang / ska la sogs pa dang / srog chags kyi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs pa gal te mthong na sa'i phyogs gzhan du brko bar bya'o//
172b6(rgyud): gnod pa med pa dang / nye bar 'tshe ba med pa der 'gyur ro// ri'i rtse mo dang / chu klung gi ngogs dang / rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung chen po'i chu ngogs rnams su'ang gang rab tu 'bad pa chen pos
172b7(rgyud): shin tu so sor brtags te shin tu gtsang zhing srog chags med par byas nas bri bar bya'o// sa'i phyogs der slar yang srog chags med pa'i tshul ba'i rnam lnga bsres pas chu klung gi 'gram gyis gtsad
173a1(rgyud): ma'am/ grog mkhar gyi sa gang du srog chags med pa'i sa des dgang bar bya'o// bkang nas kyang legs par brdungs te kun nas mnyam par byas la ji ltar 'dod pa'i dkyil
173a2(rgyud): 'khor rnam pa gsum bya'o// seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la khro bo'i rgyal po nyid kyis lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas phyogs bzhi rnams su gdab par bya'o// tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la khro bo'i snying
173a3(rgyud): pos lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas kun nas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa'i rnam pas dkri bar bya'o// de bzhin du dbus kyi gnas su nang du'ang zur bzhi'i rnam par bya'o// dbus kyi nang
173a4(rgyud): na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i rig pa 'am/ rtsa ba'i snying po stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o// phyag rgya chen po dang rtsa ba'i sngags kyis gtsug tor bcings te khro bo'i rtsa
173a5(rgyud): ba'i sngags kyis grogs bsrungs nas bdag nyid bsrung bar byas te/ bzlas pa byed bzhin du phyi rol tu byung ste/ dkyil 'khor la g.yas su bskor ba byas nas kha shar du phyogs te ku sha'i khres la che
173a6(rgyud): bar 'dug nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yid la byas te dkyil 'khor de kun nas gru bzhi'i rnam par dkri bar bya'o// de nyid kyi phyi rol du ba rnams zhag gcig sgrung
173a7(rgyud): bar gnas pas rab tu gnas par bya'o// de la 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sngon spyad pa rnams byas te/ rang gi rig pa dang / sngags dang / rgyud la mkhas pa'i mkhan pos sems can
173b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi don gyi phyir theg pa chen po la lhag par mos pas nag gcig spang bar gnas pas thogs pabang po dang yang dag par ltu ga bstan bcos rnam pa snga tshogs par bya ba mthong bas tshar lnga lnga'i drim/
173b2(rgyud): zhib po 'bar bas legs par snang ba byas nas/ rtsa ba'i rig pa'i sngags dang snying pos mngon par bsngags pa'i phye ma dkyil 'khor dbus su gdab par bya'o// phyi rol tu'ang rgyal mtshan dang / bang na
173b3(rgyud): bsgreng ba dang / rta babs bzhi sa brgyan pa dang / chu shing gi sdong bu 'bras bu'i tshogs kyis g.yur bzhing kun nas 'bras bu'i tshogs rnams kyis rab tu 'phyang bzhin pa dang / rnga bo che dang /
173b4(rgyud): dang / dung gi sgra nges par sgrog pa'i sa'i phyogs su bsgrags par bya'o// ngos bzhir rjes su 'thun pa'i bar du bsngags pa'i sgra chos mnyan par bya'o// phyogs bzhi rnams su theg pa chen po'i
173b5(rgyud): mdo sde'i glegs bam bklag par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lho phyogs su bklag par bya'o// 'phags pa zla ba sgrol ma'i ting nge 'dzin nub phyogs su'o//
173b6(rgyud): 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa byang phyogs su'o// 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa shar phyogs su'o// de ltar glegs bam klog pa po med na mdo sde bzhi po lhag par rtogs pa'i gang zag chos smra ba po la
173b7(rgyud): chos mnyan pa'i phyir gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon langs nas tsan ngan dang / ga pur dang / gur kum rnam par bsres pa'i me tog dkar po dri zhim pa lartsa
174a1(rgyud): ba'i rig pa bzlas te/ dkyil 'khor de thams cad du gcal du dgram par bya'o// mngon par bkram nas phyi rol du bya ste zhag bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i kha zas bsten
174a2(rgyud): pa gnyis sam gsum byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa/ gso sbyong nye bar gnas pa bstan pa la gnas pa'i ri mo mkhan mkhas pa de grogs sam/ slob ma des khas blangs pa rab tu gzhugs par
174a3(rgyud): bya'o// gang rtsa ba'i rig pa nyid kyis gtsug tor bcing ba byas nas/ de nas gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i go 'phang rnam par bkra zhing / 'bar la mdzes pa'i zangs kyi/
174a4(rgyud): phyi ma zhib mo so sor bzung nas longs spyod chen po dang ldan zhing / chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po chen po rnams 'drir gzhug par bya'o// dkyil 'khor mthong ba nyid las nges par byang chub la gzhol ba/
174a5(rgyud): yin na/ sngags sgrub par byed pa lta ci smos/ shAkya skyes mchog myang 'das nas// sems can bsod nams chung rnams la// 'di lnga'i longs spyod ga la yod// cho ga 'di ni bstan par bya//
174a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen ldan// skye bo bkren pa gzigs nas ni// nyung zhing mdor bsdus dkyil 'khor ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bstan pa yin// 'bras sA lu dang thug pa che'i bye ma
174a7(rgyud): shin tu zhib mo tshon sna lnga pa 'bar bas dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar ba dang / nag po dang / ljang khu'i kha dog tu kha bsgyur la/ sngar bzhag pa'i phye ma dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis blangs
174b1(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas pas bye ma la phyag rgyas gangab par bya'o// gzhan ni bsgrub pa po'i slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol lcogar bya/
174b2(rgyud): phyogs las kyi cho ga mthong bas me thab bya'o// khru gnyis kyi tshad la dpangs khru gang tsam kho ra khor yug tu pad+ma'i ze ba'i rnam pa/ phyi rol pad+ma'i ze ba'i rnam par shing pa la sha'i yam shing rnams
174b3(rgyud): kyis me rab tu sbar te/ shing dpal 'bras kyi lam shing mtho gang tsam gyi tshang la rlan dang bcas pa/ zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la btags pa rnams kyis rtsa ba'i snying pos sam/ phyag rgya dang
174b4(rgyud): ba'i rig sngags kyis me lha spyan drang bar bya'o// spyan drangs nas kyang sngar brjod pa'i yi ge gcig pa nyid kyis rig pa 'am/ rtsa ba'i rig pa'i snying pos slar yang brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o//
174b5(rgyud): nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis gtsug tor bcing zhing yo byad tshogs par byas nas/ bdag nyid dang ri mo mkhan ches mkhas pa 'am slob ma byed du gzhug go// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob
174b6(rgyud): dpon gyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid la byas nas sngar brjod pa'i bdug pa'i rig pas bdug pa bsreg go// thal mo sbyar ba byas nas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
174b7(rgyud): dpa' thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag byas nas phye ba blangs te gzugs kyi rnam par bya zhing / mo mkhan mkhas
175a1(rgyud): pas rdzogs par bya'o// cho ga 'di dag gis dang po kho nar re zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa rin po che seng ge'i khri la bcwam
175a2(rgyud): ba gnas gtsang ma'i gnas na chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa kun tu bri'o// dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis kun tu bris nas rjes su sgrub pa pos bdag nyid bsrung ba'i cho ga dang rig pa byas nas
175a3(rgyud): 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhi dang / steng dang / 'og tu gtor bar bya'o// de nas khrus byas nas me thab dang nye bar song nas gos gtsang ma bgos
175a4(rgyud): te gtsang sbra dang srung ba'i cho ga byas te/ rtsa ba'i rig pas gur kum dang bsres pa'i mar gyi sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ de nyid du bzlas pa byed cing de
175a5(rgyud): nyid du gnas par bya'o// yungs kar dkar po la khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bsngags te/ mngon par bsngags nas kham phor kha sbyar du gzhag par bya'o// bgegs
175a6(rgyud): kyi rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs rnam pa du ma dang / nga ro drag po dang / rlung dang / char dang / yul ngan gzhan dang gzhan gang yang rung ba 'ongs pa mthong na/ khros pas yungs kar gyi sreg blugs lan bdun
175a7(rgyud): sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas bgegs rab tu 'jigs par 'gyur ro// mo'i bgegs la ni lam lnga chang pa nas sprin sreg byas na skyes bu de rengs par 'gyur ba 'am/ nus pa med par 'gyur ba 'am/ 'tshal
175b1(rgyud): 'gyur ba'am/ skang cig de nyid la mi ma yin pas zin par 'gyur bar ba chom med/ ci stur yang ma yin no// brgya byin yang myur du 'chin gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i mi 'am/ bgegs pasas pa
175b2(rgyud): gzhan lnga smos kyang ci dgos/ khro ba sgrol mas non pa'i 'jigs pas phan tshun du 'bros shing nges par rlag par 'gyur ro// de nas rjes su srub pa pos de nyid du su sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug nas khro bor rnam
175b3(rgyud): bo sgrol mas non pas bzlas pa byed cing gnas par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku gzugs kyi g.yas kyi gzhogs su rang sangs rgyas gnyis pad+ma'i gangan/
175b4(rgyud): la bzhugs pa skyil krung gis nye bar bzhugs par bya'o// de dag gi 'og tu nyan thos chen po gnyis chos mnyan par bya'o// de rnams kyi g.yas su'ang bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
175b5(rgyud): dbang phyug rten thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ston ka'i sprin gyi mdog ltar dkar ba/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yon pas pad+ma bsnams nas g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa'o// de'i yang
175b6(rgyud): g.yas su bcom ldan 'das ma gos dkar mo phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa/ ral pa'i gcod
175b7(rgyud): ban 'chang ba/ dar la dkar po'i na bza' bsdams pa/ dar la'i stong g.yogs bla gos bsdams pa/ thal ba nag po'i thig le gsum byas pa'o// de bzhin du brtan pa dang khro gnyer can ma'ang
176a1(rgyud): rang rang gi gdan la rang rang gi spyod lam du gnas shing nye bar bzhugs pa'ang bya'o// de rnams kyi g.yas su bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin
176a2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i spyan ma dang / gtsug tor gyi rgyal mo'ang bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug bya ba la/ 'di lta ste/ kun tu bzang po dang / sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang /
176a3(rgyud): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / ngan song spong ba dang / byams pa phyag na rnga yab thogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la lta bzhin pa dang / dri ma med par bla gros dang / dri ma med/
176a4(rgyud): pa'i tog dang / nor bzang dang / zla 'od dang / dri ma med par grags pa dang / nad thams cad gso bar byed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / 'jig rten 'gro ba dang / blo gros
176a5(rgyud): chen po dang / mngon par 'dzin pa zhes pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po bcu drug po 'di rnams rab tu zhi ba'i sku dang rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa bri'o// rig pa'i rgyal po'i gtso bo dang / rig pa'i rgyal
176a6(rgyud): mo dang / pad+ma'i rigs gzugs dang phyag rgya rnams lung las ji ltar bshad pa bzhin dang / gnas ji lta ba bzhin du ze'o// mtha'i gnas su'ang gru bzhi'i rnam par gnas gzhag par bya'o// pad+ma'i me tas
176a7(rgyud): legs par byas pa dang / rig pa'i lha gang gis dran pa'ang gnas de rnams su gzhag par bya'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yas kyi gzhogs su rang sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang
176b1(rgyud): yongs su gnas zhes bya ba gnyis kyang ngo // de bzhin du shar dul bltas pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug par sgo rnams bya'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon gyi gzhogs su rang sangs nus
176b2(rgyud): tsan dan dang / grub pa zhes pa gzhan gnyis kyang kun tu bri'o// de rnams kyi 'og tu nyan thos chen po 'od srungs chen po dang / ka t+yA ya na dang gnyis kun tu bri'o// de rnams kyi yang gzhogs su
176b3(rgyud): 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje ut+pal ltar sngo bsangs su snang ba/ rab tu zhi ba'i gzugs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas rnga yab thogs pa/ g.yon pas khro bo'i spyi bor bzhag pa'o//
176b4(rgyud): rdo rje khu tshur dang / rdo rje lcags kyu dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / dpung bzang dang / rdo rje sde rnams cha byad ji lta ba dang / mtshan ma ji lta ba bzhin du bgegs rnams 'joms pa'o// rig pa'i rgyal
176b5(rgyud): po dang rgyal mo 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang / gzugs rang phyag rgya la sogs pa rnams ji ltar dran pa bzhin du bri'o// de rnams kyi yang g.yon du gru bzhi'i rnam par rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bri
176b6(rgyud): bar bya'o// bris nas kyang gnas gang du rig pa'i tshogs ma dran pa de rnams gnas 'dir bzhugs shig ces brjod par bya'o// de rnams kyi steng du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / bcom ldan 'das ma
176b7(rgyud): mA ma kI kun tu bri ste rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rab tu ni pa'i lus so// de rnams kyi yang steng du gtsug tor gyi rgyal po brgyad kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ phyag rgya bcings pa/
177a1(rgyud): rang rang gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su kun tu bri ste/ gser mdog dbang po rab tu zhi ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs par
177a2(rgyud): sku gzugs la cung zad blta ba sbyin pa rnams 'di lta ste/ gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa dang / gtsug tor gdugs dkar po dang / rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang /
177a3(rgyud): bad+ma'i gtsug tor dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / gzi brjid phung po dang / gtsug tor mthon po zhes pa ste/ gtsug tor brgyad po 'di rnams kun tu bri'o// 'jug pa'i phyogs kyi sgor ni byang chub
177a4(rgyud): sems dpa' gnyis bya ste/ g.yas phyogs su ni 'jig rten las 'das par 'gro ba zhes bya ba rab tu zhi ba'i lus ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ phyag g.yas mchog sbyin pas 'phreng ba 'dzin pa/ phyag
177a5(rgyud): g.yon pas spyi blugs 'dzin cing sgo la mngon du phyogs pa/ bzhin cung zad khro gnyer dang bcas pa kun tu bri'o// 'jug pa'i sgo'i g.yon phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma rgyal ba las
177a6(rgyud): rgyal ba bri bar bya ste/ rab tu zhi ba'i lus ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ phyag g.yon na dbyug gu dang ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ phyag g.yas pas bgrang 'phreng bzung nas mchog sbyin pas rab
177a7(rgyud): sbyin par byed pa/ bzhin cung zad khro gnyer can 'jug pa'i sgo la mngon par phyogs pa kun tu bri'o// seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu chos kyi 'khor lo kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ de'i 'og
177b1(rgyud): tu rin po che'i gzhal las khang de la gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo hacang mi skem/ ha cang mi sdom pa'i lus su gnas pa/ rab tu zhi ba'i sku/ gzugs mdzes sho cung zad
177b2(rgyud): 'dzum pa'i bzhin/ phyag g.yon pas ut+pal sngon po bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pas dpal 'bras bsnams pa/ byis pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ rin po che'i cod pan 'chang ba/
177b3(rgyud): mu tig gi 'phreng bas mchod phyir thogs byas pa/ dar la'i stod g.yogs mnabs pa/ dar gyi na bzas smad g.yogs pa/ kun nas 'od 'phro ba/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa/
177b4(rgyud): pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa/ khro bo'i rgyal por gyur pa/ sgrol mas non pa la gzigs par gyur pa/ dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i sgo la mngon par phyogs pa/ blta na sdug pa thams cad
177b5(rgyud): du srin mo ral pa gcig pa byas pa'i gzugs 'chang ba kun tu bri'o// de'i g.yas phyogs kyi gzhogs su pad+ma'i 'og tu khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa bri ste/ rnam par 'gyur ba chen po'i gzugs
177b6(rgyud): can kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ bka' so sor ba zhes bzhin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen por gyur pa la blta ba kun nas bri'o// g.yon gyi gzhogs su pad+ma'i 'og tu gnas/
177b7(rgyud): gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' lnga bri bar bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ shin tu dri ma med pa dang / shin tu dul ba dang / dag pa dang / mun pa sel byed dang / kun tu snang ba
178a1(rgyud): zhes pa de rnams thams cad kyang gnas gtsang ma'i gnas na 'dug pa/ rin po che 'bar ba du ma'i rdo'i mthil dang 'dra ba/ kun nas 'bar ba rnam par bkra ba'i me tog rnams kyis
178a2(rgyud): gcal du bkram pa/ gzugs mdzes pa kun tu bri'o// phyi rol gyi khor yug tu gru bzhi'i rnam pa la phyogs bzhir rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa/ rnam par bkra ba'i tshon sna lngas gsal ba/ shin tu drang ba'i
178a3(rgyud): rim dma' bas nang gi dkyil 'khor bya'o// shar gyi phyogs su bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng du ri mo'i dbus su me tog gi rgyal po'i dbang po pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa/ de bzhin
178a4(rgyud): gshegs pa'i gzugs shin tu chung tsam du bya ste/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ phyag mchog sbyin pas rab tu sbyin pa/ sku'i gtsug tor la bzhugs pa'o// de'i g.yas
178a5(rgyud): su gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// g.yon du gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ma'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma bri bar bya'o//
178a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i phyag rgya'i g.yas su/ bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bya
178a7(rgyud): stephyag mchog sbyin pas rab tu sbyin pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa'o// de'i yang g.yas su lhung bzed dang chos gos kyi phyag rgya bya'o//
178b1(rgyud): de bzhin du mthar gyis 'jug pa'i gnas su pad+ma'i phyag rgya bya'o// bcom ldan 'das me tog kun nas rgyas pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yon du gtsug tor gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya bri ste/ kun
178b2(rgyud): nas 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'o// de'i yang g.yon du de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gi sku rin po che'i ri la nye bar bzhugs pa/ chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa/ bai DUR+Ya sngon po dang / mar gang dang
178b3(rgyud): pad+ma rA ga rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'bar ba'i 'od 'byin pa/ kun nas kun tu 'od gsal ba bri'o// de'i yang g.yon du rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya kun nas 'bar bas 'khrugs pa kun tu bri'o// de'i yang
178b4(rgyud): g.yon du chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba dang ldan pa bri'o// de'i yang g.yon du ril ba spyi blugs dang / bgrang 'phreng dang / bzang po'i gdan gyi phyag rgya bri'o// sgo'i gnas su rdo rje rtse
178b5(rgyud): gsum pa gnyis ka nas kun nas 'bar ba bri'o// bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu phyag rgya chen po dbyug pa can dang / ut+pa la'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba 'di dag phan tshun ma
178b6(rgyud): 'byar bar kun tu bri'o// dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa kun tu bris pa'i phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor de'ang tshon sna lngas 'bar ba/ rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa/ zur bzhis rnam par mdzes pa/ rta babs
178b7(rgyud): bzhi'i rnam pa phyogs bzhir ro// nang gi dkyil 'khor las khru gnyis tsam gyi phyi rol gyi shar phyogs su tshangs pa chen po bri bar bya ste/ gdong bzhi pa/ gos dkar po bgos pa/ stod g.yogs gos dkar
179a1(rgyud): bo can/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po can/ gser gyi mdog ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ g.yon na dbyug pa dang spyi thugs thogs pa/ phyag na rdo rje'o// de'i yang g.yas su
179a2(rgyud): 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu bya ste/ lus dar la'i gos bgos pa/ dar la'i stong g.yogs can/ bzhin rab tu zhi ba/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po can/ skyil krung gis nye bar
179a3(rgyud): 'dug pa/ phyag g.yas mchog sbyin pa'o// de'i yang g.yas su 'og min pa'i lha'i bu bya ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ rab tu zhi ba'i lus/ sems bsam gtan la gnas pa/ ngar
179a4(rgyud): la'i gos kyi bgo ba bgos pa/ dar la'i stod g.yogs can/ skyil krung gis nye bar 'dug pa/ phyag g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po can no// de'i rim pas dga' ldan dang
179a5(rgyud): 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / 'thab bral dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams bri bar bya ste/ go rims ji lta ba bzhin dang / cha byad dang dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin no// brgya
179a6(rgyud): byin gyi 'og tu rgyal po chen po bzhis ris te/ rtag myos dang / 'phreng thogs dang / lag na gzhong thogs dang / pi wang gnyis pa dang / sa bla ba'i lha'i bu rnams go rims ji lta ba dang / cha byad ji lta ba
179a7(rgyud): bzhin du bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du lho phyogs su mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong dang / gya nom snang dang / dge chung dang / bsod nams skyes la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams cha byad dang
179b1(rgyud): dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du nub kyi phyogs dang / de bzhin du yang byang gi phyogs su'ang ngo // nub kyi phyogs su de rnams kyi 'og tu 'phreng gnyis la brten nas bri bar bya'o// dkyil
179b2(rgyud): 'khor gnyis kyi phyi rol tu dkyil 'khor gsum par 'gyur te/ phyogs bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi go rims bzhin du bri bar bya'o// byang phyogs su 'jug pa'i g.yas ngos su nor sbyin gter dang nye bar
179b3(rgyud): gnas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ cod pan cung zad bcom pa/ gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can no// de'i g.yas su nor bu bzang po dang / gang ba bzang po gnod sbyin gyi sdeng pon
179b4(rgyud): dag bri'o// de bzhin du rim gyis gnod sbyin ma chen mo 'phrog ma bri ste/ gzhon nu dga' byed pang na 'dug pa/ dkyil 'khor la nges par rtog bzhin pa bri'o// lngas rtsen dmar ser 'jigs su rung
179b5(rgyud): ba'ang bri ste/ de rnams kyi nye logs su gnod sbyin rnams kyi phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du rims kyis nub kyi phyogs su chu lha lag na zhag pa thogs pa dang / klu dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang /
179b6(rgyud): 'jog po dang / nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa rgyal po chen po brgyad bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du 'phreng gnyis pa la brten nas go rims bzhin du gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang /
179b7(rgyud): lho 'phye chen po dang / drang srong dang / grub pa dang / yi dgas dang / sha ba dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa dang / sman dang / nor bu rin po che'i bye brag dang /
180a1(rgyud): ri bo dang / chu bo dang / gling rnams go rims bzhin du gtso bor grags pa dang / mchog tu gtso bo thams cad kyang bri bar bya'o// lho phyogs su gshin rje ma mo bdun gyi 'khor dang
180a2(rgyud): bcas pa bri bar bya'o// shar lho'i phyogs su me lnga kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ dbyug pa dang / ril ba spyi thugs dang / bgrang 'phreng lag na thogs pa/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba
180a3(rgyud): gos dkar po bgos pa/ dar la'i stod g.yogs can/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po can/ gser gyi mdog thal ba'i thog le gsum byas pa/ sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang / mtshon cha dang / cha byad dang /
180a4(rgyud): dbyibs dang / kha dog de'ang 'phreng gnyis pa la brten nas bri bar bya'o// thams cad nas 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por dka' bzlog gi bdag po khyu mchog la zhon pa/ lag na mdung rtse gsum
180a5(rgyud): thogs pa'o// lha mo dka' bzlog ma'ang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// smin drug gi bu'ang rma bya la zhon pa/ lag na mdung thung thogs pa/ gzhon nu'i gzugs can/ gdong drug pa/ lus
180a6(rgyud): dmar por snang ba/ gos ser po bgos shing stod g.yogs gos ser po can/ phyag g.yon pas dril bu thogs nas ba dan dmar po thogs pa'o// go rims bzhin du b+h+r-i gi ri Ti shin tu ring ba'i rnam pa
180a7(rgyud): dang / tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / nag po chen po dang / ma mo bdun po rgyan dang / cha byad dang / dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par bri'o// nor lha brgyad dang /
180b1(rgyud): drang srong bdun dang / khyab 'jug phyag bzhi pa/ phyag na 'khor lo dang / be con dang / dung dang / ral gri thogs pa/ nam mkha'i lding gi gzhon pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// gza' brgyad dang /
180b2(rgyud): rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun dang / gang sa stengs kyi dkyil 'khor la rab tu rgyu ba'i nye ba'i gza' brgyad po nyid kyang bri'o// go rims bzhin du dkar po dang / nag po'i tshes bco lnga dang / khyim bcu gnyis
180b3(rgyud): dang / dus drug dang / zla ba bcu gnyis dang / lo tshogs dang / sring mo bzhi gru la zhon pa dang / lnga pa ming po chu la gnas pa rnams kyang ste/ mdor na phyag rgya rnams su rnam par gzhag par bya'o//
180b4(rgyud): lha rnams go rims bzhin du 'phreng gnyis su bya'o// mdor na dkyil 'khor gsum par yang dkyil 'khor gsum pa la brten nas mngon par bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gsum po rnams su'ang
180b5(rgyud): gru bzhir rnam par gzhug par bya'o// 'di rnams bcom ldan 'das so// mdor bsdus na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi gtso bo ni nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o//
180b6(rgyud): pad+ma'i rigs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni g.yas su nges par bri bar bya'o// rdo rje'i rigs 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje ni g.yon du nges pa bri bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
180b7(rgyud): kyi gtso bo 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'ang nges par bri bar bya'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nges par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma rnams ji ltar rnam par bzhag pa bzhin du phyag rgya rnams su nges par/
181a1(rgyud): bri bar bya'o// 'di dag ni nang gi dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor bar ba la'ang shar gyi phyogasu mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'ang nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o// de bzhin
181a2(rgyud): dulho'i phyogs su 'od gsal ba'o// 'og min dang gzugs can min pa rnams lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par ro// 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched mi gsal ba'i lha rnams ni ma yin no//
181a3(rgyud): byang gi phyogs su brgya byin lha'i rgyal po dang / rab 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / 'od chung la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha'i rgyal po re re nges
181a4(rgyud): par mngon par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma rnams ni ji ltar rnam par bzhag pa bzhin du phyag rgya rnams su mngon par bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gsum par yang byang gi phyogs su 'byung po'i bdag
181a5(rgyud): bo dbang ldan dka' thub bzlog pa dang bcas pa nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o// sgo gnyis pa mi tshe logs su gzhon nu smin drug gi bu rma bya'i gdan la lag na mdung thung thogs pa/ lus dmar por snang ba/
181a6(rgyud): gos ser po'i stod g.yogs bgos pa/ phyag g.yas na dril bu dang ba dan dmar po thogs pa/ gzhon nu'i gzugs can dkyil 'khor la nges par rtog bzhin pa'o// shar gyi phyogs su nam mkha' lding
181a7(rgyud): 'dab chags kyi gzugs can dang / drang srong mArkaN+Da nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma rnam par bzhag pa bzhin du phyag rgya rnams su'ang ngo // lho shar du gzhon nu ma bzhi dang / gzhon nu ming po
181b1(rgyud): dang lhan cig bgru'i bzhon pa la kun tu gnas pa/ chu gter chen po la yongs su rgyu bar byed pa dang / me lnga'i rgyal po'ang nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du l-I'i phyogs su lang ka'i grong gi srin
181b2(rgyud): po'i bdag po shin tu 'jigs su rung ba ste/ der shing pi tsu ma rtal brten nas gnas pa dang / rmugs 'dzin chu'i dbang po zhes bya ba gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' nges par mngon par
181b3(rgyud): bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du go rims bzhin du gshin rje'i rgyal po yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen po can nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du sha za'i rgyal po rnam par g.yeng byed ces bya ba nges par mngon
181b4(rgyud): par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma phyag rgya rnams su'ang rnam par gzhag par bya'o// de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs su klu'i gtso bo dga' bo dang nye dga' bo nges par mngon par bri bar bya ste/ gza'i gtso
181b5(rgyud): nyi ma'ang ngo // nub kyi phyogs su thub pa ser skya zhes bya ba drang srong gi mchog dang / mu stegs can gcer bu pa'i khyu mchog/ gcer bu'i gzugs su go rims bzhin du phyag rgya rnams su rnam par
181b6(rgyud): gzhag par bya'o// byang chub kyi phyogs su gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po nor sbyin dang / dri za'i rgyal po zur bud lnga pa dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa ste/ 'di rnams nges par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma
181b7(rgyud): ni dbyibs ji ltar kun tu gnas pa bzhin du go rims bzhin phyag rgya rnams su'ang mngon par bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor bzhi pa mngon par bri'o zhes pa phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor bzhi par ri mo lngas spras
182a1(rgyud): pa phyag rgya'i 'phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/ gru ba zhi dang rta babs bzhi'i rnam pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis rnam par brgyan pa/ go rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa la
182a2(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ 'jug pa'i sgor phyag rgyar gyur pa ni ut+pal sngon por bri'o// g.yas dang g.yon du ni pad+ma dang / rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / dung dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / be con dang / 'khor
182a3(rgyud): lo dang / swasti ka dang / bum pa dang / nya dang / dung dang / gdub kor dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / zhags pa dang / dril bu dang / gri dang / tho ba dang /
182a4(rgyud): gzhu dang / lcags mda' ste/ 'di rnams rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mtshon cha'i mchog gi phyag rgyas khor yug tu grwa bzhi 'phreng bas khyab par bya'o// de nas phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhir phyag rgya chen po
182a5(rgyud): gzhi gzhag par bya ste/ byang phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa'i rnam pa can byas nas rdo rje gnyis ka nas rtse mo gsum pa'i rnam pa kun nas 'bar ba'o// shar phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru
182a6(rgyud): gsum pa'i rnam pa can byas nas pad+ma kun nas 'bar ba can gzhag par bya'o// lho'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor gzhu'i rnam pa can byas nas lhung bzed kun nas 'bar ba can gzhag par
182a7(rgyud): bya'o// nub kyi phyogs su dkyil 'khor nyi ma'i rnam pa can byas nas ut+pa la sngon po rang gi sdong bu dang 'dab ma dang ldan pa kun nas 'bar ba'o// phyogs bral rnams su phyag rgya bzhir 'gyur te/
182b1(rgyud): nub byang gi phyogs su dkyil 'khor zlum po'i rnam pa byas nas zhags pa kun nas 'bar ba'o// lho nub kyi phyogs su dkyil 'khor ring po'i rnam pa byas nas dbyug pa kun nas 'bar ba'o// lho shang /
182b2(rgyud): phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa'i rnam pa can byas nas dgra sta kun nas 'bar ba'o// byang shar gyi phyogs su ral gri kun nas 'bar ba gzhag par bya'o// thams cad nas mngon par bris nas stong
182b3(rgyud): dang / 'og dang / thad kar phyag rgya gsum phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo dang nye bar phye ma nyid kyis bri bar bya ba la 'di lta ste/ gos dang / bsil yab dang / lham kun nas 'bar ba de rnams mngon par
182b4(rgyud): bri bar bya'o zhes so// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan pas// sems can phan don 'dod pa yi// dkyil 'khor cho ga 'di rnams kyis// mdor bsdus 'dir ni bstan pa yin// de nas dkyil 'khor
182b5(rgyud): gyi slob dpon gyis dang po nyid du slob ma gzung bar bya ste/ dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang / yan lag thams cad mdzes pa'i bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje rigs dang / dmangs rigs byang chub
182b6(rgyud): tu sems bskyed pa theg pa chen po'i theg pa pa/ theg pa gzhan mi 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can gyi sems dpa' chen po dang cing dge ba'i chos can dang / rgyal srid chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang / longs
182b7(rgyud): spyod chung ba la smod pa dang / longs spyod chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang / bzang zhing dul la tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma sdom
183a1(rgyud): pa la gnas pa/ gso sbyong la nye bar gnas shing sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po la zhe mi sdang ba dang / phyogs chen po dang / rigs dang ldan pa dang
183a2(rgyud): rang bzhin gyis chos spyod pa/ nyin dang mtshan du smyung bar gnas pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ skra dri zhim pa dang khrus gsum byas pa/ mi smra bar gyur pa/ de'i nyin mo ga pur dang / gur kum dang
183a3(rgyud): ma la ya'i tsan dan dri zhim pos dri zhim par byas pa/ rtag tu nye reg byas pa/ rtag tu nye reg byas pa dang ldan pa/ ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ srung ba'i cho ga byas pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa dang /
183a4(rgyud): bden pa dang ldan pa/ rgyal bar dgongs pa/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor de nyid du ha cang yang mi nye/ ha cang yang mi ring bar gzhag par bya'o// gtsang zhing gtsang sbra byas pa ji srid gcig nas brgyad la sogs
183a5(rgyud): pa'i bar rnams te/ gzhan rnams ni ma yin no// de rnams kyang phan tshun kun tu chags pa/ rgyal rigs spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po dang / de rnams kyi bu gzhon nu dang gzhon nu ma
183a6(rgyud): rnams grong pa'i chos mi shes pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu'i gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal byis pa'i skye bo rab tu sad par byed pa/ gzhon nu'i skye bo dga' bar byed
183a7(rgyud): pas so// de nas ches thog mar de lta bu'i grong ba'i chos mi shes par rab tu gzhug par bya/ rgyal po chen po mngon par 'phel ba dang / tshe dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / longs spyod chen
183b1(rgyud): po mngon par 'phel ba dang / khyad par du'ang tshul khrims dang ldan pas rig pa'i dngos grub nges par gnas pa'i phyir ro// de ltar sngar bzhag pa byas nas grogs bzang po dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis ka
183b2(rgyud): bur gyi bdug pa bsregs te/ rgyab kyi phyogs pa ma yin par phyi rol tu 'byung bar bya ste/ byung nas kyang ji ltar bde ba'i chu shin tu gtsang sbra byas pa/ srog chags med pa/ rtsa ba'i rig pa brgyad brgya mngon
183b3(rgyud): par bzlas pa/ phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab pa'i chus khrus byas nas/ nye reg byas te gos gtsang ma bgos pa'i gtsang mas me thab tu song nas/ ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ byang shar du mngon par/
183b4(rgyud): phyogs pas ga pur dang gur kum tsan dan dang bsres pa'i mar gyi sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// sngar brjod pa'i cho gas spyan drangs pa dang gshegs su gsol lo// slar yang dkyil
183b5(rgyud): 'khor du 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas bum pa gang ba brgyad gtsang ma'i gos dang ldan pa/ shing sa ha ka ra'i yal 'dab dang 'bras bus rnam par brgyan pa/ gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che dang
183b6(rgyud): 'bru nang du bcug pa de lta bu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la so sor dbul bar bya'o// gnyis pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad la'o// gsum pa ni 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la'o//
183b7(rgyud): bzhi pa ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la'o// lnga pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la'o// drug pa ni lha thams cad la'o// bdud pa dang brgyad pa ni
184a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i sgo khang du gzhag par bya ste/ gcig ni 'byung po thams cad la'o// gnyis ni sems can thams cad dang thun mong du gyur par yongs su bsngos nas gzhag
184a2(rgyud): par bya'o// de nas sngar brjod pa'i cho ga nyid kyis bdug pa bsreg cing ut+pa la'i phyag rgya bcings nas slar yang spyan drang bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags
184a3(rgyud): panyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang sngar brjod pa'i cho ga nyid kyis spyan drang bar bya'o// de bzhin du me tog dang / bdug/
184a4(rgyud): ba dang / dri dang / mar me dang / lha bshos kyang sngar bstan pa nyid kyi las kyis lha bshos thams cad kyis thams cad du go rims bzhin du bya'o// mar me smos pa nyid kyis mar gyi mar me dbul bar bya'o//
184a5(rgyud): 'phags pa dang 'phags pa ma yin pa thams cad la lha ba shos smos pas/ sA lu'i zan zho dang sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa/ 'o thug khyad par can khyad par can gyis nye bar sbyar ba'i mar la bcos pa'i sdum 'khur gyi mya ngan
184a6(rgyud): med pa 'khyil ba dang / khaN+Da la sogs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbul bar bya'o// phyi rol gang ba dang / tsan dan gyi thang chu sbrang rtsi dang 'o ma/ 'o thug tu btsos pa'i bza' ba rnams rang
184a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang / 'phags pa'i lha rnams la me tog dri zhim po rnams kyang dbul bar bya'o// la du can dang / gar+b+ha tA ra kI khyang/
184b1(rgyud): par dang / sngar gyi yo byad rnams lha thams cad dang / 'byung po'i tshogs dang / sems can thams cad la sngags dang ldan pa'i cho gas dbul bar bya'o// de bzhin du snga ma dang / rgya spos kyi me tog dang /
184b2(rgyud): bun+dug la sogs pa rnams sngar nges par bstan pa rnams sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / 'phags pa dang / 'phag
184b3(rgyud): pa me yin pa'i lha rnams thams cad la dbul bar bya'o// khyad par du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sna ma'i me tog dang / pad+ma'i rig la pad+ma dang / de bzhin du phyag na rdo rje'i rigs la ut+pa la dang /
184b4(rgyud): gzhan rnams la tha mal pa'i sngags kyis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ga pur gyi bdug pa'o// pad+ma'i rigs la tsan dan no// de bzhin du gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje can nyid kyi gu gul du
184b5(rgyud): shes par bya'o// sngags gzhan thams cad la bdug pa tha mal pa dbul bar bya'o// 'phags pa rnams ni thams cad la// mar gyi mar me dbul bar bya// 'phags pa min pa'i sngags rnams la/
184b6(rgyud): dri zhim til mar dbul du gzhug/ cho ga'i go rims bzhin du ni// bdug pa mthong ba'i rgyu yis so// de bzhin kho nar brjod pa'i dri// sngags rnams kun la rtag par de'o// de bzhin gshegs la
184b7(rgyud): gang brjod dang // phyag na rdo rje gang brjod pa// rang rang gi ni rgyud rnams so// sngags spyod don du sgrub pa pos// 'di ni cho ga blta bar bya// kun nas rjes su 'jug pa'o// zhes pa'o// de nas dkyil
185a1(rgyud): 'khor gyi slob dpon sngar cho ga mthong bas spyan drang ba dang / mchod pa dang / bdug pa la sogs pa dang / lha ba shos rab tu dbul ba rjes su 'jug pa'i bya ba byas nas/ de'i
185a2(rgyud): 'og tu sgrub pa'i grogs mchog mkhas shing skyed pas/ 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma sha med pa thams cad rnga pa Ta ha dang / dung gi dga' ba'i sgra dbyangs nges par sgrog pas/ bdug pa dang / me
185a3(rgyud): tog dang / mar me dang / 'phreng bas rnam par spras pa phyogs bzhi rnams dang / phyogs bral rnams dang / steng dang / 'og dang / zad ka thams cad du phyi'i dkyil 'khor la bskor ba byas nas 'byung po
185a4(rgyud): thams cad pa'i gtor ma rgya cher gtor bar bya'o// de nas khrus byas nas slar yang zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la btags pa'i 'bras sA lu dang / thug po che'i sbyir sreg rtsa ba'i rig pa 'am snying pos
185a5(rgyud): stong phrag brgyad bya'o// sbyin sreg byas nas kyang sngar bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor la rjes su zhugs pa'i sems dpa' chen po la srung ba'i cho ga rnams byas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi slob ma nyid du
185a6(rgyud): khas blangs pa/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ gso sbyong byas pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid kyi lus dngos grub kyi don du phul ba/ sems can thams cad kyi
185a7(rgyud): nye bar longs spyod pa thun mong bar gyur pa/ bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi snying po gnon par byed pa/ dge ba rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sangs rgyas thob par 'dod pa rnams la dkyil
185b1(rgyud): 'khor bstan pa nyid las sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa byed pa'i skye bo rnams kyang skad cig de la grol bar 'gyur ro// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis gos ma
185b2(rgyud): nyams pa tha ga pas btags ma thag pa/ skra dang bral ba/ rtsa ba'i rig pas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa/ dri zhim po'i tsan dan dang gur kum gyis bgos pa'i dar gyis dkyil 'khor du 'jug
185b3(rgyud): pabar 'dod pa rnams kyi gdong g.yogs nas/ thog ma nas bcom ldan 'das ma sgrub pa pos rab tu 'jug par bya'o// rgyal po'i bu spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba 'am/ rgyal rigs kyi bu 'am/ gzhan
185b4(rgyud): yang spro ba chen po rgyal srid chen po 'dod pa'ang rab tu gzhug par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis par gnas pa gdong g.yogs nas dri bzang po'i me tog can dan dang gur kum dag gis rnam par bsres pa
185b5(rgyud): byin te/ shin tu gtsang sbra byas pa'i lag pa dag gis me tog 'thor du gzhug par bya'o// gang du de'i me tog babs pa de la de'i rig pa'i sngags sbyin par bya'o// skye ba gzhan dang gzhan rnams su
185b6(rgyud): de nyid dang 'di rjes su 'brel ba'o zhes kun tu grags pa yin zhing / de nyid 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / byang chub kyi snying po gnon par byed pa dang / byang chub chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i//
185b7(rgyud): ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don du mngon par sgrub par byed pa'o// de nyid 'di'i bsgrub par bya ba dang / longs spyod chen po dang / rgyal srid chen po dang / dbang che bar grags pa'i gang zag
186a1(rgyud): dang 'grogs pa 'di'i mngon par sgrub par byed pa'o// skye ba 'di nyid du sgrub pa gang dang ldan pa lhag par spyod pa las/ las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du
186a2(rgyud): rim gyis de lta bu la sogs pa ji srid brgyad po rnams de srid de/ gzhan rnams ni ma yin no zhes so// sgrub par 'dod pa gzhan yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sdig pa zad pa'i don du dam tshig tsam du 'gyur
186a3(rgyud): zhes pa'o// dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis mngon par dbang bskur ba sbyin na/ dang po re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol ha cang mi ring / ha cang mi nye ba'i byang shar gyi phyogs kyi cha'i sa phyogs rtsa ba'i sngags
186a4(rgyud): kyis byin gyis brlabs shing sngags kyis dag par byas nas/ de nas rgyal po mngon par dbang bskur ba de bzhin du sems bzhin pas mtha' gcig tu sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon
186a5(rgyud): par dang ba'i dad pa dang spro ba chen po dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral ba/ theg pa chen po la zhugs pa/ dkon mchog gsum la bsnyen bkur byed pa/ dbang po ma tshang ba med cing ma smad pa/
186a6(rgyud): skye ba 'di nyid la rig pa dang sngags sgrub par 'dod pa/ bsam pa bzang zhing sngags kyi spyod pa la spro ba'i yid dang ldan pa/ dge mtshan 'dod pa'i rang bzhin can/ sad pa'i rgyur yang rig pa'i don la
186a7(rgyud): rnam rtog med cing / der gtad pa'i yid cen de lta bu la sogs pa lnga ji srid par mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o// lhag ma rnams spang bar bya'o zhes so// shes rab can dang spyod pa la ma rmongs pa'i
186b1(rgyud): khyad par las te/ gzhan rnams bsten par bya ba ma yin no// de nas rgyal po thams cad dbang bsrung ba bzhin du yo byad thams cad bsogs te/ slob dpon dang mkhan po mnyes par bya'o//
186b2(rgyud): nas bla re bres te rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs dkar po mgo bor 'dzin bzhin pa dang / rnga yab dkar po g.yo ba bzhin pa dang / bkur sti chen pos dung dang / rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga'i
186b3(rgyud): dga' ba'i sgra nges par sgrogs pa dang / rgyal ba'i sgra dang / bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bsngags pa dang / bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa rgyal bas gsungs pa rnams kyis mngon
186b4(rgyud): papar bstod bzhin pas bskor ba dang / bkra shis de byas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// slob dpon sangs rgyas dang byang
186b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sngags kyi spyod pa mngon par sgrub pa la yang dag par rjes su 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten pa thams cad las 'das pa'i gsang chen rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor du
186b6(rgyud): yang dag par rjes su 'jug pa dang / chos kyi rgyal srid thams cad kyis sangs rgyas nyid mngon par rtogs par 'dod pa dang / mdor bsdus nas brjod na sangs rgyas nyid 'byung ba'i phyir bdag nyid spro bar brgyas
186b7(rgyud): zhes so// de nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste shar du mngon par phyogs pas dkyil 'khor mthong zhing rtogs pa la/ dang po re zhig rig pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba byin nas phyag rgya chen po rtsa ba'i rig pa
187a1(rgyud): bzlas par bya'o// de nas rig pa dang sngags dag gang gnas pa gro ga'i 'dab ma la gi ha~M gis bri bar bya'o// bris nas tsan dan dang gur kum dag gis lag pa dag dang kham por kha sbyar
187a2(rgyud): bkrus nas/ de nas gro ga'i 'dab mkham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhag par byas nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du gzhag
187a3(rgyud): par bya'o// de nas der nye bar 'dug ste rig pa rtsa ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad snga ma nyid du brjod par bya'o// de nas der ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pa la mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor
187a4(rgyud): du thams cad dang thun mong du gyur pa'i bum pa gang ba sgo dang nye bar sngar bzhag pa blangs nas slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas shing spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o// slob ma ji ltar 'dod pa'i chus spyi bo nas/
187a5(rgyud): mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes so// de nas de la kham phor kha sbyar de de'i ched du sbyin par bya'o// mar me la klog tu gzhug par bya'o// gal te nges bcom ldan 'das las rig pa'am sngags bzung ba nyid
187a6(rgyud): yin par gyur na bklags pa nyid las kyang las byed do// rnam pa gzhan du na rim gyis 'bad pas bsgrubs pas byed par 'gyur ro// gzhan rnams ni sngags bzlas pa kho nas 'grub par byed do// de nas sngags
187a7(rgyud): yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// dang po sgrub pa kho nas 'grub par byed do zhes pa rnam par rtog pa med pa las so// de kho na sngar bris pa slob dpon gyi sgrub pa gsum gyis nges par 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'bad
187b1(rgyud): pa med par ro// de bzhin du pog ma rig pa'i mngon par dbang bskur basbyin par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis par mngon par dbang bskur ba ni/ dkyil 'khor gnyis par dkyil 'khor thams cad pa dang /
187b2(rgyud): thams cad la gang rab tu bstabs pa'i bum pa gang ba des snga ma'i cho ga gang yin pa ji lta ba de nyid kyis spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur bar byas na sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas thams
187b3(rgyud): cad kyis rjes su gnang bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyis dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya bsgrub pa la'ang lhag par 'dod par 'gyur ro//
187b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis slob dpon du mngon par dbang bskur ba sbyin no// dkyil 'khor gsum par nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phul ba'i bum pa gang ba cho ga de nyid kyis spyi bor
187b5(rgyud): mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o// khyod la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa thams cad kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i sngags rnams
187b6(rgyud): dang / dkyil 'khor 'dri ba dang / nye bar ston pa dang / rgyud ngang rgyud kyi phyag rgya dang / spyad pa nges par ston pa dang / rang gi cho ga nges par ston par rjes su gnang ngo zhes brjod par bya'o// skye ba'ang cid
187b7(rgyud): dam/ gang phyi ma gzhan dang gzhan rnams su sangs rgyas nyid nges pa thob bo// de bzhin du rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyal ba'i mngon par dbang bskur ba dang / sngar nges par bstan pa'i cho gas bcom ldan 'das
188a1(rgyud): la sngar phul ba'i bum pa gang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la phul ba'i bum pa gang bas de bzhin kho nar mngon par dbang bskur ro// de bzhin du yang khyod la sangs rgyas bcom
188a2(rgyud): ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyis 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa dang / lus can thams cad kyis mi thub cing rnam par rgyal ba dang / khyod
188a3(rgyud): sngags rnams thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbubs shig ces rjes su gnang ngo zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sems can lnga po nyid re re la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du mngon par
188a4(rgyud): dbang bskur ba lnga sbyin par bya'o// de nas de dag rim gyis dkyil 'khor du bcug nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phul te/ dkyil 'khor la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas gshegs
188a5(rgyud): su gsol bar bya'o// de nas nyi ma gzhan la rim gyis rig pa dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa rnams la bslab par bya zhing / rnam par sbyar bar bya'o// skad cig de nyid la song nas sngar brten par phul ba/ byang
188a6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po la sngar phul ba'i chu bum pa gang ba blangs nas/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de rnams la chu khyor ba gsum shar du mngon par phyogs par byas nas 'thung du gzhug par bya'o// 'di skad
188a7(rgyud): brjod par bya ste/ kye byang chub sems dpa' chen po gsang ba'i dam tshig gang gis 'da' bar byed na bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skye bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gang du 'am/ der yang rigs dman pa gang gis dkyil
188b1(rgyud): 'khor du 'ongs pa de rnams kyang dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed nas/ grogs byed pa'i lag par gos dkar po gtsang ma mgo bor bcings pa gzhan gyis sam gos kun tu g.yogs te gas
188b2(rgyud): ba dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas rigs dman pa rnams kyis me tog gtor bar bya'o// de nas grogs byed pa de rnams kyis kyang rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis khrus bya'o// de rnams kyi'ang ngam tshig
188b3(rgyud): tsam de 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sgrub pa'ang grub par 'gyur ro// de sngar byas pa'i me'i bya ba'i gnas su song na rtse mo ma nyams pa'i ku sha rnams kyis so// der yang me thab rnam pa gsum du brjod do// zhi ba dang /
188b4(rgyud): rgyas pa dang / mngon spyod do// zhi ba'i don du pad+ma'i rnam pa'o// yang na tshim par byed pas dbang du byed pa'ang ngo // mngon spyod la zur gsum mo// de la me'i bya ba'i cho ga thams cad la ku sha dgram par 'gyur
188b5(rgyud): ro/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag bya ba byas nas shar gyi rtse mor me'i bya ba gzhag par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi nas me'i bya ba mdzad pa rnams la phyag byas nas lho'i rtse mor ro//
188b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas byang gi rtse mor sbyin par bya'o// de bzhin du yang bya ba rnams grogs byed pas gnas pa'i ngang tshul can gyis me'i bya ba ku sha rnams kyis so// thog mar
188b7(rgyud): rtsa ba'i rig pas so// thog mar zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la btags pa'i 'bras yos kyi sbyin sreg nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin par bya'o// zhi ba'i don du snying pos mar gyis so// rgyas pa'i don du shing
189a1(rgyud): a pa man gsum gyi sbyin sreg go// mngon spyod la ka Ta ke yis so// me'i bya ba'i cho ga 'di'ang thams cad du thun mong ba'i sgrub pa rnams la'ang ngo // dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi che ba
189a2(rgyud): spyod pa rnams su'ang ngo // de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis gnas gtsang mas gtso bo'i lha nyid bstan nas/ me'i cho ga'i bya ba byas te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad du rab
189a3(rgyud): tu zhugs pa rnams la/ de nas rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas pas mchod yon no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha'i byang
189a4(rgyud): par rnams dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams kyang gsan du gsol/ gang dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga las 'das par yang rung ste/ gus par byed pa dang / gzhan yang gang cung zad
189a5(rgyud): bdag nyid nyams par bya ba de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu gnas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod yul dang /
189a6(rgyud): ma bral bar thob par gyur cig/ myur du bde ba dang ldan pa thob par gyur cig/ de skad ces brjod par bya'o// dkyil 'khor du rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can rnams thams cad la/ mdor na byang chub kyi sems
189a7(rgyud): dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur bar bya'o// sbyin pa la rab tu chags pa dang / byams pa la sogs pa la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchod pa dang / mdor na lung dang / rig
189b1(rgyud): pa dang / gsang sngags sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa rnams blta bar bya/ byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slong /
189b2(rgyud): dpon gyis byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa de rnams thams cad la dri bzang po'i me tog gis mchod yan phul nas sam/ de nas yid kyis mchod yon phul nas rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas pas gats+tsha gats+tsha zhes pa
189b3(rgyud): dang / swA hA zhes pa kho na bzlas pas phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas gyen du nges par bltas pas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o zhes pa'o// byang
189b4(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i sde snod bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rab 'byam gyi le'u ste gnyis pa rdzogs so//
189b5(rgyud): de nas sems dpa' chen po nges slar yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par gzigs nas/ lha'i bu rnams thams cad la spras par gyur to// khyed rnams nyon cig/ mchog pa
189b6(rgyud): grub pa mchog tu gsang ba sgrub thabs thams cad kyi cho ga rig pa'i las thams cad byed pa/ rig pa'i las bzang po byed pa/ chen po nyid dang don chen po byed pa/ phung krol thams cad zlog par byed pa/
189b7(rgyud): don thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ mchog tu bkra mi shes pa thams cad kun nas bkra shis pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ bdag gi mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po yang dag par gyur pa/
190a1(rgyud): las phran tshegs thams cad la nye bar sbyar bar bya ba/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo las chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub byed pa'i sgrol ma gang zhe na/ na mo rat+na tra sA ya/ nam Ar+ya ba
190a2(rgyud): lo ki te shwa rA ya bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ grogs po dag 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma las chen po thams cad byed pa/ las phran
190a3(rgyud): tshogs thams cad bklags pas grub pa/ mchog tu gsang ba shin tu gsang ba/ mchog tu grub pa/ gzhan gyis rab tu sbyar ba'i las thams cad 'jig par byed pa'i rig pa 'di'ang dkyil
190a4(rgyud): 'khor gnyis pa'i cho ga dang sgrub thabs su 'gyur te/ 'phags ma sgrol mas la sa chen po thams cad mdor bsdus pa dang / las phran tshegs thams cad la'ang nye bar sbyar bar bya zhing / dkyil
190a5(rgyud): 'khor thams cad kyi cho ga dang sgrub thabs rnams la'ang ngo // nyin mtshan gang du 'am der yang rung ste/ gtsang ma'i phyogs su bri bar bya'o// bdag nyid nyes pa med pa dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon
190a6(rgyud): gyis gcig pus dang po re zhig gru bzhi mnyam pa/ sgo bzhi pa/ khru bzhi'i tshad dang ldan pa'i dbus su pad+ma'i phyag rgya/ de'i g.yas su ut+pa la sngon po dang / dbyug pa'i phyag rgya dang / ril ba spyi brug
190a7(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya/ g.yon du rdo rje rtse gsum gyi phyag rgya dang / gos dkar mo'i phyag rgya dang / rta mgrin dang dpal chen mo'i phyag rgya'o// shar sgor pad+ma/ byang du ut+pa la/ lho ru rdo rje/ nub tu 'jug/
190b1(rgyud): pa'i rim pa las 'das par/ steng du 'khyil ba'i rnam pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o// de'i 'og tu phyinas me'i bya ba byas nas sngar brjod pa'i cho gas mchod ba la sogs pa byas te/ dkyil 'khor du 'khru/
190b2(rgyud): pabar bya'o// de la rgyal srid 'dod pa sa ha tA'i shing du'o// longs spyod 'dod pas rang gi khyim gyi lha'o// rta 'dod pas rta'i bres su'o// glang po che 'dod pas glang po che'i bres su'o// bu 'dod pas tha
190b3(rgyud): de rtsi'i shing gi drung du'o// tshangs pa'i srin pos zin pa la tshangs pas bskyangs pa ru'o// klus zin pa la kru shing dang nye ba ru'o// mkha' 'gro mas zin pa la lam bzhi mdo ru'o// gnod sbyin gyis
190b4(rgyud): zin pa la pa Ta'i shing gi drung du'o// srul pos zin pa la khron pa'i drung du'o// gzhan rnams kyang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gang du'am de ru'ang nyes pa med do// grogs po dag mdor bsdus na rig
190b5(rgyud): pa 'di ni dkyil 'khor dang las thams cad pa ste/ sgrub thabs thams cad dang / las thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// gsang chen 'di dang lhan cig rab tu sbyar bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor 'di ni
190b6(rgyud): sems can rnams la phan par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu yod pa'o// longs spyod thams cad mngon par 'phel bar byed pa sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi rig pa sgrub pa po rnams la phan pa'i don gyi phyir 'byor
190b7(rgyud): pa thams cad mngon par 'phel bar byed pa ste/ mdor na phyi ma'i lus can 'byung bar 'gyur ba thams cad kyi slob dpon du gyur par rab tu grags so// de nas dkyil 'khor chen por gyur
191a1(rgyud): pa gang thob nas dpal med pa 'joms par byed cing zhi bar byed/ nang dang ngagra 'phrog pa de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor sems can thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang stobs sgrub par byed pa mthong
191a2(rgyud): zhing thos nas/ de nas cho ga la rab tu dang ba skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub tu bdag gis lung ston par the tshom med do// gang yang ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung
191a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba/ 'jig rten gyi 'dren pa de rnams kyang rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur ro// sa steng dkyil 'khor smra ba ni// zhi ba'i las rnams thams cad byed// bkren pa rnams kyis phan pa thob// sems
191a4(rgyud): can mgon med sdug bsngal can// rnams kyis dkyil 'khor rab sbyar bya// in+d+ra nI la sogs phye mas// dkyil 'khor yang dag kun tu bri// in+d+ra nI la sogs med na// sA lu'i phye mas yang dag bri// sA
191a5(rgyud): lu'i bye ma sogs med na// so phag phye ma sogs kyis bri// so phag phye ma sogs med na// bye ma rnams kyis yang dag bri// de ltar yon tan kun bsdus pa'i// sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor rmad byung ba// 'jig rten/
191a6(rgyud): mgon po'i yang dag bka'// byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa yin// zhes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod dang ldan pa theg pa chen po'i mdo sde/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma rag dgyen brjes
191a7(rgyud): kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las/ sgrub thabs kyi cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rab 'byam gyi le'u ste gsum pa rdzogs so// / de nas sems dpa' chen pos slar yang dkyil 'khor chen po
191b1(rgyud): de la kun tu gzigs nas dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin yang dag par 'phags pa dgongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs shing mngon par yi rang
191b2(rgyud): bar gyur pa/ mchog gi sgrub pa'i cho ga ras ris kyi cho ga gsungs so// dang po re zhig dge ba'i nyi ma la dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i ras bal blangs nas bram ze'i bu mo'i lag pas ras bal byed du gzhug par bya'o//
191b3(rgyud): de nas ras bal de la lhag par gnas par bya ste/ rtsa ba'i rig pa dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i dog pa blangs nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang /
191b4(rgyud): rang sangs rgyas thams cad lhag par gnas par mdzod cig/ bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams legs par 'tsho zhing bdag gi skye ba 'bras bu yod pa dang / sngags kyi dngos grub lhag
191b5(rgyud): bar gnas par mdzod cig/ de'i dus su rnga pa Ta ha dang / rnga bo che dang / dung dang / pi wang dang / gling bu dang / 'khar rnga dang / rnga mu ra dza'i sgra thos par gyur pa 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rgyal rigs mo
191b6(rgyud): 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ mi rnams glo bur du 'di skad ces rgyal ba dang / grub pa dang / dngos grub sbyin pa dang / byin pa dang / zung zhig dang / dpal dang / 'bras bu dang bcas
191b7(rgyud): pa dang / las kyi 'khor lo dang / mang po zhes pa de lta bu la sogs pa gzhan yang dge ba'i sgra rab tu 'don pa dang / dril bu'i sgra byung ba dang / dga' ba'i sgra'ang rung ste/ de rnams rig pa 'dzin pas sangs
192a1(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par shes par bya'o// gzhan du dngos grub 'bras bu med do zhes pas so// de'i dus su de
192a2(rgyud): rnams ma rungs pa'i sgra 'byin pa 'am/ zung zhig/ zo zhig/ 'dzin du chug cig/ nyams pa/ rnam par brlag pa/ kyi hud/ ring ba med pa/ de lta bu la sogs pa'i sgra 'byin par byed pa dang / mi dang sha ma/
192a3(rgyud): he dang / lce spyang dang / bong bu dang / byil dang / dud 'gro dman pa rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi sgra 'don par gyur na/ de la sgrub pa pos bdag gi dngos grub med do zhes shes par bya zhing /
192a4(rgyud): ba 'di nyid la kun tu brtul bar bya'o// slar yang snga ma bzhin du byas nas brtsam par bya ste/ de lta bu lan bdun gyis mtshams med pa lnga byed pa'ang bdun pa'i las kyi sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes so//
192a5(rgyud): de nas sgrub pa pos gzhon nu ma de la bsrung ba byas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug tu bcug ste/ shar du mngon par phyogs pa 'am/ byang du mngon par phyogs par bzhag nas/ bdag nyid nA ru'i sngon mo bzal
192a6(rgyud): zhing gzhin nu ma de la'ang tsA ru'i ston mo bzar gzhug par bya'o// snga ma kho nar yongs su brtags pa'i ku sha'i khres la cho ga de nyid kyis ras bal 'khal du gzhugs par bya'o// dog pa de 'jam pa dang legs
192a7(rgyud): par bsgrims pa sngar bslabs pa'i bu mos yang dag par blangs te gcig dang / gsum dang / lnga dang / brgyad la sogs pa nas/ ji srid bcu drug tsam gyis bar du ka rA'i srang grangs legs par bgrangs
192b1(rgyud): pa dang ldan pa'i gnon nu mas bya'o// de la rab ni bcu drug bya// de bzhis 'bring ni brgyang pa ste// phran tshegs las rnams sgrub pa la// lnga dang gcig ni ba ma'o// sngags rnams kun la sngags rig pas/
192b2(rgyud): nus pa bzhin du bya// de nas brtsams te gang cung zad// sdig pa'i las rnams sngon byas pa// dog pa la dmigs sems kyis ni// de yi skad cig nyid la 'jigadog pa 'ang na blangs nas su// gtsang mar
192b3(rgyud): snong du gzhug par bya// phyogs su gyur par bzhag byas nas// ga pur gyi ni bdug pas bdug/ srog chags yan lag min byung bsam// gur kum tsan ngan la sogs sam/ gtsam pa ga sogs ma yi ka
192b4(rgyud): zhim me tog rnams kyis bgos// gtsang ma'i phyogs su bzhag nas ni// srung ba'i cho ga byas nas ni// sngags rig las kun shes pa yis// shin tu mnyam bzhag bzlas par bya// de nas tha ga sar song
192b5(rgyud): nas// ji ltar 'dod pa'i gla byin te// yan lag bral min skem min nyid// dkar po'i chos la rtag tu dga'// nad kyis gdungs min rgan po min// lud pa dbugs mi bde las grol// ma ning mtshan
192b6(rgyud): gnyis min pa dang // de ni dman pa min nyid dang // ngan par ltung ba spangs pa ni// kun nas mtshan nyid yang dag ldan// rab bsngags blta na sdug pa dang // blo yas kun tu spyod pa dge/ 'jig rten pa 'i/
192b7(rgyud): 'jug pa rten// dngos grub 'dod pas de la ni// ras mchog 'thag par byed pa la// rab bsngags dge ba'i stobs ldan nam// blo ldan pa po ni shin tu mkhas// shin tu khyad par mchog gyur pa'i//
193a1(rgyud): ras ni 'thag byed mchog ga ni// rab kyis rab la bya ba yin// 'bring la 'bring po sgrub par byed// tha mas phran tshegs las rnams ni// dman pa nyid ni kun las so// bzo
193a2(rgyud): bos ji ltar smra ba bzhin// de las gru ni ji bzhin sbyin// bzo bo yi ni dang po'i ngag/ smras pa de las sngags reg pas// myur du rin ni sbyin par gyis// dpa' bo'i tshong zhes de la brjod// don du gnyer
