193a3(rgyud): ba nyid dang de'i// rin gyi dngos po zlog par byed// myur du dngos grub byed gang 'di'i// ras ni bla na med pa'i mchog/ las rnams shin tu mchod par 'os// lha dang mi yi bde nyid dang // 'byung po
193a4(rgyud): kun gyi dpal yin zhes// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas tha ga pa la gso sbyong byin nas/ shin tu dag pa'i rgyu skar la 'am/ cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed la 'am/ dkar
193a5(rgyud): bo'i nyi ma 'am/ dkar po'i gza' nges par bltas te/ dkar po'i zla phyed gzhan la'ang rung ste/ shing sa ha kA ra'i snye ma dang me tog skyes shing / shing gi me tog dang yal ga rgyas shing dpyid ka'i
193a6(rgyud): dus/ dus kyi mchog der snga dro nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe/ sngar bstan pa'i rgyu spun dang bcas pas tha ga pa tsA ru'i bza' ba zos shing gos dkar po gyon pa/ mgo la gtsug tor bcings nas legs par bkrus
193a7(rgyud): patsan dan dkar po dang gur kum dag gang yang rung bas legs par byugs pa/ lus la rjes su byugs pa/ ga pur gyi dris kha bsgos pa/ yid dga' zhing bkres pa dang skom pa dang bral bar byas nas/
193b1(rgyud): thags kyi sngam la sogs pa'i yo byang thams cad kyang sa dang ba lang gi lci ba dag gis bkrus te/ gsar pa rnams kyang slar yang ba'i rnam lngas bkru bar bya'o// de nas srog chags mang pa'i chus bkru
193b2(rgyud): bya'o// tsan ngan dkar po dang gur kum gyis mngon par gtor bar bya'o// sa'i phyogs gtsang ma tsa co dang bral zhing / ljongs kyi mi dang bral ba/ rnam par dben pa'i gnas blag pa dang bcas shing gsang bar
193b3(rgyud): me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pas mchod do// de nas rjes su sgrub pa bos yang dag par sbyong bar byed pa'i sngags nyid yungs kar dkar po la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags par byas nas phyogs pa ni
193b4(rgyud): rnams dang / steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs bral rnams su gtor bar bya'o// de nas tha ga pa la yungs kar gyis yang dag par bsnun nas phyag rgya chen po gtsug pud lnga pa bcings te/ gtsug tor bcing /
193b5(rgyud): ba byas na bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// gal te ras rab yin na zheng du khru bzhi/ chur khru brgyad kyi tshad 'di tsam du tha ga pas bran par bya'o// 'bring bar gyur na zheng du khru do// chur khru lnga nyid do//
193b6(rgyud): ma ni bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshang la/ chur ni sangs rgyas kyi khru gang nyid do// de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtho gang ni yul dbus kyi skyes bu tshad dang ldan pa'i khru gcig ste/ 'di ni
193b7(rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'o zhes bsgrags te/ tshang 'dis tshad kun du bshad do// 'di ni 'phur ba'i dngos grub tu// skyes bu mchog gis gsungs pa yin// thub pa mi snang gyur 'og tu// rgyal
194a1(rgyud): sring 'dod la 'bring po ste// longs spyod chen po don gcer ba'i// skyes bu lha dang lha min dang // gdengs can tha ma grub par bshad// 'bring la dngos grub 'bring po'o// ras 'bring po
194a2(rgyud): ni rtag pa ru// sems can kun gyi las rnams sgrub// phran tshegs las rnams bsgrub bya la// ras tha ma ni rtag pa ru// las rnams thams cad sgrub par byed// rdzas rnams kun la rtag tu ni// las rnams/
194a3(rgyud): thams cad sgrub par byed// ras ris gsum gyis nges bstan pa'i// dngos grub dpal don gnyer ba'i mi// brgya byin bde sogs bdag po yang // cho ga nyams na mi 'grub ste// cho ga yang dag ldan gyur//
194a4(rgyud): na mi yi skye bo phal pa la'ang // 'bad pa yis ni las rnams kun// myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// rgyal dang rgyal mchog sras rnams kyis// sbyor ba 'di dag yang dag bshad// sems can
194a5(rgyud): bkren pa mgon med pa// sdug bsngal gyis gdungs kun gyi dpal// byang chub lam du gang 'di ni// de nyid gzigs pa rnams kyis bstan// chos 'di byang chub rgyu yin par// sngags kyi lam gyis bstan/
194a6(rgyud): pa yin// dkyil 'khor yang dag bstan pa gang // 'jig rten dkyil 'khor thams cad dang // 'jig rten 'das pa'ang 'grub 'gyur te// 'bad pa med par sngags rnams 'grub// gang zhig byang
194a7(rgyud): chub chur 'dong pa// de la rtag tu dngos grub 'gyur// rtag tu 'gro la mi phan pa// gzhan la dngos grub med par gsungs// byang chub ched du 'jug kun la// ras ris thams cad 'grub par gsungs//
194b1(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi/ dam tshig 'di ni khyad par du// myur du bya ba'i don bsgrub phyir// 'dir ni mtha' dag thob pa ru// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yin// de nas rim gyis ban
194b2(rgyud): bo yis// 'bad pas ras ni 'thag par bya// nyin zhag lnga dang brgyad rnams dang // bcu drug gnyis dang bzhi dag dang // nyin mtshan nyid kyis myur ba ru// ras ni 'thag pa rdzogs pa dang // bzo bo/
194b3(rgyud): mchog tu grub pa ni// nyin mtshan gyis ni dge ba yin// gtsang sbra'i spyod pa phun sum tshogs/ bzo bo rtag tu byin brlabs pa// thag ring gnas su song nas ni// bshang dang gci ba yongs su dor/
194b4(rgyud): 'ongs pa'i gos dang bcas bkrus nas// gzhan pa'i gos gzhan bgo bya zhing // gos dkar 'chang zhing 'phreng bar ldan// yang dang yang du nye reg bya// lus la tsan dan dkar pos byug/ bzo bo'i lag
194b5(rgyud): pa gtsang bar bya// rtag tu 'jam zhing legs sbyangs pas// slar yang 'bad pas btag par bya// de la sogs pa'i rab sbyor ni// rgyal ba gzhan gyis gsungs pa 'am// 'bad pas rnam dpyad dang
194b6(rgyud): tshul gyis// ras ni ma lus btag par bya// ras kyi thags ni rdzogs pa dang // sngar gyi las kyis legs sprul pa// de rnams tshad ldan ma nyams pa// bya'o bzang po'i nyin zhag la// rgyud dang rgyud du
194b7(rgyud): mnyam par 'jug/ dkar po'i phyogs kyi mdzes pa la// ras ni yongs su bsal byas nas// kha tshar mdung po'i mtha' mdzes la// 'od ma'i shing ni khru bzhi la// ras ni blangs nas de nas 'gro// nor ni
195a1(rgyud): rgya cher 'god pa yin// bzo bo bde legs byas nas ni// brtul zhugs bzang po legs spyod pa'i// sngags pa ji ltar 'dod song nas// pri ni ma me tog gis mchod de// gtsang ba'i
195a2(rgyud): phyogs su rnam par dgod// 'di nyid kyis ni sngags kyis ni// srung ba'i cho ga rab tu bya// gang zhig ras bal sngon du ni// slar yang rnam mang yongs spangs pa// de nyid kyis ni bdag nyid dang // ras nyid bsrung /
195a3(rgyud): bar bya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo che// bsngags bzlas pa yis gsungs pa yin// sangs rgyas rnams ni mang pos dang // ngas kyang de ni slar yang ste// de nyid gsang sngags thams cad kyis/
195a4(rgyud): rnam par spyod pa'i sngags kyi gzugs// brtson 'grus chen po gzi brjid che// sngags kyi don kun sgrub pa po// sna tshogs skyob pa'i rgyu rnams ni// rnam pa sna tshogs byed par 'gyur// 'dzam gling
195a5(rgyud): gnas pa'i sems can rnams// sems kyi spyod pa kun tu rmongs// dad pa med cing phyin ci log/ log pa'i kun spyod la rab brkam// sngags rnams sgrub par mi byed pa'i// de nyid phyir na slar gsungs
195a6(rgyud): pa 'khor ba mun pa'i btson rang 'khyams// gang yang rtag tu ying dag cing // dang ldan ltad mo bkra shis dang // sngags rnams kun la rtag tu spyod// bdag nyid chen po dngos grub 'dod// rtag tu
195a7(rgyud): 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang // spro ba che zhing gzi brjid che// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags rnams gang // 'bad pa med par yang dag 'grub// dad pa med pa'i skye bo la// dkar po'i chos rnams mi s+ya ste/
195b1(rgyud): sa bon ma sgor bdab pa la// myu gu med cing 'bras med bzhin// ngad pa rtag tu chos kyi zer// don kun gzigs pas gsungs pa yin// chos don dang tshul can de rnams// sngags kyi dngos grub rtag tu brjod/ nga/
195b2(rgyud): nas sgrub pos bzo bo ni// ri mo mkhan nam bdag kyang rung // ri mo mkhas pas ma 'dres pa'i// chor rtsi kha dog gsal ba dang // kha dog can gyi tshon blangs nas// ji ltar thag pa la ni// sngar gyi cho ga de nyid
195b3(rgyud): kyis// mtshan nyid yang dag ldan pa yis// ri mo mkhan la gong bzhin du// rgyas pa ru ni bya ba'o// ji ltar sngar bzhin tha ga pa'i// cho ga de nyid kyis ni de// ras la ri mo bri bar bya// yang na rang gis ri mor bri/
195b4(rgyud): ga pur gur kum tsan dan las// so phag tshon la bsgo bar bya// bdug pa bsregs shing sngags nyid kyis// lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas// na ga ge sar pun+da ga/ ba ku lA dang tsam pa kA// bA ri Shi ka d+hA
195b5(rgyud): dus+ya// pA la ti ma me tog sogs// ras de la ni mngon par gtor// shar du mngan phyogs su sha ya~M// zhes la cher 'dug dang ba'i thos// sangs rnas byang chub sems dpa' kun// sems dpas
195b6(rgyud): gyur pas 'di phra mo// lag pas blangs nas ma 'khrugs pa'i// sems kyis ras la ri mo bri// dang po re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa bri bar bya ste/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/
195b7(rgyud): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis mtshan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus nye bar mdzes pa'i sku rin po che'i pad+ma la bzhugs pa// kun nas 'od 'bar ba/ kun nas 'od 'dom gang gis/
196a1(rgyud): nye bar mdzes pa'i sku/ chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa/ rab tu dang ba'i sku/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ dbus na gnas pa'i pad+ma'i bi DU R+Ya'i sdong po can/ 'og na
196a2(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po sra ga da na che po pad+ma'i sdong bu de la 'dzin bzhin pas de bzhin gshegs pa la lha zhing lag pa g.yas pas phyag 'tshal bzhin pa/ dkar po rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ lus phyed mi'i rnam
196a3(rgyud): pa can gyi dga' bo dang nye dga' bo bri bar bya'o// pad+ma'i mtsho de'i 'khor yug tu pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / cung zad kha bye ba dang / rnam par 'bye ba dang / chu las skyes pa'i bya dang nyal sogs pas
196a4(rgyud): mngon par khyab pa/ ma lus par bkod pa shin tu spras pa/ mdzes pa'i rnam par mngon par bri bar bya'o// gang bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i pad+ma'i sdong bu dang 'dab ma de nyid las rnam par 'phros pa'i pad+ma'i
196a5(rgyud): me tog du ma rnams rim gyis mtho ba'o// g.yon gyi gzhogs su pad+ma'i me tog brgyad de// de rnams la'ang pad+ma rnams la bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyi sku mngon par bri bar bya'o// dang
196a6(rgyud): bo re zhig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug pad+ma'i ze ba ltar cung zad dkar ba'i gur kum dang gser gyi mdog can/ 'od dpag tu med pa'i cong pan gyis dbu la rnam par brgyan pa/ phyag na ut+pal
196a7(rgyud): sngon po 'dzin pa/ g.yas kyi phyag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhin pa/ sku mdzes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba/ zhi ba'i rnam pa/ bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa/ kun nas 'bar
196b1(rgyud): bas 'khrigs pas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas pa'o// bad+ma gzham la ni 'phags pa tha 'od gzhon du de bzhin du mngon par bri bar bya'o// gsum pa la nor ba bangs so// bani pa la sgrub pa thams cang /
196b2(rgyud): rnam par sel ba'o// lnga pa la nam mkha' mdzod do// drug pa la sa'i snying po'o// bdun pa la 'jam dpal lo// brgyad pa la spyan bzangs te/ 'di dag thams cad gzhon nu'i cha byad can/ gzhon
196b3(rgyud): nu rgyan gyis mngon par brgyan pa mngon par bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas kyi gzhogs su byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad la/ byams pa ma gtogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par
196b4(rgyud): brgyan pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nye logs su 'phags pa byams pa tshangs par spyod pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa/ dbu la ral pa'i cod pan bcings pa/ gser mdog ngur smrig dmar po gsol ba/ dar la
196b5(rgyud): dmar po'i stod g.yogs byas pa/ tshom bu gsum gyi mtshan ma byas pa/ gzugs mdzes pa/ dbyig pa dang ril ba spyi blugs g.yon gyi phyag du bkod pa/ kr-iSh+Na sA ra'i pags pa phrag pa g.yon du bgos pa/ phyag g.ya
196b6(rgyud): bas bgrang 'phreng bzung nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhin pa / der gtod pa'i lta ba bsam gtan la dmigs pa'i sems kyi spyod pa can no// pad+ma gnyis pa la 'phags pa kun tu bzang po
196b7(rgyud): bri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs kyi mdog/ sku rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag g.yon pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu ri po che bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pas dpal 'bras bsdams nas mchog sbyin pa/ mdzes pa
197a1(rgyud): gzugs can de bzhin du mngon par bri bar bya'o// gsum pa la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba/ gser gyi rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa/ ral
197a2(rgyud): pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po can/ thams cad mkhyen pa dbul byas pa/ 'phags pa 'od dpag med stobs bcu pa ral pa'i nang du nye bar bzhugs pa/ gzugs mdzes pa/ phyag
197a3(rgyud): g.yon na pad+ma bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas mchog sbyin pa/ bsam gtan la dmigs par gyur pa'i sems kyi spyod pa can/ sku kun nas gsal bar gyur pa'o// bzhi pa la 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje phyag
197a4(rgyud): g.yon pas rdo rje bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pas nye bar 'gog pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa bsnams nas mchog sbyin pa/ gser mdog rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ mdzes pa'i gzugs can
197a5(rgyud): zhi ba'i lta ba dang ldan pa/ do shal dang do shal phyed pas lus nye bar dkris pa/ mu tig gi ngo shal gyi mchod phyir thogs byas pa/ cod pan rin po che 'bar bas rnam par 'phro ba/ dar srab mo'i sham thabs
197a6(rgyud): dang / dar la dkar po'i bla gos byas pa'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang kun tu bzang po'i sham thabs dang bla gos kyang de bzhin no// lus kyi rnam pa ni sngar bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin
197a7(rgyud): no de bzhin gshegs pa'i pad+ma lnga pa la 'phags pa blo gros chen po/ drug pa la zhi ba'i blo gros/ bdun pa la rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'o// brgyad pa la ngan song spong ba zhes pa'i byang chub sems
197b1(rgyud): dpa' 'di rnams phyag na 'bras bu dang glegs pame bsdams pa/ rnam pa kun tu mdzes pa/ dar la'i stong g.yogs cad/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyad pa/ g.yo ba dang ldan pa'i gos mnabs pa/
197b2(rgyud): rnams mngon par bri bar bya'o// de rnams kyi yang steng du rang sangs rgyas brgyad mngon par bri bar bya ste/ dge slong gi cha byad 'chang ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i sku/ ngur smrig dmar po
197b3(rgyud): gsol ba/ skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug pa/ rin po che'i rdo le ba la bzhugs pa/ zhi ba'i cha byad can/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ dri zhim po'i me tog gis gcal du bkram pa la 'di
197b4(rgyud): lhalta ste/ mA la tI dang / bIR+Sha kA dang / d+hA nuska ri skA ri kA dang / pun+d+ha ga dang / na ga ge sar la sogs pa'i me tog rnams kyis ras la kun nas gcal du bkram bzhin pas mngon par bri'o// bcom
197b5(rgyud): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon gyi gzhogs su 'phags pa 'jam dpal gang yin pa'i steng du rin po che du mas spras pa'i shin tu ring po'i rnam pa'i gzhal med kyi dkyil 'khor ro// brag ri'i
197b6(rgyud): rgyal po nye bar mdzes pa rin po che'i rdo leb kyis bkab pa ri bo'i rnam pa lta bur mngon par bri bar bya'o// der gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgyad mngon par bri bar bya ba la 'di lta ste/ rin
197b7(rgyud): chen gtsug tor can rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i 'od rnam par 'phro ba/ kun nas 'od 'dom gang ba/ pad+ma rA ga dang / in+d+ra nI la dang / ma ra ka sta la sogs pa dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / rdo'i snying po la sogs
198a1(rgyud): pa nor bu rin po che chen po khyad par can rnams kyis kun nas rab tu 'bar bzhin pa/ cung zad nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chos gos ser po'i stong gson/
198a2(rgyud): mnabs pa/ skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa/ sham thabs ser po mnabs pa/ sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyi go cha bgos pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus nye bar mdze
198a3(rgyud): pa'i sku/ rab tu zhi ba'i gzigs stangs can/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can mngon par bri'o// gnyis pa la de bzhin gshegs pa me
198a4(rgyud): tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po gser gyi mdog tu mngon par bri bar bya'o// mag ge sar ches bzang ba dang / ba ku la la sogs pa'i me tog rnams kyis mngon par gtor ba mngon
198a5(rgyud): par bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpal la mngon par gzigs bzhin pa kun nas 'od can rin po che'i 'od rnam par 'phro ba'i mthar thug pa'o// gsum pa la de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i
198a6(rgyud): dbang po'i rgyal po mngon par bri bar bya ste/ pad+ma'i ge sar gyi mdog tu snang ba/ chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa'o// bzhi pa la de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzang mngon par bri bar bya'o// lnga
198a7(rgyud): papa la bzod par dka' ba'o// drug pa la rnam par snang mdzad rgyal ba'o// bdun pa la sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po'o// brgyad pa la de bzhin gshegs pa sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar
198b1(rgyud): byed pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po mngon par bri bar bya ste/ thams cad gser gyi kha dog can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra'i rnam pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin par mdzad pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi steng ngu'ang/
198b2(rgyud): bris sku'i zur gnyis ka nas sprin gyi go bar na gnas pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gnyis me tog gi char 'bebs par byed bzhin pa bri'o// bar snang la gnas nas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
198b3(rgyud): dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad la phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhin pa mngon par bri bar bya'o// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang du 'phags pa nyan thos chen po brgyad byung
198b4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbu'i gnas spangs pa'i steng du mngon par bri bar bya'o// 'di lta ste/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / 'od srungs chen po dang / rab 'byor dang /
198b5(rgyud): sgra gcan 'dzin dang / dga' bo dang / bzang ldan dang / ka bi na zhes pa'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rnams 'di lta ste/ dri dang can dang / tsan dan dang / nye ba'i 'chi ltas dang / dkar po dang / si ka
198b6(rgyud): dang / dbang po dang / mu khyud dang / mu khyud bzang po zhes pa'o// thams cad mchog tu shin tu mdzes pa/ zhi ba'i cha lugs/ zhi ba'i bdag nyid/ rab tu dul ba'i rnam pa'o// nyan thos chen po
198b7(rgyud): rnams thal mo sbyar bar byas nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la nges par rtog par byed pa'o// steng ngos su'ang gnas gtsang ma'i lha dang nye bar gnas pa'i lha'i bu gzhan gnyis dar gyi tha
199a1(rgyud): re kun nas chur ring zhing shin tu mdzes pa bzung nas/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad kyi steng du 'dzin par
199a2(rgyud): byed bzhin pa lha'i 'phreng ba dang gos 'chang ba'i lha'i bu mngon par bri'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng ngos su dbul mu tig gi do shal dang / rin po che'i skud pa la pad+ma rA ga dang / in+d+ra nI la la sogs/
199a3(rgyud): pa rnams kyis brgyus pa'i rin po che'i skud pa'i tshogs de la dar gyi bla re legs par bkod cing / khor yug tu'ang mu tig gi do shal rab tu 'phyang ba mdzes par gyur pa mngon par bri bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom
199a4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi pad+ma'i gdan gyi 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang nye bar klu'i rgyal po nye dga' bo'i gzhogs su rin po che'i ri bo pad+ma'i mtsho las mngon par 'phags pa/ rin po che'i myu gu dang / phug dang
199a5(rgyud): ri sul dang / byu ru'i 'khri shing yongs su dkris pa'i rin po che'i shing dang / drang srong chen po nye bar gnas shing bsten pa'i ri bo/ de'i steng du khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa drag po chen po'i gzugs can/ phyag/
199a6(rgyud): g.yon pas zhags pa bzung nas/ g.yas pas dbyug pa 'dzin pa/ bzhin khro gnyer can/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po la lta zhing bka' nod par byed bzhin pa/ gsus pa rlob/ skra gyen du brdzes pa/ mig
199a7(rgyud): sman nag po dang sprin dang mtshungs pa/ ag tshom ser skya dang sra ring zhing sen mo ring ba/ mig dmar ba/ mgrin pa'i phyogs sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ bgegs thams cad rnam
199b1(rgyud): bar 'joms pa/ ches mi bzang ba chen po/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen po/ kun nas 'bar ba/ khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa rnam pa 'di nyid kho nas bri bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu ral pa can de dang de'o// ri de'i 'og tu
199b2(rgyud): rdo'i steng du nye bar 'dug pa/ pus mo sa la 'dung ba'i lus can/ lag pa spos por thogs pa/ cha byad dang / dbyibs dang / 'jug pa dang / spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la lta bar
199b3(rgyud): gyur pa yang dag par bri'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i 'og g.yas kyi gzhogs su klu'i dbang po'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye logs su pad+ma'i mtsho las mngon par 'phags pa'i rin po che'i ri'i dbang po'i
199b4(rgyud): rgyal po gzhan gsungs pa de bzhin du gnas pa mngon par bri ste/ khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa phan pa lha'i me tog gcal du bkram pa mngon par bri ste/ ri de ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu bri'o//
199b5(rgyud): ri de ni shin tu mtho ba/ pad+ma rA ga'i rdo leb dang / de nyid kyi myu gu dang bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin gyi rtse mo'i rnam par bri bar bya'o// de la brten pa'i lha mo spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs rje/ 'phags ma sgrol ma
199b6(rgyud): lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dar la dmar po'i stod g.yogs dang / dar la khra bo'i sham thabs can/ bud med kyi rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ phyag g.yon na ut+pal sngon po bsnams pa/
199b7(rgyud): gser mdog can ma/ ha cang mi skem/ ha cang mi sbom/ ha cang mi rgan pa/ sems bsam gtan la gnas pa/ bka' nod cing 'dug pa/ phyag g.yas pas mchog sbyin par 'dod pa/ lus cung zad
200a1(rgyud): bdud pa/ skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la cung zad lta bar gyur pa/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas yongs su bskor ba'o// de nyid
200a2(rgyud): du'ang rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i rtse mo de nyid du'ang pun+d+ha ga'i shing gis yongs su bskor ba/ yal ga thams cad la kun nas me tog gis spras shing kha bye bar gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la mngon par bkab pa
200a3(rgyud): yal gdung ba de nyid kyis kyang shin tu bkra ba'i byu ru'i myu gu 'brel ba rnam par bkra ba'i gzugs can gyi tshon rtsi 'bar ba na lha mo sgrol ma'i bzhin kun du snang bar mngon par bri'o// lha mo bgegs kun 'joms pa so//
200a4(rgyud): 'jigs pa 'joms par byed pa'i mchog/ sgrub pa po ni srung don du// mchog sbyin dge ba bri bar bya// bud med gzugs 'chang lha mo ni// thugs rje stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras// 'byung po kun gyi dpal yin//
200a5(rgyud): temachog sbyin byed ma bri bar bya// lha mo las chen byed pa mo// byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen po// bgegs kun rnam par 'joms don du// sgrub pa po ni kun tu 'dod// mi dbang rnams ni srung ngon dang /
200a6(rgyud): dpal gyi don du rab tu grags// khro rgyal dbang po gang yin de// ri yi rtse mor gnas 'dong ba// bgegs kun rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir// rgyal mchog sras rnams kyis gsungs so// drag po chen po brtson 'grus
200a7(rgyud): che ga tum chen 'od zer chen po ste// bstan pa la sdang sems can rnams// tshar gcang ched cing rab tu brtag/ sgrub pa po ni srung don dang // bgegs rnams thams cad 'joms pa dang // mi bzang rdo
200b1(rgyud): bo'i ngang tshul can// sngags kyi lha rnams 'gugs par byed// shin tu drag po drag gzugs can// brtse ba med cing nges par 'gog/ sdig pa drag pa spyod pa rnams// dbang du ma gyur dbang du byed// mkha'/
200b2(rgyud): spyod sa la spyod pa dang // kun nas sa 'og spyod pa dang // thub pa'i bstan la 'gal byed pa'i// gdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed// ras ni kun nas gru bzhi dang // grwa bzhi dag tu bri bar bya// ras kyi
200b3(rgyud): 'og gi mtha' rnams su'ang // chu bo rgya cher bya ba yin// klu ni gdengs kas mtshan pa can// gcig nyid kun du bya ba yin// yan lag dkar ning bzang ba dang // lus phyed mi yi rnam par skyegapa rtag tu thal/
200b4(rgyud): ma sbyor byed pa// mgo bo'i steng du bzhag byas nas// gdengs ka bdun pa brtson 'grus che// dbang chen ldan pa'i klu de ni// ming ni mtha' yas zhes bya yin// de bzhin gshegs la nges par blta// nor/
200b5(rgyud): bu rin chen gyis mdzes shing // shin tu mdzes shing gzugs mdzes pa// rin chen rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ldan kun tu bri// klu dbang chen por rnam par grags// thub pa'i
200b6(rgyud): bstan la rab bzhugs pa'i// 'jig rten kun la phan par brtson// bgegs kun rnam par gzhom don du// chu bo la brten bri bar bya// de la ras kyi cho ga 'di// mdor bsdus rgyal bas gsungs pa yin//
200b7(rgyud): rgyas par de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis// kun nas bshad pa sngar gsungs so// mkhas pa gang zhig 'dri byed pa// de yi bsod nams mtha' yas so// sdig pa shin tu mi bzad pa// bskal pa bye bar byas
201a1(rgyud): pa gang // sa stengs bris su mthong ba yis// de yis skad cig nyid la 'joms// mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang // tshul khrims 'chal dang smang pa dang // sdig pa kun la rab 'jug
201a2(rgyud): dang // 'khor bar yongs su rgyu ba yi// 'gro ba skye gnas dman pa rnams// de rnams ras ris 'dzin mi gzhug/ de rnams ras ris mthong bas ni// 'bras bu yod par thub dbang gsungs// de phyir mthong
201a3(rgyud): ba tsam gyis ni// skad cig de la sdig pa 'jig/ dag pas 'jug pa nyid dang ni// rjes su zlos pa dag 'jug pa// sngags mnyan pa la rtag brtson pa'i// mi rnams grub thob smos ci dgos// bskal pa
201a4(rgyud): bye bar sangs rgyas kun// mchod pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa// sa stengs ras ris 'dri ba yi// sngags pa bsod nams de thob 'gyur// gang+gA yi ni bye ma yi// tshad du grags pa gang yin pa// de yi tshad
201a5(rgyud): gyur sangs rgyas dang // rgyal sras rang rgyal bse ru dang // nyan thos rnams la 'jig rten du// slar yang lan mang mchod ston gsol// 'bras bu thob pa gang yin de'i// sngags pa ras ris bris pa dang /
201a6(rgyud): mthong dang cho ga klog pa dang // rjes su yi rang ba nyid dang // cho ga thams cad rab brtags pa// de yi sngags kyis dngos grub nges// ji srid 'jig rten pa yi sngags// gang zhig rgyal ba skyes mchog
201a7(rgyud): dang // de slob pase ru lha rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che// gsungs pa'i sngags rnams thams cad ni// ras ris 'di yi spyan sngar 'grub// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod pal po
201b1(rgyud): che theg pa chen po'i mdo sde las/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pagyen du brjes pa'i cho ga rab 'byam gyi bris sku dang ba rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das pagaca/
201b2(rgyud): thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang khyod kyi ras
201b3(rgyud): ris kyi cho ga bar ma yod de/ de ngas bshad par bya yis/ de legs par nyon la legs par yid la gyis shig bshad par bya'o// dang po re zhig sngar bstan pa'i dog pa dang / sngar brjod pa nyid kyi tshe
201b4(rgyud): ga dang / sngar yongs su brtags pa'i bzo bo dang / sngar gyi tshang bar ma nyid kyi ras shin tu dag pa/ 'jam pa/ shin tu sbyangs pa/ kha tshar dang bcas pa/ tshon ma 'dres pa/ sgra dang 'dres pa dang bral
201b5(rgyud): bal sogs pa rnams kyis tshang dang gzugs ma gtogs pa/ dang po ji lta ba de bzhin nyid kyis ras ris phyi ma 'drir gzhug par bya'o// dang po re zhig gnas gtsang ma'i gnas kun nas mdzes pa'i rnam
201b6(rgyud): ba rin po che shel gyi rang bzhin lta bu/ mu tig dkar po'i do shal gyis brgyan pa/ de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ rin po che seng ge'i khri la nye bar bzhugs pa/
201b7(rgyud): chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'o// g.yas kyi gzhogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug pad+ma'i ga sar du snang ba 'am/ gur kum mam/ nyi ma'i
202a1(rgyud): kha dog can/ phrag pa g.yon pa'i phyogs su pad+ma bsnams pa/ thal mo sbyar ba byas te bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la nges par rtog bzhin pa/ bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa/ bya
202a2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po bde legs dbus ma'i cod pan can/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po can/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga dang mgo bdud pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon gyi gzhogs
202a3(rgyud): su phyag na rdo rje bri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs sngar ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du mngon par za'o// 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das la rnga yab g.yob par byed bzhin pa'o// de'i gzhogs su 'phags pa byams pa
202a4(rgyud): dang / kun tu bzang po dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / blo gros chen po dang / zhi ba'i blo gros dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ste/ 'di rnams rim gyis mngon par bri
202a5(rgyud): bar bya ste/ dang po ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// de rnams kyi steng du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgyad 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ bzhugs pa phyag/
202a6(rgyud): g.yas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ chos gos ser po'i bla gos mnabs pa'i sku can/ phyag g.yon pas chos gos kyi rna ba 'dzin pa/ cung zad dmar bar snang ba'i ngur smrig gi sham thabs can
202a7(rgyud): kun nas snang ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa 'di la ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rab tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po dang / rin chen gtsug tor can dang / thams cad slob dang
202b1(rgyud): log par dang sel dang / gser thub dang / 'od srungs dang / spyan babang zhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di rnams 'drir gzhug par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi galas kyi gzhogs su/
202b2(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang nye bar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dzir gzhug par bya'o// nyan thos cher ba brgyad dang / rang sangs rgyas brgyad sngar ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du
202b3(rgyud): 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ 'on kyang 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la rnga yab g.yob par byed bzhin du 'khor ba'i lus su mngon par bri bar bya'o//
202b4(rgyud): de bzhin du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu mngon par bri bar bya'o// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / rab 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / dag pa dang / dri ma med
202b5(rgyud): ba dang / shin tu mthong dang / 'od gsal dang / tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po dang / 'og min te/ de lta bu la sogs pa'i lha'i bu gzugs na spyod pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams
202b6(rgyud): rim gyis mngon par bri bar bya'o// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang nye bar gnas pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nye bar spras pa dgod de/ rang gi gzugs dang cha byad 'chang ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o//
202b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu rgya mtsho chen po las mngon par 'phags pa'i kun nas rin po che'i ri bo ji srid du ras kyi mtha' mar 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ ras kyi mtha'i grwa'i phyogs gcig tu
203a1(rgyud): sgrub pa po cha byad dang dbyibs ji lta ba'i rnam pa pus mo dang mgo bo btung ba/ lag pa spos por thogs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// rin po che'i ri bo da la 'phags pa sman ras gzigs
203a2(rgyud): dbang phyug gi 'og tu khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa sngar ji ltar nges par bstan pa de bzhin du mngon par bri'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon gyi gzhogs kyi seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
203a3(rgyud): phyug gi zhabs kyi drung dang nye ba der rin po che'i ri la bzhugs pa'i lha mo sgrol ma mngon par bri ste/ sngar ji ltar nges par bstan pa de bzhin du 'drir gzhug par bya'o// ras de'i khor yug tu'ang me tog sil ma
203a4(rgyud): mngon par gtor te/ tsam pa ka dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang / pad+ma dang / so'u gan+d+hi ka dang / mA lA tI dang / biR+Sha ka dang / d+hA nusmA rI kA dang / bun+da ga dang / na ga ge sar la sogs pa'i me tog
203a5(rgyud): rnams kyis kho ra khor yug tu gcal du dgram par bya'o// ras kyi steng ras kyi mtha' grwa gnyis su lha'i bu gnyis me tog gi tshogs 'thor bar byed bzhin pa/ gzugs rnam par bkra ba/ bar snang la
203a6(rgyud): gnas pa'i char sprin gyi nang na lding ba/ kha dog dkar por mngon par bri bar bya'o// 'di ni ras ris 'bring por brjod// rtag tu dge legs don 'byung ba// sa steng skye bo mi rnams la// dngos grub
203a7(rgyud): 'bring po sbyin par byed// 'khor bar kun tu 'khor ba na// sdig pa cung zad sngon byas gang // 'dir ni bris sku mthong ba yis// de yis skad cig nyid la 'jig/ sems can rmongs pa mi shes pa// de rnam
203b1(rgyud): 'gro ba lnga por 'khyams// gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' yi// bris sru bar ma mthong ba yang // sdig pa byed par 'gyur ba dang // mtsham sa lnga po byed pa dang // tshul 'tshal gyis kyang 'grub par 'gyur/
203b2(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs sngags gsungs pa'ang // shin tu myur bar dngos grub ni// bzlas pa byas pas thob par 'gyur// nad can rnams ni nang las grol// bkren pas nor ni rnyed par 'gyur// bud med
203b3(rgyud): rnams ni bu thob 'gyur// bris sku bar ba blta ba na// mthong ba tsam gyis de yi tshe// bsod nams rgyas pa chen po thob// nges par lha dang mi rnams kyi// bde ba'i skal ba can 'gyur mi// de yi skye ba gzhan/
203b4(rgyud): la yang // nges par sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur// bri ba dang ni klog pa dang // lha mchod pa dang 'drir 'jug dang // de bzhin mthong dang reg nyid kyang // sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur// 'di ltar 'ong
203b5(rgyud): chen bris sku la// don du gnyer dang gsol 'debs pa// rjes su yi rang ba las kyang // skye ba 'bras bcas myur du thob// bskal mchog bye ba rnams kyis kyang // skye bos bsod nams gang thob pa/
203b6(rgyud): tshig tu brjod par mi nus so// bris sku mthong ba 'bras bur bcas// zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod pal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde las/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol
203b7(rgyud): ma ral pa gyen du brdzes pa'i rtsa ba'i cho ga rab 'byam las le'u gsum pa yongs su rdzogs so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ slar yang sems dpa' chen po de la
204a1(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po khyod kyi ras ris kyi cho ga chung ngu zhes bya ba gzhan gsum pa'ang yod de/ gang 'bad pa med par dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba ste/ sngar bstan pa/
204a2(rgyud): nyid kyi cho ga dang / bzo bos bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad tsam thad kar dang / de bzhin kho nar kun nas gru bzhi pa la sngar bzhin du ras ris sngar bstan pa'i tshon rtsi rnams kyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o//
204a3(rgyud): dang po re zhig byang chub sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i gdan la skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ byis pa khye'u sngar bzhin du chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa/ kun nas 'od zer 'phro bar byed bzhin pa/ mdzes pa'i
204a4(rgyud): gzugs can 'drir gzhug par bya'o// g.yon gyi gzhogs su 'phags pa kun tu bzang po rin po che'i rdole ba la gnas pa/ phyag mja yab thogs pa/ g.yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu thogs pa/ kha dog bri
204a5(rgyud): yang ku ltar sngo bsangs so// g.yas kyi gzhogs su'ang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rin po che'i rdo leb la gnas pa/ phyag na rnga yab thogs shing / phyag g.yon pas pad+ma bsnams pa/ kun
204a6(rgyud): nas 'od dang ldan pa'i lus can/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snga ma bzhin du mngon par bri bar bya'o// seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu gser gyi ri bo ji srid ras kyi mtha'i bar du 'drir gzhug par bya'o//
204a7(rgyud): ras ris kyi mtha'i zur du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi seng ge'i khri'i 'og las g.yas kyi gzhogs su khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa snga ma bzhin du 'drir gzhug par bya'o// de'i 'og tu
204b1(rgyud): sgrub pa po lag na spos por thogs pa snga ma bzhin du 'drar gzhug par bya'o// de thams cad snga ma ji sa ba de bzhin du'o// de nas 'phags pa spar ras gzigs dbang phyug gi steng dung ba'i na gshegs pa 'di bag/
204b2(rgyud): maung 'drar gzhug par bya ste/ rin po cha ro'i phug sor bcu drug pa'i tshang na bzhugs pa/ khang ba brtsegs pa 'dra bar ba'i bya sgribs mtho ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o// ras ris de'i khor sug tu po'i rnam pas
204b3(rgyud): yongs su bskor ba mngon par bri'o// ras ris de'i steng gi zur du gnas pa'i ri bo'i bya skyibs dang kum tu 'brel bar lding bzhin pa lta bu/ me tog sna tshogs 'thor bar byed bzhin pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris
204b4(rgyud): kyi lha'i bu dag pa dang rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba gnyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o// ras de la me tog sna tshogs kyis gcal du bkram pa mngon par 'drir gzhug par bya'o// ras ris rnam gsum mtshan nyid ni// tham
204b5(rgyud): cad 'dir ni bstan pa las// 'di ni chung ngu zhes bya ste// ras ris phran tshegs las la shis// sdig las shin tu mi bzad pa// bskal pa bye ba stong phrag tu// gang zhig byas sam byed 'gyur ba// ras ris/
204b6(rgyud): mthong bas grol 'gyur te// ras ris mthong ba tsam nyid kyis// skad cig nyid las grol bar 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba stong phrag tu// blo ldan sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur byas// ras ris tha ma mthong ba
204b7(rgyud): yi bcu drug char yang mi bong ngo // sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad la// mchod byas bsod nams gang yin de// ras ris chung ngu mthong ba la// mkhas pas de yi bsod nams thob// mdzes pa
205a1(rgyud): yi ni las rnams dang // longs spyod rgyud kyang 'di spyad do// rig dang gsang sngags ji snyed pa// tshangs dbang drang srong gis bshad dang // nam mkha' lding gis gang bshad dang /
205a2(rgyud): chu lha nyi ma lus ngan dang / nor sbyin sogs dang srin po dang // lha min dbang po thams cad dang // lto 'phye che dang zla ba dang // rlung dang gshin rje la sogs dang // seng ge 'phrog byed sogs bshad pa'i//
205a3(rgyud): sngags rnams thams cad 'dir drangs te// ras ris spyan sngar 'grub par 'gyur// zhi ba can dang de bzhin du// rgyas pa can rnams bya ba ste// de bzhin 'dir ni mi bzad pa// rgyal mchog gis spang
205a4(rgyud): spang bar bya// zhes byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod pal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde las/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i cho ga bzhi pa ras ris kyi cho ga rab 'byam
205a5(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs so// / de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan
205a6(rgyud): gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
205a7(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gsungs pa ni legs so legs so// rig pa'i brtul zhugs thams cad dpyad pa'i don dang / phan pa'i phyir dang / bde ba'i phyir dang / 'jig rten la snying
205b1(rgyud): brtse bas byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro bar byed pa'i chos lhag ma dang bcas pa/ nges par byang chub la rgyun du mchog tu gzhol ba/ byang chub
205b2(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams kyi rig pa dang sngags kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa/ bdag gi rig pa gsang chen 'ang cing skye bo thams cad rgyas par byed par 'gyur ba/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus 'jig rten gyi tha
205b3(rgyud): ma mya ngan las 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i rigs nub pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad kyis spangs shing thams
205b4(rgyud): cad bor te mun par gyur pa dang / snod kyi 'jig rten rnam par zhig ste/ 'phags pa'i lam dang / rig pa dang / sngags dang / sman dang / nor bu rin po che thams cad dang bral ba/ skye bo legs pas
205b5(rgyud): yongs su gzung ba'i snang ba med pa'i sems can gyi khams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ le lo can dang / dran pa nyams pa dang / ma dad pa dang / mi srung ba dang / mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su
205b6(rgyud): zin pa/ sgyu dang / g.yo dang / rdzun dang / g.yo ba'i spyod pa dang ldan pa de rnams/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas kun tu skrag par 'gyur te/ le lo dang snyoms las la mngon par dga' zhing dad pa med par
205b7(rgyud): 'gyur te/ 'dod pa tshol zhing gsang sngags tshol bar mi 'gyur te/ log par lta ba la dga' ba rnams kyang bsod nams ma yin pa mang po la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur te/ dam pa'i chos spong bar byed pa
206a1(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mnar med pa la mchog tu gzhol zhing drag po'i yang drag por 'gro ba sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa de rnams kyi don gyi phyir dang / dbang du pa gyur pa rnam/
206a2(rgyud): dbang du gyur par bya ba dang / dbang du gyur pa rnams la mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pas bsdu ba'i sbyor ba rig pa dang / ras ris kyi cho ga da lta gsungs pa'i dus la bab par dgongs
206a3(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das gsung du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das mchog tu gsang ba/ rig pa'i brtul bzhugs kyi cho ga sgrub pa/ ras ris kyi cho ga rab 'byam mchog tu gsang ba
206a4(rgyud): 'dod pa'i don byed pa/ don chen po rnam par 'byor pa rig pa bdun cu po thams cad kyi mchog gi snying po/ rnam par rtog pa med pa'i dus der 'grub par 'gyur ro// de'ang sems can rnams 'dul ba'i don gyi
206a5(rgyud): thabs la mkhas pas 'khor bar kun tu 'jug pa rnams skyob pa/ nges par byang chub la mchog tu gzhol bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa drug gis gsungs par gyur pa/ 'di la rig pa
206a6(rgyud): ni na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tA ren+d+ra tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma
206a7(rgyud): Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tA re tu ri tu re swA hA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma bzhin bzang ma zhes bya ba'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/
206b1(rgyud): ma hA satwA ya / tA re tut+tA ra tu re swA hA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma dbus legs ma zhes bya ba'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tA re tut+tA \u0f7f/
206b2(rgyud): re swA hA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma legs spyod ma zhes bya ba'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma mtshan legs ma
206b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tA re tA re tu re tu re swA hA/ 'phags me sgrol ma lho chung ma zhes bya ba'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma ar+yA
206b4(rgyud): ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tA re tut+tA re/ tu re tu re swA hA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma legs gan sa ma zhes bya ba'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/
206b5(rgyud): ma hA satwA ya/ tA re tut+tA re/ tu rai tu re swA hA/ 'phags ma sgrol mnye bar 'dud pa zhes bya ba'o// zhes pa 'di rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rig pa chen po mchog gi snying po chen po dang mtshungs pa/ bya ba
206b6(rgyud): thams cad mchog tu grub pa/ sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas bzhin du skyes pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang ba/ 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las skyob pa/ las thams cad byed pa/
206b7(rgyud): byang chub kyi lam ston pa po/ pad+ma'i rigs kyi rig pa rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma la yang dag par rab tu sbyor ba/ shin tu mdzes pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa rab tu sbyin pa dang / bstan pa nub
207a1(rgyud): pa'i dus kyi tshe'ang 'grub par 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos kyi tshul srung ba'i ched du mnyam par 'jug cing 'grub par 'gyur ro// de rnams sbyor ba chung ngu nyid kyis rgyal srid chen po
207a2(rgyud): dang / longs spyod chen po'i dbang phyug gis don de rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// de rnams shin tu myur bar de'i tshe de'i dus su dngos grub thob par 'gyur te/ nyams sad pa'i rgyur yang mchog gi snying po 'di
207a3(rgyud): ngag bsgrub par bya ste/ mdor na ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// ras ris kyi cho ga mdor bsdus par gyur pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jigs pa chen po dang / snyigs ma
207a4(rgyud): lnga'i sems can bsod nams chung bar 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dbang chung bar grags pa/ tshe thung ba/ longs spyod chung ba/ brtson 'grus gzhan pas ras ris kyi cho ga shin tu rgyas pa'i las bsgrub
207a5(rgyud): par bya ba la sogs pa'i las rnams rab tu rtson par mi nus te/ de rnams kyi don du ches mdor bsdus te gsungs pa ni/ dang por re zhig dpa' bo'i rin gyis dog pa nyos/ srang tshad tsam mam srang phyed tsam
207a6(rgyud): dkyus su khru gang tsam la zheng du khru phyed tsam pa'i ras kha tshang ba'i ras kha tshar dang bcas pa tha ga pas btag par bya'o// yang na slar yang skra dang bral ba'i ras kyi dum bu gsar pa steng 'og tu ji ltar 'dod pa khru
207a7(rgyud): gnyis sam/ bzhi 'am/ drug gam/ lnga 'am/ bcu 'am/ brgyad pa'i ras shin tu dka' ba blangs te/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du ri mo mkhan gyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o// tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / gur
207b1(rgyud): kum gyis bsgos pa'i ma 'dres pa'i tshon rtsi de rnams dang / ras tsan ngan dang / gur kum dang / ga bur rnams gcig tu byas pas srog chags med pa'i chu rtog ma med pa dang bsres te/ sdong gsar bar ras
207b2(rgyud): slang du bcug nas nyi ma gsum du legs par mnan pas mnan la gzhag go// gtsang ba'i phyogs su bsrung ba byas te bdag nyid kyang gtsang mar byas nas/ dkar po'i phyogs kyi lal ras kyi sdongad kyi mdung du
207b3(rgyud): kha shar du phyogs pas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ sngags kyi tshig 'di lan stong phrag brgyad brjod par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ oM he he b+ha ga bAn/ ba hu rU pa d+ha ra di byi tsak+Shu Sha/ a ba lo ka ya/ a ba lo ka ya
207b4(rgyud): mAM sa ma la ma nu swar/ ku mA ra dA pa d+hA riN/ ma hA bo d+hi satwe/ kits+tshi rA ya si hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ sngags 'di bzlas pa byas la de nyid du nyal bar bya'o// rmi lam du grub pa'am mi 'grub pa ston par 'gyur ro//
207b5(rgyud): nas langs nas grub pa'i mtshan ma'i rmi lam mthong na/ ring po mi thogs par ras ris bri bar bya'o// gal te grub pa'i mtshan ma'i rmi lam ma mthong na ras de snod de nas phyung ste nyi ma la bskam par bya'o// bskams
207b6(rgyud): nas slar yang snod gsar pa gzhan zhig tu legs par sras la bsrung ba byas te gzhag par bya'o// de nas slar yang mchog gi snying po de rnams las sngags gang yang rung ba gcig bzung nas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin
207b7(rgyud): du yi ge drug po rnams las slar yang yi ge 'bum bzlas par bya'o// de nas ches myur bar ras ris 'grub par 'gyur ro// dang po re zhig ras de blangs nas/ cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed ngam/ gzhan yang dkar po'i/
208a1(rgyud): nyi ma dang / rgyu skar dge ba dang yang dag par ldan pa/ dge ba'i tshe dkar po'i gza'i ris kyi nyi ma la shin tu mdzes pa'i dge mtshan dang / bkra shis phun sum tshogs pa'i mtshan monam byed kyi dus/
208a2(rgyud): kyi tshe/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pas ras ris de 'drir gzhugs par bya'o// gtsang ba'i phyogs su ga pur gyi bdug pa bsregs te/ dang po re zhig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku rgyan thams
208a3(rgyud): cad kyi brgyan pa byas te/ dbu zur bud can skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan pa/ gser gyi mdog can/ dar la sngon po g.yo bzhin pa'i sham thabs can/ ngar la sngon po'i bla gos mnabs pa/
208a4(rgyud): seng ge'i khri la skyil krung phyed bas bzhugs te chos 'chad bzhin pa/ zhabs g.yas pa rin po che'i zhabs rten la bzhag pa/ seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ blta
208a5(rgyud): na sdug pa/ bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa/ sgrub pa po la gzigs par gyur pa bri bar bya'o// g.yas kyi gzhogs su 'phags pa kun tu bzang po pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs/ rnga yab dkar po g.yo ba bzhin pa/
208a6(rgyud): phyag g.yon na yid bzhin gyi bu bsnams pa/ lus thams cad mdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dar la sngon po g.yo ba dang bcas pa'i sham thabs mnabs pa/ mu tig gi do shal gyi mchod phyir
208a7(rgyud): thogs pa can/ phyag g.yon pas pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pas rnga yab dkar po gser gyi yu ba can bsnams nas g.yob par byed bzhin pa/ zhi ba'i rnam pa can/ spyan ras gzigs dbang
208b1(rgyud): byug la lta bar gyur pa'o// de bzhin du 'phags pa kun tu bzang po pad+ma dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs pa ste/ de dag gnyis ka'ang de ltar mngon par bri'o// pad+ma'i sdong bu gcig las 'thon pa'i pad+ma gsum gyi bu/
208b2(rgyud): ma rtsa ba'i pad+ma ze 'brul byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i seng ge'i khri dang rin po che'i zhabs rten no// pad+ma gzhan la ni 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'o// pad+ma gsum pa la ni 'phags pa mthu chen thob bo//
208b3(rgyud): pad+ma'i sdong bu de ni mdzes pa/ rin po che mar gad kyi rnam pa la pad+ma'i me tog du mkha ma bye ba dang / phyed tsam kha bye ba dang / me tog kha bye ba dang ldan pa/ mtsho chen po ma dros pa las byung ba'i klu'i rgyal po dga' ba
208b4(rgyud): dang nye dga' gnyis mtsho chen po las skyes pa'i pad+ma'i sdong bu la 'dzin pa/ klu'i rgyal po de gnyis kha dog dkar ba/ gdengs ka bdun gyis brgyan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis mdzes pa/ lus phyed mi'i
208b5(rgyud): lus la sbrul gyi gdengs kas mtshan pa/ phyed sbrul gyi lus 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la nges par rtog bzhin pa/ phyeng chu'i nang du nub pa/ nor bu rin po che dang gos kyis nye bar mdzes
208b6(rgyud): pa bri bar bya'o// mtsho chen po de'i khor yug gi 'og tu ras ris kyi mtha'i grwa g.yas kyi gzhogs su bsgrub pa po/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi dkyil 'khor la nges par rtog
208b7(rgyud): bzhin pa/ lag na spos por thogs pa/ lus dang pus mo'i lha nga 'dud pa/ cha byad dang kha dog ji lta ba de bzhin du mngon par bri'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi steng du ras ris kyi mtha
209a1(rgyud): gnyis su lha'i bu 'phreng ba 'dzin pa gnyis me tog gi 'phreng ba bzung nas nam mkha' la lding ba/ me tog gi tshogs chen po 'thor bar byed bzhin pa/ shin tu mdzes pa dag
209a2(rgyud): mngon par bri'o// ras ris de'i 'khor yug tu nag ge sa ra la sogs pa'i me tog rab tu bkram pa bri bar bya ste/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs gsum lhag par gnas pa 'am/ mngon par bri'o//
209a3(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa dang / 'phags pa kun tu bzang po dang / 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje phyag na rnga yab thogs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// sgrub pa
209a4(rgyud): po ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs gsum po rnams gdon mi za bar 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i rnam pa dang / dbyibs ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du 'am/ sgrub pa po ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa de
209a5(rgyud): lha de ltar bri bar bya'o// dbus su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ mtha' gnyis su'ang phyag na rdo rje dang / kun tu bzang po ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gdon mi za bar 'drir
209a6(rgyud): gzhug par bya'o// ji ltar rnyed pa'i ras kyi dum bu mtho gang ngam/ khru gang tsam la bdag nyid dam/ gzhan gyis sam/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can nam/ gso sbyong med pa'am/ dad pa med pa 'am/
209a7(rgyud): dad pa can namagatsang ma'am/ mi gtsang ba 'am/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'am/ tshul khrims 'chal pa'ang rung ste/ ri mo mkhan gyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o// sgrub pa po bdag nyid ni gdon
209b1(rgyud): ming bar sngon spang ba byas pa/ ngang pas byang chub tu sems bsgreng ba gdon mi za bar 'gyur bas bya ste/ de ltar na sngags 'grub par 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du sdig pa byed pas rnams kyang ma yin no// de ltar dang /
209b2(rgyud): bar gyur pa yis// sngags kyi lha rnams bsgrub bya zhing // dad pa de yis gsang sngags rgyal// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni gzhan du min// gang phyir dad pa theg pa'i mchog/ gang gis 'dren pa 'gro
209b3(rgyud): bar byed// dad pa med pa'i mi rnams la// dkar po'i chos rnams mi skye ste// sa bon me yis tshig pa la// myu gu sngon po ji bzhin no// dad dang ldan pa'i mi rnams la// sangs rgyas las rnams
209b4(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// lha rnams kun dang khyad par du// gsang sngags rnams ni thams cad ni// dad pa med na mi 'grub po// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang // gang yang 'jig rten 'das de
209b5(rgyud): bzhin// dad dang ldan par brjod pa dang // rnyog pa bral bas 'grub par 'gyur// yid ni byang chub der son pas// de rnams byang chub nges par 'grub// gzhan gyis grub par ma gsungs te/
209b6(rgyud): bstan pa 'di las zlog pa yin// ras ris chung dang chen po dang // bar ma yongs su bsgrags pa yin// las rnams thams cad sgrub byed pa// de ni rab tu bshad par bya// byang chub sems
209b7(rgyud): dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde las/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi cho ga las/ ras ris kyi cho ga rab 'byam lnga pa rdzogs so//
210a1(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis
210a2(rgyud): sems can de rnams kyi don gyi phyir bstan pa gang yin pa de rnams ras ris kyi cho ga rab 'byam bshad pa 'di thabs nyung ngu nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur te/ de rnams kyi don gyi phyir sgrub par byed pa'i thabs
210a3(rgyud): yon tan rgyas pa rab tu dbye bas rnam par phye ba las rnam par dbye ba de yang dag par 'thun par bshad par bya yi/ de legs par nyon la legs par yid la gyis shig/ sems can thams cad kyi don
210a4(rgyud): gyi phyir bshad par bya'o// de nas yang byang chub sems dpas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis 'byor pa bsten par mdzad cing sngags kyi spyod pa'i
210a5(rgyud): yon tan sgrub pa'i mthu gsal bar mdzad pa legs par gsungs pa ni legs so// bcom ldan 'das gang da lta de'i dus la bab par dgongs nas bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bka' stsal/
210a6(rgyud): du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas
210a7(rgyud): 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel gyi kha dog la sogs pa byung bar gyur to// 'od zer de byung ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor snang
210b1(rgyud): bar byas nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud kyi gnas thams cad spa bkong bar mdzad nas/ rgyu skar gyi 'od dang / ri'i lha'i tshogs kyi 'od dang / gang du zla ba dang nyi ma 'di ltar/
210b2(rgyud): mthu ma ning rdzu 'phrul che ba de dag gi 'od kyang spa bkong bar mdzad nas/ de rnams mi gsal zhing 'od med par gyur te rnam par snang bar mi 'gyur zhing spa bkong bar mdzad de/ nor bu dang / sngags dang / sman
210b3(rgyud): dang / rin po che'i 'od thams cad 'od med par byas nas/ slar yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa le nal gyi sgor nub par gyur to// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag mardo
210b4(rgyud): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid na 'dus shing 'khod par gyur pa de stan las langs nas/ rings pa'i tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis po la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
210b5(rgyud): gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol
210b6(rgyud): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ji skad smras pa de
210b7(rgyud): bzhin du rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad kyi/ rgyu yod/ rkyen yod do// gang zhig mdo sde'i dbang po bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i cho ga rig pa'i spyod pa rjes su sgrub pa las
211a1(rgyud): sgrub par byed pa'i thabs la yang dag par gzhol ba/ chos kyi sprin la brten cing yang dag par rjes su 'jug cing rjes su 'brang bar byed par 'gyur ba dang / 'dzin par 'gyur ba
211a2(rgyud): dang / klog par 'gyur ba dang / dad par 'gyur ba dang / glegs bam du bri bar byas nas mchod par 'gyur ba dang / tsan dan dang / bye ma dang / byug pa dang / bdug pa dang / 'phreng ba dang / gdug
211a3(rgyud): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'am/ sil snyan gyi rnam pa'i khyad par ram/ rol mo sna tshogs dang / pheg rdob pa dang / tha na rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgyun du thob pa 'am
211a4(rgyud): spu zing zhes byed pa skye bar byed par 'gyur ba 'am/ rig pa'i mthu dang nus pa thos nas dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba 'am/ rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ spyod pas sor sgrub par 'gyur ba de rnams ngas than
211a5(rgyud): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ de rnams thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su byed par 'gyur ro// de nyid kyi phyir rgyal ba 'dzum pa mdzad kyi/ rnam pa gzhan du ma yin no//
211a6(rgyud): dang po re zhig dam tshig mthong ba/ sngon spyad pa rnams byas pa/ mngon par dbang bskur ba thob pas rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di la rtsa ba'i rig pa 'am/ snying po 'am/ nye ba'i snying po 'am/ gzhan gang yang rung
211a7(rgyud): ba'i sngags bzung nas yi ge gcig pa 'am/ ji ltar 'dod pa gzhan yang rung ste/ dgon pa chen por song nas lo bdun du bzlas pa bya ste/ 'bras bu dang / chu'i bza' ba dang / rtsa ba dang / 'dab ma bza'
211b1(rgyud): zhing / sngon spyod ba rnams byas par 'gyur ro// de nas ra'i rtse mor 'dzegs te ras ris kyi thu bo zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhag nas/ bdag nyid shar du mngon par phyogs te/ ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'jug nas/
211b2(rgyud): pad+ma dkar po dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / gur kum gyis mngon par btags te/ 'bum phrag gcig bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
211b3(rgyud): rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyi ras ris kyi 'og nas dbul bar bya'o// ga pur gyi bdug pa'ang ji ltar 'byor pa bsreg go// lha'i bu rnams la ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog gi mchod pa
211b4(rgyud): bya'o// de nas cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi dkar po'i nya 'am/ nya so so la mtshan mo phyed kyi dus kyi tshe ras ris kyi spyan sngar me thab pad+ma'i rnam pa lta bu byas nas/ tsan dan dkar po'i shing gis me sbar te/ gur
211b5(rgyud): kum dang ga pur gcig tu byas nas sreg blugs ji ltar 'byor pas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas te/ de nas bsrung ba bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa las 'od zer phyung ste/ ras ris kyi
211b6(rgyud): khor yug tu gcig tu 'bar bar gyur pa 'byung ngo // de nas sgrub pa pos tsan ngan dang gur kum gyis btags pa'i pad+ma dkar po'i me tog gis mchod yon dbul lo// de nas sgrub pa pos rings pa'i tshul
211b7(rgyud): gyis ras ris la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams la phyag 'tshal nas sngar sgrub
212a1(rgyud): pa pos bris pa'i ras kyi mtha'i phyogs nas 'jigs pa med pas ras ris gzung bar bya'o// de nas bzung ba tsam gyis 'phur bar 'gyur te/ se gol gtogs pa tsam la tshangs
212a2(rgyud): pa'i 'jig rten las 'das te/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su kun tu gnas par 'gyur ro// gang du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i dbang po'i rgyal
212a3(rgyud): po de bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston par byed pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang mngon sum du mthong ste/ chos nyan par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' stong
212a4(rgyud): phrag du ma dag kyang mthong ste/ de rnams la bsnyen bkur byed do// bskal pa chen po stong du rga ba med pa dang 'chi ba med par rol par 'gyur ro// bris sku gnas pa de nyid du sangs rgyas dang byang chub
212a5(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyang shes so// zhing stong phrag kyang 'da' bar byed do// lus stong phrag ston par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi
212a6(rgyud): mthu du ma yang dag par 'byin par byed par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro// nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
212a7(rgyud): dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i sde snod/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brjes kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga bris sku rab 'byam las/ mchog gi sgrub pa'i thabs
212b1(rgyud): kyi cho ga las kyi 'bras bu drug pa rdzogs so// / de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'dug pa'i lha tshogs rnams la bka'/
212b2(rgyud): stsal pa/ grogs po dag khyed cag nyon cig/ las chen po dang bcas pa'i rig pa 'phags ma sgrol ma'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor sgrub par byed pa'i las kyi cho ga sgrub pa po srung ba'i don du gsang ba
212b3(rgyud): dam pa mchog gi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo gang gis bzlas pas sngags thams cad bzlas par 'gyur ro// kye kye lha'i tshogs rnams
212b4(rgyud): 'di ni 'da' bar byed pa ma yin pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu'i dbang phyug kyang rig pa 'dis 'gugs shing dbang du byed la/ yang dag par 'dod par gyur par byed na//
212b5(rgyud): de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos// sngags thams cad dang bgegs thams cad 'joms par byed pa ste/
212b6(rgyud): 'di ni brtson 'grus che ba dang / mthu che ba dang / gcig tu dpa' ba/ rig pa thams cad gcig kho nar sngags thams cad kyi mchog tu bshad pa dang / gcig kho na rig pa'i rgyal po 'jigs pa chen po/
212b7(rgyud): rnams las mchog tu bshad pa ste/ de gang zhe na/ las chen po thams cad byed pa/ don thams cad sgrub pa/ bya ba thams cad byed pa/ sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa/ gdug pa'i las
213a1(rgyud): rnams dang sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa/ sngags thams cad so sor rdzogs par byed pa/ dge bar byed pa/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rig
213a2(rgyud): pa dang sngags thams cad kyi gong nas gong du rab tu 'jug pa/ thogs pa med pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po yang dag par gyur pa/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
213a3(rgyud): byed pa de gang zhe na/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tA re tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ grogs po dag 'di ni mchog tu
213a4(rgyud): gsang ba dam pa/ las chen po thams cad byed pa/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo sems can thams cad kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa/ sangs rgyas thams
213a5(rgyud): cad kyis bkra shis pa/ rig pa dang sngags thams cad kyis bsgrubs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi mnga' bdag/ rig pa'i dbang phyug thams cad kyi dbang phyug/ rnam par sdang ba thams cad la
213a6(rgyud): byams pa'i bdag nyid/ skye bo rnams la snying brtse ba dang / bge gas thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa ste/ mdor ma ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar rab tu byed do// ma bsgrubs par yang
213a7(rgyud): las rnams byed do// rig pa bzlas nas gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// gos la mngon par bsngags nas gyon masal ba bzang por 'gyur ro// so shing la mngon par bsngags te bris na so nang
213b1(rgyud): sel bar 'gyur ro// ka ra wI ra dkar po la lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas zos na ngon du ma gnyer bar yang kha zas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mig gi nad la rgya mtshwa phye mar byas pa la lan bdun mngon par
213b2(rgyud): bsngags nas mig bkang na mig nad sel bar byed do// rna ba'i nad la glang po che'i rgyab nas thon pa 'brug sgrogs pa na 'byung ba'i tsha d+h+ri ka/ ka bupu ka'i lo mar gtums te me chung ngus btso bar bya'o// chos
213b3(rgyud): nanas phyir btso ba byas la chu dro 'jam la rgyam tshwa dang sbyar ba byas nas/ lan bdun mngon par bsngags te des rna ba dgang bar byas te skad cig de nyid la nye bar zhi bar byed do// bud med bu 'byung ba'i dus su mngal
213b4(rgyud): 'gags nas gzer bas zil gyis non par gyur na/ A Ta rlung Sha ka'i rtsa ba srog chags med pa'i chu la btags nas lte ba'i phyogs su byugs na bde blag tu btsa' bar 'gyur ro// skyes bu zug rngus nyams
213b5(rgyud): pa 'am mtshon nang du lus pa la mar snying pa la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags nas blud par bya ba 'am/ de'i phyogs su byugs na de'i skad cig nyid la zug rngu med par 'gyur ro// ma zhu ba dang / gsung pa
213b6(rgyud): dang / tshad pa'i nad la kha ru tshwa dang / rgya ma tshwa dang / tshwa gzhan gang yang rung ba la mngon par bsngags nas zos na na da de las grol bar 'gyur te/ nyi ma de nyid la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro// ldan pa'i
213b7(rgyud): nad kyi tshad pa 'am/ 'phral gyi tshang pa la'ang rung ste/ ma tu lung ga'i rtsa ba btags nas srog chags med pa'i chu 'thung du gzhug ste gnod pa med par de las grol bar 'gyur te/ lan bdun bzlas pas
214a1(rgyud): sam/ gnyis bzlas pas so// bud med mo ga sham mi skye ba'i chos rnams skye bar 'dod na a sho ga nA'i rtsa ba ba'i mar dang lhan cig bskol te/ ba'i 'o mas bsres te lan nyi shu
214a2(rgyud): rtsa lnga yongs su bzlas te/ zla mtshan gyi dus su 'thung ngu bcug nas khrus byas pa'i mthar/ skyes pa gzhan spang zhing khyim pa'ang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa yongs su spangs na/ rang gi skyes pa 'am rang gi bdag
214a3(rgyud): po'i bu skye bar 'gyur ro// lo gsum mam/ lo lnga rab tu skye ba'i dus las lhag pa 'am/ lo du mar bu ma chags pa 'am/ gzhan gyi sngags dang / sman dang / gzhan gyi phyag rgyas btab pa dang / gzhan gyis/
214a4(rgyud): gdug par byas pa 'am/ mngal 'dzin pa mi 'dzin par byas pa 'am/ nad kun tu langs pa 'am/ sbyor ba gzhan kun tu spangs pa 'am/ nad gzhan gang yang rung ba cung zad kyis yongs su mi 'dzin par byas
214a5(rgyud): pa 'am/ brtan pa dang / g.yo ba dang / bcos ma dang / bcos ma ma yin pa la sogs pa'i dug la sogs pa rab tu zhugs pa 'am/ rtsa ba dang / sngags dang / sman dang / mdza' ba dang / mi mdza'
214a6(rgyud): ba'i sbyor ba byas pa la/ mar snying pa dang rma bya'i gdongs gcig tu byas nas btags la/ sha ka ra dang lhan cig sbyar te lan nyi shu rtsa bdur mngon par bsngags nas a ru ra tsam bza' bar bya ste/ nyin zhag
214a7(rgyud): bdun gyi bar du sha ka ra dang ldan pa'i 'o ma bskol ba btung bar bya zhing yang dang yang du sngags kyang bzlas so// klad pa na ba la bya rog gi gshog pa la lan bdun mngon par bsngags te/ des bya bas na bde bar/
214b1(rgyud): gnas par 'gyur ro// bud med la ches smad pa la sogs pa'i nang rnams la a lam bu sha'i rtsa ba 'o ma dang lhan cig btags nas ni li ka'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa la brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bzlas nas 'o mas skyo
214b2(rgyud): mar sbyar nas btung bar bya'o// de bzhin du rims nyin bzhi pa dang / nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / rgyun pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / rims drag po la sogs pa
214b3(rgyud): rnams la 'o thug mar dang sbyar la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags te 'thung ngu bcug na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon gyis zin pa la bdag nyid kyi gdong la lan brgya rtsa
214b4(rgyud): brgyad mngon par bsngags nas bltas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du ma mo dang / byis pa dang / srul po dang / ro langs dang / grul bum gyi gdon la sogs pa rnams dang / mi thams cad
214b5(rgyud): gdug pa can drag pos mngon par zin pa la bdag nyid kyi lag pa la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags te/ zin pa de'i mgo bo la reg na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro// lan gcig bzlas pas bdag nyid
214b6(rgyud): srung ngo // gnyis bzlas pas grogs po srung ngo // gsum bzlas pas khyim srung ngo // bzhi bzlas pas grong srung ngo // lnga bzlas pas grong gi spyod yul du gyur pa srung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du ji srid stong
214b7(rgyud): brag gi bar du bzlas pas dmag gi tshogs bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro// 'di rnams sam gzhan yang las phra mo rnams ma bsgrubs par yang byed do// de nas sgrub par 'dod na phra mo'i las rnams mi bya
215a1(rgyud): bar mtha' gcig tu song nas rnam par dben pa'i phyogs rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung 'bab pa dang / rgya mtsho'i ngogs dang / gang+gA'i klung gi ngogs dang / gzhan yang chu klung chen po'i
215a2(rgyud): ngogs la brten nas/ phyogs gtsang ma phyag bdar byas nas khrus lan gsum bya zhing / gos lan gsum brjes te smra ba bcad de slong mo'i kha zas za zhing / lo ma dang / nas zan dang / 'o ma dang / 'bras
215a3(rgyud): bu za zhing 'bum phrag bcu gcig bzlas pa bya'o// grub pa'i mtshan ma mthong na/ de nas sgrub pa brtsam par bya ste phyogs de nyid du ras ris thu bo der bzhag la/ ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas gser
215a4(rgyud): dngul gyi rang bzhin nam/ zangs dang sa'i rang bzhin gyi mar me'i snod tu ru ka'i 'bru mar gyis bkang ba 'am/ dri zhim po'i 'bru mar gyis bkang ba 'am/ ba'i mar gyis bkang ba'i mar me'i snod du ras gas
215a5(rgyud): pa dum bu dum bur byas pa'i mar me 'bum phrag gcig ras ris la dbul bar bya'o// de'i kho ra yug tu mar me'i 'phreng ba rnams phul ma thag tu ras ris las 'od zer rnams 'byung ste/ 'od zer rnams
215a6(rgyud): byung ma thag tu ras ris kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bar 'gyur ro// steng gi bar snang la rnga bo che'i sgra sgrogs shing legs so zhes pa'ang thos te/ de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rings pa'i tshul gyis ras ris kyi
215a7(rgyud): mtha'i zur du sgrub pa po sngar bris pa ras ris la brten pa la mchod yon phul nas bskor ba byas te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas la gzung bar bya'o// de nas bzung ba tsam gyis mar me 'dzin pa de
215b1(rgyud): rnams thams cad kyis lhan cig tu 'phur bar 'gyur ro// gcig gis lhag pa'i gzhal med khang brgyar yang 'gro bar byed do// lha'i sil snyan dang so sor yang dag par ldan pa dang / sgra snyan pa'i gru
215b2(rgyud): dbyangs sgrogs shing gar byed pa'i rig pa 'dzin ma de rnams kyis khor yug tu kun tu khyab par snang ba sgrub pa po rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por dbang bskur ba byed do// mar me 'dzin pa de rnams kyis
215b3(rgyud): lhan cig rga ba med cing 'tsho ba med par rol par byed do// bskal pa chen por gnas shing nyi ma 'char ka 'dra ba dang / lha'i rgyan gyis mdzes pa dang / rnam par bkra ba'i gos kyis brgyan pa de rnams dbang
215b4(rgyud): du byas nas mngag gzhug par 'gyur te/ de rnams dang lhan cig rnam par spyod par gyur te/ lha'i rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang 'di'i bran nyid du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po
215b5(rgyud): chen por 'gyur zhing ring du 'tsho zhing grub pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// mchog tu skal ba bzang por 'gyur zhing / rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// rdzas thams cad
215b6(rgyud): kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchod pa byed pa la dga' bar 'gyur ro// skad cig tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du mngon par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// brgya byin gyis
215b7(rgyud): kyang grangs su mi 'gro na/ de las gzhan pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis lta ci smos/ mthar yang 'di sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang dge ba'i
216a1(rgyud): bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro// las sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang yod de/ ches dka' thub byas pa/ de nas mtha' gcig tu song nas lhag par gnas te 'du 'dzimed cing
216a2(rgyud): 'du 'dzi dang bral ba'i dgon pa chen por zhugs nas/ gnas gang na pad+ma'i mtsho chen po dang chu dang bcas pa/ ri bo gcig la brten pa'i ri de'i rtse mor 'dzegs te/ rig pa rnams kyis dri dang me tog la
216a3(rgyud): sogs pa phul nas/ de rnams ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'o ma 'am/ nas zan dang / pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu bza' zhing 'o ma las byung ba zos te rig pa 'bum phrag bcur bzlas par bya'o//
216a4(rgyud): bzlas pa'i mthar yang sngar bstan pa'i cho ga de nyid kyis ras ris kyi thu bo bzhugs nas/ pad+ma'i me tog la tsan dan dkar po dang / gur kum gyis btags te seng ldeng gi shing gis me sbar nas/
216a5(rgyud): sngar yongs su brtags pa'i pad+mas stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug gis sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas sbyin sreg gi mthar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i ras ris las 'od zer 'byung ste/ des sgrub pa po kun
216a6(rgyud): tu snang bar byas nas spyi bor nub par 'gyur ro// reg ma thag tu sgrub pa po mngon par shes pa lngar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems de pa'i sa thob bo// lha'i gzugs kyis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du
216a7(rgyud): rnam par rgyu ste/ bskal pa sum cu rtsa drug tu 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum cu rtsa drug 'da' bar byed do// de rnams kyi mthu'ang yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // sangs rgyas sum
216b1(rgyud): cu rtsa drug mnyes par byed do// de rnams kyang mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bas mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro// mthar yang byang chub la mchog tu gzhol bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen
216b2(rgyud): po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ro// ji srid du byang chub tu mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po
216b3(rgyud): shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen du brdzes pa'i rtsa ba'i cho ga las/ las mchog sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga bdun pa'i le'u rab 'byam yongs su rdzogs so//
216b4(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas slar yang sgrub pa'i las mchog gsungs te/ rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di la rtsa ba'i rig pa'i sngags yongs su bzung nas gang+gA
216b5(rgyud): klung du zhugs nas gru'i bzhon pa la rab tu gnas te/ gang+gA'i dbus su 'o ma dang chu btung zhing / stong phrag sum cur ji ltar 'dod pa'i nyin zhag gi bzlas pa bya'o// de nas bzlas pa'i mthar klu thams
216b6(rgyud): cad mthong ngo // de nas sgrub pa brtsam ste/ gru'i dbus de nyid du me thab pad+ma'i rnam pa bya'o// de nas na ga ge sar la sogs pa'i me tog rnams kyis ras ris la mchod pa chen po bya'o// ras ris kyi thu
216b7(rgyud): bo zhal nub tu mngon par phyogs par gzhag ste/ bdag nyid shar du mngon par phyogs te ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste/ na ga ge sar gyi me tog re re la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa/
217a1(rgyud): byas nas seng ldeng gi shing gis me sbar te/ tsan ngan dkar po dang gur kum bsres pa'i nag ge sar gyi me tog rnams kyis stong phrag bcu'i bar ji srid par sbyin sreg bya'o//
217a2(rgyud): gzhan klu rnams mthong ba mnye bar bcings pa'i dngos grub kyi rdzas rnams rab tu chags pas blang bar mi bya'o// gang las sbyin sreg gi mthar gru'i gzhon pa dang lhan cig 'phur bar 'gyur ro//
217a3(rgyud): rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// klu'i dbang po rgyal po thams cad kyang rjes su 'brang zhing bran bzhin du gnas so// bar gyi bskal pa sum cur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// rang dbang du spyod
217a4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// 'gro ba la thogs pa med do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong ste/ de'i spyi bo la reg par mdzad do// reg pa tsam gyis mngon par shes pa lngar 'gyur ro//
217a5(rgyud): nges par sangs rgyas nyid du lhag par 'gro bar byed do// gzhan yang mchog gi sgrub pa'i cho ga'i sgrub thabs su 'gyur ba ni sngar bzhin du gang+gA'i klung du zhugs nas bil ba'i shing gi rang bzhin gyis shing
217a6(rgyud): gcig nyid kyis gru'i bzhon pa byas nas shin tu brtan pa legs par byas pa der mngon par 'dzegs nas/ bde ba'i shing gi rang bzhin gyi smra ba des gru de'i rjes su sgrub pa po ches mkhas shing gsal ba
217a7(rgyud): nyid kyis g.yab par bya ste/ gang+gA'i klung chen po yongs su mi dor bar kun nas thad kar ram rgyun rings su g.yab par bya'o// de nas rtsa ba'i rig pa bzung nas sam/ snying po 'am/ nye ba'i snying po 'am/
217b1(rgyud): yi ge gcig pa 'am/ khro bo 'am/ po nya'am/ ring du rjes su 'brang ba 'am/ gzhan gang yang rung ba'i sngags bzung nas ras ris kyi thu bo de nyid phun la nub tu phyogs par bzhag nas/ bdag nyid dang por
217b2(rgyud): shar du mngon par phyogs la/ phyis ni ji ltar 'dod par bya'o// 'o ma dang / nas zan dang / 'bras bu bza' ba 'am/ chu 'am/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang 'bras bu bza' zhing smra ba bcad de/ dus gsum du
217b3(rgyud): khrus bya zhing / gos lan gsum du brjes te/ shin tu dkar ba'i las kun tu spyod cing shin tu dkar ba'i blo dang ldan pas/ dang po re zhig ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji ltar nye bar bstan pa bzhin du sngar cho ga mthong
217b4(rgyud): bas rig pa 'bum phrag drug cu bzlas par bya'o// de nas gal te rtsa ba'i rig par 'gyur ro// de nas stong phrag drug cu bzlas pa'i mthar gru rgya mtshor chen por 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa'i yo byad
217b5(rgyud): rnams bsdus te sngar gyi gnas de nyid du gzhag par bya'o// de nas gru'i bzhon pa rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba na/ 'jigs par mi bya zhing / bzlog par mi bya'o// sgrub pa po'i dbang las ma gtogs par bzlog
217b6(rgyud): par nus pa'ang ma yin no// de nas dpag tshad stong du gnas pa'i rgya mtsho chen por yang yud tsam gyis 'jug par byed de/ lam mthung na lta ci smos/ der zhugs nas chu'i steng du sgrub pa'i las brtsam par
217b7(rgyud): bya'o// de nas me thab sngar gyi rnam pa 'am/ rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i sa'i snod du seng ldeng gi me spar la/ nag ge sar gyi ze'u dang / me tog tsan dan dkar po dang ga pur dang bsres pa'i sreg blugs ches nyung
218a1(rgyud): ba 'am/ ches mang ba'i tshad kyang rung ste/ sngar bzhin du rtsa ba'i rig pas 'bum phrag drug cu sbyin sreg bya'o// sbyin sreg byed pa na/ lang ka'i grong na gnas pa'i srin po gzugs/
218a2(rgyud): sna tshogs 'dzin pa rnams hA hA zhes sgrogs pa dang / klu'i grong longs spyod ldan na gnas pa'i klu'i rgyal po rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs 'chang ba/ ches zhi ba dang / ches khro ba rnams langs te/ klu dang
218a3(rgyud): srin po rnams kyang 'di skad ces smra'o// khyed bzhengs shig khyed bzhengs shig/ bdag cag gi rje bo mdzod cig ces so// de bzhin du lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /
218a4(rgyud): grub pa dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad kyang rab tu chags par byed mod kyi/ ldang bar mi bya'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas sngags bzlas shing lag pa g.yon pa'i sdigs 'dzub kyis bsdigs par bya'o// de/
218a5(rgyud): nas rnam par 'byor zhing phan tshun du rab tu 'bros la 'jigs par byed do// de nas sbyin sreg gi mthar gru des sgrub pa po de khyer nas skad cig la 'og min gyi gnas su 'gro bar byed do// 'jig rten gyi khams
218a6(rgyud): gzhan du'ang 'gro zhing 'ong bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa'i sems shes par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa lnga dang / rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / mthu chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan
218a7(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang rtag tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// klu thams cad dang / srin po thams cad dang / gnod sbyin thams cad dang / lha thams cad dang / lha ma yin thams cad dang / sems
218b1(rgyud): can thams cad kyang 'di'i dbang du 'gyur te/ bka' bzhin byed pa la bzhag nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams
218b2(rgyud): 'di'i sngags grub pa de rnams kyang 'di la byams pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro// rjes su 'dod par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang las kyi cho ga mchog gi sgrub
218b3(rgyud): thabs su 'gyur ba ni bil ba'i shing la gru bo che'i gzhon pa byed du gzhug ste/ shing gcig gi gzhon pa 'am/ bsdus pa'ang rung ste gnas chen po bya'o// gang+gA'i dbus kyi gling der gnas pa'i gru'i gzhon par
218b4(rgyud): skyes bu brgya nyi shu lag na sgron me thogs pa rnams gru'i bzhon pa la 'dzegs te/ gos dkar po gyon zhing bsrung ba byas pa ras ris kyi thu bo sngar gyi cho gas kun tu bzhag pa'i spyan sngar gzhag par bya'o//
218b5(rgyud): nas ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas na ga ge sar gyi phye ma rnams dang / gur kum dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / ga pur bsres pa dang / seng ldeng gi sreg blugs stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug sbyin sreg
218b6(rgyud): bya'o// de nas sbyin sreg gi mthar gru de skad cig tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'gro zhing 'ong bar 'gyur te/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rnam par rgyu'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong
218b7(rgyud): bar byed do// mthong ba tsam la sa thob par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa lnga dang / yun ring du 'tsho zhing / bskal pa chen por gnas par 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen
219a1(rgyud): por 'gyur ro// mar me 'dzin pa de rnams kyang 'di'i rig pa 'dzin pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// lhan cig spyod pa de rnams dang thabs cig tu ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rnam par rgyu zhing / rang /
219a2(rgyud): dgar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur gyis mngon par dgyes par 'gyur ro// mthar yang sangs rgyas nyid du nges par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang las kyi
219a3(rgyud): cho ga'i sgrub thabs dam par 'gyur ba ni/ chu klung 'gram mam rgya mtsho'i ngogs// de bzhin kha ba can gyi ro// ri yi rgyal po 'bigs byed de// der ni las mchog bsgrub par bya// sa h+ye ma la ya nyid/
219a4(rgyud): dang // ri bo spos kyi ngang ldang dang // bya rgong phung po'i ri rgyal du// las kyi mchog ni bsgrub par bya// rgya mtsho chen po'i brag dang ni// shing sogs me tog ldan pa ste// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i
219a5(rgyud): sngags rnams ni// phyogs 'di rnams su bsgrub par bya// rnam par dben pa'i phyogs gtsang ma// bas mtha' grong ba'i chos spangs par// gsang sngags rgyal po bsgrub par bya// de bzhin kho
219a6(rgyud): nar thams cad du// ri bo dang ni tshang tshing dang // bas mtha'i gnas mal nyams dga' ba// de bzhin rgyal bas spangs pa yi// gdug pa'i sems can rnams bral bar// gsang sngags rgyal po
219a7(rgyud): thams cad bsgrub// rgyal po chos dang ldan pa'i yul// skye bo gtsang sbra spyod la dga'// ma dang pa la gus pa dang // gnyis skyes rigs kyis dor ba ru// lha rnams dngos grub thob par 'gyur//
219b1(rgyud): gnas der yin gyi gzhan du min// nyams dga' skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram// ya mu na nyid rab mdzes pa// sin+d+hu nar ma da bak+She// zla ba'i cha ni gtsang ma'i 'gram// kA be rI dang dbyangs can nyid// chu klung //
219b2(rgyud): chen po shI ta nyid// 'di dag grub zhing gzhan min par// stobs bcu ldan sras rnams kyis bshad// stobs bcu pa yis gsungs pa'i zhing // byang phyogs lam med ri bo dang // kha che dang ni rgya yul
219b3(rgyud): dang // bal yul de bzhin mang yul dang // rgya nag che dang li yul nyid// de dag ma lus grub pa'i zhing // byang gi phyogs su brten pa yi// gang yang ri ngang chu bo yang // bsod nams yul du rab tu
219b4(rgyud): brjod// nas dang gro ni za ba'o// gang du sems can snying rje ldan// de ru rtag par dngos grub 'gyur// dpal gyi ri bo brag ri che// lho phyogs yul du gnas pa yi// dpal ldan 'bras spangs mchod rten
219b5(rgyud): nis stengs rgyal ba'i ring bsrel 'dzin// der ni sngags rnams bsgrub par bya// myur du las dang las rnams so// rdo rje gdan dang mchod rten che// chos kyi 'khor lo mdzes pa dang // gang du thub gtso
219b6(rgyud): zhi bar gshegs// der yang dngos grub blta bar bya// lha las babs pa'i mchod rten che// sa pak+She dang cho 'phrul che// ser skya zhes bya'i grong mchog dang // lum pa'i tshal du 'khrungs pa der/
219b7(rgyud): gsang sngags rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur// rgyal bas bstod cing rab bsngags pa'i// bya rgod phung po'i ri der dang // de bzhin brag dang bsil ba'i tshal// me tog ces bya'i grong mchog dang /
220a1(rgyud): de bzhin rtag tu ga sho bathong // bcom brlag sa bya gubadzi dang// sa stengs grong ni 'phags rgyal dang // mchod rten de bzhin yangs pa can// rtag tus stengs ma thil/ zong /
220a2(rgyud): dang grong khyer gtso bo rnams// gang gzhan rgyal ba yang dga'abyung // rab bsngags bsod nams yul dag tu// de rnams su ni dngos grub sgrub// 'di rnams las gzhan yul rnams ni// grong dang ljongs
220a3(rgyud): dang ri bo dang // gnas dang grong mchog gtso bo ni// 'o ma 'am 'bab chu la brten pa// der ni rnam dben rjes 'jug cing // bzlas dang sbyin sreg dga' bar 'gyur// gnas ni bla khab med pa dang // rtag
