220a4(rgyud): tukhang pa stong pa ru// sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba'o// sngags rnams rjes mthun las rnams ni// sngags pas rtag tu yul dbus su// sngags bzlas yang dag 'dod par bya// bzlas la rab zhugs rtag tu/
220a5(rgyud): brtson// sngags rig gtong ba dag la goms// tshul khrims spyod cing shin tu bden// 'byung po kun la phan par dga'// sngags kyi spyod pa la dad pa// brtul zhugs can gyis sngar bzhin 'dra/
220a6(rgyud): gtsang ma'i yul dang gtsang sbra can// kla klo rkun ma spangs pa dang // sems can sdig sbrul la sogs pa// spangs pa'i sa phyogs 'dod par bya// 'bras bu me tog yang dag ldan// dri med chu ni rab bsdas/
220a7(rgyud): brda sngags rig pas ni sngags bsnyen bya// yul gzhan rnams su bsgrag mi bya// lha yi gnas sam dur khrod dang // brtan pa'i mtshan ma gcig pa dang // rtags gcig de bzhin pas mtha' ru// sngam/
220b1(rgyud): rig sngags ni bsnyen pa bya// bdag dang grogs rnams bsrungs byas nas// sngar spyad gsang sngags ldan pa dang // sngags pas rtag tu sngags bzlas bya// dgon pa che mchog shing chen dang // me tog
220b2(rgyud): 'bras bu la sogs 'byung // ri yi rtse dang khung bu dang // chu yi gnas ni gtsang mar bcas// 'bab chu che 'gram yid 'ong bar// sngags rig pas ni sngags bsnyen bya// sngags shes gnas 'di
220b3(rgyud): nges rtogs byed// shar phyogs su yang chu klung che// lu hi ta 'gram dge ba dang // de bzhin kA ma ru pa'i yul// grong mchog 'phel bar byed pa dang // dma' ba gang du 'di 'gro mchog/ 'dug pa dang ni chu
220b4(rgyud): klung mchog/ gnas der rtag tu zlos pa dang // gtsang ma blo gros ldan pas bsten// sngon du bsnyen pa'ang der gyis shig/ gang+gA'i sgo ru las rnams kun// de bzhin rtag tu gang+gA dang // dug can pa ni phrad pa
220b5(rgyud): ru rab tu sbyor ba kun nyid dang // gtsang ma'i sngags kyi bzlas pa bya// dur khrod che dang gzhan nyid ni// zlos pos der ni rtag tu bzlas// dri med chu dang 'bab chu ni// srog chags rnams kyis spangs pa ru/
220b6(rgyud): de nyid phyir ni shin du ni// mnyam bzhag sngags kyi bzlas pa bya// der ni 'jig rten bsam pa yi// bsod nams min pa cung zad mthong // 'on kyang sngags kyi nyer bstan pas// cung zad dus su 'dug
220b7(rgyud): par bya// de nas gzhan du 'gro bar bya// zla ba gzas zin dus der ni// dus la bab na dus cung zad// der 'dug bya yi gzhan du min// gzhan du sngags rig ci nus pas// de nas myur du 'gro bar bya/
221a1(rgyud): bde gshegs mchod rten bzhugs pa yi// sa stung rnams su kun tu 'dug/ 'jig rten ma rmugs thams cad ni// lnga ba ngan par lhung ba rnams// mu gas can gnan gnas rnams/
221a2(rgyud): ni sngags rig pas ni rtag tu spangs// sngags shes der ni mi bsdang ngo // skyes mchog blo gros rgyu ngan pa// rgyal ba mchog gis gang bzhugs dang // rang rgyal bse ru lta bu dang // byang chub sems dpa'
221a3(rgyud): skal ba che// rgyal mchog sras po nyan thos rnams// de rnams kun bzhugs sa steng gi/ yul rnams kun tu sngags shes pas// 'bad pas sngon du bsnyen pa bya// mnyam par bzhag pas gsang sngags ni//
221a4(rgyud): gnas de ru ni bzlas par bya// gsungs pa'i gnas ni 'di rnams su// gsungs pa'i las rnams thams cad dang // las kyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs rnams// 'di rnams rnyed par ma gyur na// gang yang rung ba'i
221a5(rgyud): gnas der ni// gtsang mas sngon du bsnyen pa bya// dad cing mos pas sgrub thabs kyi// cho ga mchog gi las brtsam mo// dang po re zhig bros sku'i thu bo zhal nub tu bstan nas bzhag ste/ bdag nyid shar du mngon
221a6(rgyud): bar phyogs la grog mkhar gyi sa 'am/ gang+gA'i klung gi 'gram gyis blangs nas/ pu shel ci dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / gur kum dang / ga pur rnams bsres la rma bya'i gzugs byas te/ de bris sku'i spyan
221a7(rgyud): sngar bzhag nas rtse mo ma bcad pa'i ku sha gtsang ma'i phyogs nas byung ba'i 'khor lo'i rnam pa byas nas bris sru'i spyan sngar lag pa g.yas pas bzung ste/ lag pa g.yon pas rma bya'o// dkar po'i bla bol ba'i
221b1(rgyud): mtshan byed na bris sku la mchod pa chen po byas nas/ gapur gyi bdug pa bsregs pa'i dro dang / ji srid nam langs pa'i bar de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas nyi ma 'char ba'i dus kyi tsho ma bya'i rgyal por 'gyur ro
221b2(rgyud): 'khor lo'ang 'bar ro// bdag nyid lnga'i 'phreng ba dang gos 'chang zhing rnam par brgyan pa dang / nyi ma 'char ka 'dra bar 'dod pa'i gzugs can du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas
221b3(rgyud): teras ris la bskor ba byas la/ ras ris blangs nas rma bya'i ga na de la 'dug na yud tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten las 'da' bar byed do// rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su
221b4(rgyud): bskor ba'i rig 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ bskal pa drug cu'i bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// ji lta 'dod par 'gro zhing rab tu spyod par 'gyur ro// thogs pa med par 'gro'o// lha'i phun
221b5(rgyud): sum tshogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nyid 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro// mthar yang sangs rgyas nyid thob par
221b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de bzhin du dbyig pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / mchod phyir thogs dang / ldong ros dang / gi'u wang dang / ral gri dang / lcags mda' dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / dgra sta dang / mtshon
221b7(rgyud): cha'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ sa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par dang / rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa dang / bya dang / bzhon pa'i khyad par seng ge dang / stag dang / gzigs la sogs pa rnams srog mkhan
222a1(rgyud): gyis las byas pa'am/ brinam pa phrinam bsres pa las byas pa'am/ stan dang / gnon pa dang / mal cha dang / gdunas dkar po dang / cod pan dang / rgyan gyi bye brag thams cad
222a2(rgyud): dang / rin po che'i bye brag thams cad dang / rab tu byung ba'i yo byad kyi bye brag thams cad la bgrang 'phreng dang / mtshal lham dang / shing lham dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / kha ba dang / gril sogs pa
222a3(rgyud): rgyal gyi lcags las byas pa 'am/ gzhan yang gang cung zad sems can gyi yo byad sdong la sogs pa rgyal gyi lcags las byas pa'am/ grog mkhar gyi sa 'am/ chu klung gi sa las byas pa de thams cad pa'i rnam
222a4(rgyud): lngas bkrus nas mngon par gsang gtor byas te snga ma bzhin du skyong ba'i sngags sam/ yi ge gcig pa'i sngags sam/ sngags gzhan gang yang rung ba brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas/ rtog pa'i
222a5(rgyud): rgyal po 'dir gsungs pa ma gtogs pa sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i rig pa ji ltar 'dod pa dang / ji ltar mngon par dga' bas bdag nyid srung zhing grogs po'ang yongs su bsgrub par byas pa/ shin tu gsang thub
222a6(rgyud): cing sngags dang rgyud shes pa/ sngar bstan pa'i gnas su bris sku zhal nub tu bstan la bzhag ste bdag nyid sngar bzhin du'o// bris sku la mchod pa chen po byas nas gtso bor ga pur gyi bdug pa bsregs te sngar
222a7(rgyud): bstan pa'i mtshon cha dang / yo byad dang / sems can gyi khyad par rnams sngar bstan pa'i bcos mar byas la/ yar po'i rma banya ba'i mtshan mo rdzas de rnams gang rung grangs te mtshan mo ji srid du bzlas pa byas na
222b1(rgyud): nyi ma 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe bar skabs 'dir bris skul 'od zer gyi 'phreng ba chen po kun tu mthong ngo // gal te sgrub pa po bzhon pa'i khyad par blangs par gyur na/ de la zhon nas ji ltar 'dod par 'gro bar 'gyur ro//
222b2(rgyud): gal te rgyan gyi khyad par ram/ mtshon cha'i khyed par blangs pa 'am/ bcangs pas rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 'gro zhing lnga'i lus can nyi ma shar ba dang mtshungs pa/ 'od
222b3(rgyud): zer chen po'i 'phreng ba dang ldan pa/ glog ltar gsal ba'i sku/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mnga' ba dag/ ring du 'tshe zhing bskal pa chen por gnas pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas
222b4(rgyud): yongs su bskor ba'i lha'i nor bu rin po che'i gzhal yas khang na spyod pa/ sngar yongs su brtags pa'i sa'i rang bzhin gyi bzhon pa gang gis grub pa de nyid mthu chen por 'gyur te/ de nyid 'di'i gzhon pa dang /
222b5(rgyud): de nyid 'di'i grogs po ste/ gzhan gyi sngags kyi dngos grub bzlog par gyur pa/ bdag gi sngags kyi dngos grub kun tu sbyar bar byas pa/ byams pa'i bdag nyid can/ phan par 'dod pa/ rtag tu rjes su bcings pa/
222b6(rgyud): de nyid 'di'i mtshon cha dang / rgyan dang / rin po che'i bye brag dang / stan dang / mal cha dang / sems can la sogs pa gang yin pa de nyid 'di'i bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / sba ba chen po rtag tu rjes su 'brel
222b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// mthu chen po dang / brtson 'grus chen po dang / lus chen por 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs mngon sum du mthong zhing / legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste spyi bor byugs nas ji srid /
223a1(rgyud): byang chub snying po rjes su thob kyi bar du dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad de/ stobs bcu po rnams nges par kun nas thob ste/ mchod pa'i 'os su'ang 'gyur ro// sems can rnams
223a2(rgyud): kyis zil gyis mi non pa dang / 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa'i mtha'i rigs rgyun mi gcod pa dang / sa thob par yang 'gyur ro// stobs bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa'/
223a3(rgyud): nyid du nges pa dang / ting nge 'dzin du 'gyur ro// mdor bsdus na las mchog thams cad dang / gnas mchog la gnas pas ras ris mchog gi spyan sngar mchod pa mchog la mngon par dga' bas las mchog
223a4(rgyud): gzhan nyid bya'o// rig pa 'dzin pa nyid nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sa rjes su thob par byed pa nyid dang / lus 'di nyid kyis
223a5(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams su kun tu 'gro ba nyid dang / stobs bcu'i rgyud yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang / 'phags pa byams pa mngon sum du mthong ba nyid kyi phyir dang / chos bstan padon
223a6(rgyud): yod pa nyid kyi phyir dang / sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi gcod pa nyid kyi phyir dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun tu gnon cing rjes su thob par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang / chos kyi sprin rnam par
223a7(rgyud): 'byor pa la rjes su 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir dang / nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba med cing bdud rtsi'i char gyi rgyun gyis rab tu zhi bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang / 'jig rten rjes su 'dzin pa la rab tu 'jug
223b1(rgyud): cing nan tan byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul srung ba nyid kyi phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung don yod par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang / sngags kyi spyod pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs/
223b2(rgyud): kyi cho ga rab tu sgom pa nyid kyi phyir dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos bdag nyid chen po rnams 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir/
223b3(rgyud): rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di bsgrub par bya ste/ sngags kyi mthu rab 'byam dang ldan pa ras ris thu bo spyan snga dang nye bar 'dug nas/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi cho ga dang /
223b4(rgyud): rgyud thams cad du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i lam ste/ 'dor na 'dir rtog pa gzhan du gsungs pa'i las rnams kyis kyang ras ris kyi rgyal po 'di bsgrub par bya ste/ myur du de rnams kyi sngags kyi dngos grub
223b5(rgyud): tu 'gyur te/ gang ngas bstan pa de dag gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma
223b6(rgyud): sgrol ma ral pa gyen brjes kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las/ ras ris mchog gi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas slar yang 'khor gyi
223b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po de la gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po khyod kyi ras ris kyi cho ga bar ma'i las kyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs par ma yod do// de
224a1(rgyud): mdol bsdus nas bshad bar bya yis/ legs par nyon la legs par yid la gyis shig dang bshad par bya'o// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan
224a2(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ston pa 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/ sems can thams cad la phan par dgyes pa/ bdag
224a3(rgyud): cag la thugs brtse ba'i don dang / ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la gzigs nas/ gang de'i dus la bab par dgongs na de gsung du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
224a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ dang po re zhig tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / gtsang
224a5(rgyud): sgra'i kun du spyod pa dang / nges par sdom pa dang / bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / bsam gtan dang / cho ga dang / gang du rab tu gnas pa ste/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa sgrub pa'i las 'bras
224a6(rgyud): bu dang bcas shing don med par mi 'gyur ba dang / sngags thams cad kyi rab tu sbyor ba'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba de gang zhe na/ de ngas bshad kyi/ sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ dang po re zhig rig
224a7(rgyud): pa'i brtul zhugs dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba dang po nyid du yang dag par blangs te/ dang po re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis nye bar bstan pa'i dam tshig la yang dag par rjes su 'jug par
224b1(rgyud): bya'o// khyod kyis rtog pa'i rgyal po gsungs pa/ sngar nges par bstan pa/ gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa dang ldan pa/ slob dpon du dbang bskur ba thob pa/ khyod kyis bstan pa'i chog shes pa/ mkhas pa gsal
224b2(rgyud): ba chos dang ldan pa/ bden par smra ba/ spro ba che babyas pa gzo ba/ brtan pa/ sems bzang ba ha cang mi rgan cing ha cang mi gnon pa/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti thams cad la 'dod pa med pa/ tshangs par
224b3(rgyud): spyod pa/ snying rje dang ldan pa/ rnyed pa tsam gyis sam/ longs spyod kyi rgyur ram/ rjes su chags pa'i rgyur yang brdzun mi sman/ shin tu chung ngu tsam nyid dang / rnyed pa dang / rmongs pa'i rnam pa lta ci smos
224b4(rgyud): dam bcas pa brtan pa dang / 'byung po thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du snying brtse ba dang ldan pa dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sngar spyad pa byas pa khyod kyi gsang ba'i rig pa dang sngags rjes su zlos
224b5(rgyud): pa/ rig pa sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa/ khyod kyi dkyil 'khor du yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten shes pa/ yang dag par rjes su 'dzin par byed pa/ 'bras bu dang ldan zhing mkhas pa/ legs pa la rab tu
224b6(rgyud): zhugs pa/ mi 'jigs shing mi gnod la/ chags pa med pa/ dpa' ba/ brtson 'grus brtan pa/ nad med pa ste/ nad gang gis las su mi rung ba'i ngang tshul can dang / rigs che zhing mtho bar rab tu
224b7(rgyud): skyes pa zhes pa/ yon tan 'di rnams dang ldan pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du 'gyur te/ sgrub pa po'ang de dang 'dra ba 'am/ yan lag cung zad ma rdzogs pa'o// de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la
225a1(rgyud): mchod pa byas nas 'di'i don du gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rig pa dang / sngags dang / bcom ldan 'das mdor
225a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig la rjes su 'jug par 'tshal ma/ bdag cag la rjes su brtse ba'i don dang / phan pa'i thugs bskyeng nas de slob dpon gyis gsung du gsol/ de mas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon
225a3(rgyud): gyis sngar bstan pa'i cho gas slob ma ji lta ba bzhin rim gyis brtags nas gzhugs par bya zhing / sngar bzhin du mngon par dbang bskur ba byin nas rig pa dang sngags byin la/ rim pa ji lta bar dam tshig
225a4(rgyud): bstan par bya'o// gsang chen dang / phyag rgya dang / rgyud dang / sngags dang / las rnams kyang dus ring mo nyid nas yongs su brtags te bsam pa shes nas rgyud dang sngags la sogs pa dang / las rnam
225a5(rgyud): thams cad bstan par bya'o// gzhan du ma yin no zhes pa'i cho ga 'di rab tu bsgrags so// de nas slob mas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la ji ltar nus pas gang gis slob dpon dgyes pa 'am bdag nyid
225a6(rgyud): dang longs spyod kyang dbul bar bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon des bu'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag par bya'o// bu bzhin du bskyang bar bya'o// ma bzhin longs spyod kyis nye bar bsdu bar bya'o// de
225a7(rgyud): nas sgrub pa po des rig pa dang sngags gang yang rung bzhig bzung nas mtha' gcig tu song ste/ sngar bstan pa'i gnas rgya cher gong ma bzhin du sbyang bas rig pa la sogs pa de rnams nyid kyis spyan drang
225b1(rgyud): ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba dang / mar me dang / dri dang / bdug pa dang / gtor ma dang / lha bshos dag dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i cho ga nyid kyis rgyas par byas te spyar drangs nas gang ra bul te/
225b2(rgyud): thun mtshams gsum du khrus gsum bya zhing / gos lan gsum brjes te nyi ma so so la bzlas pa bya'o// de la thun mtshams kyi dus zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo'i mtha' nas brtsams te ji srid nyi ma 'char
225b3(rgyud): ba'i dus tsam gyi bar 'di la dang por bshad do// nyi ma gung ni nyi ma shar ba'i mthar dus tsam gyi tshad kyi mtshams nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la yang dag par brten pa ni chog shes pas gung gi thun
225b4(rgyud): mtshams su shes par bya'o// nub pa'i dus su'ang lhag ma bzhi cha tsam ni thun mtshams gsum par brjod par bya'o// slob dpon mkhas pa bshes gnyen can// tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang dag
225b5(rgyud): ldan// chen po'i rigs su 'khrungs pa dang // kun nas brtson 'grus brtan pa ni// sngags dang rgyud sogs yang dag ldan// bya ba kun la blo gros byang // phra zhing mkhas la chod shes pa// chos kyi/
225b6(rgyud): dbyings ni rtag tu 'dzin// spro ba che zhing gzi brjid ldan// 'jig rten chos la ltos pa med// thub pa mchog gi chos la dad// 'jig rten pa rnams dor ba dang // bzlas pa byas shing rnam dben shes//
225b7(rgyud): sngon du bsnyen pa rjes brten pa// byang chub sems dpa'i gsang sngags shes// de las gzhan pa'i rkyen rnams mthong // sangs rgyas kyis gsung gsang sngags dang // 'jig rten pa yi rab sbyor shes//
226a1(rgyud): bsrung ba byas shing mthu brtan pa// gtsang sbra'i kun spyod la rtag dga'// sangs rgyas nyer bstan lam la ni// kun nas rjes su 'jug pa dang // rab sngags rgyal bas gsungs pa
226a2(rgyud): yi gsang sngags zlos la rtag tu brtson// rtag tu mthong chos 'bras bu dang // 'jig rten pha rol de bzhin nyid// sdig pa kun la 'jigs pa dang // phra mo tsam la'ang de bzhin no// gtsang zhing mkhas
226a3(rgyud): la le lo med// yid gzhungs blta na sdug pa dang // stobs bcu pas bshad sngags gang dang // de bzhin kho nar rgyal sras dang // 'jig rten pa yi sngags gang nyid// rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag la'ang // de
226a4(rgyud): la rtag tu ngal bar byas// gzhung dang bstan bcos don 'dzin pa// nad med nus pa med min pa// rga dang nang ni rnam par spangs// de bzhin pashes gnyen can sngags thug// kun nas myur du byed pa dang /
226a5(rgyud): mtha' ring min zhing de bzhin du// nga rgyal chung zhing zur gyis go// tshangs par spyod cing shes rab che// khyad par du ni shes pa dang // gcig tu 'du 'dzi med pa dang // dpa' zhing dbang bskur thob pa dang //
226a6(rgyud): de 'dir byang chub pha rol son// srid pa zhi bar byed la brtson// de bzhin nyid du rig sngags byas// mthu chen 'jig rten shes pa dang // 'gro ba sems can rjes sems pa// dpal nyid dang ni rab tu ldan// /
226a7(rgyud): sbyin dang 'byung po phan la dga'// de bzhin khyad 'phags slob dpon la// rtag tu gsol ba gdab par bya// des ni dkyil 'khor bris pa yi// sngags kyi dngos grub ster bar byed// de nyid kyis ni dbang
226b1(rgyud): bskur gyis// 'bras bu chen po sbyin par 'gyur// dngos grub 'dod pa'i slob mas kyang // thub pa bzhin du rtag tu mchod// de yi gsung ni mi 'gom pa// slob mas 'bad pas bya ba yin// ji ltar 'byor cing
226b2(rgyud): bdog pa yi// longs spyod de la dbul bar bya// nyung ngu tsam mam mang yang rung // gang gis mnyes par 'gyur ba dang // lus ni 'tsho ba'i rgyu yi phyir// pha la nor ni ster ba ltar// de bzhin slob ma chos shes pas//
226b3(rgyud): slob dpon la ni nor dbul bya// mtha' yi dbang phyug dngos grub thob// tshe dang de bzhin nad med dang // rgyas pa'i 'gro ba thob par 'gyur// slob mas bla ma de mchod na// de yis sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur//
226b4(rgyud): lam dang cho gnyer mthong dang // bsnyen pa las dang brten pa las// de bzhin ri mor byas mchod las// sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par 'gyur// de bzhin rgyal mchog sras rnams dang // lha rnams thams
226b5(rgyud): cad dgyes par 'gyur// bla ma rtag tu bsnyen bkur na// bla ma sngags rnams mthong ba yi// 'di dag thams cad brtan par 'gyur// sgrub pos sngon dang thog mar ni// dam tshig la ni rjes 'jug bya// dman nam/
226b6(rgyud): de dag mnyam yang rung // gal te ches mchog gyur pa 'am// rmongs pa'am lhag par khro ba yis// rtag tu bla ma brnyas mi bya// des kyang rgyud 'dir de la ni// man ngag rtag tu sbyin par bya// gang tshe sngags kyi dngos
226b7(rgyud): grub byin// 'dis ni ser sna byas pa min// sngar bstan slob ma de la ni// lus can zhen pa 'phel byed pa'i// mig ni gang la yod gyur pa// de nyid slob ma nyid bya'o// slob dpon 'am ni slob ma'i rgyur// phan
227a1(rgyud): tshun rjes su 'jug byed pa// gang du zhen pa'i rgyun skyong ba// 'jam po'i rgyun ni 'dzin pa ste// de la sngags ni sbyin par bya// slob dpon de bzhin slob ma ni// slob ma bla mar mthong ba la/
227a2(rgyud): rtag tu spro bar 'gyur ba 'am// gnyis kas dngos grub yang dag 'byor// de la rtag tu lam nyid dang // sngags kyi spyod pa rjes bstan bya// gnyis kas pa dang bur shes pas// sngags ni 'bras bcas rjes 'jug/
227a3(rgyud): pabartan dang dga' ba de bzhin thob// rtag tu slob mas bla ma ni// rab tu 'bad pas bsrung bar bya// bu ni bdag nyid chen po rnams// sangs rgyas chos rgyun mi 'chad 'gyur// de med mgon med de rnams la/
227a4(rgyud): ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags rnams sbyin// sems can bkren dang ma ning la'ang // thams cad la ni khyad par du// sngags kyi spyod pa khyad par 'phags// tha ma mchog dang bar ma la// dus rnams kun du bya ba'o//
227a5(rgyud): yongs su thob pa'i chos rnams la// rjes su gzung ba'i rgyur bya'o// 'gro ba blo gros nges pa yi// 'dod pa rnams la'ang rab sbyin bya// de phyir ji ltar 'dod pa'i sngags// slob ma nyid kyis blang bar bya// de nyid
227a6(rgyud): kyis ni nyer bstan pas// lam nyid yin no gzhan du min// dngos grub 'dod pas gang de la// pa ni pha rol song ba na// pha bzhin mgo bos phyag byas te// de nas ji ltar 'dod par 'gro// de nas 'dir ni song nas
227a7(rgyud): ni mnyam par bzhag pas gsang sngags bzlas// slong mo slong ba'i rjes 'jug cing // smra ba bcad de dus gsum bzlas// de ltar bstan pa nyid du 'gyur// ji ltar lam la rab 'jug pa// de tshe rnam 'gyur
227b1(rgyud): de gcod pa// khang stong dang ni dgon pa che// ri bo che dang chu klung ngogs// gtsang dang ba lang gnas mtsho chen// rnam dben skye bo spangs pa bsten// lha khang dngan shing drung dang // mtshan gcig min mthon po dang //
227b2(rgyud): mtsho che 'gram nyams dga' dang // chu gling ngam ni gling rnams dang // rnam pa sna tshogs sngar bstan pa'i// yul rnams sna tshogs yid 'ong ba// 'di rnams las kyang phyogs gzhan du// mnyam par bzhag
227b3(rgyud): pas sngags bzlas bya// grogs po mtshan nyid ldan pa ni// sngags don nges pa'i rtog ge ba// ltas kyi rnam pa de nyid shes// dpa' zhing g.yul las rnam rgyal ba// snying stobs ldan zhing bzos pa can// dang
227b4(rgyud): dang tshul khrims phun tshogs ldan// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i yul 'dir ni// rab bsngags mtshan nyid dang ldan pa// bzod dang ldan pa'i grogs po yis// 'bad pa med pa nyid kyis de'i// las rnams
227b5(rgyud): thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// tho rangs mal nas langs nas ni// 'bab chu mtsho chen las byung ba'i// srog chags med cing dri ma med// chu de nyid la khrus byas nas// sa dang ba byung phye ma yis// sngag
227b6(rgyud): shes lus ni drol phyis bya// de nas sngags kyis sbyang byas pa'i// chu nyid shin tu dri med la// zlos po brtson pas khrus bya'o// ha cang yun ring khrus mi bya// de nas langs la lag pa dag/ sa dag
227b7(rgyud): gis kyang bkru bar bya// bdun dang bdun dang yang lan bdun// nyi shu rtsa gcig nye reg bya// yang der so shing kun tu spyad// so sbyangs nas ni dor bar bya// de nas skyob la phyag byas shing // 'jig
228a1(rgyud): rten mgon la phyag byas nas// sngags rig mchod pa yid 'ong bya// rnam pa sna tshogs bstod mchod kyis// yang dang yang du yang dag bstod// de bzhin dri nam me tog gis/
228a2(rgyud): ston pa skyob la mchod yon dbul// sangs rgyas rnams la mgos phyag byas// de tshe slob mar gyur pa rnams// 'jig rten mgon po de rnams kyis// spyan snga nyid du sdig pa bshags// bdag nyid dag
228a3(rgyud): kyang phul byas nas// ras ris spyan sngar 'khod par bya// ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug/ sngags rig gnyis ka 'dug nas ni// mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin te// der ni bgrang 'phreng nyid kyis ni// rab tu
228a4(rgyud): 'bad pas bzlas pa bya// de tshe sngags gzhan mi bzlas so// cho ga dman pa yang spang zhing // ha cang mchog kyang de bzhin no// bar ma bar ma'i las dag la// brtul zhugs can dag sngags bzlas
228a5(rgyud): bya ra ha cang mthon po spang bar bya// gal te tshig ni dma' ba'ang min// bar ma bar ma'i las rnams la// rab tu bsngags par rgyal bas gsungs// ha cang mtho min dma' ba min// bar mar rtag tu bzlas pa bya//
228a6(rgyud): sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// tshig ni dpal dang ldan par gsungs// gzhan gyi drung du mi bzlas shing // gzhan gyi las lam rtag tu gsa'// bdag nyid rig pa'i yul du bzlas// sngags ni bar ma
228a7(rgyud): de bzhin du// bzlas pas rab tu 'byor par 'gyur// sngags don legs par thos pa 'ga'// dngos grub 'bring po 'dod pa nyid// sngags ni dge bar bzlas par bya// de phyir skye bo dang bral bar// sngags
228b1(rgyud): kyi de nyid don legs thos// tshogs dang bral zhing rnam dben par// zlos pa pos ni sngags bzlas bya// mtshan mo yi ni bzhi cha dang // de yi byed kyi phyed nyid kyi// skya rengs dmar po'i dus tsam ste// nyi ma'i dkyil
228b2(rgyud): 'khor shar ba na// thun ni dang por de bzhin du// thub pa'i skyes mchog gis gsungs so// dus kyi tshad ni bzhi yin te// bar mar yongs su bsgrags pa yin// de nas nyi ma phyed nub na// sngags kyi
228b3(rgyud): bzlas pa de tshe btang // sngags zlos bor ba de yi tshe// mchod yon phul nas gshegs su gsol// brtul zhugs can gyis rnam gzhan spang // de tshe bor ba'i dus lhag na// thub pa'i bstan la dge ba
228b4(rgyud): bya shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs// dam pa'i chos ni klog pa dang // sa bcu pa yi glegs bam ni// mchod dang klog pa rtag tu'o// de nas dus la bab gyur na// rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po dang /
228b5(rgyud): thub pa skyes mchog phyag byas nas// de nas 'tsho ba la 'gro zhing // de bzhin dus su spyod par ldan// dus su za zhing dbang por thul// sgrub po chos dang ldan pa dang // sangs rgyas bstan la rab dang brtson/
228b6(rgyud): grong gzhan du ni 'jug pa na// mi smra gtsang sbra spyod la dga'// sems can rtag tu chos ldan pa'i// khyim du bsod snyoms dag la 'jug/ zlos po srog chags med pa'i chu// chos par grub pa gtsang mar 'dod//
228b7(rgyud): yang dag lta ba phun sum tshogs// sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu dang // de lha'i khyim du rtag tu ni// bsod snyoms don du slong mo bslang // dper na brtson pas gos bgos te// nyam nga'i g.yul du rab
229a1(rgyud): 'jug pa// rtag tu dgra ni 'joms par byed// dgra rnams kyis gzhom mi nus pa// de bzhin sngags pa slong mos 'tsho// rtag tu grong du 'jug pa na// de bzhin chags par 'os
229a2(rgyud): pa yi// gzugs sgra mthong nas mi dge ba// 'dod chags zhi ba'i don gyi phyir// mi sdug dge ba bsgom par bya// lang tsho'i rnam pas brgyan pa yi// bud med lus ni mthong nas kyang // smad cing rul ba'i lus rnams ni// /
229a3(rgyud): srin bus zos shing dur khrod gnas// lus ni mi rtag sdug bsngal ba// mi gtsang dri mi zhim par bsgom// gang la byis pa rmongs pa yi// 'gro ba lnga por 'gro zhing 'khor// las kyi srad bus brgyus pa ni//
229a4(rgyud): yun ring dus su mya ngan byed// mi shes sgrib pas rmongs pa ni// dmus long sdug bsngal rgyu can no// gang du blo ni phyin ci log chags pas skye ba 'phongs par 'gyur// rnam pa sna tshogs las lam
229a5(rgyud): gyis// rnam pa du mar chags gyur pa// ring nas khyogs kyis 'gro ba ni// 'gro dang 'ong ba spyod par byed// rtag pa nyid phyir rjes chags pa// 'dzin pa'i kun tu spyod pa spyod// gang du sems can
229a6(rgyud): mi dge 'ga'// lam du yun ring rgyu bar byed// zo chun khyud mo'i rnam pa bzhin// srid pa'i mtsho chu 'byung ba rnams// 'gro ba de rnams mi bzad pa'i// sdug bsngal chu bos kun tu g.yengs/
229a7(rgyud): de bzhin bud med sdug bsngal gyi// rtsa ba 'ba' zhig yin pa ru// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // de bzhin nyan thos rang rgyal dang // thub pa rnams kyis gsungs pa yin// srid pa'i rgya mtsho
229b1(rgyud): mi 'khrugs pa'i// mtsho chen 'di dag bskam par dka'// bud med sems kyis bslus pa yi// sems can gnas gang bying ba de// dmyal ba dud 'gro'i 'jig rten dang // yi dgas 'jig rten lha ma yin//
229b2(rgyud): de bzhin mi yi 'jig rten nyid// lha yi 'gro bar 'gro bar bya// rtag tu kun nas yongs su 'khor// bud med chags pas bslus pa ni// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho btson ra yi// 'dam rdzab chen por bying bar 'gyur//
229b3(rgyud): bud med chags pa'i blun po'i mi// ro la chags pa'i ce spyang bzhin// gang la sems can rtag dga' ba// mi bzad sdug bsngal bzod par byed// dkar po chos las nges par nyams// sangs rgyas bstan/
229b4(rgyud): la rab tu gnas// srid pa'i mtsho yi sdug bsngal nyid// thams cad zlog par byed pa yin// sngags zlos pa la dga' zhing brtson// dbang cher grags shing yid dang ldan// gzi brjid ldan zhing sngags
229b5(rgyud): thub pa// de rnams la ni sdug bsngal med// yang dag sdom dang tshangs bden shes// bla ma lha la mchod pa byed// ma dang pha la gus pa rnams// gsum po rnams la sdug bsngal med// mi rtag sdug bsngal
229b6(rgyud): stong pa dang // gzhan gyi don la rjes su bsnyen// bud med lus la 'byung po'i gzugs// de bzhin 'bras dang zug rngu dang // blo ngan phung po'i lcags kyus zin// 'khor ba las ni mi 'da' bar// rtag tu
229b7(rgyud): bud med chags gyur pa// de la dngos grub yod pa min// de la mchog 'gro yod ma yin// 'gro ba 'bring yang yod ma yin// dngos grub chung ngu'ang yong ma yin// 'dir ni zlos po khrims 'chal na// tshul
230a1(rgyud): khrims 'chal la thub dbang gis// sngags kyi dngos grub ma bstan no// mya ngan 'das grong 'gro ba yi// lam yang med cing phyogs dang bral// 'dir ni byis pa smad pa la// sngags
230a2(rgyud): grub pa ni ga la yod// skye bo tshul 'tshal 'di la ni// de la bde 'gro'ang yod ma yin// mtho ris reg pa'ang yod ma yin// bde ba nyid la gzhol ba'ang med// de bzhin rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags// grub
230a3(rgyud): par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos// ta la'i shing gi mgo bo ni// gang tshe bcad na slar yang ni// sngon po nyid du mi 'gyur zhing // myu gu slar yang nam zhig 'gyur// de bzhin sngags grub rmongs pa ni// tshul khrims 'chal
230a4(rgyud): zhing sdig pa'i las// rtag tu slar yang bud med chags// mi dge'i grogs dang phrad pa la// sngags kyi rgyal po ga la 'grub// de bas gang tshe zlos pa pos// bde bar gshegs pas spangs pa yin// bud med
230a5(rgyud): nyes pa rnams spyad de// gang gi dngos grub bsgrub bya ste// byis pa bud med la rmongs pa// gzhan gyis grub par ma bstan no// de nas dang por bro ldan pa// gtsang zhing 'du 'dzi med la dga'// rigs ldan
230a6(rgyud): brtan zhing dpa' ba dang // sems bzang ldan zhing mthong na dga'// chos dang chos min rnam dpyod shes// de rnams grub pa rnyed mi dga'// de ltar sngags shes zhugs pa ni// grong du bsod snyoms phyir du 'jug
230a7(rgyud): ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin song nas// sngar ni brtags pa'i gnas dag tu// mkhas pas dag pa'i blos bza' ba// bza' ba phyogs su bzhag nas ni// phyi rol song nas rkang pa bkru// de nas slar yang gnas de
230b1(rgyud): rung srog chags med pa'i chu rnams kyis// dang po 'dren pa nyid yin te// gnyis pa la ni lag g.yon gyi// rked ba man chad dris phyis bya// kun tu g.yas pa slar byin nas// lag pas yis bkru bar ga gasngar/
230b2(rgyud): gzhag pa yi dag pa dang // gtsang ma rnams kyis bdun nyid du// bzang zhing dag chus gtsang sngar byas// ser swa'i ba las byung ba yi// ba yi lci ba gsar ba dag/ gtsang zhing dri med snod blangs la// srog chags
230b3(rgyud): med pa'i chus sbyar te// dang por ston pa thub pa yis// mchog la dkyil 'khor bya ba yin// khyad par khru gang tsam du'o// gnyis pa rang sngags mgon po la// gsum pa rigs kyi lha mo la// gang zhig sngags/
230b4(rgyud): bzlos pa go// slar yang rtag tu bya ba yin// bzhi pa sems can thams cad kyi// nye bar longs spyod don du grags// g.yas su 'jig rten mgon po yi// dkyil 'khor 'di ni rtag tu bya// dkon mchog gsum
230b5(rgyud): gyi ched du ni// dkyil 'khor de ni khru bzhi'o// gnyis pa rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // gsum pa stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras// dkyil 'khor bdun po 'di dag ni// kun nas gru bzhi pa ru'o// khru gang ngam ni
230b6(rgyud): khru byed rung // nyin re zhing yang bya ba'o// zlos pos de tshe sbas pa'i phyogs// sdig pa 'joms byed nyin re bzhin// de nas sngags pa thub pa langs// lag gnyis 'bad pas bkrus nas ni// gtsang ma'i chu yis
230b7(rgyud): nye reg bya// dag cing srog chags spangs pa yi// dri ma med pa'i gtsang ma ni// 'bad pas gtsang ma'i snod du blang // mtsho chen dang ni 'bab chu 'am// chu mig chu bo la gnas pa// gtsang ma'i phyogs nas byung ba yi//
231a1(rgyud): sems can gtsang ma lag gis bcus// sngags pas slar yang nye reg bya// gnyis sam gsum du rtag tu yang // de nas kha la reg bya zhing // de bzhin nyid du rna ba'i rgyun// mig dang /
231a2(rgyud): sna yi bu ga dang // spyi bo lte ba'i phyogs reg bya// dge ba spyod pas lan lnga 'am bdun// cho ga bzhin du thams cad bya// gtsang sbra'i spyod pa phun sum tshogs// zlos po gtsang mar gyur nas ni// bsod
231a3(rgyud): snyoms snod ni blangs nas su// chu yi gnas su 'gro bar bya// gang du chu bo rab gnas pa// de bzhin dma' bar gyur pa dang // chu klung rab tu 'bab la sogs// rtag tu blangs pa bkru bar bya// slar yang
231a4(rgyud): de nas langs nas ni// gtsug lag khang ngam gnas su 'gro// gang du sngon ni yang dag bsten// gang du gnas pa der 'gro ba// song nas zlos pos phyogs de ru// lhung bzed de ni gzhag par bya// de nas
231a5(rgyud): myur du nye reg bya// de bzhin slar yang lhung bzed blang // lhung bzed sa 'am lo ma 'am// dngul lam de bzhin gser nyid dang // zangs sam shing shun dag kyang rung // ston pa la ni lha bshos dbul//
231a6(rgyud): ston la lha bshos phul nas ni// slar yang rang rig sngags rgyal la'o// 'gron po gcig ni 'ongs gyur dang // sdug bsngal can la'ang ci nus sbyin// bshos nyid kyang ni thams cad du// kun nas nges
231a7(rgyud): par bza' ba nyid// ha cang mang po sbyin mi bya// sngags shes 'dir ni gdung mi bya// kun nas rigs pa ldan par bya// lto ba'i tshad tsam bzhag nas ni// gzhan pa'i zan ni rtag tu'o// bkres dang
231b1(rgyud): sgom pas nyen pa yis// sngags don sgrub par mi nus ste// ha cang mang dang nyung zos na// sngags don bsnyen par mi nus so// de nyid phyir na rgyal dbang gis// sems can zas kyi gnas so zhes// lus
231b2(rgyud): can kun la gsungs pa yin// gang gis mi rnams 'tsho ba dang // lha dang lha min dri za dang // klu dang gnod sbyin mi'am ci// srin po yi dgas sha ba dang // 'byung po skar ma gza' dag ni// gang zhig
231b3(rgyud): zas la mi ltos pa// de ni 'ga' yang yod ma yin// rtag tu kha zas rags pa ni// kham gyi zas zhes grags pa'o// sems can phra mo'i zas can yang // de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ni//
231b4(rgyud): bsam gtan zas can rtag par ni// gzugs na spyod cing g.yo ba ste// gzugs med nyid kyi lha rnams kyang // ting 'dzin 'bras bu za ba'o// srid pa bar ma'i sems can yang // dri za bar ni rab
231b5(rgyud): tu grags// de bzhin 'dod khams sems can rnams// zas ni rnam pa sna tshogs za// 'dod dang ldan pa'i lha dang mi// kham gyi zas ni za bar byed// de nyid phyir na thub dbang gis// sems can
231b6(rgyud): zas kyis gnas pa zhes// chos kyi rgyu ru bstan pa yin// gang de rnams ni rab tu grags// zlos po rtag tu brtson pa ni// zas kyi tshod ni rig par bya// gang phyir rig pa bsnyen pa ni// zas 'di la ni
231b7(rgyud): rab tu gnas// kun spyod ma nor dag pa dang // dge zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang // zas kyi tshod kyang shes pa la// de yi dngos grub rnyed mi dka'// dper na khur ni drang ba'i rgyud// shing rta yun
232a1(rgyud): rings gnas don du// shing rnga'i mig ni slu bar byed// de bzhin sngags pa sngags rig pas// zas ni gnas pa'i cheng du spyad// lus ni gso ba'i don du ni// zlos pos rtag/
232a2(rgyud): tu gso bar bya// sngags rnams sgrub pa'i don phyir dang // byang chub tshogs kyi rgyu yi phyir// mi yi 'jig rten rjes gzung rgyur// de bzhin rtag tu sngags bzlas bya// de nyid phyir na thub pa'i gtsos//
232a3(rgyud): brtson 'grus chen pos 'di gsungs so// mtshan ni 'od srungs zhes bya bas// sngon ni de tshe sa stengs der// sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir// 'byung po rnams la legs don du// sngags ni
232a4(rgyud): rab tu gsungs pa yin// sdug bsngal gyur pa'i 'jig rten kun// dbul zhing skyo la sha thang ba// mchog tu nyon mongs gyur pa rnams// 'di rnams don du gsungs pa yin// 'byung po rnams dang /
232a5(rgyud): legs pa nyid// slar yang kun tu brten pa rnams// 'byung po kun gyi zas don du// gsang sngags 'di ni mchog tu gsungs// nga yis gsang sngags 'di brjod kyi// byang sems la brten thams
232a6(rgyud): cad dang // nyan thos rnams ni mnyan par gyis// nad kyis zin pa 'joms byed cing // bkres pa'i nad kyis gzir ba dang // gang yang sems can skom pa dang // sdug bsngal thams cad ni don
232a7(rgyud): dang // 'byor pa 'dod rnams mnyan par gyis// 'od srungs 'od ni chen po pa// thub pa'i gtso bos de skad gsungs// nyan thos rnams ni yid mgu nas// khyab bdag de la gsol ba 'debs// chos kyi rgyal
232b1(rgyud): po thub pa che// chos mkhyen gsang sngags bshad du gsol// dam tshig mchog la nyer gnas pa'i// sems can rnams la rjes brtser mdzod// de skad gsol nas thub pa yis// sngags mchog
232b2(rgyud): rgyas par gsung bar byed// ka la bing ka'i sgra dbyangs dang // rnga bo che dang sprin gyi sgra// tshangs dbyangs brtson 'grus chen po dang // tshangs pa'i sras gang rgyal mchog gis// gang yang cung zad
232b3(rgyud): 'dir 'ongs pa// rkang med pa dang rkang mangs dang // rkang gnyis pa dang rkang bzhi pa// 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kun nyon cig/ mdor na sems can kun don du// bde 'byung sngags ni bshad
232b4(rgyud): par bya// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi// sems can la sogs 'dir lhags pa// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// 'byor pa 'dod pa rnams nyon cig/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta ga
232b5(rgyud): sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ga ga ne/ ga ga na gan+d+ho/ A nA ya/ sarba la hu la hu/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ A kaR+Sha Ne/ mA li lam+ba/ ya the prI taM me saM pA dA ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis de skad
232b6(rgyud): ces gsungs nas/ cang mi gsung bar gyur to// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis rig pa'i sngags kyi tshig 'di rgya cher gsungs pa'i bar skabs 'dir/ nam
232b7(rgyud): mkha' thams cad chen po la 'os pa'i zas kyi sprin gyis yongs su gang bar snang bar gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi nam mkha'i mthil thams cad zas kyi sprin
233a1(rgyud): gyis kun tu g.yogs par snang bar gyur to// bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par 'dod pa'i zas thams cad dang / ji ltar mngon par sred pa'i bza' ba de de rnams su char
233a2(rgyud): 'bab par gyur to// ji ltar mngon par sred pa'i bza' ba de rnams kyi zas kyi bya ba bkres pa'i sdug bsngal zhi ba'i don dang / skom pa rnams kyi btung ba yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu bo'i rgyun lta bu btung/
233a3(rgyud): bar bya ba'ang yid la 'dod pa bzhin du der bab par gyur to// sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la bkres pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / skom pa thams cad gsal bar byas par
233a4(rgyud): gyur to// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor thams cad kyang ngo mtshar thob cing tshim pa thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das
233a5(rgyud): kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas la yongs su bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa
233a6(rgyud): ngas kyang de'i tshe gsungs pa la mngon par rjes su yi rang ngo // rtog pa'i rgyal po'i mchog 'di la sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dang / bkres pa dang skom pa bsal ba'i don gyi phyir dang / khyad par du
233a7(rgyud): sngags zlos pa po thams cad kyi phyir ro// dang po re zhig zlos pa pos sngags 'dis bslu bar bya'o// gal te bsod snyoms la 'gro bar mi spron/ ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs nas 'bum phrag bdun bzlas par bya/
233b1(rgyud): de nas dkar gsum bza' ba 'am/ 'o ma btung ba'o// ri'i rtse mo de nyid du 'phags ma sgrol ma'i ras ris bar ma sngar bzhin du bzhag nas mchod pa chen po byas te/ gtor ma dang lha bshos ches rgya chen po byas
233b2(rgyud): nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis gsungs pa'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyis seng ldeng gi yam shing rnams kyi me sbar nas/ u dum ba ra'i yam shing la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar
233b3(rgyud): la btags parlan dang bcas pa 'am/ dpal 'bras kyi yam shing yang rung ste stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas mtshan byed kyi dus kyi tshe sprin nag po chen po dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'ong bar 'gyur te//
233b4(rgyud): 'jigs par mi bya/ langs nas 'gro bar yang mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i snying pos bdag nyid bsrung bar bya zhing / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang grogs rnams kyang sngar bzhin bsrung bar
233b5(rgyud): bya'o// de nas rlung nag po'i dkyil 'khor mi snang bar 'gyur te/ bud med kyang rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'od kyi 'phreng ba dang ldan pas phyogs rnams kyang kun tu snang bar byed bzhin pa sgrub pa
233b6(rgyud): bo'i mdun du 'dug ste/ kye kye sems can chen po longs shig/ grub pa yin no zhes so// de nas sgrub pa pos snga ma'i me tog dang bsres pa'i dri chus mchod yon dbul lo// de nas de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyur
233b7(rgyud): ro/ nyi ma de nas bdag nyid dam 'di'i grogs po nyi shu rtsa lnga la deng nas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bza' ba rnams rab tu ster bar byed do// ji ltar 'dod pa'i yo byad rnams kyang kun tu sbyin par byed do//
234a1(rgyud): de nas sgrub pa pos mchod yon phul nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o// ras ris la skor ba lan gsum byas nas ras ris blangs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
234a2(rgyud): phyag byas nas/ de nas ri'i rtse mo 'am mo med pa'i gnas su 'gro bar bya'o// der bdag nyid dam grogs pos phyag bdar byas nas dgram par bya ba rnams bkram la/ gnas der nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa'i las
234a3(rgyud): rnams bya'o// de nas sgrub pa pos sngar bzhin du ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ ras ris par ma sngar bzhin du bzhugs su gsol nas seng ldeng gi shing gis me skar lathun gsum du pad+ma dkar po'i me tog zho dang /
234a4(rgyud): sbrang rtsi dang / mar la btegs pa rnams kyis nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu rtsa ba'i rig pa 'am/ snying po'am/ nye ba'i snying pos las chen po thams cad kyi ched du 'am/ yi ge gcig pa'i ched du stong phrag brgyad du sbyin
234a5(rgyud): sreg bya'o// de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus kyi tshe sbyin sreg gi mthar bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur zhing / 'dod pa'i mchog gnang bar byed do// nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'am/ mi snang ba
234a6(rgyud): 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ nyan thos nyid dam/ mngon par shes pa lnga nyid dam/ tshe ring ba nyid dam/ rgyal srid chen po dang / longs spyod chen po nyid kyi ched dam/ rgyal
234a7(rgyud): po chen po mnyes pa nyid dam/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rjes su rnam par spyod pa nyid dam/ mdor na yid la 'dod pa de thams cad gnang bar byed do// gang blangs kyang rung ste/ de mthun par
234b1(rgyud): gnang bar byed cing // grub pa'i rdzas rnams thams cad kyang thob bo// sems can chen po rnams 'gugs par byed pa 'am/ mdor na ji lta ji ltar zhus pa de thams cad mdzad do// las kyi nyes pa rab tu sngags
234b2(rgyud): ba'ang yang dag par sbyong bar byed do// zhes bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gsungs so// las kyi cho ga gzhan pa bar ma'i sgrub thabs su 'gyur ba ni/ dang po re zhig khyad par gyi gnas sam/ gtsang ma'i
234b3(rgyud): phyogs sam/ chu klung ngam/ chu gling gi 'gram du sngar bzhin du thams cad byas nas ras ris zhal nub tu phyogs par gzhag la/ bdag nyid kha shar du phyogs par gnas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/
234b4(rgyud): rgyas par gong bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste/ thun gsum du 'bum phrag drug bzlas par bya'o// bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dong ka'i me tog tsan dan dkar po dang bsres pa 'am/ gur kum dang bsres
234b5(rgyud): pas snga ma de bzhin kho na ra me sbar nas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// sbyin sreg gi mthar ras ris 'gul na blon po nyid do// ras ris la 'od kyi snang ba byung na 'od las rgyal srid do// ras ris kun nas 'bar
234b6(rgyud): ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs na rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rigs kyi rgyal srid do// ras ris la me byung na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang phyug nyid de brgya byin nyid do// ras ris chos ston par byed pa byung na byang chub sems
234b7(rgyud): dpa' gsum gyi dbang phyug nyid do// ras ris kyi phyag spyi bor reg na mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sa bdun rjes su thob pa dang / stobs bcu nges pa nyid rim gyis thob par byed pa nyid do// de nas sgrub pa pos
235a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis gsungs pa'i sngags bsgrubs te bkres pa dang skom pa phyir gzhil ba'i don rjes su thob pa de nyid kyis dang / cho ga de nyid kyi yo byad kyis rig pa'i
235a2(rgyud): spyod pa'i ngor sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga'i chos la yang dag par nan tan bya'i/ gzhan du grub par mi 'gyur ro// de ltar rim gyis sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su 'jug cing mdor na nan tan gyis nges par sgrub
235a3(rgyud): par byed de/ rdzas dang / sman dang / yo byad kyi khyad par dang / nor bu rin po che rnams ji ltar sngar nges par bstan pa bzhin du sgrub par byed do// sngags shes sngags ni zlos pa po'ang // cho ga bshad pa la
235a4(rgyud): sems pa// sngags pa de tshe de phyogs su// gtsang ma'i 'gro bas zas kyang ni// zos nas yid ni dga' ba dang // dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa dang // lhung bzed lhag ma rtag blangs te// sems bzang /
235a5(rgyud): chu bo gtsang bar 'gro// mtha' gcig tu ni bor nas ni// brtul zhugs can gyis dud 'gro sbyor// dud 'gro rnams la 'thur byin nas// 'bad pas lhung bzed bkru bar byed// lhag ma lhung bzed bya ba ni// sdum/
235a6(rgyud): med zas dang dri bral gang // lhung bzed lhag mar thub pas gsungs// gang du slong ba'i snod du ni// de ru zan ni mi bza' ste// der ni bza' ba 'bras bu dang // rdzas rnams rtag tu bza' mi bya// pad 'dab
235a7(rgyud): kyis kyang ma yin te// ut+pa la las byung bas sam// dri bzang ldan rnams spangs pa ste// sngags pas der ni mi bza' 'o// gang yang sngags pas ku mu da// p+lak+Sha u dum ba ra las byung // ba Ta'i
235b1(rgyud): 'dab ma dang yang ni// tsher ma'i yal ga ri khrod byung // A mra'i 'dab ma ru yang min// de bzhin bA Ta la las byung // sA la'i 'dab ma shi rI Sha// byang chub shing las byung ba dang // gang du bcom
235b2(rgyud): ldan sangs rgyas ni// shAkya seng ge bzhugs pa yi// shing de 'bad pas spang bar bya// shing de yi ni yal ga dang // na ga ge sar shing la'ang min// gang du nam yang bza' mi bya// mkhas pas de kun
235b3(rgyud): cis kyang spang // thub pa'i lo ma'i spyil po ni// rmongs pas nam yang 'gom mi bya// sngags pa dam tshig nyams par 'gyur// zas ni lo ma de rnams las// gzhan pa'i lo ma rnams su bza'//
235b4(rgyud): sa byung zangs su nges bstan dang // de bzhin gser dang dngulas byung // shel dang rdo ba las byung ba// de bzhin bza' ba blangs nas ni// rtag tu sngags pas der mi bza'// lo ma'i rgyab tu mi bza' ste//
235b5(rgyud): de bzhin lag pa'i mthil du'ang min// stobs bcu pa yi sras rnams dang // rang rgyal bse ru lta bu gang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos gtso// lo ma gzhan dang lnga bshos 'byung // zlos pos
235b6(rgyud): de rnams spang bar bya// yi ge rkang pas kyang mi 'gom// sna tshogs bza' ba snum 'khur dang // de bzhin btung dang bza' ba rnams// sngags pas 'bad pas blang bar bya// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i mchog
235b7(rgyud): rnams dang // de bzhin nyan thos skyes bu mchog/ dkon mchog gsum la phul ba yi// lha bshos thams cad nyid kyang ni// zlos pos rtag tu spang bar bya// chung ngu tsam yang lus can la// sngags
236a1(rgyud): rnams de yis mi 'grub ste// kun nas bkra shis thams cad dang // rtag tu dpal ni smos ci dgos// rgyas pa can dang zhi ba can// lha bshos gtor ma za byed pa// de tshe
236a2(rgyud): de yi kun mi 'grub// gtsang zhing mkhas la tshul khrims ldan// snying rje snying rje'i las can dang // gtsang sbra'i spyod pa la dga' ba// rig sngags kun tu sgrub par byed// sems cad gzhan la byin pa'i zas/
236a3(rgyud): zlos pos de ni bza' mi bya// gzhan gyis rab tu ma brtags pa'i// zas gzhan bza' bar mi bya'o// rang lo byin pa'i kha zas ni// cung zad tsam yang blang bar bya// sngags shes de ltar 'jug pa ni/
236a4(rgyud): de yi dngos grub sdig pa'i dgra// yongs su rdzogs par byed par gnas// zlos pos cho ga 'di yis ni// bza' ba len pa'i brtul zhugs can// thub pa rnams kyis legs par bsngags// sngag
236a5(rgyud): rnams thams cad sgrub pa la// mdor na cho ga mthong ba yis// bza' ba kun dang las rnams la'o// de nas gzhan yang rab 'chang byed// sngags ni thams cad sbyong bar byed// de nas zlos pos nye reg
236a6(rgyud): byade tshe sngags 'di brjod par bya// de tshe sngags pas lan bdun du// lus sbyong byed pa bzlas byas nas// 'byung po'i tshogs dang lha rnams 'dir// de don rgyas pa mnyan par gyis// lus kun te
236a7(rgyud): reg byas nas su// thub pas sngags 'di brjod par bya// na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ A pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba kil+li Sha/ nA sha ni/ nA sha ya/ sarba duSh+Ta pra yuk+taM/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hU~M
236b1(rgyud): swA hA/ sngags 'dis bslangs pa'i zas gzhan gang yang rung ba yongs su spyod pa na sngags lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas yongs su longs spyad par bya'o// zos nas snga ma bzhin du nye reg byas te spyi bo
236b2(rgyud): la sogs pa'i lus thams cad du byugs nas de nas ngal bso bar bya'o// ngal sos nas yud tsam phyed dam thun gcig la'o// de nas ras ris dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mngon par phyag byas nas/
236b3(rgyud): dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam bklag par bya'o// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'phags pa zla ba sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'phags pa sa bcu pa dang / 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa dang
236b4(rgyud): 'phags pa rma bya chen mo dang / 'phags pa rin po che tog gi gzungs te/ 'di rnams las gzhan dang gzhan gang yang rung ba bklag par bya'o// nyi ma'i dus kyi tshad bzhi cha tsam du'o// de nas yongs su zhi nas dzi/
236b5(rgyud): lhar 'dod pa bzhin du bklag par bya ste/ glegs bam brtul nas gos gtsang ma bgos te dam pa'i chos la phyag byas nas/ de nas khrus kyi ched du chu klung gi 'gram mam mtsho phran chen por 'jug pas song nas
236b6(rgyud): srog chags med pa'i sa blangs te lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas rig pa 'dis chu la gdab bo// gang zhe na/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba duSh+pa stam+b+ha ya hUM/ na
236b7(rgyud): dI ba ra d+hA ri Ne/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra phaT phaT swA hA/ 'dis bsrung ba byas nas phyogs rnams bcing ba dang / grogs rnams dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / kha bcing ba dang / gdug pa dang / rab tu gdug
237a1(rgyud): pa rnams thams cad dang / las thams cad 'gugs par byed pa dang / bgegs bcing ba la'ang srang bu la lan bdun bzlas nas rked pa'i phyogs su bcings pas thams cad du yongs su
237a2(rgyud): 'chags pa dang / bzlas pa'i dus thams cad dang / khrus kyi dus thams cad dang / gdug pa'i bgegs rnam par gzhom pa dang / rab tu zhi ba'i don du sngags 'di stong phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o// de nas las
237a3(rgyud): thams cad byed do// pad+ma'i gdan la phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pa dgod par bya'o// las rnams thams cad du thams cad byed kyi/ rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa pos sa las byung ba'i phye ma la som
237a4(rgyud): pa rnams blangs nas ji ltar bde bar khrus bya zhing srog chags med pa'i chus khrus byas te/ thams cad du las thams cad la srog chags med pa nyid kyis bya'o// de nas khrus byas nas sa'i rang bzhin nam/ gzhan/
237a5(rgyud): dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i dri dang yo byad kyi khyad par gyis rjes su byug par bya'o// chu'i nang du mchil ma dang / bshang ba dang / bci ba la sogs pa'ang dor bar mi bya'o// rtse bar yang mi bya'o// snying rje dang ldan pas
237a6(rgyud): bdag dang sems can thams cad la so sor brtag par bya ste/ bdag med pa dang / stong pa dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang / sdug bsngal nye bar 'gags pa dang / tshor bas mngon par non pa dang / chu rlabs
237a7(rgyud): bzhin du mngon par 'byung ba'i rab tu sbyor ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'di ltar sgrub pa dang bral ba sngags shes pas gang de bzhin du dug dang / gcod pa dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor
237b1(rgyud): ba dang / rnam par 'jigs pa la sogs pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po nye bar 'gog par bya bzhin pa/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thibs po gnas pa'i bdag nyid du mthong zhing gnas med pa dang / skyob pa med pa dang /
237b2(rgyud): skyabs med pa dang / shin tu dman pa'i yid can gyi bdag nyid du brtags nas sgom pa po mgrin pa nub tsam gyi chun gnas pa 'am/ lte ba tsam du gnas pa'i chu de nyid kyi nang du sems rtse gcig tu nye bar gzung bar bya'o//
237b3(rgyud): dang po re zhig pad+ma chen po'i 'dab ma la me tog chen po dang ldan pa/ pad+ma chen po'i lo mas nye bar mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin las byung ba'i sdong bu dang / rin po che ma da ka las grub pa'i
237b4(rgyud): pad+ma'i ge sar dang / shel las byas pa'i 'dab ma stong legs par kha phye ba dang / de'i rjes su skyes pa'i shel dang pad+ma rA ga'i me tog rnams kyis mdzes pa'o// de'i steng du seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rang bzhin
237b5(rgyud): las grub pa/ rin po che du mas nye bar mdzes pa ras bcos bu zung gis bkab pa'o// de'i steng du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsam par bya ste/ chos ston par mdzad cing bzhugs pa/ gser gyi
237b6(rgyud): mdog tu snang ba/ kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas khyab pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/ tshad chen po nam mkha' lta bu mchog tu bris bzhin pa/ skyil mo krung gis nye bar bzhugs pa/ g.yas su
237b7(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ pad+ma chen po'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ rnga yab bsnams pa/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i grwa na 'khod de/ lus dmar ser
238a1(rgyud): gur kum btags pa'i kha dog lta bu'o// g.yon du 'phags pa mthu chen po thob stong ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba phyag na rdal ba thogs pa'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' brgyad la/
238a2(rgyud): 'phags pa byams pa dang / kun tu bzang po dang / sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang / 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje dang /
238a3(rgyud): nor bzang zhes pa byang chub sems dpa' bcu po 'di rnams kyi g.yas su rang sangs rgyas brgyad bsam par bya ste/ tsan dan dang / spos dang ldan dang / tog dang / tog dkar dang / 'dod pa dang / nye ba'i
238a4(rgyud): 'dod pa dang / mu khyud dang / mu khyud brgyad do// de nyid du nyan thos chen po brgyad gnas pa la/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / 'phags pa shA ri'i bu dang / ba lang bdag dang / b+ha raH
238a5(rgyud): dza bsod snyoms len dang / pi len da'i bu dang / 'phags pa sgra gcan zin dang / 'phags pa 'od srungs chen po dang / 'phags pa kun dga' bo zhes pa'i nyan thos chen po de rnams dang nye bar dge slong gi dge
238a6(rgyud): 'dun mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o// rang sangs rgyas rnams dang nye bar rang sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad po rnams kyi gnas su'ang byang chub sems dpa'i dge
238a7(rgyud): 'dun mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o// de bzhin du kun nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan par bsgom par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang lte ba
238b1(rgyud): tsam gyi tshul gnas bzhin du lha dang mi'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa la me tog man+da ra ba dang / man+da ra ba chen po dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po dang / d+hA nu skA ri ka dang / bArli ka dang / in+d+ra ba ra'i me tog rnam pa/
238b2(rgyud): sna tshogs pa tshad chen po phung po chen por gnas pa ri rab tsam gyi me tog gi phur mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya zhing / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'
238b3(rgyud): rnams la phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams dang / lha dang mi'i mar me mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis mchod par bya'o// de bzhin du
238b4(rgyud): gtor ma dang / bdug pa dang / lha bshos dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur la sogs pa yo byad lha dang mi'i nyer mkho rnams dbul bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod/
238b5(rgyud): spu nas 'od zer mngon par 'phro bzhin pas bdag nyid dang phyogs thams cad kyang kun tu snang bzhin par bsgom par bya'o// sgom pa po bsam gtan la zhugs ma thag tu/ tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras
238b6(rgyud): bu thob bo// nges par byang chub la mchog tu gzhol bar 'gyur ro// de lta bu sogs bsam gtan rnams// 'jig rten skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs// 'byung po kun kyang legs pa dang // sngags
238b7(rgyud): pa rnams la phan don dang // de tshe bsam gtan dang po'i gtso// sngags pa kun la phan don du// sems can rnams kyi phyir gsungs so// de nas thub mchog bdun pa yi// dkyil 'khor rnam par brjod par
239a1(rgyud): bya/ thub pas dang por gsungs pa yin// gnyis pa yi ni dkyil 'khor dang // gsum par yang ni de las gzhan// dang por mchog gi dngos grub ste// bar ma la ni de bzhin
239a2(rgyud): gzhan// chung ngu la ni phran tshegs 'grub// thub pa mchog gis nges par gsungs// de bzhin ras ris bsam gtan ni// thu bo bar ma chung ngu ste// thams cad sdig pa 'jig byed pa'o// de las gzhan
239a3(rgyud): yang mkhas pas ni// bsam gtan rnam pa rab bsgrub bya// bsam gtan de la rab gnas na// sngags rnams de la 'grub par 'gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa'i cho ga bshad// zlos pos bsam gtan bsgoms
239a4(rgyud): nas ri// sngags kyi mchod yon der phul nas// ji ltar bde bar gshegs su gsol// chu tshogs de las bsgral nas ni// de nas ji ltar bde bar 'gro// gnas ni sngon du nges bstan par// cho ga mthong
239a5(rgyud): bas legs zhi bar// de tshe sngags pas gsang sngags bzlas// sngar las ji ltar brjod pa bzhin// rang gi lha ni spyan drangs pa// der ni sngags kyis gshegs su gsol// de nas bdag nyid de bzhin
239a6(rgyud): zhing // grogs po rnams ni bsrungs byas nas// dge ba'i las kyis de nyid shes// cho ga'i las la dga' zhing 'dud// rnam pa sna tshogs bstod mchod kyis// gang zag mchog la kun bstod nas/
239a7(rgyud): rang sngags sngags kyis mgon po dang // nyan thos rang rgyal bse ru dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// 'jig rten gsum po rjes 'dzin bzod// de nas gsang sngags zlos pa po//
239b1(rgyud): stan de la ni slar langs nas// thag ring gnas su song nas ni// phyi rol rlung gi rnam par spangs// snabs dang mchil ma rnam par dor// bshang dang gci ba'ang de bzhin no// nyin par byang du la phyogs shing //
239b2(rgyud): mtshan mo lho ru kha blta'o// sngags zlos pos ni nam yang der// don rnams bsam par mi bya'o// der ni rang las byed gsungs pa'i// sngags kyi bzlas pa mi bya'o// rab bsngags 'gro ba mtshan sogs
239b3(rgyud): kyi 'de tshes steng nyer 'dug ste// dag pa'i chu yis nye reg bya// gtsang ma'i gos mtha' chur gzhug bya// sa yi phung po bdun nyid kyis// 'bad pas rkang pa bkrus byas nas// rab tu 'dzag pa bdun
239b4(rgyud): blangs nas// bshang ba 'dzag la sum cu ste// gnyis ka'i mtha' la lag pa dag/ mchil ma dor ba nyid dang ni// snabs la'ang gnyis te de bzhin no// de nas 'bad pas nye reg bya// gnas las ring du
239b5(rgyud): song ba'i sar// de bzhin sgra tsam song nas ni// lam la sogs pa spangs pa ru// de nas gzhan gyis ci 'dod bzhin// lho phyogs mtha' yi phyi rol tu// chu dang g.yang sa med pa dang // de bzhin bye mas khyab
239b6(rgyud): pa dang // chu klung spangs shing ngogs kyang spangs// 'bad pas mi gtsang chu spangs par// bsang zhing shin tu sbyangs pa dang // bas mtha' ljongs ni spangs pa dang // rnam par dben pa'i sar song nas// sngags
239b7(rgyud): pas mi gtsang dor bar bya// zos po dus ni shes byas nas// ji ltar 'dod pa'i shugs dgag min// de nas dag pa'i phyogs song ste// bsam mthar de bzhin bshang ba dang // gci ba'i bya ba byas nas ni//
240a1(rgyud): de ru lus ni ci bde bar// gnyis ka'am gsang g.yogs sbas pa dang // skye bo med pa'i sa gzhi la// mi smra reg pa spangs nas ni// rtag tu gci ba bya ba yin// lus la lhag gnas bsha/
240a2(rgyud): ba dang // brtul zhugs can rtag gtsang sbra bya// reg na gzhon sha can rnams 'dod// srog chags spangs pa'i sa rnabs ni// gsum po de bzhin blangs nas ni// rtag pa kho nar bshang lam la'o// de bzhin gnyis
240a3(rgyud): ka'i mthar lag pa// sngags pas rtag tu sa dag ni// sngar bstan pa dag blangs nas ni// zlos pos rtag tu rkang pa nyid// g.yas dang de las gzhan pa ni// phan tshun nyid du kun bzhag nas// 'bad pas rkang pa bkru/
240a4(rgyud): bar bya// rgya cher sngar ni brjod pa bzhin// sngags zlos po yi gtsang sbra yang // dring med pa'i gtsang sbra ste// rtag tu thub pa nyid kyis gsungs// 'di dag mdor bsdus bstan pa yin// rgyud rnams kun tu mthong
240a5(rgyud): zhes// mnga' bdag thub pa nyid kyis gsungs// de nas zlos pos nye reg bya// sdom brtson dngos grub las la dga'// sngar brjod pa yi cho ga yis// yid kyis nang gi dag pa yin// gtsang sbra rnam pa lnga ru brjod//
240a6(rgyud): sngags pas sngags rnams thams cad du// lus kyi gtsang sbra de bzhin du// ngag yid kho nar rab tu bsgrags// bzhi pa bden pa'i gtsang sbra ste// chu ni lnga par brjod par bya// bden pa'i chos ni khro ba thul// chung
240a7(rgyud): shes bstan bcos mthong ba dang // phra mo'i de nyid don la mkhas// sngags shes las la grags pa dang // rgyu yis nang la mkhas pa ste// de la dngos grub rnyed mi dka'// bden pa'i chos mi rngam spangs pa 'i
240b1(rgyud): brdzun pa'i tshig ni smra mi bya// bden pa thams cad rnam spangs pa'i// ma rungs rab tu ma rungs nyid// rnam par sdang dang 'khrug bcas dang // gtsub cing gnad ni 'gems pa dang // bden pa'i chos ni rnam par
240b2(rgyud): nyams// sems can gzhan la gdung bar byed// pra ma nyon mongs can sems dang // chos rnams thams cad spangs pa dang // de bzhin 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid can// rtag tu khrims 'chal chos min spyod/ gasngam
240b3(rgyud): zlos pa yis spang bar bya// de bzhin nyid du grong gi chos// khro ba brnab sems 'byung ba yi// 'jig rten pha rol 'jigs pa rnams// blo ldan rang rgyal ba se ru dang // slar yang rtag tu nyan thos dang // sngon
240b4(rgyud): gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis smad// de bzhin rtag tu rdzun smra ba// 'jig rten dngos grub 'dod don gnyer// sa spangs rdzur smra nye bar smra// mi bzad dmyal ba chen por lhung // sngon gyi nges pa las de bzhin//
240b5(rgyud): dga' bas gshin rje'i 'jig rten du// rtag tu slar yang der gnas so// rtag tu rdzun smras nyer 'tsho ba// mi bzad ngan 'gror ltung bar 'gyur// thil nag rab tu tsha ba dang // yang sos ral gri lo ma dang // de bzhin
240b6(rgyud): shal ma li yi nags// der ni bskal pa mang por gnas// rdzun du smra ba'i skye bo ni// gsang sngags log par smra ba dang // rmongs pas log par brjod pa yis// 'byung po rnams la slu byed pa// de la grub
240b7(rgyud): pa ga la yod// de phyir rmongs pa las 'di yi// sngags kyi dngos grub ma mthong nas// sngags pa'i dngos grub med do zhes// 'di skad du ni tshig smra ba// gang gis sangs rgyas bstan pa ni// sa stengs
241a1(rgyud): 'dir ni rab spangs pa// bskal pa bye ba mang po yis// de yis grub par ga la 'gyur// de phyir 'di ni mi bzad pa'i// 'jigs chen mnar med 'tshed par 'gyur// yang sos dang ni
241a2(rgyud): thig nag dang // rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal bar ni// der ni bskal pa chen por gnas// dam chos snang ba bral ba'i phyir// dmyal ba mi bzang mun pa ru// byis pa'i skye bo 'tsheng par byed// dam pa'i chos la brnyas pa
241a3(rgyud): dang // mi shes mun pas bsgribs pa ste// ye shes byis pa'i ngo bo 'am// rmongs pa log pa'i nga rgyal can// rig pa'i rgyal po brnyas byed pa// mi bzang dmyal bar lhung bar 'gyur// de phyir sdig pa mi
241a4(rgyud): bya zhing // log par smra ba'ang smad pa yin// dam pa'i chos la brnyas pa dang // log par blta ba smad pa yin// de phyir rtag tu dang gyur nas// gsang sngags chog rtag tu bsten// bden par smra zhing chos shes
241a5(rgyud): pa sems can rnams la rtag tu phan// sngags shes sngags ni sten par byed// de yis dngos grub nges par 'gyur// mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma yi// las ni rnam pa sna tshogs byed// las rnams
241a6(rgyud): bya ba rnams kyis byed// rtag tu phan pa'i bya ba yis// bya ba'i las dang yang dag ldan// de la rtag tu grub par 'gyur// bya ba'i don dang don kun phyir// las don rtag tu bya ba'o// bya ba'i don du bya min gang //
241a7(rgyud): bya ba las la sbyar bar bya// 'bras bcas nyid kyi bya don gyi// bya ba nyid ni rtag tu bya// bya ba las dang 'bras bu nyid// bya ba las 'bras rtag tu'o// 'bras med 'bras bu nyid 'gyur zhing // 'bras bu nyid kyang
241b1(rgyud): rtag tu 'bras// 'bras med 'bras bu bcas pa nyid// thams cad nyid kyang 'bras bur bcas// rnal 'byor sngags ni bsgrub bya ste// yang dag sbyor dang bral ba yang // bral dang yang dag ldan sgrub pa po// bsgrub
241b2(rgyud): bya sgrub byed med par ni// de la grub pa yod ma yin// grub pa'i rdzas ni thams cad kyang // grub pa'i rgyu dang 'gal ba yin// sngags kyi dngos grub ma grub pa// sngags ni sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu// byed par 'dod/
241b3(rgyud): pa de las te// 'dod pa'i las ni bya bar 'gyur// las min las ni thams cad la// las kyi rgyud ni mi bya'o// sngags dang rgyud kyi don ldan pa'i// las ni mtha' dag
241b4(rgyud): brtsam par bya// brtsams dang rtsom pas 'dud pa yi// las nyid brtsam par mi bya'o// bya ba ma brtsams sngags rnams ni// lus can kun la 'grub mi 'gyur// sems can kun rjes skyong ba yis// zum
241b5(rgyud): pa'i gtso bos sngon gsungs pa// gsang sngags smra bas bstan pa yi// rgyal ba'i sras kyis yang dag sdom// sgrub po sngags ni kun shes shing // rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di la tshig/ sngags kyi tshul gyis
241b6(rgyud): bstan pa yin// lam ni byang chub rgyur gyur pa// sngags kun nyid ni sgrub par byed// rig pa mnyam par 'gyur ba yin// de ni ring po mi thogs par// mkhas pas dngos grub 'gyur ba yin// 'byung po
241b7(rgyud): thams cad zhi don du// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bsgrags// gsang sngags tshul gyi lam 'dis ni// mya ngan 'das grong 'gro ba yin// de bzhin rtag tu byang chub lam// chos don thams cad rdzogs
242a1(rgyud): par byed// de yi mthar zug dpung gnyen ni// dang po'i gnas ni sangs rgyas nyid// de bzhin 'dir ni lhun grub tu// 'bras bur bcas pa'i dngos grub thob// sna tshogs las dang
242a2(rgyud): chos shes pa// sngags rnams byed par 'gyur ba yin// tshul khrims bsam gtan rnam thar rnams// 'di rnams mdor bsdus thob pa yin// dngos grub don kun sgrub byed pa// rgyal ba gtso bos gsungs pa
242a3(rgyud): yin// gang zag rkang pa'i don thob pa// dam pa'i 'gro bar gnas pa dang // de bzhin rtag tu gnod sbyin gtso// thams rgyal srid rgyu yin te// lha min lha yi 'jig rten gyi// de bzhin de rnams bdag po na//
242a4(rgyud): sngags pas thams cad thob par 'gyur// bya ba 'bras bcas byed par 'gyur// gtsang sbra'i kun spyod yang dag ldan// tshul khrims bsam gtan rtag tu dga'// sngags rnams kun tu gsungs pa yi// de nas/
242a5(rgyud): sngags pas sngags bzlas bya// sngags pa 'byor pa 'dod pa yis// rnam pa sna tshogs las byas te// de bzhin mchog dang bar ma dang // tha ma nyid kyang bya ba yin// tha mas longs spyod 'phel ba ste// bar
242a6(rgyud): mas gong ma'i lus can nyid// mchog nyid kyis ni ldang ba nyid// zlos pos rtag tu thob par byed// sngags pas bzlas mthar ngal bso zhing // ji srid dus su brtag par bya// bzlas pa'i dus la bab pa na// der
242a7(rgyud): ni bsgrub pa bya ba yin// de bzhin las rnams sgrub par byed// de la rtag tu bzlas pas skyes bu rang gi sdig pa zad par byed do// sngags pas sngon las kyi cho ga gang byas pa skye ba brgyud pa rnams su grub par gnas
242b1(rgyud): pa de/ de bzhin du las tshogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ba de skyes pas sngags bzlas pas/ slar yang sngags zlos pa po'i sdig pa zad pa'i don dang / las de 'joms shing sngags grub par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du mchog
242b2(rgyud): dang / bar ma dang / tha ma'i 'jig rten gyi mchod pa dang bzlas pas sdig pa ma lus pa zad par byed cing / skye ba brgyud pa rnams su gang byas pa'i sdig pa de thams cad 'jig par byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa
242b3(rgyud): rnams kyi sngags bzlas pas lus rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / thub pa rnams kyis gnas pas dga' ba dang / yon tan thams cad kyi grags par 'gyur ba dang / gnod sbyin gyi khang par
242b4(rgyud): gnas pa'i rgyal po nyid dang / rtag tu don thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob pa dang ldan no// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod pal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags/
242b5(rgyud): ma sgrol ma ral pa gyed brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las/ ras ris bar ma'i cho ga rab 'byam ste dgu pa rdzogs so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang
242b6(rgyud): ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po khyod nyon cig/
242b7(rgyud): khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags rjes su spyod pa/ sems can mtha' dag gi don la brtson pa/ sems can rnams gang gis bzlas par bya ba'i rig pa'i sngags dang / gang dang ldan pas bgrang bar bya ba'i bgrang 'phreng
243a1(rgyud): cho ga/ rgyud thams cad kyi thun mong gi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga/ sngags thams cad kyi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga de legs par nyon la legs par yid la zung zhig bshad par bya'o// de skad
243a2(rgyud): ces bka' stsal pa dang / sems dpa' chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la rjes su brtse bas nye bar blangs/
243a3(rgyud): nas rig pa'i sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / dam tshig la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can rnams dang / sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir yang de bka' stsal du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
243a4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems dpa' chen po rnam par dbye ba rgyas par bshad bar ba'o nyom cig/ gang
243a5(rgyud): gos sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa/ sems can gyi don thams cad sgrub par byed pa dag pa ne ma/ dang po re zhig sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ na maHsarba bud+d+hA nA~M/ a tsin+tud+hA ta/ rU bi nI/ tad+ya thA
243a6(rgyud): oM ku ru ku ru sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ya/ sarba duSh+Ta bi mo ha ni/ ga ga nA ba la m+be/ bi sho d+ha ya swA hA/ rig pa 'dis bgrang 'phreng thams cad la las bya'o// sbyang ba dang / dbug pa dang / blang ba dang / rku ba la sogs
243a7(rgyud): pa'i las rnams bya'o// dang po bgrang 'phreng shing la ni// lan grangs sum cu rtsa bdun du// de yis mngon par bsngags byas nas// brtul zhugs can gyis bsrung ba bya// mtshan mo gcig tu gnyid log/
243b1(rgyud): nas// der ni rmi lam brtag par bya// mi ma yin gzugs kun rdzogs pa// mi sdug lhag par mche ba gtsigs// sngags pa la ni des smras pa// bcom ldan sems pa ji bzhin long // sgrub po tho rangs langs
243b2(rgyud): nas ni// shing de ru ni 'gro bar byed// mi sdug gzugs ldan gtsigs pa che// rmi lam du yang ma mthong na// sngags pas shing de bor bar bya// de nas gzhan du 'gro bar gyis// dang po ru rak+Sha yin te// de las
243b3(rgyud): gzhan pa dbang po'i shing // bo de tsa ni 'dod pa'o// gzhan yang 'bras bu 'byung ba yin// shing la 'dzegs pa legs rdzogs pa'i// grogs dang lhan cig 'dzeg par bya// grogs po med par gyur na ni// rang
243b4(rgyud): nyid de la 'dzeg par bya// steng gi yal ga'i 'bras gnas su// 'dzegs nas phun tshogs brtul zhugs can// de la rtag tu bag yod pas// steng gi yal ga'i 'bras bu blangs// steng gi las la legs sbyar/
243b5(rgyud): bya steng ni mchog gi dngos grub tu// gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa yin// bar mar dngos grub 'bring po ste// tha ma la ni 'og ma'o// srog chags rnams kyis ma spang ba'i// 'bras bu de rnams yang
243b6(rgyud): dag blang // nub kyi yal ga las thob pa// rdzas kyi rgyur ni bsgrub par bya// byang gi gnod sbyin mo la sogs// lha rnams lhan cig 'gugs par byed// dgug pa'i bya ba bshad pa ni// kun gyi don du zhi phyir ro//
243b7(rgyud): lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed dang // mi 'am ci dang srin po rnams// 'dod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed// 'byung po thams cad rgyas pa'i phyir// 'bras bu dang bcas las rnams ni// ma lus spyod pa byed pa'o//
244a1(rgyud): shar gyi phyogs kyi yal ga la// der gnas 'bras bu 'byung ba rnams// de bzhin 'bad pas byas gyur na// tshe ring po ma don gyi rgyu// rtag tu sngags kyi dngos grub 'bras// rnam pas/
244a2(rgyud): tshogs byed pa yi// gang zhig lhor ni 'gro ba yin// yal ga lo mar rab ldan pa// sems can rnams kyi srog 'brog byed// don zlos pos 'bad pas spang // lho ru brten pa'i yal ga la// 'bras bu gang
244a3(rgyud): du yang dag brjod// phyogs des gdung byed dgra rnams kyi// srog ni 'jig par byed pa yi// bsod nams ma yin mang po'i rgyu// de ni blos pos 'bad pas spang // 'og tu 'phyang ba'i yal gar gnas// 'bras bu
244a4(rgyud): gang zhig rab bsgrags pa// lha ma yin dang ldan pa yi// sa yi 'og tu de rnams 'gro// de rnams 'bras bcas 'phreng ba ni// blangs nas yang dag rab bsgrags pa// 'og tu 'gro ba'i 'khri shing la// des na de
244a5(rgyud): ni sa 'og 'gro// de ru rab tu zhugs nas lha'i// bde nyid zlos pos dang 'gyur ro// lha min bu mo yang dag ldan// de ni bskal par gnas par byed// bgrang 'phreng 'bras bu kun blangs nas// de nas zlos pos
244a6(rgyud): bzlas pa bya// lhan cig bsrung ba byas nas ni// de nas ji ltar bde bar 'gro// de nyid ring po'i gnas su ni// gtsang ma'i phyogs der sngags pa ni// de bzhin rtag tu 'dug par bya// bgrang 'phreng skyes pa sbyang
244a7(rgyud): bar bya// brtsor pas bgrang 'phreng 'bras bu blang // de nas kun tu yang dag sbyang // der ni 'phreng ba dbug par grags// gsum bdun brgyad dang gcig dang ni// lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// sngags
244b1(rgyud): shes der ni snang bar bya// rtag tu snga ma'i sngags kyis ni// brgyad dam bdun du bzlas byas pa// de nas de ni dag par 'dod// pad+ma'i rtsa lag legs brjod pas// bu mos bkal ba'i srang bu yis// su ma/
244b2(rgyud): 'gyur lnga dang ldan pa yi// brtul zhugs can gyis 'phreng thag bya// sngags kyi de nyid shes pas brgya// 'bras bu phra mo zlum por bcas// rtag tu srog chags bu ga med// yan lag ma nyams ma spang ba/
244b3(rgyud): mdzes shing kha dog sdug pa dang // bu ga med cing gas pa med// ril bu zlum po ji bzhin pa// de bzhin ru rak+Sha dang ni// bo de tse dang in+d+rak+Sha// 'bras nyid rtag tu lung thang mdzes// 'bras bu dam pa'am
244b4(rgyud): gang gi tshe// sngags pa mchog tu brtson pa yis// 'bad pas bgrang 'phreng brgyu bar bya// gser ram yang na dngul dag gam// nor bu shel las byung ba dang // mu tig dung nyid mu sa ra// byu ru yis kyang /
244b5(rgyud): bya ba ste// 'breng ba rnam pa sna tshogs bya// gzhan yang rin chen las byung ba'i// bgrang 'phreng bzang po bya ba dang // sa las byung ba'i zlum po yi// ril bus bgrang 'phreng can dag ni// mnyam par bzhag ste/
244b6(rgyud): srad bu brgyu// gzhan yang ril bu 'ga' zhig gam// 'bras bu'am khams las byung ba yis// ku sha'i rtse mos brgyus pa yang // zlos pos 'bad de bya ba yin// brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu lnga// lnga bcu
244b7(rgyud): 'di dag par ma yin// sngags pa mnyam par bzhag pa yis// 'bras bu'i tshad rnams brgyu bar bya// stong rtsa brgyad pa nyid bya ba// 'breng ba 'di ni thu bo yin// 'phreng ba rnam pa 'di bzhi ni// sngags pas/
245a1(rgyud): #rtag tu brgyu bar bya// de nas brgyus te sngags rnams ni// phyi mo gsum mam gnyis nyid dang // rgya lcags las byung gdu bu dang // de bzhin gser dang dngul dag dang // de nas
245a2(rgyud): zangs byung gdu bus kyang // 'phreng ba kun nas brgyu bar bya// de nas mtha' ru yang mig bya// de la rim gyis dgod par bya// 'bad pas mdzes par dkri bar bya// sangs rgyas ma lus bzhugs par ni//
245a3(rgyud): yongs su gsal bar byas de nas// dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba yin// sbrul gyi gdengs ka'i rnam pa bzhin// yongs su dkris pas brgyan pa yin// mu tig do shal rnams mtshungs shing // mgul rgyan
245a4(rgyud): rnam par sprul pa'o// de nas 'bab chu dge ba'i mtha'// dri ma med la khrus byas nas// go rims ji bzhin khrus byas te// chu yi gnas las ldang bar bya// de bzhin brtson pas nye reg bya// bgrang 'breng /
245a5(rgyud): srad bu blangs nas ni// ba yi rnam lngas rab tu bkru// sa yi phye mas rab bkrus nas// gtsang ma'i gos la dri bzang gis// rjes su nye bar byugs pa dang // rab tu bsngags pa'i kha dog kyang // tsan dan/
245a6(rgyud): dkar po gur kum dang // 'bad pas dron mos bkru bar bya// de bzhin gnyis ka 'gro bar 'gyur// ji lta'i gnas su song nas ni// gang du ras ris bar pa ni// rgyal mchog thub pa'i gtso bo ni// shAkya
245a7(rgyud): seng ge mi yi mchog/ ston pa'i gzugs brnyad de bzhin du// sa steng rgyal ba'i ring bsrel can// mchod pa de yi spyan sngar dgod// de dang nye bar bzhag nas ni// de tshe de yi spyan snga ru// dam tshig la gnas/
245b1(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad// son pa'am brgya yang gcig tu ni// brgyad dang bcas pa bzlas byas nas// nyin mtshan smyung bar gnas gyur nas// bdun pa'i thub la 'phreng ba dbul// snga ma de bzhin bzlas bya ba// chang ting de//
245b2(rgyud): dang mnyam par bya// de nas 'phreng la yongs su bzlas// mtshan mo de nyid du 'khod de// ku sha bting ba'i sa gzhi la// sngags shes der ni nyal bar bya// rmi lam gang dang gang mthong ba// dge ba'i rmi lam
245b3(rgyud): mthong na ni// rmi lam nges par bstan pa yi// dngos grub de yis bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas nyan thos bse ru rnams// gal te rmi lam mthong gyur na// sngags pas 'bras bu bcas par 'grub//
245b4(rgyud): nges par de yi cho ga bya// dge slong gzugs dang bram ze yi// gzugs brnyan sna tshogs mdzes pa mthong // gal te rmi lam de mthong na// 'phreng ba dbul bya de bzhin du// sngags kyi don kun sgrub pa po// de/
245b5(rgyud): yis gdon mi za bar 'grub// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las/ ras ris
245b6(rgyud): bar ma'i cho ga rab 'byam las bcu pa bgrang 'phreng gi cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam rdzogs so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas slar yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
245b7(rgyud): gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags kyi le'u
246a1(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga dang / sbyin sreg gi las la rab tu sbyor ba'i rig pa'i sgrub pa yod de/ me la nye bar spyod pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga las gang du rig pa'i spyod pa la mngon par brtson
246a2(rgyud): pa'i sems can rnams rab tu sbyor zhing gnas par 'gyur ba de gang zhe na/ rig pa'i sngags kyi tshig gsang chen ni/ tad+ya thA/ oM tiSh+Tha ha ri ping+ga le/ hi rak+Sha di hi da dA pA ya hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ spyan ras gzigs dbang
246a3(rgyud): byuphyag 'di ni mchog gi snying po las thams cad byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad ster ba'o// dang po re zhig sgrub pa pos me'i snying po 'di lan cig bzlas pas mar gyi sreg blugs gsum me la sbyin sreg bya ste/ me lha spyan
246a4(rgyud): drangs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rab tu sbyar te/ zhi ba can dang / rgyas pa can dang / drag po'i las rnams la yam shing rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro// mya ngan med cing zhi don du// khyad par rlar dang bcas pa nyid//
246a5(rgyud): mtho gang ngam ni khru gang tsam// sor mo gsum du'ang mtho ba yi// sdum pa'i rnam pa rab tu shis// cho ga 'di ni bya ba yin// bu ga med cing ser ka med// de bzhin ne tse'i gshog pa 'dra// ljang dang dkar ba'i kha
246a6(rgyud): dog gam// kha dog nag po spang bar bya// srin bu rnams kyis zos pa spang // bu ga med pa'ang yang dag sbyir// gzhan yang kha dog mchog min pa// tha ma'i chos kyang spangs pa'o// de rnams skam dang rlon pa'ang
246a7(rgyud): yin// de yi tshe yang brtsam par bya// ma rul yon po min nyid dang // shin tu ring ba'ang spang bar bya// de nas me thab byas nas ni// kun nas zur ni bzhi pa ru// 'og nyid du ni 'bad pas brko// khru bzhi pa yi tshad dag
246b1(rgyud): mi 'khru gsum khru ni gnyis pa dang // de bzhin nyid du khru gcig pa// rtag tu srog chags spangs pa dang // byems legs par sbyar ba de// de nas pard 'dra'i kha khyer ni// kun nas dkyil 'khor rnam pa'o// yang na
246b2(rgyud): 'bad pas zur bzhig/ 'dab ma gsum du bya ba'o// zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can// 'di yang yang dag bsgrags pa yin// mngon spyod la ni sa'i dbus su// rdo rje bya zhing rtse gnyis su// rtse mo gsum du bya ba yin/
246b3(rgyud): me thab rgya la khru gnyis re// gtsang ma'i phyogs su de bzhin bdar// chu klung 'gram du de bzhin spyad// bstan pa gcig gi phyogs rnams dang // dur khrod khang pa stong pa ru// sbyin sreg legs par brtsam par bya//
246b4(rgyud): de bzhin ri bo'i rtse nyid dang // rtag tu lha khang stong pa dang // de bzhin nyid du dgon pa che// gang yang sgrub pa'i phyogs rnams ni// gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa dang // sbyin sreg las ni thams cad la// de
246b5(rgyud): rnams gnas su gsungs pa yin// khru gang tshad du gnas pa yi// ku sha'i khres la nyer 'dug nas// der ni sngags shes khyad par du// sbyin sreg gi ni las bya'o// gnas de nyid du rab gnas pas// myur du dngos
246b6(rgyud): grub the tshom med// shar dang byang du kha phyogs pas// zhi ba can dang rgyas pa bya// lho ru drag po'i las rnams te// de ni sngags pas spang bar bya// shar bltas zhi ba'i dngos grub ste// rgyas pa can yang byang du phyog/
