438b1(rgyud): rtsil las byung ba'i skyes pa'am bud med kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas/ rnam par dben pa'i phyogs su ma rab tu sbar nas brkyang brgyang mngon par bsngags nas bzhu bar bya ste/ myos byed kyi tshor
438b2(rgyud): mas nges par gdab par bya zhing dbang du 'gyur te/ gang don du gnyer ba de rnyed do// dkar po'i nyal nyin mtshan du spung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar dri zhim po'i me tog stong phrag brgyad
438b3(rgyud): dbul bar bya ste/ kar sha pa Na lnga rnyed do// nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas te/ gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du pri yang ku shing gis me rab tu sbar nas/ be kaM ka ta'i
438b4(rgyud): yam shing stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig ga nor thams cad thob par byed do// dkar po'i brgyad pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar bya rog 'phur gyi bar du
438b5(rgyud): stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o// dong tshe bcu rnyed do// mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la gu gul gyi bdug pa bsregs te bA la'i me sbar nas zho dang / sbrang rtsi
438b6(rgyud): dang / mar gyis btags pa'i ka ra wI ra'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas me thab tu pad+ma'i tshad kyi ka ra wA ra langs te/ ka ra wI ra'i dbus su de'i mdog can gyi ldong
438b7(rgyud): ros mthong ste/ sngags zlos shing blang bar bya'o// med kyis blangs pa tsam gyis nyi ma 'char ba'i mdog can/ lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/ rlung
439a1(rgyud): gi shugs dang bcas pa 'dod pa rgya chen po skye bar 'gyur ro// lo stong phrag brgyad cur 'tsho bar byed do// sems can thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing rang 'chi ba shes par byed
439a2(rgyud): pa dang / gal te slar yang sgrub pa byed na tshe nyis 'gyur du 'gyur ro// khang stong du zhugs te phyogs gtsang mar ras ris bzhugs su gsol nas mi smra bar 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing phyogs gcig tu/
439a3(rgyud): bzlas par bya'o// de nas ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas gtor ma ches rgya chen po phul te skyil mo krung bcings nas/ ji srid 'od zer 'byung bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de mthong
439a4(rgyud): bas mtshams med pa lnga'ang zad par nye bar 'gro'o// de nas grub par 'gyur te kun nas rgyal srid chen po rnyed do// phyir rgol ba med par 'gyur ro// gi'u wang la stong phrag brgyad mngon par
439a5(rgyud): bsngags pa byas nas bdug pas bdugs te bar ma chad par 'jog tu bcug nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// thams cad kyang 'di'i dbang du 'gyur ro// ma gyur
439a6(rgyud): na'ang de dbang du byed pa la khyim du dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te/ rkang 'thung a ba a bI ya lag pa g.yon pas sreg blugs stong sbyin sreg gyis shig dbang du 'gyur ro// thun mong ba'i bud med
439a7(rgyud): dbang du byed pa la lan tshwas gzugs brnyan byas nas lag pa g.yon pas sbyin sreg gyis shig/ dbang du 'gyur ro// 'bangs mo dbang du byed pa la pun+du ga'i ge sar dang / nas dang / gro dang
439b1(rgyud): sha rnams gcig tu byas nas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ dbang du 'gyur ro// 'bras sA li btags pa las byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas nas gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg gyis shig
439b2(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur ro// rna ba'i mig sman blangs nas mchod rten gcig dang a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du gtums te stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pas mig la bsdu bar bya'o// skye bo thams cad
439b3(rgyud): dga' bar 'gyur ro// thun mong ba'i mig sman la mngon par bsngags nas/ gang thog mar bltas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya'o// gang lung
439b4(rgyud): phog pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// phug gi sgor 'bum zlos shig/ 'khrul 'khor ltung bar byed do// ba lang gi gnas su rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi mchod rten bzhugs nas 'bum zlos
439b5(rgyud): shig/ dong tshe 'bum so sor rnyed do// klu'i gnas su ras ris bzhugs nas srung ba'i cho ga byas pas 'dzam bu'i shing gis me slar nas mngar gsum gyi gtor ma byin te/ klu shing gi me tog stong phrag
439b6(rgyud): brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas bram ze'i gzugs can gyi klu 'ong bar byed do// de'ang ci bgyi zhes smra bar byed do// nyi ma re ri la dong tshe bdun bdun rab tu stsol cig ces brjod par bya'o// de bzhin du
439b7(rgyud): gyur cig ces brjod nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyi ma re re la dong tshe bdun bdud stsol bar byed do// lhag ma med par zad par bya'o// byed dkon mchog gsum gyi nye bar sbyor ba'i cheng du'o// ras
440a1(rgyud): ris kyi spyan sngar zla ba gcig tu bzlas par bya'o// dong tshe stong phrag bcu gnyis rnyed do// dkar po'i brgyad pa nas brtsams te ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du zla ba drug bzlas/
440a2(rgyud): par bya'o// rgyal srid sbyin par byed do// nag po'i brgyad pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas/ gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar bad kan mthar byed kyi snying po blangs nas srad bu dmar pos dkris te/
440a3(rgyud): de nas pA la sha'i shing gis me sbar nas phur bu can la stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas dum bu gsum du gshegs te/ dum bu re re la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas nas mer gzhug
440a4(rgyud): pabar bya'o// tho rangs dong tshe sum brgya so sor rnyed do// dkar po'i brgyad pa la mtshan mo gcig tu sbyang bar gnas pas a ti muk+ta ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya'o// nyi ma bdun bdun du dong
440a5(rgyud): tshe stong so sor rnyed do// nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la mtshan mo gcig smyung bar gnas pas mtshan mo shing ba t+yaM Da ka'i rtsa ba rnams bsregs pa'i me la stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ dngul stong so sor rnyed do//
440a6(rgyud): dkar po'i bdun pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs te pad+ma stong phrag bcu dbul bar bya'o// rgyal srid so sor rnyed do// skyes pa dbang du byed pa la nag po'i brgyad
440a7(rgyud): pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas/ nag po'i brgyad pa la mtshan mo gcig tu sbyang bar gnas pas byang chub shing gi shing la me rab tu sbar nas ku mu da la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags
440b1(rgyud): pa stong phrag spyir sreg gyis shig/ dbang du 'gyur ro// bud med dbang du byed pa la nag po'i bcu gnyis pa la so ru gan+ti ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyad 'phags pa 'jam dpal la snyun cig/ dbang du 'gyur/
440b2(rgyud): ro rasman 'ching ba dang / yid kyis gnyis 'thung dang / rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi brun la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas nas rkeng pa'i phyogs su gzhag par bya ste/ khu ba 'ching ba byas par 'gyur ro//
440b3(rgyud): chos gos kyi rna ba la lan bdun bzlas nas mdung pa byas na dug 'ching ngo // dug gso ba la lo mas so// phyag rgya dbye ba la chus so// 'bebs pa la gu gul gyi bdug pas sam chus gdon 'ching
440b4(rgyud): ngo sor mo la yongs su bzlas nas sdigs par byed pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// ras ris kyi spyan sngar brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o// rmi lam du ji ltar 'byung ba bzhin ston par byed do// ring bsrel
440b5(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas/ de'i spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po byas te a pA mArga dkar po zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa rnams bil ba'i shing gis me rab tu sbar
440b6(rgyud): nas 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o// rgyal srid so sor rnyed do// ma grub na grong bsdus pa stong so sor rnyed do// ras ris kyi spyan sngar gi'u wang ngam/ ldong ros la stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas
440b7(rgyud): nas bskus te dgra bo rnams kyi nang du zhugs na 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// dgra bo rnams kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ro// 'bebs pa la me tog dkar po dang bcas pa'i chu dron la lan gsum bzlas
441a1(rgyud): pa dang / ka ra wI ra'i ma tog la lan gsum bzlas pas 'bebs pa la bsnun par bya'o// 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa ston par byed do// 'ching ba ni sa gol gyi phyag rgyas shis par
441a2(rgyud): byed do// mig sman sgrub par 'dod pas dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i so'u bi ra'i mig sman srang gcig blangs nas/ bram ze'i bu mo kha byang du bltas pas ba byung lngas 'thag tu gzhug par bya'o// ming
441a3(rgyud): med kyi sor mos ril bu bzhi byas nas pad+ma'i 'dab mas g.yogs te/ cho ga 'di nyid kyis mar dang sra rtsi bog sreg cing stong phrag brgyar bzlas par bya'o// grong gi mchog bcu rnyed do// cho ga 'di nyid
441a4(rgyud): kyis mchod rten byas nas tsan dan gyis btags pa'i pad+ma stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya'o// yul gyi bdag po nyid so sor rnyed do// bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi mchod rten byas nas bdug/
441a5(rgyud): pa bsregs te/ tsam pa ka'i me tog stong phrag brgya dbul bar bya ste gser stong so sor rnyed do// bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi mchod rten byas te me tog gi ge sar stong phrag brgya dbul bar bya
441a6(rgyud): ste gos stong so sor rnyed do// de bzhin du me tog thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i cho ga'o// dur khrod nas ro bsregs pa'i thal ba blangs te zla ba nya la nyin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas pas/ ming med kyi
441a7(rgyud): sor mo'i khrag gis zlum po byas nas gzugs brnyan bris te rkang pa g.yon pas mnamangs stong thos shig/ rigs brgyad dang bcas pa dbang du byed do// bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi
441b1(rgyud): mchod rten byas nas 'bras yos la zho dang / mar gyis btags pa'i me la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad gyis shig ka gi lu wang la stong du mngon par bsngags pas thig le byas na gang mthong ba dang / gang rnams/
441b2(rgyud): mthong ba de rnams dbang du byed do// tho rangs tu ru ska'i tshul lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas te gdong bkrus pas gang mthong ba de sbyin par byed do// thams cad de kho na bzhin du til mar
441b3(rgyud): za bas khyor ba'i chu la lan bdud mngon par bsngags pa byas te 'thung zhig/ don du ma gnyer bar bza' ba rnyed do// rgyal po'i pho brang du rab tu zhugs te chos gos de blangs nas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
441b4(rgyud): yongs su bzlas te lag pa g.yon pas mdud pa byas na thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// chom rkun gyi nang du dran par byed cing bzlas pas 'ching ba grol bar byed do// gcod pa dang 'bugs pa la
441b5(rgyud): sogs pa'i sngags rnams la sA li'i 'bru dang / ka ra wI ra dkar po dang / yungs kar rnams kyis gzugs brnyan byas nas/ ras ris kyi spyan sngar lag pa g.yon pas mnan te stong phrag brgyad
441b6(rgyud): zlos shig/ sngags rnams slong bar byed par 'gyur ro// rims gzhom par 'dod pas gi ri kar+Ni ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ sha za'i rims 'joms par 'gyur ro//
441b7(rgyud): seng lding gi yam shing gis brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ gdon thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro// thal ba la lan bdun bzlas nas gzhan gyi gsang sngags sgrub par byed do// tshul
442a1(rgyud): lan cig bzlas pas grol lo// ras sam gro ga la bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na pha rol gyi dmag sde rengs par 'gyur ro// chu dang pe bzhing nag po'i brgyad pa/
442a2(rgyud): 'am/ nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas mtshan ma gcig par song nas lus kyi g.yas su ras ris bzhugs te skra bcing bar bya'o// khu tshur bcings nas ji srid khu ba byung ba
442a3(rgyud): de srid du bzlas par bya'o// 'chi bar byed do// zhes gsum pa la khu tshur sgrub par 'gyur ro// khu tshur byas na mi snang ngo // lo bdun brgyar 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// dbang phyug chen po'ang ci bgyir
442a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// phyogs gtsang mar ras ris bzhugs te nyin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas pas/ ras ris kyi spyan sngar gzugs brnyan byas te cho ga bzhin du mngon par mchod nas bil ba'i yam shing zho
442a5(rgyud): dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi dpral ba nas 'od zer 'byung ngo // de nas grub par 'gyur ba ste rdzas sam
442a6(rgyud): gser dpag tu med pa rnyed do// nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar ka ra wI ra'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ de nas ka ra wI ra'i me tog gcig blangs
442a7(rgyud): nas klu'i gnas su song ste/ me tog klu'i mtsho bran du bcug la sngags bzlas par bya'o// klu mo dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// gang don du gnyer ba de thob par byed do// nyin mtshan du spyang
442b1(rgyud): bar gnas pas nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la lam sum mdor mchod pa byas nas nye bar 'dug ste/ sran ma'i tshad kyis ldong ros kyi ril bu byas nas khar bcug ste ji srid khags pa de srid du bzlas par/
442b2(rgyud): bya'o// ldong ros grub par 'gyur te dpral bar thig le byas pas mi snang ngo // 'dod pa'i gzugs can lo lnga brgyar 'tsho bar byed do// nag po'i brgyad pa la khri'i tshogs can blangs nas gzhan/
442b3(rgyud): nag po'i brgyad pa la khri'i tshogs can la rtse gsum byed du gzhug go// gzhan pa'i nag po'i brgyad pa la nyin mtshan du smyung par gnas pas dur khrod du song nas rtse gsum la mchod pa chen po byas
442b4(rgyud): nas skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug ste/ lag pa g.yas pas rtse gsum blangs nas ji srid rtse gsum las 'od zer byung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas grub par 'gyur te mtshan mo ma brtsigs
442b5(rgyud): par lha'i khyim 'byung ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i bud med 'byung ngo // 'khor gyi skyes bu mang po'ang dgod pa dang sgeg pa la sogs pa rnams kyis kun nas khyab par nye bar
442b6(rgyud): gnas te gang bsams pa de thams cad rnyed do// tho rangs ston pas thams cad 'jig go// dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar
442b7(rgyud): tshangs ma'i khu ba zho gang la brgyad brgyar zlos la 'thung zhig/ nyi ma bdun gyis thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// ras ris kyi spyan sngar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bsrung ba byas te bza' ba pi To kA la
443a1(rgyud): ji srid zan du gyur pa de srid bzlas par bya'o// de nas grub par 'gyur te/ phyi nas zan 'pho bar byed do// 'brul skyes pa'ang ngo // sngon spyad pa byas pas lcags gsum las byung
443a2(rgyud): ba'i 'khor lo sor bcu drug pa'i rnam pa byas nas nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas/ rtsa ba'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas 'khor lo a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma bdun la
443a3(rgyud): bzhag ste/ skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug nas ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas blangs pa tsam gyis sgra li zhing 'khyil ba/ nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog can rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar
443a4(rgyud): 'gyur te/ gang rnams kyis mthong ba dang gang mthong ba de rnams dang lhan cig 'phur bar 'gyur ro// 'bar ba can legs par mthong ba blangs nas lag pas mnan te lan bdun bzlas pa byas nas gang la
443a5(rgyud): rig pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// ku sha las byung ba'i 'khor lo byas nas lan bdun bzlas pa chur bcug ste klu rnams langs nas ci bgyi zhes smra bar byed do// dong tshe 'bum byin cig ces brjod par bya'o// slong mo za/
443a6(rgyud): zhing ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mngon du 'gyur ro// de mthong nas sgrub par byed pa gang de 'grub par byed do// rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs
443a7(rgyud): nas arka'i me tog gis sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// chu klung de nyid du rkeng pa nub tsam du zhugs nas bil ba'i me tog rab tu lcug cig/ mes pos mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro//
443b1(rgyud): ma dAr ba'i ma chog gi sbyin sreg gyis shig/ dbang pos mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// de nyid du chul mnar ba'i me tog gis nor sbyin mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas par bya'o// rgyam/
443b2(rgyud): por 'gugs par byed do// 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o// sems can thams cad 'gugs par byed do// rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs te mya ngan med pa'i shing gi me tog stong phrag brgya
443b3(rgyud): blugs par bya'o// mtshan mo bdun gyis gnod sbyin mo rnams 'gugs par byed do// shing la mi smra bar zla ba drug tu bzlas par bya'o// mngon par 'dod pa'i rdzas so sor rnyed do// arka las byung
443b4(rgyud): ba'i rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan sor drug pa byas nas kha dog ma 'dres pa rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// de'i mdun du zla ba drug tu bzlas par bya'o// dkyil 'khor ba'i
443b5(rgyud): rgyal por 'gyur ro// yang na rig pa 'dzin pa nyid do// ras ris kyi spyan sngar mi smra bar zla ba drug tu lag pa g.yon pa la mngon par bsngags nas khri yongs su bzlas te nye bar gyur pa'i gter 'bum 'byung ngo // 'bras yos
443b6(rgyud): la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa stong phrag bcu dang / a bA mArga'i yam shing la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa stong phrag bcu sbyin sreg gyis shig/ gser stong phrag bcu so sor rnyed //
443b7(rgyud): gi'u wang blangs te ril bu byas nas lcags gsum gyis dkri'o// de nas gtsang zhing dkar ba'i gos bgos te dur khrod du song nas dri dang / bdug pa dang / me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas
444a1(rgyud): nas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byin te/ ril bu thong pa kha sbyar du bzhag nas/ ji srid 'jigs pa'i sgra thos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// 'jigs par mi bya'o// grogs
444a2(rgyud): rnams la bsgos nas yang khar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// phag gi mig blang nas phyugs dang lhan cig gzhon nu ma'i lag pas btag par bya'o// ril bu
444a3(rgyud): byas nas lcags gsum gyis dkris te lag pa kha skur du bzhag nas dbang phyug chen po'i sku'i g.yas phyogs su kham phor kha sbyar du bzhag ste/ lag pa g.yas pas mnan nas ji srid shi ta'i sgra thos pa de
444a4(rgyud): srid du bzlas par bya'o// rig pa bzlas te grogs rnams la'ang byin nas khar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// bsgrub par bya ba thams cad kun tu dga' ba dang lo stong phrag tu 'tsho bar byed do// pad+ma
444a5(rgyud): ge sar dang / mig sman dang / ldong ros kyang rung ste/ cha mnyam par byas nas gso sbyong can gyi bu mo'i lag pas btags par bya'o// lcags gsum gyis dkris pa byas nas sngon spyad pa byas pa rgyal gyi
444a6(rgyud): sbyor bas dbang phyug chen po'i sku'i g.yas su 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma phul nas dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas te kham por kha sbyar du bzhag nas/ lag pa g.yas
444a7(rgyud): pas mnan te ji srid kha Ta kha Ta zhes sgrogs pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gcig phul nas grogs rnams la'ang bgos te khar bcug pas mi sdang bar 'gyur ro//
444b1(rgyud): stong du 'tsha bar byed do// sngon spyad pa byas pas 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing ri'i rtse mor ras ris bzhugs nas 'bum bzlas par bya'o// de nas gso sbyong can gyis grog mkhar gyi sa rtag tu blangs nasa'o
444b2(rgyud): mas sbyar te 'jam par byas nas/ bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi ngang pa bya'o// ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis kha dog ma 'dres pa 'drar gzhug par bya'o// de nas rnam par dben pa'i
444b3(rgyud): khyogs su ras ris bzhugs nas dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pas mngon par mchod de/ 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byin nas gtsang ma gos gtsang ma bgos pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar dza
444b4(rgyud): srid ngang ba g.yo bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas sngar yongs su bzlas pa'i gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i me tog gis mchod yon dbul bar bya'o// slar yang brgyad brgyar
444b5(rgyud): bzlas par bya'o// thams cad 'ong bar byed de 'jigs par mi bya'o// sngags bzlas pa'i rma byas reg par bya'o// ci bgyi zhes smra bar byed do// lus kyi nang du son par gyur cig ces brjod par
444b6(rgyud): bya'o// de nas sgrub pa po'i lus su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// skad cig de nyid la sA li zhing 'khyil ba/ lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa/ nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog ltar snang ba/ thogs pa med par
444b7(rgyud): 'gro bar byed do// gang mthong ba dang lta bar byed pa de dang lhan cig 'bur bar 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin thams cad 'di'i dbang du 'gyur te bskal par gnas shing / gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe
445a1(rgyud): lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// sngon spyad pa byas pas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya'o// gso sbyong can gyis/
445a2(rgyud): mi smra bar thog phog pa'i shing blangs nas 'o mar nyin zhag bdun du gzhag par bya'o// de nas phyung ste sa dkar po dang tsan dan gyi chus mnyes pas ji srid rdo rje phog pa'i shing 'khrur gzhug par bya'o// de nas/
445a3(rgyud): sgrub pa po gso sbyong can gyi bzo bos seng ge byed du gzhug par bya'o// de nas rgyu skar snar ma la dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas dge 'dun gyis bstan pa'i slong mo bza' bar bya'o//
445a4(rgyud): ras ris kyi spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gter ma dbul bar bya'o// de nas sgrub pa po gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pas
445a5(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pas seng ge mnan te/ ji srid seng ge g.yo bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// g.yos pa dang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mtshan ma skye ste 'jigs par mi bya'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin
445a6(rgyud): pas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i yungs kar rnams kyis seng ge la gzhu bar bya'o// seng ge sgra chen po sgrogs par byed do// sgrub pa po'ang ma bsams par dgon pa las 'da' bar mi
445a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa pos lan bdun brjod nas seng ge la 'dzegs te/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang 'dus na seng ge la zhon te 'khor dang bcas pa 'bur bar 'gyur ro// yid kyis
445b1(rgyud): rlung ltar 'gro ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor du ma dang / bskal par gnas shing / gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe gang du 'dod pa der skye bar 'gyur ro// seng ge'i sgrub thabs so// nor sgrub par
445b2(rgyud): byed par 'dod na dkar po'i zla ba nya nas brtsams te mi smra bar 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing / ji srid phyi ma zla ba nya'i bar du ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas par bya'o// de nas ras ris g.yo bar 'gyur
445b3(rgyud): ro yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan g.yo bar byed do// nor gyi dngos grub chen por 'gyur ro// ni lA Ta ka la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags te mdud pa bya'o// gyad g.yul du
445b4(rgyud): rgyal bar 'gyur ro// thal ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te gyad kyi spyi bor bzhag par byas na g.yul du rgyal bar 'gyur te/ gyad kyi dngos grub bo// dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas/
445b5(rgyud): 'o ma dang lhan cig zangs kyi snod du bzhag ste brgyad brgyar mngon par bzlas pa byas nas 'thung zhig/ de bzhin du nyi ma bdun gyis thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
445b6(rgyud): dbang phyug gi zhal nas 'od zer 'byung ste sgrub pa pos bskor ba byas nas steng du 'gro ste rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i gzugs can lo brgya stong phrag gsum du 'tsho bar byed do// nag/
445b7(rgyud): bo'i brgyad pa la mtshan mo gcig smyung bar garas pas gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du gi'u wang bzhag nas ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de'i tshe blang bar bya ste blangs pa tsam la sred
446a1(rgyud): meng bu'i stobs su 'gyur te/ gzhan gyi mtshon cha rnams mthu med par 'gyur ro// gang 'phreng ba dang ldan pa de gnas so// lo sum brgya 'tsho bar byed do// nag po'i bcu/
446a2(rgyud): bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar bil ba'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas/ be kaM ka ta'i yam shing la tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyar sbyin sreg
446a3(rgyud): gyis shig/ dong tshe gcig rnyed // dkar po'i bcu gsum pa la nyin mtshan du spyang bar gnas pas sa las byung ba'i 'dod pa'i lha byas nas/ de'i khar 'bras thug po che stong phrag brgyad
446a4(rgyud): sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma bdun la gang bu mo 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// nag po'i bcu bzhi la nyin mtshan du spyang par gnas pas dur khrod du song ste/ sa la ma lhung ba'i ba glang gi
446a5(rgyud): lci bas dkyil 'khor nye bar byug pa byas nas ma nyams pa'i thod pa blangs te tsa na da na dmar po'i chus bkrus nas me tog dmar po dang / dri dang / me tog gis mngon par mchod cing
446a6(rgyud): nas thod pa la nye bar 'dug ste gsang sngags bzlas pas dgug par bya'o// ji srid thod ba g.yo bar gyur pa de srid du'o// de'i tshe grub par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe sen mo sa gang bkug
446a7(rgyud): pa de 'ong ste/ gang brjod pa de byed do// zhi ba byed par 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar pad+ma stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ zhi bar 'gyur ro// ras ris kyi spyan sngar mA
446b1(rgyud): la ti'i me tog zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyang sbyin sreg gyis shig/ zhi bar 'gyur ro// sngon spyad pa byas pa nag po'i bco lnga pa la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod
446b2(rgyud): rter du ras ris bzhugs nas mchod pa chen po byas te gtor ma rgya chen po dbul bar bya'o// phyi rol tu 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byir te/ de nas na ga ge sar gyi phye mas gzugs brnyan bris shig
446b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bcing ba'ang byas nas ku ga'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ ji srid du skar mngar ltung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// slar yang ji srid ras ris rab tu 'gul ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o//
446b4(rgyud): dngos grub kyi mtshar ma gzhan rnams kyang 'byung ste/ de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas 'phur ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i gzugs can
446b5(rgyud): dpag tshad stong nas mthong bar byed cing thos par byed do// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis gnod pa med do// sngon spyad pa byas pas nag po'i bcu bzhi la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas mchod
446b6(rgyud): pa rgya chen po byas nas/ ma nyams pa'i lus blangs te dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pas mngon par mchod nas lag pa g.yas pas byin te/ ji srid du 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// 'bar ba
446b7(rgyud): tsam gyis rig pa 'dzin pa stong gis yongs su bskor te nam mkha'i mthil du 'phur bar byed do// lo brgyad gnyis len pa'i rnam pa/ sga li zhing 'khyil pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis gnod pa
447a1(rgyud): med pa'o// 'bebs pa la bdug pas so// dug 'joms pa la yab 'dab kyis so// bdag nyid bsrung ba la bzlas pas so// dkar po'i bcu bzhi pa nas brtsams te ji
447a2(rgyud): srid bco lnga'i bar du gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar gso sbyong can gyis dag pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas bzlas par bya'o// gang 'dod pa de thob par byed do// mar la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags par
447a3(rgyud): byas nas 'thung zhig/ nyi ma bdun gyis yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro// ras ris kyi spyan sngar ma wi ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ mtshan mo bdun la rdzas skye bar 'gyur ro// dkar
447a4(rgyud): po'i bcu bzhi la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas u dum+ba ra'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas/ u dum ba ra'i yam shing la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin
447a5(rgyud): sreg gyis shig/ dong tshe lnga brgya rnyed do// nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la gso sbyong can gyis mar me stong phrag brgyad sbar nas mar me 'khyil pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ phyi nas bzlas pa
447a6(rgyud): dbul bar bya'o// de nas mig thob par byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du bzhugs nas stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas te/
447a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bya ba byas nas/ nyi ma gcig la thun gsum du yongs su bzlas pa lan bcu gnyis su bzlas par bya'o// rna ba so sor rnyed do// nad la 'phag
447b1(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ting nge 'dzin nges par skyes pa'i cho gas ras sam 'bras bu can la kha dog ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o// de'i spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas stong
447b2(rgyud): phrag brgyar bzlas par bya'o// ku sha'i stan la 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing dus gsum du khrus byed cing gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos pas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong can gyis tshes gcig
447b3(rgyud): nas brtsams nas ji srid bco lnga'i bar du bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o// de nas nad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// sngon spyad pa byas pa'i 'o ma dang nas zan za ba 'am/ ba lang gi gcin dang nas zan za bas
447b4(rgyud): dus gsum du khrus bya zhing / gso sbyong can gyis ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas mar me brgyad so sor sbar te pad+ma stong gis mchod par bya'o// nag po'i phyogs la bzlas
447b5(rgyud): par bya'o// dkar po'i tshes gcig nas bsgrub par bya'o// zla ba nya la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ mtshan thog zag tu bzlas pa bya'o// gal te rgyal por 'gyur
447b6(rgyud): na sgrub pa po'i khang pa 'bar bar byed cing me tog gi chun po g.yo bar byed na dkyil 'khor ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// ra sa ris kyi spyan sngar tsan dan dkar pos dkyil 'khor byas nas dri dang / me tog dang /
447b7(rgyud): kha dug pa la sogs pa dang / gtor ma'ang phul nas me tog gi ge sar brgya phrag gsum blangs te/ brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags par byas nas mar gyi mar me gsum sbar te/ u dum ba ra'i lam/
448a1(rgyud): shing gis me rab tu sbar nas me tog re re la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags par byas nas mar gyis byugs te sbyin sreg bya'o// gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// mtshan mo//
448a2(rgyud): bdun du dus gsum du yongs su bzlas par byed na de'i mtshams med pa lnga bsrabs par 'gyur ro// nyi ma so sor brgyad brgyar zlos par byed na sdig pa rnams bsrabs par 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas
448a3(rgyud): pas gang 'dod pa'i grong de so sor rnyed pa dang / mig gis gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro// rtsod pa las rgyal ba dang smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// til dang mA Sha'i sbyin sreg gyis gig/ nor skyed par
448a4(rgyud): byed do// ba Ta'i myu gu zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ dus ma yin par 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// ras ris kyi spyan sngar klu shing gi me tog stong phrag
448a5(rgyud): brgyad kyis mi bdag dbang du 'gyur ro// de nas yang shAkya thub pas slar yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la kun tu gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
448a6(rgyud): dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags kyi le'u mtha' dag rnam par bkod pa'i khyad par gyi cho gas sbyin sreg gi las rab tu sbyar bas rig pa sgrub pa po'i me
448a7(rgyud): la rab tu spyod pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga dang / gang du rab tu gnas pas rig pa'i spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa'i sems can gyis rab tu sbyar bar bya ba yod de/ de gang zhe na/ 'di'i rig pa'i sngags
448b1(rgyud): kyi tshig rnams gsungs pa/ tad+ya thA/ oM tiSh+Tha/ ha ri bing+ga la lo hi tAk+Sha/ de hi/ da dA ba ya/ hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi me'i snying po ste/ las thams cad byed pa/
448b2(rgyud): 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par bdag nyid dgongs so// sgrub pa pos 'dis me la sbyin sreg bya ste lan cig bzlas pa'i sreg thugs gsum me la sbyin sreg bya'o// me spyan drangs par 'gyur ro//
448b3(rgyud): bzhin du zhi ba can dang / rgyas pa can dang / drag po'i las rnams rab tu sbyar ba la yam shing gi shing rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te/ zhi ba'i don du mya ngan med pa'i shing rlan dang bcas pas khyad par du
448b4(rgyud): byas pa mtho gang ngam/ khru gang tsam mam/ sor gsum pa'ang bsgreng ba dang / 'jam zhing mnyen pa rab tu bsngags pa ni cho ga 'di bsgrub par bya'o// bug pa med cing khong stong yang ma yin pa ni
448b5(rgyud): tso'i gshog pa 'dra ba dang / de bzhin du ljang khu dang / lo ma bskams pa 'am/ kha tog nag po'ang spang bar bya'o// srin bu rnams kyis zos pa spangs nas bug pa med pa'ang kun tu 'jog pas/
448b6(rgyud): kha dog gzhan mchog dang tha ma nyid kyang spangs nas skam po de rnams kyang spangs pa bsregs par kun tu spyod do// ma rul cing mi 'khyog pa nyid dang gzhan spang bar bya'o// de nas me thab kun nas
448b7(rgyud): gru bzhi pa byas nas 'og nyid du bskor bar bya ste/ gzhu gang dang / khru gang gi tshad las khru gsum mam/ khru gnyis sam/ khru gcig ste/ de bzhin kho nar srog chags rnams spangs pa rtag tu bye ma
449a1(rgyud): bsngags te de la pad+ma'i rnam pas so// de nas kha khyer kun nas dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa gru bzhi pa'ang 'bad pas so// ras ris kyi spyan snga na ba can dang / rgyas pa can
449a2(rgyud): yang rung ste/ 'di rnams yang dag rab tu bsgrags// mngon spyod du ni bshad pa la// dbus su rdo rje bya ba ni// rtse mo gnyis ka rtse gsum pa// gzhan las me thab khru gnyis pa// thad kar yang
449a3(rgyud): ni bdun pa'o// de bzhin gtsang ma'i phyogs rgyab tu// chu klung ngogs kyi phyogs gcig gam// brtan pa'i phyogs sam dur khrod dam// khang stong sbyin sreg legs brtsam bya'o// de bzhin kho nar
449a4(rgyud): ri rtser yang // lha yi khang pa stong pa dang // rtag tu dgon pa chen po dang // de bzhin du yang gsum rnams ni// sgrub po'i phyogs su gsungs pa yin// gang zag mchog gi gnas de rnams//
449a5(rgyud): gsungs pa sbyin sreg las kun las// ku sha'i khres la nyer 'dug pas// gnas nas khru yi tshad las ni// sbyin sreg las rnams khyad par du// der ni sngags shes pas bya'o// dngos grub
449a6(rgyud): myur ba kho nar gnas// nyid du gnas par the tsom med// shar du bltas dang byang bltas pa'ang // zhi dang rgyas pa can la bya// drag po la ni b+h+yo ru ste// de ni sngags pas rnam par spang /
449a7(rgyud): dul bltas zhi ba 'phel// rgyas pa la yang byang bltas pa// 'di rnams sngags pas dus lhan cig/ rig pa bzlas pas yang dag brtsam// bil ba arka pa la// / n+ya gro d+ha yis rgyas las bya/
449b1(rgyud): mdzan stong canas shing rnams ni// dag dang rgyab gyur pa 'o// de rnams thams cad spang bya ste// zab pa rnams kyis bkag pa yin// rag tu ni dang rgyas las sa// rnad par pa gang na
449b2(rgyud): bsgrags// de bzhin nas po rnamasas la mo// zab pa rnams d+ha tus sa// de rnams med pa'i lam gang gis// shing de rnams su ga par bya/ ljang dang smram pa 'ang ba dang /
449b3(rgyud): bya'i mgrin pa dang mtshungs pa// de bzhin ku sha'i rnam pa yin// zhi dang rgyas pa rtag tu bya// mar gang dang ni 'dra ba dang // de bzhin dkar po'i rtsa rnams kyis// sdig pa'i las rnams rtag
449b4(rgyud): tu bya// rgyal ba mchog gis bkag pa yin// 'dir ni dri med tshul yang // dag pa srin bu spangs pa las// rtag tu de nas mngon par bkru// kun nas bskor ba bya ba yang // rang snang //
449b5(rgyud): phyi rol brtson pa 'am// cho ga ji bzhin nye reg bya// gtsang mas rtswa yi rtsa ba yi// sgron ma'i tshad las bya ba'o// de nas khu tshur tshang byas nas// 'bad pas me ni sbar bar bya// kha mi
449b6(rgyud): rlung gis bu mi bya// de bzhin gos kyi mtha' yis dang // gos kyi chun po'am sham thabs dang // sgrib g.yogs dag ni spangs pa yis// nam mkha'i nor dang tha dad rlung // nye bar
449b7(rgyud): bcom dang mngon dga' ba 'am// gtsang ma nyams pa bral bas dang // de bzhin gos dang nor bus kyang // rlung g.yab bya'o rlung bzang pos// me ni yang dag brtsam par bya// de las gyur/
450a1(rgyud): pa'i rlung 'di yis// sngags shes me ni sbar bar bya// shin tu mnyam bzhag sbyin sreg don// bud med mchog gzhan brtag pa dag/ byas nas yang ni mtha' ru ni/
450a2(rgyud): ba yi mar gyi sreg blugs gsum// der ni sbyin bya de las ni// gang yang tshad du bya ba'o// sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad dang // rang rang sngags kyi mgon po la// de nas ji bzhin 'dod
450a3(rgyud): phyag bya// de tshe me la sbyin sreg bya// gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas pa yis// rtag tu me ni spyan drang ngo // bdag nyid rtsom pas dri zhim po'i// me tog kho nas rtag tu 'bod// sngags shes
450a4(rgyud): gnas la mkhas pa yis// gdan ni gnas la phul nas ni// gsang sngags des so gzhan du min// zho ldan mar dang bsres pa sa// sbrang rtsi btags pa'i yam shing gsum// rgyas don ma
450a5(rgyud): la sbyin sreg bya// sngags kyi las kyis thams cad du// pad+ma'i gdan la nyer 'dug pas// zhi ba'i las kyi sbyin sreg bya// rgyas pa can la 'di rnams nyid// sbyin bya gzugs 'thur sngags
450a6(rgyud): rnams kyis// mngon spyod can du gnas pa la// gzhan gyi gzugs su blta bar bya// dri ma med pa'i lha rnams ni// rim pa bzhin du me thab tu// ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog dri// bdun du
450a7(rgyud): yongs su bzlas pa yis// mngon par bos pa de yi tshe// 'byung gnas nges par gzhal ba rnams// ji ltar gnyis kar gnas de bzhin// lam shing rdzas dang bsres pa dang // mar dang
450b1(rgyud): sbrang rtsi yang dag ldan// de bzhin kho nas zho bsres pas// bya'o stong ngam 'bum tshad dam// yang na brgya rtsa brgyad brtag bya// sngags ni blangs nas de bzhin du// rig pa lan cig bkras/
450b2(rgyud): pa yi/ mig dang gtsug pud 'bar ba yi// 'phreng ba'i me la me lce gcig/ de bzhin nyid du zhi ba'i las// sbyin sreg nges par bya ba yang // rgyas pa can la de dang dbang // drag po'i las ni//
450b3(rgyud): smad pa ste// rgyas pas spangs so sbyin sreg las// rab sbyor ma ni bsngags par 'gyur// skra can brgyad cu'i stobs dang ldan// rgyal ba mchog gis rab tu bsngags// der ni gas pa/
450b4(rgyud): sngags rtag sgrub byed// dkar ba'i me la sbyin sreg bya// gal te kha dog dmar de bzhin// rtag tu rgyas pa'i dngos grub 'dod// nag po dung khaM ser skya la'ang // g.yon pa can zhes bya ba
450b5(rgyud): nyid// kha dog rnam gsum rab 'jug pa// dngos grub rnam pa gsum yin no// sngags pa las gzhan kha dog gam// rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog nyid// de la sngags kyi dngos grub med/
450b6(rgyud): slar yang sa yi mthil 'dir ni// rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog nyid// kha dog gsal ba de 'dra yod// me ni 'bar ba mthong nas ni// slar yang las rnams brtsam par bya// spyan drang byas
450b7(rgyud): la gzugs kha dog/ gal te sngags kyi dngos grub 'gyur// slar yang sbyin sreg rab 'jug pa// las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis// spyan drangs gshegs su gsol ba nyid// ma la
451a1(rgyud): sngags ni brjod par bya// sngar ni rab tu brtags pas kyang // dkyil 'khor 'di su ro rnam pa gzhan// cho ga de nyid kyis kyis shig/ sbyin sreg 'di la spyan drang dang /
451a2(rgyud): gshegs su gsol ba'i las can gyis// las rnams de nyid kyis bya'o// der ni me yis spyod pa'i las// de bzhin gzugs dang ras ris kyi// spyan sngar brtsams nas 'grub par byed
451a3(rgyud): de la sngags ni sngar brjod pa// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bas bsngags// las rnams kun nas der bya'o// gzhan pa'i las rnams mi bya ste// khyad par sdig pa can gyi las// rgyal ba
451a4(rgyud): mchog gis smad pa dang // gang du 'jig rten dang 'gal spang // 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du langs// de nas byang sems sa yi bdag/ de bzhin mngon shes lnga thob pa// de nas lha nyid 'grub
451a5(rgyud): par byed// 'dir ni rtag tu sbyor shes pa// ras ris sbyin sreg las la mkhas// sa 'og bdag po nyid dang ni// bar snang la ni spyod par byed// de nas sa tha'i sgra dang ni// gnod sbyin
451a6(rgyud): zhing dam gnod sbyin mo// 'gugs par byed cing rtag tu yang // rgyal srid kyi ni bdag po nyid// yang na yul 'dir 'khor ba nyid// yang ni rig dang rig 'dzin nyid// lha min nyid dang sems can
451a7(rgyud): kun// dbang byed rjes 'gro 'gugs par byed// sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa// byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che// sems chen sa bcur gnas bcas pa// sbyin sreg las kyis/
451b1(rgyud): 'gugs par byed// sa stengs mi rnams smos ci dgos// lhag ma'i bdag po nyid de bzhin// khyad par 'jig rten dbang phyug nyid// 'byung po kun la yang dag nges// mi bdag nyid dang de bzhin
451b2(rgyud): yang // dbang gi don du sems can kun// mi bdag des sam mi des ni// sa stengs thams cad mnyam pa yis// las rnams de bzhin kun nas ni// rtag tu sbyin sreg gis bya'o// nges par
451b3(rgyud): las kun yang dag brten/ bdag nyid brtson pas lhan cig sgrub// dpal gyi don du de yi las// mchog dang bar ma nyid dang yang // yang na chung ngu nyid bsgrub bya// de nyid du ni rdzas kun gyi// dngos
451b4(rgyud): grub brjod pa'i don du sbar// lhan cig dngos grub blta bar bya// sbyin sreg las la legs 'jug pa// las rnams kun la phyag rgya bcing // bdag srung mar dang ldan pa yi// sbyin sreg las la/
451b5(rgyud): rab 'jug byed// de nas ras ris gsang sngags 'di// bdun bzlas pa 'am brgyad bzlas pa// rtag tu las 'dis spyod lam bya// na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwAtwa nAn/ a pra ti ha ta ga ti satwa nA
451b6(rgyud): ta d+ya thA.oM dz+wa la tiSh+Tha hUM/ ru ru bi shwa sam+p+ra be swA hA/ shing la sbyor ba 'dis bzlas te// slar yang gnyis sam bdun bzlas pas// sngags rig me la sbyin sreg gyis// me tog bdug pa dri
451b7(rgyud): yang rung // kun nas thams cad nyid la ni// lan bdun bzlas pa 'di nyid kyis// khyod kyis rab tu brjod par bya// las rnams thams cad rtsom byed pa// cho ga rgyu yi snga ma yis// rab tu
452a1(rgyud): rab sbyor nyid kyis bya ba'o// las rnams kun la sngar bcings pa'i// phyag rgya chen mo grags ldan ma// de bzhin bsrungs pa byas gyur nas// dngos grub tshu la mkhas pa yis/
452a2(rgyud): las rnams thams cad brtson par byos// gal te rus pa mthong ba na// dge ba'i sgra rnams nyid dang ni// rtag tu 'bras bu bcas pa de'i// gsang sngags ji ltar 'dod bzhin du// nges par mchog 'di sbyin
452a3(rgyud): pa'o// dang po las kyi rab sbyor ba// gsang sngags rgyu yis rab zhugs pa// 'bras bur bcas pa kho na yi// dngos grub de rnams bsgrub par bya// rgyal ba'i sgra dang pa Ta ha// rnga bo che yi dngos grub nges/
452a4(rgyud): thams cad du ni smad par brjod// sbyin sreg las ni gnas bcas pa// gzhan yang dge mtshan mchog dang ni// 'dab chags can nam dge ba'i sgra// rnam pa sna tshogs nges spogs pa'i// sgra yang rung /
452a5(rgyud): rgyal bas bsngags// rab bsngags dus bcas lha rnams dang // ying 'ong rnam pa snga tshogs sla// gdugs dang rgyal mtshar bang dang // bcur po rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang // de bzhin bum pa gang ba dang /
452a6(rgyud): mchod yon mthong na dngos grub rgyu// rnam pa 'di yis bsngags pa 'am// rab bsngags 'jig rten gyis mchod pa'i// dge slong dang ni dge slong ma// de rnams mthong na gsang sngags kyi// sna
452a7(rgyud): tshochogs spyod yul dngos grub bo// zhes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sde sdod bal po che theg pa chen po'i mdo sde ral pa gyen brjes kyi rtog pa las/ bgrang 'phreng srang bu'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam bcu
452b1(rgyud): gcig pa yongs su rdzogs so// / de nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar chu shing gi me tog stong phrag brgyad kyis mi'i bdag po dbang du 'gyur ro// nang thams cad las gang shu dang gdun/
452b2(rgyud): ba'i rma rnams la sa'i gong bu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byin na nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// sngon spyod pa byas pas pa byung lngas lus sbyang ba byas nas dus gsum du khrus byas te 'o ma btung bar
452b3(rgyud): bya'o// rtsa ba'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o// phyi nas nag po'i brgyad pa la ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji ltar nus pa'i mchod pa byas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ bil
452b4(rgyud): ba'i yam shing la ma ra dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi spyi bo nas 'od zer 'byung bar byed do// des sgrub pa po la bskor ba byas
452b5(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ste mchog gsum po rnams gang 'dod pa de rnyed do// rig pa 'dzin pa
452b6(rgyud): nyid kyi rgyal srid dang / khyod ci 'dra ba'i bcom ldan 'das de 'dra ba nga'o zhes so// dngos grub 'di ni bla ma mchod pa dang / snying rjes sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas sbyin pa'ang sbyin pa nyid kyis
452b7(rgyud): sgrub par byed do// nyin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas arka'i yam shing stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ gang 'dod pa de skad cig nyid la 'gugs
453a1(rgyud): par byed do// a ka ru dang / pri lang ku dang / nag gi sar rnams cha mnyam pa bye mar byas te kham por kha sbyar du byas nas/ stong zag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pas lus/
453a2(rgyud): la byugs te g.yul du zhugs na gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag
453a3(rgyud): bcu gcig zlos shig/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal mthong ngo // ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag bdun zlos shig/ mi snang bar 'gyur ro// nad kyis btab pa la ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag
453a4(rgyud): bco lnga zlos shig/ nad 'joms par byed do// sngon spyad pa byas pas 'bum phrag bcu gnyis zlos shig/ bcud dam bcud kyis len so sor rnyed do// de zos pas gnyer ma dang sma dkar spangs par/
453a5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas yungs kar rgyal po stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ rgyal po'i btsun mo dbang du
453a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// mtshan mo bdun gyis 'di la nor rab tu sbyin te 'dod pa nye bar gzhag pa ni ma gtogs so// ras ris kyi spyan sngar arka'i yam shing 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig/ gser srang brgya so sor
453a7(rgyud): rnyed do// 'bras los stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ mtshan mo bdun gyis bgegs med par 'gyur ro// pau t+yA ka'i shing stong sbyin sreg gyis shig/ skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro//
453b1(rgyud): 'bum phrag gsum zlos shig/ rked pa'i nad med par 'gyur ro// rims kyis btab pa la ku shas phyag par bya'o// bu mos bkal ba'i srad bu la stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas bcing
453b2(rgyud): bar bya'o// skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro// dong ka'i me tog stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis shig/ gos bye ba bcu gnyis so sor rnyed do// rgyal gyi lcags las byung ba'i srang shin tu mdzes pa la 'khor lo 'dab
453b3(rgyud): ma bcu pa byas nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas/ nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ 'khor lo blangs nas ji srid du mtshan ma byung ba de srid du
453b4(rgyud): bzlas par bya'o// gang gi tshe me stag 'phro bar byed pa dang / ji srid du 'bar bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas grub par 'gyur te rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad 'dug par byed cing 'khor
453b5(rgyud): dang bcas pa 'phur bar byed do// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang / bskal pa chen por gnas pa dang / thogs pa med par 'gro bar byed do// snga bar langs nas lor bzlas par bya'o// mchog
453b6(rgyud): sbyin par byed do// zla ba drug tu lan cig brjod pas nad chen po grol lo// zla ba gcig tu zlos cig/ dus ma yin par gu gul gyi bdug pas mche ba'i dug 'bebs par byed do// nyin gcig pa
453b7(rgyud): dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa la sogs pa rnams su'ang ngo // bud med dbang du byed pa la ras ris kyi spyan sngar lA pa na la sbrang rtsi btags pa mtshan mo bdun du
454a1(rgyud): khrun gsum du sbyin sreg nyi shu rtsa gcig kyis shig/ dbang du 'gyur ro// 'do na lugs sa mos skyes bu la'o// rgyal po ni ras ris kyi stan sngar arka'i lam shing lazho dang / spang /
454a2(rgyud): rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ dbang du 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i blon po la sogs pa la mtshan mo thun gsum du lan cha nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg gyis shig/ dbang du
454a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// mgo bo la lan gsum mam bdun du mngon par bsngags nas rgyal po'i sgor 'jug par byed na rgyal po'i gnang chen por 'gyur ro// brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pas rma bya'i gdongs/
454a4(rgyud): kyis phyag par byas na dug 'joms so// ldong ros a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du gtums par byas nas stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pas yang dag par brtsam par bya ste skal ba bzang por
454a5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// ras ris kyi spyan sngar dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te/ 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing dus gsum du khrus byas nas gos lan gsum brdzes te/ a ka ru dang / du ru ka dang / tsan
454a6(rgyud): ngan rnams bsregs shing dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma chu las skyes pa 'am/ thang las skyes pa'i dri zhim pa'i me tog dang / ba'i mar gyi mar me
454a7(rgyud): gsum mo// mthar mtshan mo gsum du ltung bar gnas pas mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// gang don du gcer ba de rnyed do// thun mtshams su bza' ba'ang ji ltar nus pa sbyin no//
454b1(rgyud): bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas mtshan mo gsum du spang bar gnas pas a riny+dza'i lam shing la no dang / spang rje dang / mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyang sbyin sreg kyis
454b2(rgyud): shig/ de nas ras ris las 'od zer 'byung ba dang / sa 'gul ba dang / mar me'i rtse mo 'phel ba dang / 'phreng ba g.yo bar byed pa ste/ mtshan ma 'di rnams kyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// rna ba'i
454b3(rgyud): mig sman a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du gtums te/ stong phrag rdzogs pa'i sreg blugs byas nas skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug ste/ ji srid grub pa rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o//
454b4(rgyud): 'bras bu can la gang 'dod pa'i rdzas de'i ming bris te stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pa byas nas gang du klu gnas pa'i mtsho phran der dor bar bya'o// de'i klu nges las thams cad rdzogs
454b5(rgyud): par byed do// nyi ma bdun gyis ji ltar 'dod pa'i gos sbyin par byed do// 'bras bu can la mngon par 'dod pa'i rdzas mngon par bris nas/ de bzhin du khron pa'am mtsho phran du gzhug par bya'o//
454b6(rgyud): denas skyes bu chur byi 'dzul byed du gzhug go// der yang sgra chen po skyes bus thos te phyogs che ge mo na rdzas la sogs pa gnas so// de nas blang bar bya ste chu klung gi mtha' sgrol bar byed pa bzod
454b7(rgyud): dka' ba can gyi 'dun sa 'am/ rgyal po'i pho brang du'ang rung ste/ lha rnams dran par byas te gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// gang du 'dod pa dbang du bya'o// de 'phags pa'i zhal du'ang
455a1(rgyud): bcug nas cung zad yang dag par gsung bar mdzod cig/ ring por mi thogs par dbang du 'gyur ro// chu snod du byas nas de la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
455a2(rgyud): phyug bsams te stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pa'i chu nges mche ba can la gtor bar bya'o// dug med par 'gyur ro// de la brjod pa'i cho gas dkyil 'khor du rab tu zhugs pa ni don
455a3(rgyud): med par mi 'gyur ro// sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung blangs nas tsA ru bza' zhing mi smra bar dkyil 'khor byas nas zla ba nya nas brtsams te/ ji srid gsum pa'i bar de srid du bzlas par bya ste/
455a4(rgyud): 'bum bzlas so// zla ba drug tu tshangs par spyod pa dang brtul zhugs 'di nyid spyad cing zla bas dngos grub dang / zla ba drug gis 'gro ba mtha' dag mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// lus kyis kyang
455a5(rgyud): mchog gi dngos grub thob par byed do// zla bas sngags thams cad sgrub par byed do// gang 'dod pa'i klu'i rgyal po mngon par bris nas de'i steng du rkang pa g.yon pa gzhag ste g.yogs pa'i
455a6(rgyud): phyogs su 'bum bzlas par bya'o// klu'i rgyal po de 'ong ste/ de ci bgyi zhes smra bar byed do// klu thams cad kyi gnas su rab tu 'jug par gyis shig ces brjod par bya'o// der rab tu
455a7(rgyud): 'jug par byed do// gang tshol ba de rnyed do// de bzhin du gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po bris nas sgrub par byed na bka' bsgo ba byed de/ thams cad 'dzin pa'i gtsang ma'i gnas nas rdul chung ngu blang
455b1(rgyud): te sbrul gyi steng du yongs su thor cig/ sbrul bzlog pa byas par 'gyur ro// slar yang gal te grol bar 'dod pa brjod par bya ste/ gos dkar po'i kha dog can la sa las byung ba'i phyag rgya byas nas stong //
455b2(rgyud): zag brgyad mngon par bsngags te mche ba'i steng du 'jog tu bcug nas khu gcig shi ba'ang spong bar byed do// ldong ros la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams dang / ral gri dang rdo rje dang / 'khor lo dang /
455b3(rgyud): b+hu Shu N+Da la sogs pa rnams pa byung lngas sbyangs nas stong phrag rdzogs pa'i sreg blugs bya ste/ rdzas gang yang rung ba blangs nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar cho ga sngon du 'gro bas 'bum phrag lngar zlos shig
455b4(rgyud): phyi nas ji ltar byas pa'i rin gyis ldong ros blangs nas byang chub shing gi yam shing gis me sbar te/ ji srid me'i mdog tu gyur pa de srid du bsreg par bya'o// de nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba las byung
455b5(rgyud): ba'i 'o ma bu mos bsrubs pas mar du byas nas thal ba mar la gdab par bya'o// de bzhin du zhos bkang ba'i snod dang sbrang rtsis bkang ba la'ang ngo // de nas blangs te gur kum gyi za ma tog
455b6(rgyud): gzhag nas bcom ldan 'das ma 'di nyid kyis bdag nyid bsrang ba byas te/ zla ba gzas bzung ba na mtshan mo gsum du sbyang bar gnas pas ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ a shwat+tha'i
455b7(rgyud): 'dab ma gsum gyis kun tu dkris nas bzhis dgab par bya'o// ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste lag pa g.yas pas mnan nas ji srid dro ba dang / du ba 'thul ba dang / 'bar bar gyur pa de/
456a1(rgyud): srid du bzlas par bya'o// dro bzhin pa la thig le byas nas sems can thams cad dbang du byed do// du bas mi snang ba'o// 'bar bas nam mkha' la 'gro'o// lo stong phrag/
456a2(rgyud): bcur 'tsho bar byed do// sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// de bzhin du mig sman pa bla sgrub par byed pa dang / gi'u wang la cho ga 'di'o// dkar po'i bco lnga la pad+ma 'dab mar bzhag ste ras/
456a3(rgyud): ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas lag pa kha sbyor gyis blangs te/ ji srid dro ba dang / du ba 'thul ba dang / 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// 'di nyid la mangs grub rnam pa gsum mo//
456a4(rgyud): ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag bcur zlos shig/ de nas bzo bo dbang po ma tshang ba min pa gso sbyong can gyis lcags gsum gyi pad+ma 'dab ma bcu pa 'am/ brgyad pa gdan dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa byas
456a5(rgyud): nas/ de nas gur kum dang / gi'u wang dang / ga pur rnams nam mkha'i chus btags pa pad+mar chug cig/ dkar po'i brgyad pa la ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar
456a6(rgyud): gnas pas skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste sdig pa bshags pa dang / gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pa byas nas lag pa g.yas pas pad+ma blangs nas ji srid du 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de
456a7(rgyud): nas pad+ma des 'khor dang bcas pa rig par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar byed do// de bzhin du ga du bu dang / cod pan dang / lcags sgrog
456b1(rgyud): dang / rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang 'khor lo'ang ngo zhes pa'o// 'di ni 'khor lo'i khyad par te lcags lnga pa'i 'khor lo byas nas so rnon po 'khor lo mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pa mtho gang gi tshang ngo //
456b2(rgyud): gang+gA'i 'gram gnyis kyis blangs nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar gong bur bya'o// de la 'khor lo rab tu bzhag nas tsan dan dmar pos mchod de/ ka ra wI ra'i me tog dmar po dang 'phreng ba phul nas
456b3(rgyud): dkar po'i brgyad pa la gso sbyong can gyis spyang bar gnas pas slong mos dge 'dun la ston mo byas te dngos grub stsal bar bya'o// gtsang ma gos gtsang ma bgos pas snying rje'i sems kyis rab
456b4(rgyud): tu sbyar bar bya'o// ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pa rnams phul nas/ ji ltar nye bar 'byor pa'i mar me phul nas 'khor lo'i phyogs bzhir yang mar me
456b5(rgyud): bzhi dang / gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ tsan dan dmar pos btags pa rnams la lan re bzlas te re res bsnun par bya'o// ji srid stong phrag brgyad
456b6(rgyud): kyi bar du'o// be nas 'khor lo sgra dang / 'od zer 'gro ba dang / de nas 'bar ro// gnyis pa la 'khor lo nges par 'gro ste/ de nas sgrub pa pos sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
456b7(rgyud): cad la phyag byas nas rig pa zlos shig/ de blang bar bya'o// blangs pa tsam gyis 'khor dang bcas pa rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/ dpag tshad stong phrag drug cur rig pa 'dzin pa chen po klu dang
457a1(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mang du 'dod par 'gyur ro// mo stong phrag lnga 'tsho bar byed do// shi na'ang bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas ril bu sgrub par
457a2(rgyud): 'dod na se le ta ka dang / tsan dan dmar po dang / rgya skyegs dang / gu gul dang / tA ra ba ra ta ka'i rtsa ba dang / lcags kyi phye ma dang / gi ri kar+Ni dang / 'bru'i phub ma dang / ru rta dang / rgya spos dang /
457a3(rgyud): sbrang rtsi dang / pi pi ling dang / tu ru ska rnams gcig tu byas nas phye ma zhim mor byed du gzhug go// de nas ser skya rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba'i 'o ma blangs nas bu mos bsrubs pa'i mar gsar gyis
457a4(rgyud): gcig tu byas nas phye ma des rgya shug gi tshig gu tsam gyi ril bu byed du gzhug go// de nas dkar po'i brgyad pa'am dkar po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas/ yan lag brgyad
457a5(rgyud): pa'i gso sbyong can gyis ril bu lnga tsam blangs te/ a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du gtum pa byas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar bgrang 'phreng dang / til mar dang / phye ma la sogs pa gzhan la sbyin par
457a6(rgyud): bya'o// ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste mchod pa'i cho ga byas pas lag pa g.yas pas mnan te ji srid du ba 'thul ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// yang dag par bgos te khar bcug pas mi snang
457a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// lha gzugs can rnams 'ong ngo // grub pa rnams thams cad 'thon nas mthong ngo // lo brgya phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do// de nas 'bar byed na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur
457b1(rgyud): ro dngos grub rnam pa gnyis so// 'di'ang bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtsa ba'i rig pa'i las sgrub pa'i thabs su 'gyur ro// gsum pa 'am bdun pa'i sgrub pa la mtshams med pa lnga byed pa'ang 'grub
457b2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// rtsa ba'i snying pos kyang las 'di rnams 'grub par byed pa de ji lta ba bzhin du rtog par byed do// bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog par sgrub thabs thams cad ces bya ba 'di rdzogs
457b3(rgyud): so/ rang de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis yang dag par
457b4(rgyud): gzigs nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su son pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ mi dang 'byung po'i dpung gnas
457b5(rgyud): ba'i// sems can rnams la rjes brtse bas// dkyil 'khor las can thams cad ni// sems dpa' chen po spros shig spros// sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor lha rnams dang // phun tshogs
457b6(rgyud): thams cad mngon par 'phel// sgrub po rnams la phan pa yi// don phyir 'dren pas rgyas par smros// ngo mtshar rmad byung thams cad kyi// lus can bar mar gyur pa rnams// khyod kyi tshig
457b7(rgyud): gi mchog gyur pa// 'byung 'gyur de dag thos nas ni// myur du lha rnams sgrub pa la// sems can gang du rab zhugs pa// de nyid du ni sngar bshad pa// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan dang /
458a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas bye ba stong rnams kyis// thams cad de la rjes yi rang // dkyil 'khor sdig pa kun 'joms pa// dngos grub kun byed dge ba ni// sems can rnams kyi mgon
458a2(rgyud): khos spros// sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor khyod kyi tshig pa sems can cho ga yang dag 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor gang 'di thos nas ni// rab tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur// dpal min 'joms shing zhi ba dang /
458a3(rgyud): de bzhin nang dang dgra 'phrog cing // dkyil 'khor sems can thams cad kyi// gzi brjid stobs ci dam par 'phel// mthong ngam thos nas de nas ni// rab tu dad pa skyed par byed// gang
458a4(rgyud): yin de rnams bdag gis ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub ni// thob pa'i ched du'ang lung bstan to// ma 'ongs sangs rgyas 'byung 'gyur pa// 'jig rten mgon po de rnams kyang // rjes su
458a5(rgyud): yi rang 'gyur ba yin// dkyil 'khor phun tshogs 'phel byed pa// de bzhin yon tan kun sdud pa// sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor rmad byung ba// sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten mgon//
458a6(rgyud): yang dag dka' yis smros shig smos// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs nas/
458a7(rgyud): bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas ras/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga nga na ba der thal mo sa phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thu ba pa la tha mi/
458b1(rgyud): dad pa'i tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa'i tshig gis mngon par bstod do// shAkya'i rgyal po lha yi rgyal// phun tshogs yon tan du ma can// rab bsngags rdzu 'phrul rab ma nyams// rgyun du dkar
458b2(rgyud): ba'i gos dang ldan// mchod sdong zhal ni 'dam skyes dri// blo bzang snying po brten par 'dzin// gang phyir khyod ni phun tshogs nyid// 'di ni 'gro ba de dag gi dga' bas dga' bar byang ba ni
458b3(rgyud): mgo bo lha rnams kyi ni ste/ rang bzhin dran pas kun tu snang // de yi tshig ni rab rig pa// dpa' de chags pa zad pa nyid// 'bras bu gsum nyid 'dzin par byed// de de gzhan du de yi
458b4(rgyud): sa lha yi mdzes mas kun bsrungs pa// brgyad kyis 'dir ni dbang zhal las// skyes pa'i dpa' bo rab stobs dang // g.yo ba'i spro dga'i dbang po dang // kun nas gser gyi ri
458b5(rgyud): dang ldan// cod pan yang ni lhan cig gdan// lha dang lha min lhar bcas pa'i// lhag pa'i theg pa thams cad kyi// 'jig rten par ngo'i srid pa dang // skye ba khyod kyi srog la sogs//
458b6(rgyud): byung ba mdzes ldan rang nyid kyi// 'di yi mig ni dga' ba ste// gang rnams zla ba lta bu dkar// lha rnams kyis bzung ri bong can// kun da du ku la dkar po yi// gos ni mnabs nyid
458b7(rgyud): tsa ko ra// brgya byin 'dab brgya pa yi mig/ sa srungs phrag par phyogs gcig 'gro// bla ma'i ri la ri bong can// rgyal po'i dpung ldan brgya byin ni// mig brgya brtson 'grus ma
459a1(rgyud): nyams pas// grangs nas chu gter chu 'byin pa// tshogs kyi sgra ni dga' ba dang // dri med spyan ni dga' ba la'ang // nyi ma'i 'od zer dam pa ni// rnam srad zas dang dri 'khor
459a2(rgyud): ba bum dkar gang ba so so yi// bum pas de rnams dbang bskur zhing // tsan dan sa mchog yan lag bshad// gi'u wang thig le rnam par dkra// yan lag dam pa yongs 'du ba'i// dga'
459a3(rgyud): ba mchog gi yan lag dang // lus med gzhom pa'i ched du byas// yan lag chags pa byas mtha' las// khrus ni stug pos mi 'pho bas/ gzhan du 'chi med legs pa ni// de 'og thal mo//
459a4(rgyud): sbyar ba yi// dug gis btab pa smad pa ltar// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchog brjod pa'i// char ldan khyod kyi zhal du ni// sngon las khyod ni lam gyi mgo/ dri ma bzhin du spangs pa yang /
459a5(rgyud): me tog ldan pa'i zla ba la// rnam par tshar phyin longs spyod ldan// bcings pa lta bur 'di rnams nyid// bcos nas sngar med cho ga yis// bcu par khyod ni zhi ba ste// mgo med 'gro ba mtha' yas
459a6(rgyud): las// gang phyir srid pa mtha' med kyi// dri mas lha dang lha min yang // de yi brtul zhugs kyis phan tshun// dam pa'i sman gyi 'od kyi snang // 'khyil ba can spangs yan lag mchog/ phyogs
459a7(rgyud): su lha rnams gnas pa dang // mi rnams byang chub rnams sangs rgyas// rab tu byed 'gyur zhes pa ni// mi rnams 'byung dang sdud pa'i las// de phyir rnam sad chu skyes ni// lha yi yan lag
459b1(rgyud): dam par sor// dpa' bo'i yan lag dkris chags bral// 'chi bzhin pa yi lus la 'khod// kun nas gtong dang kun nas sdud// yang dag sa dang phyogs dang ldan// rnam pa ni mnyam par
459b2(rgyud): byang chub ldan// byang chub shing drung bdud dpung las// rnam par rgyal ba thob pa dang // sangs rgyas go 'phang 'pho med dang // klu yi shing gi rtsa ba ru// zhe sdang rtsub mo'i nags rnams kyi/
459b3(rgyud): rkang pa sdong bu me yi ched// rmongs mun dri ma snang byed pa// khro bo'i me ni 'ab ra ba las// mi g.yo rab tu sbyin par byed// phyag rgya rdo rje lta bu bsgom// gzhal ba'i 'khri shing gzugs brnyan brtan/
459b4(rgyud): dmar po'i me ni 'bar ba ni// 'jigs pa'i nyi ma ltar mdzes pa// yan lag stobs bskyed phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang
459b5(rgyud): phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams kyis mngon par bstod nas rang gi stan la 'khod de/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba la
459b6(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu sems dpa' chen po'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma byung ste/ 'od zer de rnams kyis gang+gA'i bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs
459b7(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing rnams kun tu snang bar byas par 'gyur ro// dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de dang yud tsam de la sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar gyur to// gang sangs rgyas kyi
460a1(rgyud): zhing de rnams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so legs so//
460a2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po spros shig/ mthu chen po sems can sdig pa can thams cad dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba smros shig/ gang gis de lta bu de rnams phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa mu med pa rnams su sangs
460a3(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang lhan cig/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba gnang
460a4(rgyud): ba dang / sa chen po ri dang / nags dang / phug tu bcas pa 'di rab tu g.yos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i ting /
460a5(rgyud): 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sngags bshad par brtsams so// dang por re zhig bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon dam tshig mthong bas slob
460a6(rgyud): dpon dang mtshungs pa'i rjes su gnang ba thob cing dad pas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ sems can rnams kyi stobs dang stobs ma yin pa shes pa/ ser sna med cing g.yo sgyu med pas nag po med cing
460a7(rgyud): ha cang mi sbom/ ha cang mi phra ba/ dri ngan pa med pas dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa/ mdzes pa/ snying stobs dang ldan pas sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang /
460b1(rgyud): bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / snying rje dang yang dag par ldan par gyur pa/ sems can gyi dgongs pa dang / bsam pa shes pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par
460b2(rgyud): dang ba/ cha mang po mngon par shes pa/ gsal zhing gsal bar smra ba/ dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las la byang ba/ rig gsum gang yang rung ba'i rig pa la sogs pas sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa/ phyag
460b3(rgyud): rgyu dang dkyil 'khor gyi rab tu sbyor ba shes pa/ mchod rten gyi las byas pa/ ha cang mi rgan/ byis pa dang rigs dma' bar skyes pa ma yin pa/ gzhon zhing lang tshe dang ldan pa ngang tshul bzang
460b4(rgyud): bo'i sgrub pa pos gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o zhes so// de nas 'di lta bu'i slob dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga brtsam par bya ste/ nus med 'dul nyes
460b5(rgyud): ma yin pa// dkyil 'khor yang dag rab sbyar bya// rmongs pa'i sems dang chags can la// dkyil 'khor bstan par yang mi bya// gang zhig bslab la yud tsam yang // lhag par 'gro
460b6(rgyud): ba'i lus can des// mtho ris thar pa yang dag 'grub// yid kyi dbang phyug thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems ni rjes zhig pa'i// dngos grub dmigs pa nyid mi 'gyur// byang chub rtsa
460b7(rgyud): bar rig thob pa'i// sems de las ni yang dag brtsam// de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// rab tu dang ba'i sems can rnams// bdag
461a1(rgyud): #/ nyid kho nar rab rtogs bya// de la bstan bya'i dkyil 'khor bri// de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis// stobs kyis sngon 'dul si tha'i lus// cho 'phrul gyi ni tha
461a2(rgyud): byed la// grong dang grong khyer grong rdal dang // ljongs rnams su ni byang shar gyi// phyogs kyi ma ru mchod yon byin// sa yi mthil du de ji ltar Sha/ sa phyogs sngags la bsngags 'gyur ba
461a3(rgyud): sdum zhing ljon shing me tog bzang // 'bras bu yang dag mang po can// rgyun mo 'chad par 'bab pa'i phyogs// dkar dang ser ba'i sa gzhi la// gyo mo bong ba gseg ma bral// rnga mo ches
461a4(rgyud): sgra dbyangs dang // lam gyi bzhi mdo dur khrod dang // lha gzhan yongs su bzung ba dang // shing gcig sdug bsngal rdzogs spangs la// gang du kun nas rgyang grags lnga'i// tshad du chu krung
461a5(rgyud): lteng ka dang // mtsho phran chu bo rab 'bab pa// ljon shing mchod rten lha khang dang // me tog nyid ni dus rgyun du// shin tu rgya chen yang dag ldan// cho 'phrul phyogs ni gang rung la// de nas
461a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ma yi// dkyil 'khor slob dpon sa phyogs der// nyi ma gung la song nas ni// ral pa gcig ma'i snying po yi// mngon par mdzes pa'i las bya'o// thog mar rab dag
461a7(rgyud): sems can kun// byams dang snying rje dang ldan pas// dkyil 'khor gnas der yid kyis dmigs// dge ba'i rig pa gdon par bya// sgrol ma'i snying po dam pa dang // de bzhin dbyangs
461b1(rgyud): ni rjes su gdon// 'dir ni sangs rgyas mchod don du// dkyil 'khor lus can kun gyis bri// phyogs kyis 'gro ba'i gnas su gnas// thog mar gtor ma mang byin nas// dri yi yam shing
461b2(rgyud): yang dag ldan// gnas su gnas pas kun zos nas// go rims bzhin du spyan drang ba'i// dbyangs kyi tshig 'di brjod par bya// slob dpon ming gi tshe ge bdag/ bcom ldan 'phag sa ma
461b3(rgyud): sgrol ma yi// dkyil 'khor dag ni bri bar 'tshal// bdag dang sems can kun gyis gang // bdag mthar gdug pa'i sems med pa// bskyed cing bkur stir byed pa dang // sangs rgyas

461b5(rgyud): sems can de rnams ni// dkyil 'khor gyi ni slob dpon gyi// mtshan mo mthong ba sbyin par byed// de nas bris pa'am gzhan du song // tho rangs rmi lam rnam par dpyad// sa yi phyogs
461b6(rgyud): der song nas ni// khru brgya yi ni tshad du yang // kun nas gru bzhi pa ru bya// phyi rol dpag tu med pa yi// dkon mchog gsum gyi tshad song nas// sa la shing dang phu ba ma dang // thal
461b7(rgyud): ba sol ba so phag dang // skra dang sen mo mchod sbyin gyi// so phag nag po la sogs gang // gzhan yang dkyil 'khor dge ba yi// mi dge'i zug rngu thams cad kun// lhag ma med par
462a1(rgyud): bsal nas ni// sa yi gong bu de nyid du// gzhan yang chu klung chen po yi// 'gram gnyis sa ni sbyang byas nas// rab tu bcug ste tho bas brdung // tsan dan chu yis
462a2(rgyud): yang yang gtor// de ltar byas nas ma ltung ba'i// ba byung tsan dan chub sres nas// khru brgyad pa yi phyogs su ni// phyi rol gyis kyang khru bcu yi// tshad du yongs su sbyangs pa la// gso sbyong byin
462a3(rgyud): nas byug tu gzhug/ ji srid sa yi phyogs der ni// shin tu 'jam shing shin tu ni// legs par rdzogs par skyes kyi bar// de ltar nyi ma bdun du ni// de nas khru bzhi'i tshad du ni// grwa bzhi
462a4(rgyud): seng ldeng phur bu brgyad// sor mo bcu gnyis tshad du bya// gzhon nu mas bkal srad bu ni// tshon snga lnga pa legs 'jam pa// shin tu sra ba bcom ldan ma'i// rtsa ba'i snying po lan bdun
462a5(rgyud): gyis// bsngags pas phur bu la dkris nas// bdun byas srod la gdab par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis// gtsang ma'i gos ni bgos pa yis// dkyil 'khor sa yi dbus de ru/
462a6(rgyud): rtsa ba nag po med pa yi// bum blang dri yi chu dang ni// me tog sgron mas bkang ba la// mgrin par me tog 'phreng bas dkris// a mra'i yal 'dab kha dag pa bya// pus mo dag ni nges btsugs
462a7(rgyud): nas// rtsa ba'i rig pa bdun byas te// yang na nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod// de nas phyogs bcur kun bltas nas// 'di ni bsgrags bya che ge dag/ gnas 'dir sangs rgyas mchod pa'i phyir//
462b1(rgyud): sems can kun gyi ting 'dzin ni// bsam byas dkyil 'khor bris pa 'dir// sangs rgyas phan par mdzad pa kun// dkyil 'khor du ni byon par mdzod// da lta 'dir ni byon nas kyang // bdag/
462b2(rgyud): gi mchod yon bzhes su gsol// de dbus nyid du brtag bya ba// gnas su bris pa'i bcom ldan 'das// spyan drang bya zhing lha rnams kyi// gnas mdor bstan nas brjod par bya// dga' ldan
462b3(rgyud): du ni byang chub sems// 'jig rten gzhan du gang gnas pa// de bzhin kha ba'i gnas su dang // gangs ldan pad+ma'i dbang phyug 'byung // lcang lo can du nor dbang phyug/ te se ru ni bde byed
462b4(rgyud): bshad// mchod yon snod ni bkang ba yis// de rnams gnas ni rnam bsam bya// de nas zhal ni bsrub snyen bkur// dkyil 'khor las rnams thams cad la// ming dang gnas ni yongs
462b5(rgyud): nyams na// phyin ci log tu ldog par 'gyur// de ltar nyi ma bdun du ni// nyin re nyin re tsan dan gyi// chu yis byug tu gzhug par bya// mtshan mo'i thun la'ang de bzhin bya// bar 'dir
462b6(rgyud): yo byad thams cad ni// rnam par 'byor par 'gyur ba yin// de la 'di ni brjod bya ste/ dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs pa yi// phye ma rdo rje'i rang bzhin skyes// dza ba'i me tog dang mtshungs/
462b7(rgyud): ba'i// phye mas dkyil 'khor kun tu bri// pad+ma rA ut+pa la// phye ma mtha' dag gis gdab bya// gur kum chu dang mtshungs pa dang // puSh+pa rA ga yi dkyil 'khor// zar ma'i me tog dang mtshungs
463a1(rgyud): / shing // de bzhin ma ra ka tas kyang // de tsam kha dog rin chen ma// lcags kyang rung ste ming can lnga// yang na dris btags phye mas sam// ji ltar rnyed pa rnam sprul pas/
463a2(rgyud): rab bkug rin chen phye ma yis// yang dag pa yi dngos grub 'dod// nor bu mching bu mtshungs min gang // pad+ma rA gas rnam pa kun// dkyil 'khor lo byad thams cad kyang // slob dpon gyis ni gzhon
463a3(rgyud): nu ma'i// lag pas byed du gzhug par bya// bram ze rgyal rigs rigs skyes pa// byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang // ma nor skyes pa rab mdzes pa// dbang po ma tshang ma yin pa// mdor na bud
463a4(rgyud): med mtshan nyid dang // yang dag ldan par skyes pa yis// 'di 'dra'i gzhon nu ma gcig gnyis// gsum la gso sbyong sbyin nas ni// 'o ma'i zas kyis mngon dga' bar// byA nas dkar po'i gos
463a5(rgyud): bgos te// dkyil 'khor yo byad thams cad ni// byed gzhug dkyil 'khor yo byad kun// legs bsags so sor brtags pa yis// chu dang rnam par dben pa dang // dge slong 'dul ba byas/

463a7(rgyud): can gyis byed du gzhug/ de nas slob dpon yo byad kun// tshogs nas dkyil 'khor rang nyid bri// slob ma yongs su gzung bar gyis// de rnams sangs rgyas chos dang ni// dge slong dge
463b1(rgyud): 'dun la rab dang // yan lag cha shas kun rdzogs pa// bden spa pra dang sbom pa min// mdzes pa mthong dang kha dog gtsigs// gzung bar mi bya'o gcig gnyis gsum// bco brgyad dam ni

463b4(rgyud): sa gzhi'i phyi rol du// shar du mngon phyogs ku sha yi// khres la rim pas nyer 'dug nas// snying po re re lag par byi ni// rtsa ba'i snying po lan bdun bzlas// gtsug tor bcings la bdun

464a1(rgyud): 'dod chags bral dang ldan pa'i chos// bstan par byas nas de rnams bdun// shes rab pha rol byiphyin bklag bya// de lta bu la cho ga yis// bud med rnams kyang yongs gzung /
464a2(rgyud): bya/ langs nas bu mos bkal ba yi// srang bu tshon sna lnga pa ni// mi mnyam rgyud du bsgril ba la// dri yi chu yis mngon bkrus nas// re rer pad+ma'i bgrang 'phreng gis// bsang gtor byas nas rtsa
464a3(rgyud): ba yi// snying po lan grangs nyer gcig tu// mngon bsngags de la 'dir brjod bya// dpal gyi gzhi ni yod pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rnams kyis zhabs mtshan ma// byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba ste/
464a4(rgyud): pad+ma'i bgrang 'phreng de phyir bsngags// de nas slob dpon rang nyid kyis// slob ma rnams la cha phra mos// lag pa la ni bcing bar bya// slob ma rnams la gang kho na// de nyid slob ma bdag nyid
464a5(rgyud): bya de nas dkyil 'khor lhag gnas pa// shar du mngon phyogs bla gos ni// phrag pa gcig tu byas nas ni// pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga ni// sa la rab tu btsugs byas te// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcing
464a6(rgyud): ba dang // rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas par bya// sangs rgyas byang sems thams cad dang // rang rgyal 'phags pa nyan thos dang // lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang // lha mi'i dri dang me tog gi/ 'phreng ba

464b1(rgyud): lags na// de dag rang nyid byon par mdzod// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kun dang / byang chub sems dpa' rang sangs rgyas/ nyan thos lha klu gnod sbyin dang // dri ba lnga min nam mkha'
464b2(rgyud): lding // mo'am ci dang lto 'phye che// rang gi rig pa sngags tshogs kyis// yongs bskor sems can thams cad la// rjes su brtse bas byon nas kyang // bdag la rjes su gnang bar mdzod//
464b3(rgyud): ltar yang gnyis yang gsum du// de nas dkyil 'khor slob gyis// rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas pa dang // dkyil 'khor sa gzhi la bltas nas// dbus su me tog 'phreng ba dor// gal te me tog 'gre
464b4(rgyud): g.yo byed// de nas byon par shes par bya// de nas sangs rgyas byang sems la// dri yi chu yis mchod yon dang // me tog phul cig de nas ni// khru brgya'i phyi rol sa gzhi la// yongs su sbyang
464b5(rgyud): ba byas pa ru// a pA mArga'i yam shing gis// me ni rab tu sbar byas nas// shar du mngon phyogs ku sha yi// khres la nye bar 'dug pa yis// rtsa ba'i snying po sbrang rtsi zho// mar gyi sreg
464b6(rgyud): blugs brgyad brgyar dbul// de nas sangs rgyas byang sems dang // lha rnams la yang mchod yon dbul// de nas dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi ru// gso sbyong yongs su blangs pa yi// skyes
464b7(rgyud): bu srung ba'i 'phreng ba dang // dbang po tshang ba gzhag par bya// de la 'di ni brjod bya ste// gang zhig rnam pa gzhan bya ba// skyong ba bral bar 'gyur ba ste// dkyil 'khor dam tshig brgyad
465a1(rgyud): rnams ni// yang dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de phyir cho ga byas pa yis// slob mas dam tshig shes par 'gyur// de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gang // rang gnas slob mas thabs/
465a2(rgyud): cig tu// song nas ku sha bting ba la// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi// tshogs kun rjes su dran pa yis// g.yas pa'i gzhogs kyis nyal bar bya// de nas tho rangs slob dpon gyis// gtsang
465a3(rgyud): ma shar du kha phyogs pas// rmi lam rnam par dpyad par bya// de la 'di ni brjod bya ste// gang zhig tsan ngan bil ba sogs// u dum ba ra la sogs n+ya gro d+ha// rgyal mtshan 'phreng bas khyab pa dang // rmi lam
465a4(rgyud): rab tu dad pa'ang rung // kha cig me lce mdzes pa dang // de ltar mthong ba de'i dngos grub// mchog gi bar du'o ngang pa dang // kA ran+d+ha ba khrung khrung dang // rma bya ro ha Na rnams ni// gang zhig de lta bu mthong
465a5(rgyud): 'gyur// rmi lam bar ma'i dngos grub de// myur ba kho nar 'byung bar 'gyur// mi 'am ra ha Na yang rung // de bzhin pi wang thogs pa dang // kun+da la sogs pa yang rung // de bzhin a swa ga d+hi
465a6(rgyud): mthong na// gang yang rmi lam mthong byed pa// mi rnams tha ma'i dngos grub de// sgrol ma'i rtog par nges par bstan// gtum po khyi la sogs pa rnams// gang gis mthong bar gyur pa dang // bong/
465a7(rgyud): bu rnga mo shing rta sogs// mthong dang reg pa la sogs sam// rgya skyegs til mar gyis reg pa// gang gi rmi lam du 'jug pa// de yi dngos grub nges par med// dam tshig tsam du 'byung bar 'gyur//
465b1(rgyud): de lta bu sogs yon tan ldan// rmi lam blo yis rnam dpyad bya// de ltar rang blos gang shes nas// slob ma de la rmi lam gyi// mtshan nyid lung du bstan par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon ni// gal/
465b2(rgyud): tekhyim gnas gyur pa 'am// dge slong dge slong ma dang ni// dge bsnyen dge bsnyen ma yang rung // chen po de rnams gso sbyong ni// bzung ste phyi nas slob ma rnams// gso sbyong yang dag gus par
465b3(rgyud): bya slob ma rmi lam mi dge ba// bstan bya sngon du sbyin sreg bya// de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon ni// snga ma kho nar sa dang ni// ras ris mthar ni a lA sa// zangs las byung bar rab zhugs te/
465b4(rgyud): yang dag 'jog par byed du gzhug/ de nas dkyil 'khor sa gzhi la// tsan dan chu yis legs par byug/ slob ma thams cad gnas gcig tu// bos nas ral pa gcig ma yi// snying pos bsrung ba byas
465b5(rgyud): nas ni// dkyil 'khor phyi yi gnas gcig tu// nyer 'dug dam tshig shes pa rnams// nang du rab tu gzhug par bya// de nas nyi ma nub dus su// dkyil 'khor thig ni gdab par bya// bu mos bkal ba'i srad bu ni/
465b6(rgyud): tshon sna lnga pa rtsa ba yi// snying po lan bdun bsngags byas te// dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni// phur bu de rnams srad bus bcings// de dag thams cad khru yi tshad// gsum byas srad bus yongs/
465b7(rgyud): dkri bya// phyi nas kun tu dung dang ni// rnga bo che dang rdza rnga dang // 'khar rnga rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i// 'khar ba dang ni bag rdob rnams// kun nas 'khrol bar byed du gzhug/ gdug dang rgyal mtshan pa dan sog// phyi rol du ni de gram bya//
466a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa// tshon sna lnga pa'i thig skud kyis// khru brgyad byas nas thig gdab bya// de lam dkyil 'khor gnyis pa ste// de nas kha dog/
466a2(rgyud): thams cad pa// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni// rtsa ba'i rig pa brgyad brgya bzlas// de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon ni// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun// rang sangs rgyas
466a3(rgyud): dang 'phags pa yi// nyan thos dge 'dun rnams la ni// phyag byas dkyil 'khor khor yug tu// rgyang grags lnga pa lhag gnas che// ral pa gcig ma'i snying po yis// gdug pa'i sems can/
466a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi// sems ni bcing bar bya ba'o// dkyil 'khor yang ni thams cad kyi// slob dpon gyi ni yo byad rnams// ral gcig snying po nyid kyis ni// thog mar bsrung ba byas nas ni// byang shar
466a5(rgyud): phyogs nas brtsams byas te// tshangs pa'i thig ni gdab par bya// rtsa ba'i rig pa zlos pa nyid// dkyil 'khor thams cad mkhas pas bris// yongs su bcad cing lus dkar ba'i// slob de de bzhin gshegs
466a6(rgyud): rnams la// phyag byas rin chen phye mas so// pad+ma'i rigs la phyag byas te// phye ma ser pos bcom ldan pa// 'phags ma sgrol ma phyag byas nas// ljang khu rnams kyis nyan thos kun// rang sangs rgyas kun
466a7(rgyud): phyag byas nas// nag pos rdo rje'i rigs la'o// de ltar dang por dkyil 'khor gru bzhi dang sgo bzhi pa'i snying por ro// phyi nas gnyis la khru gnyis kyi tshad du rab tu 'jug par byed pa'o// gsum pa mtho gang ba
466b1(rgyud): de'i nyis 'gyur ro// de ltar thams cad du rim gyis bris nas nang gi dkyil 'khor du bri bar 'dod pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad
466b2(rgyud): der rang byon par mdzad du gsol/ 'bru thams cad dang / rin po che thams cad dang / sman thams cad dang / dri dang me tog thams cad dang / tsan dan gyi chus yongs su bkang ba/ sA Sha'i lal 'dab kyis
466b3(rgyud): bkab pa/ du ku la'i ras dkar pos mgrin pa bcings pa/ gser dang dngul las byung ba/ dkyil 'khor de'i yo byad thams cad ras ris gnyis pa'i mthar me tog gi 'phreng bas dkris nas rtsa ba'i
466b4(rgyud): rig pas bsngags pa de rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa zhes bya ba ste/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag par bya'o// de la 'di brjod par bya ste/ dam tshig don dang bsod nams don// 'dod
466b5(rgyud): don so sor dmigs byed du// sdom pa bzung bar byas gyur nas// gang du gnas pa thams cad nas// dkyil 'khor mchog 'di bri bar bya// gzhan gyis mi thub thugs rje che// sangs
466b6(rgyud): rgyas byams pa spyan mar bcas// 'di rnams ming ni kun dran nas// de bzhin gshegs pa bri bar bya// bden par skyes dang rta mgrin dang // 'jig rten gsum rgyal dkar mor grags/
466b7(rgyud): de bzhin du ni khro gnyer can// khros ma zhes ni grags pa ste// 'di rnams ming ni kun dran nas// spyan ras gzigs ni bri bar bya// rig pa mchog las slar 'jigs byed// rdo rje ser skya rdo
467a1(rgyud): rje ni// drag por ba'ad dang seng ge dang // de bzhin rdorje khu tshur nyid// 'di rnams ming ni kun dran nas// phyag na rdo rje ku tu dz+ra// de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis/
467a2(rgyud): snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su phye ma dkar po dang yungs kar dkar po bsres pas// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i seng ge'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa// chos ston par mdzad
