467a3(rgyud): bzhin pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'od kun tu 'phro ba/ gtsug tor nas 'od zer 'byung bzhin pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis brgyan
467a4(rgyud): pa dang por bris shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi gzhogs gnyis su phye ma ser po dang pad+ma ga sar phan tshun bsres pas gtsug tor gyi rgyal po rnams kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrugs pa/
467a5(rgyud): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugs dang / cha byad dang / dbyibs kyi rnam pa can rab tu dang ba'i sku/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs pa/ sa bon gyis gang ba dang 'bras
467a6(rgyud): bu phyag na bsnams pa la 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / 'khor los sgyur ba dang / kun nas 'bar ba'i gtsug tor dang / gdug sa dkar po dang / gzi
467a7(rgyud): brjid phung po dang / nor bu'i phung po dang / gser gyi phung po dang / rnam par grags pa'i phung po dang / kun nas phung po dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i phung po dang / brtul
467b1(rgyud): zhugs phung po dang / ba nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi phung po dang / rtag pa'i phung po dang / dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin gyi phung po dang / thams cad phung po dang / sgra dbyangs san pa'i phung po dang / 'dzag
467b2(rgyud): rten gsum pa'i phung po dang / mtha' yas phung po dang / bsod nams phung po dang / lha'i phung po zhes pa 'di rnams g.yas kyi gzhogs su nye bar bzhugs pa'o// g.yon du 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das
467b3(rgyud): rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / mngon par 'phags pa dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / mngon par mtho ba dang / sa'i 'dab ma dang / 'dab ma brgya pa dang / 'dab ma stong pa dang / kun nas 'dab ma dang /
467b4(rgyud): 'od zer dang / 'od zer chen po dang / dri ma med pa'i 'od zer dang / bkod pa'i 'od zer dang / dkar po'i 'od zer dang / pad+ma'i 'od zer dang / bkod pa'i gtsug tor dang / bdud bzhi rnam par 'dul ba'i
467b5(rgyud): gtsug tor dang / gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gtsug tor zhes pa 'di rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nus pa dang / lung bstan pa zhes pa gtsug tor gyi rgyal po/
467b6(rgyud): 'di rnams g.yon gyi steng du bri bar bya'o// gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i nye logs su 'phreng gcig la brten pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo brgyad bri ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma spyan ma dang / mdzod
467b7(rgyud): spu dang / zla ba dang / snying rje ma dang / byams pa ma dang / mi 'jigs ma dang / lung bstan ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nus pa zhes pa 'di rnams pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ 'bar ba'i 'phreng
468a1(rgyud): pas 'khrugs pa/ rab tu dang ba'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa la nges par rtog bzhin pa'o// 'di rnams kyi steng du gsang sngags kyi rgyal po brgyad la 'di lta ste/ bcom
468a2(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhung bzed dang / mkhar gsil dang / chos gos dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi dra ba dang / de bzhig gshegs
468a3(rgyud): pa'i kum tu snang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye ba'i snying po zhes pa 'di rnams pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ rab tu
468a4(rgyud): drang ba'i mu/ cung zad de bzhin gshegs pa la nges par rtog bzhin pa/ rang gi gzugs las rab tu snang ba'i sku bri'o// gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i khro bo gzhan
468a5(rgyud): gyis mi thub pa chen po khro bo'i gzugs can/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ kun nas 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can/ rtse gsum dang zhags pas phyag grol ba/ cung zad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs
468a6(rgyud): rlan la lta ba'o// gzhan du rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi nye logs su 'phreng gcig la brten pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo brgyad la 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang / phyi nas
468a7(rgyud): dge sbyong ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzes ma dang sangs rgyas dkar mo dang / de bzhin gshegs ma sems ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lcags kyus 'gugs ma zhes pa 'di rnams
468b1(rgyud): pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sku'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs pa'o// 'di rnams kyi steng du gsang sngags kyi rgyal po brgyad la 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan
468b2(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun tu snang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten gsum pa dang
468b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten zhes pa 'di rnams kun nas 'od kyi
468b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ rab tu dang ba'i sku/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa'o// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi 'og tu
468b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po kun nas 'od pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ phyag na pad+ma ste/ de rnams thams cad lha'i gzugs g.yas pas sa bon gyis gang ba
468b6(rgyud): dang / phyag g.yon pas mchog sbyin pa/ rang gi cha byad kyis kun tu gnas par yang ngo // gtsug tor gyi rgyal po'i steng du rang sangs rgyas brgyad ji ltar rigs par bri bar bya'o// 'di lta ste/ bcom
468b7(rgyud): ldan 'das snyan grags zhes bya ba'i rang sangs rgyas dang / steng gi drang srong dang / drang srong chen po dang / lha'i drang srong dang / mA da ra dang / brtsegs pa dang / legs par brtsegs pa dang /
469a1(rgyud): brtsegs pa chen po zhes pa rang satra rgyas brgyad po 'di rnams pad+ma'i gdan la skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'jug pa/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa/ 'bar ba'i 'breng /
469a2(rgyud): bas 'khrugs pa/ bla gos ser po can no// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og tu yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon du snam sbyar ro// mdun gyi 'og tu chos kyis 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa
469a3(rgyud): kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgyad po la gnas pa'o// de'i yang nye logs su khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa zhes bya ba ral pa'i cod pam 'chang ba pad+ma'i
469a4(rgyud): gdan la gnas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bka' nod par byed bzhin pa'i 'og tu pad+ma rigs mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo bri bar bya'o// pad+ma'i gdan la nye
469a5(rgyud): bar 'dug pa ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ dpal dang ras kyi smad g.yogs dang stod g.yogs can+da/ thal mo sbyar ba byas pa/ cung zad sgrol ma'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa/ bka' nor/
469a6(rgyud): par byed bzhin pa'o// de'i gong du pad+ma chen po zhes bya ba'i khro bo mdog dmar po/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs po/ pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar 'dug pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma
469a7(rgyud): sgrol ma'i bka' nod par byed bzhin pa'o// khro bo'i rgyal po de rnams thams cad kun nas 'bar ba chen po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs 'chang ba/ dar dang ras kyi slad g.yos/
469b1(rgyud): can/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i lus su bya'o// sgrol ma'i g.yon gyi gzhogs su byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob sku mdog dkar po/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba rgyan thams cad
469b2(rgyud): kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ dar la'i snod g.yogs can/ daral dang ras kyi spyad g.yogs can/ pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa'o// spyar
469b3(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pad+ma'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa 'gro ba zhes bya ba pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs/ cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin dang / pad+ma'i gdon la nye bar 'dug pa// ral po'i
469b4(rgyud): cod pan 'chang ba/ drar la g.yo ba dang bcas pa'i smad g.yogs dang dar la'i stod g.yogs 'chang ba/ shim tu ngang ba'i sru/ 'od zer 'bar ba/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal
469b5(rgyud): bzhin pa'o// dri ma med pa 'gro ba'i steng gi g.yon du bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dbyug pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / bgrang 'phreng dang / g.yang gzhi nag po can dang / rab tu dang /
469b6(rgyud): ba'i sku/ 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu 'dod pa phun tshogs byed pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ sku dkar po/ pad+ma'i sdong bus dkris pa'i lus can/ phyag g.yon pas pad+ma dang /
469b7(rgyud): gags pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu phyag tu bkod pa/ 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin ngas can/ phyag na rdo rje'i g.yas kyi sngam bu gcig la rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bri bar bya'o//
470a1(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa mchog dang / nyal ba dang / legs par grub par byed pa dang / rdo rje sde dang / dpung bzang dang / ral pa gyen brdzes dang / rig pa
470a2(rgyud): bzang po dang / legs grub dang / sde bzang dang / stobs po che dang / rnam par 'joms pa dang / ki lI ki la dang / mchog dang / legs 'dul dang / 'gro lding ba dang / sngon rabs dang / rin
470a3(rgyud): chen ke li dang / byis pa'i ke lI dang / legs par ke lI dang / legs par gang ba dang / gang ba chen po dang / lha mthar byed dang / rdo rje chen po dang / 'bar ba zhes pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di rnams sngag
470a4(rgyud): kyi rgyal po chen po ste/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ rma bya la nye bar 'dug pa/ ut+pal ltar spobasangs pa bzhin cung zad khro gnyer du byas pa/ phyag g.yon pas rdo rje dang / phyag g.yas
470a5(rgyud): pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhin pa'o// 'di dag gi 'og tu rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo bri bar bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma mA ma kI dang / rdo rje lcag kyu ma dang /
470a6(rgyud): rdo rje lcags sgrogs dang / rdo rje rgyal ma dang / rdo rje rnam par rgyal ma dang / dmar po ldan ma dang / grags ldan ma dang / badzin ni rdo rje spyad ma dang / rdo rje khro gnyer ma dang / rdo rje khu tshur ma dang / rdo rje mi
470a7(rgyud): 'jigs ma dang / rdo rje 'phreng ba ma dang / rdo rje sgra ldan ma dang / rdo rje dge legs ma dang / rdo rje 'dzin ma dang / rdo rje ma mo dang / rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang / rdo rje gnas lcags ma dang / dus kyi rdo
470b1(rgyud): ma dang / rdo rje gtsug bud ma dang / rdo rje bka' bsgo chen po ma dang / rdo rje 'od dang / rgyal ba ldan ma dang / rdo rje gzugs ldan ma dang / rdo rje spyan ma zhes pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di rnams rdo rje rigs kyi rig pa'i/
470b2(rgyud): rgyal mo chen mo ste/ rma bya la nye bar 'dug pa/ ut+pal ltar sngo bsangs/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa cung zad bzhin khro gnyer dang ldan par byas pa dang / dar dang ras kyi sham thabs dang /
470b3(rgyud): dar la'i snod g.yogs mnabs pa/ g.yon pas rdo rje dang / g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa/ lhas bstod pa'i gzugs 'chang ba'o// de rnams de bzhin gshegs/
470b4(rgyud): pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa/ rang gi gzugs dang / cha byad dang / dbyibs bzhin du bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas kyi gzhogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stong
470b5(rgyud): ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ 'od dpag med dbu la bzhugs pa/ dar la'i stod g.yogs can dpal dang ras kyi sham thubs can/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan
470b6(rgyud): ba phyag g.yon pas pad+ma'i phyag/ phyag g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das la rnga yab g.yob par byed pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan gyis brgyan par byas pa'i lus can/ cung zad de
470b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon du 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma'i kha dog can/ pad+ma'i gdan la rgyam thams cad kyis rnam par/
471a1(rgyud): brgyan pa/ rab tu dang ba'i sru/ dar dang ras kyi sham thabs can/ snod g.yogs dmar po mnabs pa/ phyag g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das kya thub pa la byug
471a2(rgyud): 'tshal bzhin pa/ phyag g.yon pas rnga yab kyis brel ba/ 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'i phyag/ cung zad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa'o// spyan ras gzigs
471a3(rgyud): dbang phyug gi g.yas su bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma chen po pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs ma/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ rab tu dang ba'i skupad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ cung
471a4(rgyud): zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin/ dar dang ras kyi sham thabs can/ stobs g.yogs dmar po mnabs pa/ phyag g.yon pas ut+pa la yongs su bzung nas/ g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa
471a5(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa/ lus cung zad 'dud pa/ lang tsho dang po can ha cang mi sbom/ ha cang mi phra ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
471a6(rgyud): g.yas su 'phreng gcig la brten pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bco brgyad la 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyag mtha' yas pa dang / phyag spong ba dang / phyag brgya pa dang / phyag bcu gnyis pa dang /
471a7(rgyud): phyag drug pa dang / phyag bzhi pa dang / zhabs stong pa dang / zhal brgyad pa dang / zhal bcu gnyis pa dang / zhal drug pa dang / nal bzhi pa dang / rta mgrin dang / don yod zhags pa dang /
471b1(rgyud): 'od zer skyong gis rnam par snang ba dang / mgrin pa dkar pos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang / mtha' yas rnam rgyal dang / rnam rgyal chen po dang / lha'i mtha' dang / mtha'
471b2(rgyud): dpag tu med pa dang / yid kyi shing rta dang / mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes pa rig pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di rnams pad+ma'i rigs kyi gtso bo/ srid par 'jug pa/ nye bar spyod par byed pa
471b3(rgyud): kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ pad+ma'i lus kyis nye bar bskor ba'i lus phyag na pad+ma dang / g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ cung zad sgrol ma la lbu bar gyur pa'o//
471b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i nye logs su gos dkar mo pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar 'dug pa rab tu drang ba'i sru/ ral po'i cod pan 'chang ba / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs
471b5(rgyud): bar na la lta bar gyur pa phyag na pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa dang / g.yas pas bgrang 'phreng bsnams pa'o// de'i yang g.yas su 'phreng gcig la brten pa'i pad+ma'i rigs kyi las kyi gtso mo
471b6(rgyud): bcu bzhi bri bar bya ba la 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma khro gnyer can dang / dkar mo dang / dkar mo chen mo dang / dpal bdun ma dang / pad+ma gau ri dang / grags ldan ma dang
471b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas dpa' ba'i zla ba ma dang / longs spyod ldan ma dang / bde ba ldan ma dang / grags pa ldan ma dang / shes rab gos can ma dang / stobs gcig ma dang / stobs mang po dang
472a1(rgyud): stobs bcu ma dang / sangs rgyas kyi yum dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi yum zhes pa 'di rnams rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ste/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa/
472a2(rgyud): pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ lha'i bung med kyi chu byad 'chang ba/ rab tu dang ba'i sku/ cung zad sgrol ma'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa'o// pad+ma bsnams shing
472a3(rgyud): g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ rang gi gzugs bu bri bar bya'o// sgrol ma'i 'og tu ci bau gyi zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i khro bo chen po zhal bzhi pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ pad+ma'i gdam la
472a4(rgyud): gnas pa/ lus brtan pa nag po mthar byed pa'i gzugs can/ khro gnyer du byas pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa zhal gcig gis drag tu bzhad pas gdangs bzhin pa/ gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa la lha bzhin
472a5(rgyud): baHdang pos sgrol ma la lta ba'o// phyag dang pos rin po che mthong ba 'byin par byed bzhin pa/ g.yon dang pos zhags pa bsdams pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bka' nod par byed bzhin pa'o//
472a6(rgyud): de'i yang g.yas su khro bo chen po sgrol mas non pa zhes bya ba lha chen po la nye bar 'dug pa/ pad+ma'i chubs dkris pa'i lus can/ ut+pa la lhur skyo bsangs/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags mi sgrol ma'i bka
472a7(rgyud): nod par byed bzhin pa bri bar bya'o// 'jug pa dang dbang bskur ba'i cho ga thams cad sngar brjod pa kho na'o// ral pa gyed brjes kyi chung phyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga'o// / benas
472b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ral pa gyen brjes kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por rang gi
472b2(rgyud): snying po sbyin par bgyi'o// gang gis brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang / nye bar 'tshe ba dang / nad 'gro ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar
472b3(rgyud): byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug legs so//
472b4(rgyud): khyod kyis smos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang gi snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas 'di las dkyil 'khor che// dam pa yang dag rab
472b5(rgyud): 'chang byed// dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnam pa ru// phyi yi dkyil 'khor kun tu bri// de yi dbus su srang bu mnyam// gru bzhi yongs su bskor bar bya// gnyis par 'joms pa po song ste/
472b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi tshul gyi ni// ri mo bzhi po rnams kyang ngo // pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri bar bya// pad+ma yi ge ze'u 'bru la// 'jig rten mgon po dgod par bya//
472b7(rgyud): pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i 'phreng rnams su// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan kun tu bri// de ru slob dpon rab bzhugs nas// pad+ma chen po'i phyag rgya mchog/ dkyil 'khor gnas la nyer 'dug pas/
473a1(rgyud): mnyam par bzhag pas mnyam par dgod// ji ltar tshul pad+ma gang // gnas kyi nyes pa mang pos kyang // gos par mi 'gyur de bzhin 'dir// 'gro la chags pas dag par
473a2(rgyud): byed// lan cig 'di gsungs dper brjod nas// de nas lcags kyu mchog dag gis// yang dag bkug nas pad+ma che// spyan ras gzigs dbang grol bar 'gyur// de la 'di ni pad+ma'i lcags kyu chen/
473a3(rgyud): po'o// oM ma hA pad+mo hUM dza hrIH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'ongs nas slob dpon la mthong ba sbyin par byed do// yang na 'od zer gtong bar byed do// de nas
473a4(rgyud): 'di nyid kyi phyag rgyas slob ma rab tu gzhugs par bya ste/ dar dkar pos gos dkar po dang / gtsug tor dkar pos mgo bo dkri bar bya'o// 'di nyid 'jig rten du su brjod nas de nas smos shig ces so//
473a5(rgyud): de nas pad+ma lag pa g.yon du byin nas g.yas pas chu sdong byin te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad pad+ma che// dad+ma'i dkyil 'khor das pa 'di// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
473a6(rgyud): de nyid lhan cig brtag par bya// zhes so// de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing ba dang ting nge 'dzin yang bslab par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o// de nas pad+ma'i dkyil 'khon
473a7(rgyud): 'byung ste// de bzhin nyid du kyil 'khod bris nas dbus kyi ze'u 'bru la nye bar 'dug ste stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin ni pad+ma'i 'dab ma rgyas pa de la kun tu gzigs par byed pa 'phags
473b1(rgyud): ba spyamangs gzigs dbang phyug nyid thob par byed do// zhes pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ de bzhi mkhon dadakyil 'khor brtag par byas nus dbus su
473b2(rgyud): pad+ma stong dgod du gzhug go// de nas pad+ma sdong po de bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya ste/ lan re la na re yongs su bzlas nas so// de nas slob ma rab tu bcug nas dam tshig brjod par
473b3(rgyud): bya'o// bu dang slob ma'i ched du yang // dam tshig nyams par mi bya ste// dam tshig bdag la brjod par bya// gang phyir pad+ma'i rnam pa las// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad dag
473b4(rgyud): dam tshig gi ni dkyil 'khor ro// las kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// mchod pa rnam pa bzhi yis ni// sangs rgyas thams cad yid kyis mchod// lus kyis spyan ras gzigs mgon la/
473b5(rgyud): ngag gi phyag na rdo rje la// las las nam mkha'i snying por skyes// ji ltar sgrub thabs cho gar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ri rab lhun po'i ri'i rtse
473b6(rgyud): mor 'khod pa/ rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyis kun tu gnas pa'i sku thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku brgyad do zhes so// de nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te
473b7(rgyud): rtag tu thams cad dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyun du bzlas pas/ ji srid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams 'phros
474a1(rgyud): nas sgrub pa po'i pad+ma'i dbus su 'khod de/ slar yang de nas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzhan 'byung ste/ sgrub pa po la mngon par dbang bskur ba gnas shing brtan par 'gyur ro//
474a2(rgyud): de nas bdag gi dngos po thams cad spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mtshungs pa skad cig de la bde ba dang ldan pa dang ji srid du 'phur bar byed do// sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing tshe dpag tu
474a3(rgyud): med par 'gyur ro zhes so// de nas sgrub pa gzhan dang las chen po thams cad 'byung ste/ 'bum bzlas pas las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas pas mtshams med pa
474a4(rgyud): la sogs pa'i sdig pa thams cad lhag ma med par zad par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas bsod nams thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin gyi dngos grub thams cad dang / de bzhin
474a5(rgyud): gsheg pa la so gro ba'i phun sum chog pa thams cad ni 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa lnga bzlas pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang mngon du 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya chen po ni mchod rten stong phrag brgya byas nas mthar
474a6(rgyud): chogs mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas tho rangs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas snying khar rab tu 'jug par byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' so sor rnyed do// de nas zhal du rab
474a7(rgyud): tu 'jug par byed do// de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug so sor rnyed do// ma bsgrubs par yang las thams cad du 'gyur ro// thog mar brjod pas gzhan gyi grong dang grong khyer srung ba dang / mdzes par spyad
474b1(rgyud): bas thams cad bya'o// 'bebs pa la tsam ngan gyi bdug pas gdon 'bebs so// shi rI Sha'i me tog gis sems can thams cad mngon du byed do// dri bzang po'i me tog gis sems can thams cad reng /
474b2(rgyud): par byed do// sa dkar pos bud med do// dri zhim po'i me tog gis chom rkun rengs pa'o// yungs kar dkar po'i sbyin sreg gis ri dgas dang bya rengs so// yungs kar dkar po gtor bas mig 'phrul ston
474b3(rgyud): par byed do// rma bya'i nu mas rmi lam ston par byed do// dus gsum du bzlas pas rmi lam ngan pa 'joms par byed do// til gyi sbyin sreg gis sems can thams cad rengs par byed do// bya gag gi gshog
474b4(rgyud): pa'i sbyin sreg gis rgyal po dbang du byed do// rgyal po 'khyil ba'i me tog gi sbyin sreg gis 'dod pa thams cad dbang du byed do// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na/
474b5(rgyud): mtshan mo brgyad sbyang bar gnas pas gsum bzlas pa bya'o// de nas 'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i btsun mo'i mchog dbang du byed pa la bud med kyi dbang po'i spu'i sbyin sreg gis so//
474b6(rgyud): bu mo dbang du byed pa la'ang ngo // don gzhan la'ang sbyin sreg dang bcas pas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du nyi ma re rer dus gsum du bzlas pa bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsum gyis
474b7(rgyud): ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa stsol bar mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar dus gsum du bzlas pas zla ba drug gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchog stsol bar mdzad do// ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mang las
475a1(rgyud): chen po thams cad kyi sgyu 'phrul lo// / de nas sems dpa' chen po de ting nge 'dzin de nyid sgom bzhin du khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas nor pa'i mnyam par
475a2(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungs so// khru lnga pa dang sgo bzhi dang // sgo khyud rta babs nges gnas pa// phyi rol pad+ma'i rnam par bya// de ltar kun nas grwa rnams su'ang // de ni legs par
475a3(rgyud): bsams byas nas// nang gi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// sngar brjod snying po 'di yis ni// zlos bzhin 'di ni srung ba dang // dkar po dmar po ser po dang // nag po ljang khu tshon sna lnga'i// bye ma
475a4(rgyud): 'jam po rnams kyis ni// sgrol ma'i rig pas mngon bsngags pas// bsgrub bya bcom ldan 'das ni bya// khro bo'i rgyal po mdun du ste// g.yon du ral pa gcig ma bya// g.yas su 'dam skyes
475a5(rgyud): phyi rol gyi// sgo khyud snying por ci rigs bri// mkhas pas sgrol ma bzlas pa bya// gzhan du yang ni gang 'dod pa// rdo rje gdan la g.yas su ni// rdo rje khu tshur de bzhin du/ bar du rdo rje'i gdan la
475a6(rgyud): dang // g.yas mu me tog don grub pa// yongs su 'dod pas rdor rigs bya// dri yi phye mas yongs su byung // rdo rje khu tshur stobs po che// gang du 'jig rten gsum chog/ rdo rje 'chang chen 'dod
475a7(rgyud): ba yis// 'das pas rnam pa 'thim par 'gyur// khu tshur rdo rdza la tshur bcas// de ni galas kyi mo khang du// stobs po che ni dang bzhag nas/ ka yi mgrim par stobs po ma
475b1(rgyud): phyogs su ni bya ba'o// g.yas kyi phyi'i sgo khang du// de bzhin dbang phyug chen po bya// de la mdung gi phyag rgya dgod// ci 'dra'i u ma bri bar bya// lho yi ma gnyis su bya ga/ phyag rgya rnam pa snga
475b2(rgyud): tshogs pa'o// nub dang byang gi grwa rnams su// log 'dren phyag rgya rdo rje'o// byang gi grwa gnyis rnams su ni// mkhas pas rigs kyi spyan par bya// shar gyi grwa gnyis rnams su ni/
475b3(rgyud): mamo tshogs kyi phyag rgya dgod// d+h+r-i gau r-i T+Thi log 'dren bcas// de nas ji ltar 'byor pa yis// cho gas ji bzhin lha rnams mchod// khro bo stobs chen sgrol mas non// bzlas pas
475b4(rgyud): bdag nyid bsrung bar bya// ka ra wI ra tA la ni// blangs nas rang gnas smyung gnas pas// mkhas pas byang gi sgo khang du// gtsang ma gang du rab 'jug bya// blo dang ldan pas spyan drang bya/
475b5(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal pos thams cad nas// ji ltar rig pa'i cho ga yis// tshar gcad rjes su 'dzin pa'i mchog/ don dang lus kyi las rnams ni// de nyid du da nges par bya// tshar gcad dam tshig bde ba 'dri/
475b6(rgyud): gdon 'pho byed dang zad byed dang // gang zhig la la gsod pa dang // de bzhin sgrib pa sbyang ba dang // sems can rnams ni thams cad nyid// sgrub thabs bya dang 'khrul 'khor ni// ci 'dra ba yi bya ba dang /
475b7(rgyud): mkhas pa sa las mi stong dag dang // gdon rnams bod par byed pa dang // rang gi rigs dang gzhan rigs kyi// phyag rgya nye bar mtshon par bya// 'odi'i dkyil 'khor thams cad nas// 'byung po'i tshe gral sog ba kun/
476a1(rgyud): de nas gtor ma bdugs pa sogs// rgyas pas mngon par mchod par gyis// de yis gdon mthong de mchod bya// phyis kyi dbang las dul ba thob// skye bos btung ba sbyin sreg la/
476a2(rgyud): sogs pas rnam par gzhom par bya// shi Shi lAn tsa na blangs nas// gdon thob pa ni 'pho bar bya// srin po rnams kyis byin pa'i chu// mthong ba de 'dra'i mtshon rnams dang // sha za rnams la ri bong can//
476a3(rgyud): mig mi 'dzum par 'dzag pa yi// 'jigs pa mthong na sna tshogs pa// kun tu rnam par lta bar byed// skye ma byed gdon gyi rnam 'gyur gang // nus dang dpung pa brten pa yi// dgra bo rnams ni thams cad//
476a4(rgyud): du// lha dang mtshon cha'i bya ba ni// pad+ma byed dang ral pa dang // dbyug gu bgrang 'phreng 'jigs pa'i gnas// ril ba spyi thugs mi thub nyid// phyag rgya bram ze can zhes bshad// rtse gsum kun dang
476a5(rgyud): byed dang // ral pa mig la sogs pa dang // khyu mchog sgra dang drag po dang // dbang ldan rnams te mdun du grags// shik+ti gdengs ka ba dan dang // khyim bya de bzhin rma bya'i mjug/ phyag rgya gzhon nu
476a6(rgyud): ma can bshad// 'khor lo dung dang be con nyid// ral gri phub nyid nam mkha' lding // mgo nyid phyag rgya khyab 'jug bshad// che ba sprin ni lha chen po'i// bum pa gtun shing de bzhin du// dang
476a7(rgyud): pa'ang g.yon gzhogs phyag rgya ste// phyag rgya wa he ri dkar bshad// nam gru rnams dang gtor zan dang // rgan po gtum po mthong ba ni// nam gru dkar po rnams kyi rgya// rang gi gzugs nyid
476b1(rgyud): mthong ba ni// mdangs 'phrogs rnams kyi'o lhung bzed dam// gdeg par byed pa grol ba'o// de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ byed pa thams cad dge ba la// shing gcig
476b2(rgyud): gam dur khrod dam/ khang stong gtsang ma tsha sgro med pa'i sa gzhi mthong nas sgrub pa po khros pas sa la ma lhung ba'i ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te re ba gsum der bya'o// kun nas khru bzhi
476b3(rgyud): ba la dang por thal ba'i re kha'o// gnyis pa ri'i btsag gi'o// gsum pa sol ba'i phye mas rab tu 'bad pas bri bar bya'o// byang ngam nub tu'ang sgo gcig byed du gzhug go// sgo'i dbus su'ang lha
476b4(rgyud): chen po lag na mdung thogs pa bya'o// snam bu'i nang du sangs rgyas bden par rmad du byung ba'i bdag nyid can bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi g.yas kyi gzhogs su sgrol mas non pa rnam par dgod par bya'o//
476b5(rgyud): g.yon du dpa' mo chen mo stobs mo che ma ral pa gcig ma bzhag nas/ bde bar gshegs pa'i sku rgyab tu dgod par bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / de bzhin du 'jog po
476b6(rgyud): dang / dpa' bo chen po stobs kyi rgyu'ang dgod par bya'o// de bzhin du pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po dang / dung skyong dang / rigs ldan stobs po che'i nang du mngon par brjod pa'o// lha de rnams ni 'khor dang
476b7(rgyud): bcas pa snam bu gang bar dgod par bya'o// 'di thams cad nas ma mo'i tshogs rnam par med par bya ste/ dpal ldan ma ni snam bur ro// sgo ru spre'u dang / rA dang / bum snam yang sgo'i spyar
477a1(rgyud): pa rA ba li yang ngo // nag po'i brgyad pa la lha rnams lto 'phye chen po las ma 'das pa yang dag par mchod de stong phrag bzlas par bya'o// shes rab can sngags kyi
477a2(rgyud): rgyal po grub par 'gyur ro// rims dang gdon thams cad las 'byin pa dang / rtsod pa'ang rnam par 'joms par byed do// / rang gi gnas su 'jug go// de nas gsang sngags 'di 'angartag
477a3(rgyud): tu bzlas pa'i gu gul gyi chu 'am/ ku shas gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / zhi ba can dang / rgyas pa can dang / mngon par mdzes pa can nyid spyad pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin rab tu byas pas grub ste
477a4(rgyud): thams cad 'joms pa sgrol mas non pa gang yin pa de ni gsang ba'i sgrub thabs kyi dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas bcom
477a5(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gis mngon par shes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
477a6(rgyud): rin chen tog la mngon sum du thos pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ha la ha la zhes bya ba'i snying po ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyang phyi mar sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir/
477a7(rgyud): dang / sgrol ma'i mthu bstan pa'i phyir dang thabs la mkhas pa'i snying rje bdag gis bshad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ byam pa spros shig/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga/
477b1(rgyud): te b+h+yo/ mang bu ru la ra b+he byung / na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ka te shwa ma hA sA ma prA prA bi tre sa many+dzu shrI badz+ra pA Ni pra b+hI tI b+h+yo ma hA sa twe d+haH/ de rnams la phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pastun
477b2(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug khyod kyi snying po 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa sring pa'i lam rnam par 'joms par byed pa brjod par bgyi'o//
477b3(rgyud): sad+ya the daM/ he bo d+hi satwA/ ma hA satwA/ he ha le/ Ar+ya a bi lo ki te shwa ra / pa ra ma mai tri tsit+ta hi ta tsit+ta kA ru Ni kA maM/ ga ma bi ya ti / ma hA bi ya ti/ d+hu ru d+hu ru / d+hu ru tsa len+d+ra ba la nam/
477b4(rgyud): ste sU/ sarba satwA/ b+ha ya pra ta/ ha ri he ri ha ri bA ha no d+ha ba/ b+ha bA na kha ka tu ru tu ru/ b+hu ru b+hu ru / su ru su ru/ su pra gA si/ bA ma la mU Ni/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ kr-iSh+Na dzIn/
477b5(rgyud): dzaT pra ku rdza pA la s+'u t+pa la mA la/ ba lam las lA/ ka la ka la na la/ hal ha la/ rba s+yAt+pa la bo d+hisatwA/ bru~Ml bo byes twA/ ma bo d+hi sad+hA/ nas te ru/ sa ar+b+ba dzAM da pa/
477b6(rgyud): ma nu sma ra/ i de tsa me/ kar+yaM ku ru swA hA/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ha la ha la zhes bya ba'i snying po ste
477b7(rgyud): nyi ma so sor tho rangs langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor byas te/ dri dang me tog la sogs pa mngon par bkram nas de nas lan bcu gsum brjod par bya'o// de nas nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar
478a1(rgyud): byed do// zla ba drug khon byas pas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du yid kyi shing ta yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de bzhin du yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' spyan pangs cin/
478a2(rgyud): dbang phyug gis smras pa/ gal te mtshams med pa byas pas kyang ma grub pa na/ de'i tshe nga mtshams med pa byas pa dang / bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bslus par gyur cig ces so//
478a3(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su skyes pa bcom ldan 'das
478a4(rgyud): ma'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyu phyi mar 'jig pa thams cad kyi rig pasring mo bzhi gong nas gong du rab tu 'jug bzhin pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par gzigs par gyur pa/ rtog pa bzhir skyes pa
478a5(rgyud): thung ngu'i gzugs can/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba/ sa 'og dang / mi snang ba dang / ro langs dang / 'thab rtsod dang / rkang pas rab tu bgrod pa dang / rgyas pa can dang / mngon spyod can dang / dbang du byed pa dang
478a6(rgyud): skal pa bzang po nyid rab tu sbyin pa po// tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa las bzlog pa/ rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid kyis lhag pa'i cha khyim du skyes pa/
478a7(rgyud): kun tu ston par byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mkhyen pa'i mthu'i don gyis ches stong phrag pas kyang stong phrag brgya po des kyang lan cig gzhom pa tsam dang / dpe tsam du byang chub sems dpa'i yul
478b1(rgyud): 'jig rten du ma'i 'byung gnas rang bzhin du gnas pa la bltos nas/ ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjes su sgrub pa 'di rnams gsungs pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das
478b2(rgyud): yid dbang du gyur pa dngos grub rab tu stsol bar mdzad par gyur to// tad+ya thA/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ oM dza ye swA hA/ rgya lam zhes bya ba'o// tad+ya thA/ na mo a
478b3(rgyud): mi tA b+hA ga/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ oM bi dza ya swA hA/ rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'o// tad+ya thA/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya ka na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ oM a dzi te swA hA/ mi thub ma zhes bya'o//
478b4(rgyud): namo a mi tA b+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ oM a pa ra dzi te swA hA/ gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'o// zhes pa de lta bu sring mo bzhi'o// lnga pa ming po ni/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ar+ha te/
478b5(rgyud): nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ oM ki ni ki ni sarba ta thA ga tA ud+d+ha ba shAn+te/ ba ra de/ ut+ta ma ut+ta ma ta thA ga ta u d+ha ba hUM phaT swA hA ming po tum bu ru zhes pa'o// sngags kyi rgyal po yongs su bsgrags/
478b6(rgyud): mdor na nga rgyal can rlom pa// phyi ma'i rgyud kyi las rnams ni// ji lta ji ltar rab sbyar ba// de lha de ltar sgrub par byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul yang dag par bstan/
478b7(rgyud): par 'dod pas stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te// rang gi rdo rje gsor nas rdo rje yang dag par skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
479a1(rgyud): bzhugs so// de nas yang ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// byang chub sems dpa' bdag kyang rtog
479a2(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po rgyud phyi ma 'dir / bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mthu kun tu bstan pa'i don du 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi mchod rten rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjes su spyod
479a3(rgyud): pa sbyin par bgyi'o// de la rjes su si rang ba'i sems dpa' chen po phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe mchog gi grub pa dang / mchog gi las byed pa/ tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams kyang khyad par du 'grub par 'gyur ro//
479a4(rgyud): 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjes su spyod pa pos gang rdul las byung ba 'di rnams rigs dang pha rol gnon par byed pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi//
479a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// phyag na rdo rje gsungs shig/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes slar yang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// phyag na rdo rje snyoms par zhugs pa'i
479a6(rgyud): de ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kun tu snang bar byas so// de nas phyag na rdo rjes phyag gi sor mo rab tu brkyang ste/ rdo rje rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang /
479a7(rgyud): rdo rje dmar po dang / rdo rje mthar phyin dang / rdo rje nag po ste/ g.yon pa'i phyag las byung ba 'di rnams bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gzhon nu'i spun rnams so// de nas de rnams bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal
479b1(rgyud): bar byed par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la'ang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnon nu'i spun lnga po rnams la legs so zhes bka' stsal to//
479b2(rgyud): sems can rnams kyi bsod nams 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / dngos grub sbyin par byed pa/ sgrol ma'i rtog par don chen po sbyin pa/ phyag na rdo rje'i rigs las 'byung ba/ pad+ma'i phyag la mnga' bdag tu gyur
479b3(rgyud): pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rjes dkyil 'khor gsungs par gyur to// gcig gnyis gsum bzhi lnga dang ni// ji srid khru ni brgyad kyi bar// nor 'dod pa yis khru gcig ste// bu 'dod pa yis khru gnyis so//
479b4(rgyud): dgra nyams byed pas khru gsum mo// bzlas pa nyid kyis khru bzhi'o// lnga pa dngos grub thams cad la// brgyad pa mkha' la 'gro ba yis// sa 'og don dang 'bab chu dang // rgya mtsho dang ni dngos
479b5(rgyud): grub gnas// khyim du'ang rung ste gtsang ma 'am// gzhan du g.yogs par byas pa dang // las la shis pa gang rung gis// thig gis dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// gru bzhi pa la grwa bzhi pa/
479b6(rgyud): sgo bzhi rta babs rgyan gyis brgyan// dkyil 'khor cha gsum byas pa yi// steng gi cha ru bcom ldan 'das// sangs rgyas pad+ma'i gdan gnas pa// chos ston par ni mdzad bzhin pa// g.yas su
479b7(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ tshangs pa'i dbyug pa spyi blugs phyag/ g.yon du 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje// rdo rje'i phyag gam de gzhogs su/ khyab 'jug dung dang 'khor lo ste/ be con
480a1(rgyud): phyag na 'khor lo'o// dbus su mar gru la zhon// gru pi srog shing sbeng ba'o// dang por rdo rje rab 'joms dang // sgyu 'phrul dang mi gtum bu ru// gnyis par rdo rje khu tshur
480a2(rgyud): dang / rgyal mar bcas pa'o gsum pa ru// lus dmar dang ni rnam rgyal bcas// bzhi par rdo rje bsags mtha' dang // mi thub mar bcas lnga pa ru// lho nag gzhan mi thub dang bcas//
480a3(rgyud): ljang khwa dkar po dmar po dang // ser po nag po go rims bzhin// lha rnams dgod par byas nas ni// dkar po'i gos dang dkar po'i rgyan// be con rdo rje gtun shing dang // gzhu dang ral
480a4(rgyud): gri mtshon cha'i phyag/ dbus su zla nyi pad+ma la// lha rnams mngon sum dgod par bya// glu yi 'og tu me dang ni// chu yi gter ni gnas par bya// dung dang nya dang chu srin gyis// rnam par brgyan/
480a5(rgyud): pa'i shar dang lho// nub dang byang du dbang po dang / gshin rje chu la lus ngan rnams// gzhon par bcas shing phyag rgyar bcas// legs par dkris pa'i bum pa ni// dri yis chu yis yongs
480a6(rgyud): su bkang // yal 'dab kyis ni nye bar mdzes// grwa rnams su ni dgod par bya// 'dir mi bum pa lnga pa ni// rin chen gyis brgyan 'jam pa yi// gos kyis mgrin pa dkris pa dang // sa ha ka ra'i
480a7(rgyud): yal 'dab kyis// kha ni dgab par byas pa dang // gdugs bsgreng me tog 'phreng ba sbyangs// shar gyi sgo ru dgod par bya// dkyil 'khor phyi ru rgya mtsho bzhi// dung dang pad+ma la sogs kyis// pi yis
480b1(rgyud): rtse mo yis kyang bya// rgyal mtshan rnams 'khrugs bla re bres// in+d+ra nI la gser dang ni// dngul dang zangs dang lcags rnams kyi// phye mas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// lha yi me tog bdug pas
480b2(rgyud): bdug/ rnam pa sna tshogs gtor mas mchod// dus kyis non pa'i me tog 'bras// dbyig gser sna tshogs rin chen dang // bza' ba phyi rol btsal du bgram// ri bo'i steng du rab 'jug bya/
480b3(rgyud): snying po phyi mas spyan drangs sogs// las rnams kun dang gshegs su gsol// de nas gang gis dkon mchog gsum// dad pas byang chub sems bskyed de// bud med skyes pa gzhon mu yi// bsnyen
480b4(rgyud): gnas byas pa gos kyis ni// gdong ni nye bar bcings pa yis// dam tshig gis kyang mnyan par gyis// dbyig dang gser gyi me tog gis// lag pa yis kyang dor bar bya// de ni gang du lhung gyur pa
480b5(rgyud): de yi rigs 'gyur de nas ni// gdong phye lha rnams bstan par bya// sngags dang phyag rgya rnams kyang 'gyur// yang na nyin dang mtshan mo ru// dkyil 'khor de bri mnyes par 'gyur// de nas gzugs brnyan
480b6(rgyud): 'byung ste/ a shwad+tha dang / n+ya gro d+ha dang / u dum ba ra la zhi ba can dang / tsU ta dang / tsam pa ka dang / na ga ge sar gyis rgyas pa can dang / bil ba dang / arka dang / a riSh+Ta dang / ko Tha yis mngon spyod cang
480b7(rgyud): mo// dbang du byed pa dang skal ba ngan pa rnams la bad kan mthar byed dang / shasma li dang / dIr+g+ha br-it+ta'o// skyo bar byed pa la tsan dan dang / mya ngan med pa'i shing dang / sbrang rtsi dang / myos byed rnams so// skal ba
481a1(rgyud): bzang po nyid la as+thi da t+ta las byung ba rnams so// las thams cad pa la gser las byung ba'o// rgyal srid 'dod pas ni dngul las byung ba'o// zangs ni bskal ba bzang po'i
481a2(rgyud): ched du'o// lcags las byung ba ni mngon spyod can no// nyams par byed pa la tsam pa ka dang / nag ge sar dang / ba gu la dang / a ti muk+ta ka'o// nor 'dod pas ni snam dang / pU thi ka dang / mal+li kA dang /
481a3(rgyud): myos byed dang / gser shing dang / mA li ka rnams so// skal ba bzang po 'dod pas ni pad+ma dang ku mu nga'o// zhi pa can la u t+pal dang so'u gan+d+hi ka'o// rgyas pa can dang gzhan la'ang dri bzang po can gyi me tog no//
481a4(rgyud): rgyas pa can gang la dris dman pa'i me tog go// mngon spyod can dang nyams par byed pa la sogs pa la ni tsan dan la sogs pa'i dri 'phrog pa'o// zhi ba can dang / rgyas pa can dang / dbang du byed pa dang / skal ba
481a5(rgyud): bzang po nyid la de lta bu'i bdug pa la sogs pa sbyar nas snying po'i sngags 'di rnams kyis las bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na ma sh+tsa dud+d+haM b+ha ki nI nAM/ na mo de ga
481a6(rgyud): tu mU ru sAr+tha kA ha ya/ dzam+b+ha ni/ dzam+b+hi ka ro ti a mi traM/ stam+b+ha ni/ stam+b+hI ka ro t+ya ga mi traM/ mo ha nI/ mo hI ka ro t+ya mi traM/ an+d+ha ni in+ti ka ro t+ya mi traM/ dza ye A gats+tsha bi dza ye A gats+tsha dzam+b+ha ni a gats+tsha stam+b+ha ni
481a7(rgyud): A ga~MN+Da/ ba li ba li/ puSh+pa/ d+hU pa/ u ba hA ra/ pra ti gr-ih+Na thAg sam lA gu pA la lA thA/ swa tsu Tu su ma badz+ra b+han+ya nI ya sAhA/ rig pa 'di ni stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa ba'ir 'gyur te/ 'di
481b1(rgyud): lta ste/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / phug tu rab tu 'jug pa dang / gter 'pho bar byed pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa nyid dang / mig sman ldong ngos sgrub pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / nyams par byed pa dang /
481b2(rgyud): gzhan rab tu 'joms pa dang / rang gi yul so sor skyong ba dang / dug dang / pho nya dang / nad 'gro ba dang / mche ba rab bsnams la yang dag par gnas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dkyil 'ja
481b3(rgyud): bcing ba dang / khros pas rgyal po'i khab rab tu sgrub pa ste/ de lta bu la sogs pa'i las gzhan rnams kyang rang gi 'dod pas bsgrub par bya'o// sring mo bzhi'i snying po rdzogs so//
481b4(rgyud): de nas slar yang dkyil 'khor gsungs pa/ khru bzhi pa/ gru bzhi pa/ sgo bzhi pa/ kun nas rta babs kyis brgyan pa/ gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan rnams gzhon pa dang bcas
481b5(rgyud): mtshon cha dang bcas pa'i sgo skyong bya ste/ sgo gsum byed du gzhug go// byang gi rab tu thob par bya ste cha gsum byas nas steng gi cha ru bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'o// 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'ang phyag
481b6(rgyud): g.yon pas rdo rje dang g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ kun nas 'bar ba bri bar bya'o// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i g.yon du rdo rje lcags kyu lcags kyu lag na thogs pa/ gzhan du rdo rje lcags sgrog lcags sgog lag
481b7(rgyud): na thogs pa/ thams cad kyang ri'i rtse mo la yang dag par gnas par bya'o// dbang ldan gyi phyogs la brten pa'i lha chen po chung ma dang bcas pa khyu mchog dang bcas pa yang dag par bri'o// gzhan
482a1(rgyud): rnam pa gsum rim gyis mtshon cha dang / gnas dang bcas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o// b+h+r-i gi ri Ti dang / dga' byed dang / nag po chen po rnams so// nub tu mi sbyin dang /
482a2(rgyud): tum bu ru dang / 'od srungs dang / sna tshogs bshes gnyen la sogs pa rnams ril ba spyi blugs dang chu snong phyag na bsnams pa'o// nang gi char gru bya'o// khron pa dang / srog shing bsgreng ba dang / tatasU
482a3(rgyud): bri'o// stod g.yogs ljang khu can/ lag na be con thogs pa/ cod pan gyis brgyan pa'o phyag na tog skyong ba bsnams pa/ rna ba la rgya skyegs kyis brgyan pa'o// rgyal ba dkar po phyag na rdo rje thogs pa/
482a4(rgyud): stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs can no// rnam par rgyal ba lus dmar po phyag na gtun shing thogs pa/ gos dmar po'i stod g.yogs can/ gser gyi kha dog can gyi gzhu phyag na bsnams pa'o//
482a5(rgyud): gzhan gyis mi thub pa nag mo/ gos khra bo'i stod g.yogs can dgos nag po'i sham thabs can/ phyag na ral gri thogs pa/ gru la zhon pa'o// de nas zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / lha rnams dang /
482a6(rgyud): nang du pad+ma rab tu gtor ba bri bar bya'o// byang gi sgor log 'dren chen po g.yas kyi gzhogs su chu bo rab med khor yug tu rdo rje dang dung dang / kha da dang / dpal be'u rnams kyang kun tu bri'o//
482a7(rgyud): de ltar thams cad yang dag par bris te/ de nas ji ltar 'byor pa'i gtor ma dang / thug pa rnam pa lnga lnga dang / bza' ba rnam pa lnga dang / kAny+tsa mang po dang / bza' ba dkris pa'i bag zan dang /
482b1(rgyud): dza mU li ka dang / zho dang / bu ram dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi ji ltar rigs pa dbul bar bya'o// chu'i bum pa bzhi ji ltar 'dod pa'i lal 'dab kyis kha bkab pa dang / bum pa dri'i chu thams cad kyis
482b2(rgyud): yongs su bkang ba/ sa bon thams cad dang / sman thams cad dang / yal 'dab dang / gos kyis mgrin pa dkris pa/ dbyig dang / gser dang / rin po che rnams dang / yal 'dab kyis brgyan
482b3(rgyud): pa'i bum pa rnam pa lnga lnga rnams dang / phyi ru rin po che rnams kyis mngon par bkram pa'o// de lta bu la sogs pa'i bkra shis pa rnams byas nas phyi nas bzlas par bya'o// de nas mngon du slob ma rab tu
482b4(rgyud): gzug par bya ste/ 'di las gzhan po'i sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHsh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ mahA yak+Sha sen pa ta yo/ nAm d+yash+tsa tur+d+ha gi nI nA ma ma dza gA ya/ mA he ti sA hA/
482b5(rgyud): sngags 'di rnam pa brgyad kyis sems can thams cad dbang du byed do// me tog dang / yungs kar dang / lan tshwa dang / chu dang / thal bas dri med nyid sun 'byin pa'i cha byad kyis kyang ngo //
482b6(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra gA ya/ na ma shUn+ta badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na mo bi dza yA ya/ ha ha/ d+ha li/ ku mA rA ni biSh+Nu mu khe ra Te sha sA hA/ rig pa 'di 'bum bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen pa byas par
482b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nas brgya byin gyi gnam lcags phog pa'i shing sor drug pa'i shing blangs nas mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas par gyur nas/ gang du mchod rten ring bsrel dang bcas pa der song nas bum pa pa'i
483a1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyang me tog dang yal 'dab kyis kha brgyan pa gzhag par bya'o// de nas ku sha bting zhing bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / lcags gsum bcings pa'i phur bu de/
483a2(rgyud): rkang pa g.yon pa lag pa g.yon pas gnas te/ ji srid du lag pa mi snang bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// lag pa btang bar yang mi bya'o// de nas phur bu de dgon par gdab par bya ste/ phur bu khyim
483a3(rgyud): du 'byung ngo // cho ga 'di nyid kyis btab nas phur bu rkang pa g.yon pas yang dag par mnan nas dbang du gyis shig/ grong khyer 'jig pa'i lag pa btsir bas phyag rgya thams cad dang / dug byas pa rnams kyang
483a4(rgyud): 'joms par byed do// skye bo'i nang du'ang gdab par bya ste thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// gzhan la'ang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du las rnams byed do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/
483a5(rgyud): ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na ma sh+tsa ta sri NAM/ b+ha gi nI naM/ na maHsuM bu ru/ sar+b+ba ba ha s+ya/ ma hA kar+Na s+ya pi tsi bi tsa/ a mu kA ya/ b+harga pra ba tAn+na sA hA/ nag po'i brgyad pa 'am nag po'i bcu bzhi pa
483a6(rgyud): la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas sngags 'di thod par khrag gis bri bar bya'o// stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags par byas nas chu la dor bar bya'o// rnam pa thams cad pa'i ngag tu 'gyur ro//
483a7(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsa N+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA lak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na ma sh+tsa ta sri NAM b+ha gi nin/ na mo dzam+b+ha ni/ tsa Ta tsa Tu/ tsa Ta ma~M Tu swA hA/ rig pa 'dis rgyal gyi zla ba la mya ngan med pa'i shing gi 'og tu na
483b1(rgyud): leng gam gsum khar bcug ste/ stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o// de nas na le sham gcig khar rab tu bcug ste/ gang mig mi 'dzum par lta bar byed pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nam
483b2(rgyud): shU NA badz+ra pA Na ye/ mahA lak+Sha se nA pa ta le/ na ma sh+tsa ta swi NAM b+ha gri nI nAM/ na ma sUm+bu ru ma hA sar+b+ba/ bA hA ya/ na mo dza ye bi dza le a dzi te a pa ra dzi te swA hA/ rig pa 'dis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sngon du/
483b3(rgyud): bsnyen pa byas nas/ nag po'i brgyad pa 'am nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas pas/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas mar me dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'phreng ba la sogs pa phul te mchod pa rgya
483b4(rgyud): po byas te/ chu rang nyid kyis blangs nas zangs kyi snod du bzhag ste thun gcig tu bzlas par bya'o// de 'thungs shing khrus byas nas cho ga de nyid kyis tho rangs dge 'dun gyis bstan pa'i slong mo zos nas de lta bu'i
483b5(rgyud): ma brgyad zlos shig/ de nas phyogs bzhi rig pa'i gnas rnams kha ru rab tu jug pa byed de thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na le/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na ma sh+tsa
483b6(rgyud): ta sr-i NAM b+ha gi nI nAM/ tan+ti mi li mi li swA hA/ rig pa 'dis rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs te/ lag pa g.yas pas khu tshur byas nas nyi ma bcu gsum du bzlas par bya'o// dug dang mche bas shi ba
483b7(rgyud): thams cad slong ba 'jug par byed do// khu tshur gyis gdon rnams 'bebs par byed do// ma mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na ma sh+tsa ta sri nAM b+ha gi nI tsA/ na ma stu mUH/
484a1(rgyud): sar+b+ba ma hA ya/ su Tu su Tu badz+ra pra b+hany+dza nI ye swA hA/ sngags 'di ba byung gi dkyil 'khor khru bzhi pa byas nas der bA sha ka'i yam shing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags
484a2(rgyud): pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad gyis shig/ nag po'i brgyad pa nas brtsams te ji srid bco lnga pa'i bar du'o// gang 'dod pa de 'gugs par byed do// 'dis kyang khros pas rgyal po'i pho brang rab tu bsgrub
484a3(rgyud): par bya ste/ kun tu rgyu rab tu zhugs nas de la sol bas mngon par bris te rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o// de nas khro ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya rab 'chang byed/
484a4(rgyud): dge ba'i lag pa las kun+da la// las gang cung zad bya ba de// kun la lag pa g.yon sbyar bya// mthe bo ba can la bzung ba yin// phyag rgya lha yir yongs su bsgrags// sdigs mdzub can ni
484a5(rgyud): gnod sbyin la// dri za la ni gung mo ste// 'byung po rnams la ming med do// klu la sogs pa mthe'u chung // srin po rnams la mthil du'o// dbyug pa'i phyag rgya yi dgas rnams// phyag rgya rnam pa
484a6(rgyud): brgyad du bshad// mthe bong rdo rje rab 'joms pa// sdigs mdzub rdo rje khu tshur te// gung mo rdo rje lus dmar la// mthe'u chung nag po'i yan lag can// mthe bong tum+bu ru zhes 'di// rang gi gzugs
484a7(rgyud): kyis rang rang la// phyag rgya lnga po rnam par dgod// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas
484b1(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po can/ sems can thams cad la phan par mdzad pa/ rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po ral pa gyen brjes kyi rgyud phyi mas ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rig
484b2(rgyud): ba'i sngags kyi spyod pa thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i ched du ji ltar bya ba bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so// des na gang rig pa 'dzin
484b3(rgyud): pa bkrus bzhin pa rig pa de rjes su dran par byas nas rig pa med par khrus bya ba dang / rnam par dben pa'i phyogs ma yin par zlos pa nyid de rnams ni lus rtsub pa dang stobs chung bar 'gyur ro// gang lam
484b4(rgyud): du 'gro ba grong pa'i chos kyis gos pa rnams la yid kyis bzlas pa byed do// rtag tu sems g.yo ba dang nad mang bar 'gyur ro// gang yang yang nas yang du rig pa thun mong du 'pho ba dang / gnas ma yin pa
484b5(rgyud): rnams la rab tu sbyor bar byed pa dang / sbyin sreg dang bral bra bzlas pa byed pa ni rtag tu don nyams pa dang / grogs nyams par yang 'gyur ro// gang zhig slar yang rig pa 'dzin pa rang gi rig pa la
484b6(rgyud): brnyas pa byed pa dang lha la skyo bar byed pa ni log par 'dren pa dang skrag par byed do// rtag tu 'jig rten dga' bar mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu yongs su brnyas par 'gyur ro// rtag tu'ang rig pa 'dzin pas sangs
484b7(rgyud): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyis gsungs pa'i rig pa'i sngags rnams me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod par bya/ bkur
485a1(rgyud): stir bya'o// dam tshig med pa dang / srog gcod par byed pa dang / sngags byed pa dang / dge slong ma sun 'byin par byed pa dang / mtshams med pa byed pa dang / tshul dang bral/
485a2(rgyud): pas dge 'dun gyi rdzas la yongs su longs spyod pa dang / 'bru'i chang dang bcos pa'i chang la yongs su 'gro ba dang / dge slong ngam dge slong ma gsod par byed pa dang / zas la rkang pas rdzi bar byed pa dang /
485a3(rgyud): dam tshig med par khro bas zas rdzi bar byed pa dang / 'thor bar byed pa dang / dam tshig med pa shi ba mthong nas 'gro bar mi byed pa dang / dam tshig med pa dang dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa la phyag rgya dang lcag
485a4(rgyud): sbyin par byed pa dang / de la'ang dam tshig med par sman rkang pas rdzi bar byed pa dang / dam tshig las nyams par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha gzhan
485a5(rgyud): rnams la'ang dri med nyid kyis 'gom par byed pa dang / dam tshig med par dung dang / 'khor lo dang / rtse gsum kha gdengs dang / be con dang / mdung dang / rdo rje dang / phub dang / gzhu dang /
485a6(rgyud): gshol dang / gtun shing dang / mda' dang / mdung thung ngam/ glang po che dang / khyu mchog dang / bong bu dang / phag dang / shar b+ha dang / seng ge dang / bya gag dang / rma bya dang / ma he dang /
485a7(rgyud): rnga mo dang / ngang pa dang / mi dang / lha'i gzhon pa dang / mtshon cha sna tshogs pa rnams kyang 'gom par byed pa dang / sna tshogs byed pa mthong nas rkang pas gnon par byed pa dang / rnam pa gzhan du log par
485b1(rgyud): 'dren pa dang dngos grub ster bar mi byed do// bza' ba'i cho ga'ang 'dir til dang / sha dang / brlaT dang / dzAmU li ka dang / nya dang / pU ba li ka mang po dang / til gyi thug pa dang / lha bshos
485b2(rgyud): dang dri med nyid bza' ba'ang spang bar bya'o// lha'i dri med nyid gnon pa dang / pad+ma gnon pa dang / chu la gnas pa dang ldan pa dang / ut+pa la gnod pa dang / nags kyi bdag po gcod pa dang /
485b3(rgyud): rtsa ba 'byin par byed pa'ang spang bar bya'o// rig pa rjes su dran par byed pa nyid kyis rtag tu gos gtsang ma bgos pas bya ba thams cad la bstan pa nyid dang / gzhan rig pa'i cho ga thams cad la mchod
485b4(rgyud): par byed pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ slar yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po khyed rnams nyon cig/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i
485b5(rgyud): rig pa'i yi ge rnams thabs dang bcas pas bde blag tu sgrub par byed pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa ral pa gyen brjes kyi rgyud phyi mar yid kyis grub pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams ni//
485b6(rgyud): namo rat+na tra yA la/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ g+hu ni g+hu ni la la la sid+d+he sid+d+haHpa rA kra ma swA hA/ a mi tA b+hU mu tA swA hA/ sar+b+besh+tsa Ar+ya a ba lo ki te
485b7(rgyud): swA hA/ 'di ni 'phags pa zla ba ma zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i nu mo ste las thams cad byed pa'o// sgrub pa pos rtag tu gtsug pud bcing ba dang / phyag rgya bcing ba'ang bya'o//
486a1(rgyud): bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa'o// de la 'di ni tho rangs langs nas gtsang mar gyur pas dkyil 'khor byas nas/ me tog la sogs pa gtor te lngal
486a2(rgyud): brtson pa sa brgyad brgyar bzlas par bya'o// mngon par 'dod pa'i don rdzogs par byed do// yang na gang 'dod pa de dbang du byed do// de nas dkyil 'khor du tse tA dzi kaM rab tu gtor nas gang 'dod pa/
486a3(rgyud): de skrod par byed par 'gyur ro// bklags pas grub pa gang yin pa de ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par bya bar 'gyur ro// yang 'dir rnam grangs kyi gter 'di der gang gcig tu reg pa de dran par byed do//
486a4(rgyud): de nas gshing byed skyed par byed par 'dod na dur khrod du song nas dur khrod kyi shing gis me rab tu sbar te/ dar chen pos bskor la ji ltar skyes pa'i khrag gis sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma bdun pa la
486a5(rgyud): 'jigs pa'i nga ro can gyi gshed byed mtshan mo phyed nas lang bar byed do// yang dag par bsngags pas ji ltar brjod pa'i gnas su yang na byin gyis brlabs pa sbyin par bya'o// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das
486a6(rgyud): ma'i byin gyis brlabs pas ji ltar bde bar mngon par bde bar byed do// de nas gnas kha cig tu mi rnams 'chi ba dang / gnas kha cig tu me 'bar bar mthong ba dang / gnas kha cig tu lcags sgrog
486a7(rgyud): bcings pa mthong ngo // de ltar gshed byed de rnam par rgyu bar byed do// de zhi ba'i don du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pad+ma stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya'o// mchog tu zhi bar 'gyur ro//
486b1(rgyud): dgra rnams skyed par byed par 'dod na dur khrod du song nas dur khrod kyi shing gis me rab tu sbar te/ yungs kar dkar po la til nag po'i til mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig
486b2(rgyud): 'gro bar byed do// de nas rims kyis 'dzin par 'dod na dur khrod kyi thal ba stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ rims chen pos 'dzin no// zhi ba'i don du chu la brgya rtsa bzlas te mgo bor sbyin par
486b3(rgyud): bya'o// rims las grol lo// mgo bo zug rngus 'dzin par 'dod na pa byung gi gzugs brnyan la mi rus kyi phur bu la stong phrag brgyad bzlas la mgo bos phur bus gdab bo// mgo bo zug rngu chen
486b4(rgyud): pos 'dzin no// phur bu bton pas zhi bar 'gyur ro// dbang po la btab na ma ning du 'gyur ro// bton na thar ro// snying khar btab na gzer chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bton na thar ro//
486b5(rgyud): seng ldeng gi phur bu sha dang khrag gis btags pa srad bus dkris pa la brgyad brgya bzlas pa mi rus kyi phur bu'i mgo bor gdab par bya'o// dgra'i sgor btab na tho rangs 'bros par byed do// ji srid du
486b6(rgyud): phur bu bton par ma gyur gyi bar du rang gnas par mi byed do// rgyal po skyed par 'dod na lha chen po'i khang par song nas/ lnga la drug dang khrag gis byugs te sha chen po'i bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// ni m+ba'i dang
486b7(rgyud): mas kyang mchod par bya'o// de nas dug dang / khrag dang / ske tshe rnam gcig tu byas nas brgyad brgyar sbyin sreg gyis shig brgyad brgya dang pos ni rang gi sha'o// gnyis pas me tog go// gsum pas btsun mo'i 'khor ro//
487a1(rgyud): bzhi pa mtshon cha chen po'o// lnga pas glang po che'o// drug pas rta ste/ khro bo chen pos dkris pa'i las so// blo bzang po nyid nyams par byed par 'dod na ni pA'i shing /
487a2(rgyud): gis me sbar nas/ nim+pa'i lo ma dang dur khrod kyi thal ba phan tshun bsres pas sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ skad cig la nyams par 'gyur ro// de nas lkugs par byed par
487a3(rgyud): 'dod na tsi kA sa ma la'i gzugs brnyan byas nas zangs kyi phur bu la brgyad brgya bzlas te/ dgra bo yid la byas nas kha la phur bu gdab par bya'o// lkugs par 'gyur ro// phur bu bton na
487a4(rgyud): thar ro// mngon spyod can rdzogs so// / ma bsgrubs par las rnams 'byung ste/ so shing la lan bdun bzlas nas bza' bar bya'o// ma blangs par bza' ba rnyed do//
487a5(rgyud): brgyad brgyar bzlas nas mgo bo la byugs pas skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// gos la lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas gon ma skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro// mig sman la mngon par bsngags/
487a6(rgyud): nas mig la bslus na khro bas dkris pa rnams kyis mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ro// lam du zlos bzhin pas song mchom rkun rnams kyis 'joms mi nus so// sor mo la lan bdun bzlas pas mche ba
487a7(rgyud): na thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro// gseg ma la brgyad brgyar bzlas nas chu la gtor na chu la rgyu ba thams cad rengs par byed par 'gyur ro// bcings pa la 'am/ 'gag pa la bzlas na thar ro//
487b1(rgyud): ka ra wi ra'i lcug ma la lan bdur bzlas pas dkyil 'khor du nye bar byugs nas sa la mtshom cha sbyin par bya'o// gang du 'dod pa der 'pho bar byed do// khyor ba'i chu la bsngags nas steng du gtor
487b2(rgyud): bar bya ste/ dus ma yin pa'i char rengs par byed do// thal ba la brgyad brgyar bzlas na thal ba des ra bar 'gyur ro// lcags kyi phye mas rdo rje'i ra bar 'gyur ro// sgron ma gsum gyis me'i ra bar
487b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bil ba'i 'dab mas bil ba'i ra bar 'gyur ro// brgyad brgyar bzlas pa'i chus chu'i ra bar 'gyur ro// mdor bsdus na bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor gyi rgyal po rtog pa gzhan gyi tshe
487b4(rgyud): gas ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar las byed do// rig pa bsgrubs pa las mtshams med pa las grol nas byang chub kyi sems rnyed do// oM ta thA ga ta uSh+NI Sha/ a na ba lo ki tre mu d+h+ya ni ti dzor
487b5(rgyud): shi hUM/ dz+wa la dzA la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ d+ha ra bi dar/ tshin+da tshin+da/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ gzi brjid dang phung por rnam par bshad de/ 'dab ma chung ngu'i rgyab tu gnas par bya'o// zhes pa de bzhin gshegs/
487b6(rgyud): pa'i gtsug tor gyi rgyud chung ngu las bris pa 'dab ma so so la rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ gzhon nu mas bkral ba'i srad bu la ras byed du bcug nas sam/ yang na dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa ste/
487b7(rgyud): ji ltar rnyed pa'i ras kha tshar ma bcad pa sgra dang bral ba la/ ri mo mkhon gso sbyong can dbang po ma tshang ba min pas kha shar du phyogs pas ras rnams 'phrul 'khor la bzhag ste/ de'i mdun du sangs rgyas
488a1(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad dang / khyad par du bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma spyan drang bar byas nas/ de nas arka'i shing gis me rab tu
488a2(rgyud): sbar mas yungs kar dkar po la mar gyis btags pa ral pa gcig ma'i snying pos ras ris kyi spyan sngar khru bzhi pa'i tshad kyi dkyil 'khor du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ ras ris 'dri bzhin pa
488a3(rgyud): na bgegs med par 'gyur ro// de nas tshes grangs dang / byed pa dang / rgyu sgrar dang / gud tsam dge ba la snod gsar bar bzhag pa kha dog ma 'dres pa shin tu so sor btags pa'i kha dog can
488a4(rgyud): gyi chus sbyar nas ba lang gi spu'i pir gyis bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi shing ni sna tshogs pa'i gnas rab tu bsngags pa/ bya'i tshogs skad 'byin pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing dang mtshungs pa bya'o//
488a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med 'drir gzhug par bya'o// chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa/ skyil mo krung gis nye bar bzhugs pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i sku / mdzes par
488a6(rgyud): snang bzhin pa'i lus/ gtsug tor nas 'od zer chen po gser gyi kha dog can 'phro ba pad+ma dkar po la bzhugs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon gyi gzhogs su dkar
488a7(rgyud): bo rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa/ kha dog lnga pa'i gos kyi stod g.yogs bgos pa/ phyag ma rdza yab thogs pa'o// gzhan du rgyu skar me bzhi la 'phags pa dri ma med par 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub
488b1(rgyud): sems dpa' 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas kyi phyogs su thams cad dkar po/ gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ ral pa'i tshogs dang / phyag na ril ba spyi blugs dang /
488b2(rgyud): dbyug gu'i shing bsnams pa/ mchod byir thogs phrag pa la 'phyang ba g.yang gzhi nag po can/ gung mo'i sor mos yongs su bzung ba'i bgrang 'phreng dang / phyag g.yas pa brkyang bas mi 'jig
488b3(rgyud): pa sbyin pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyis mnan pa'i ral pa'i tshogs can/ gos dkar po bgos pa/ mchog tu skyes pa/ grub pa po'i steng du phyag brkyang ba phyag bzhi pa/ bde bar gshegs
488b4(rgyud): ba'i mtho gang gi tshad la 'phags pa dri ma med par 'gro ba cung zad mngon par lhags pa'o// bcom ldan 'das las cung zad dman pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya'o//
488b5(rgyud): de'i g.yas kyi gzhogs su pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs/ gser dang rin po ches rab tu gsal bar byed pa'i lus can/ cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ rnam par bkra ba'i gos bgos pa/ rin po che'i
488b6(rgyud): stod g.yogs can/ lus cung zad 'dud pa/ bcom ldan 'das la lag pa kha sbyor byas pas ut+pal sngon po yongs su bzung ba/ phyag mchog tu skyes pa/ dang por bcom ldan 'das la rtog par
488b7(rgyud): byed bzhin pa'i sgrol ma 'drir gzhug par bya'o// de'i 'og tu pad+ma'i mtsho bya'o// de nas rtsa ba'i pad+ma la bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bya'o// g.yon
489a1(rgyud): du 'phags pa dri ma med par 'gro ba'o// gzhan du bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i g.yas su klu'i rgyal po mtha' las mgo bo bdun pa/ phyag na pad+ma'i sdong po bsnams pa/ thams/
489a2(rgyud): cad dkar ba/ rnam par bkra ba'i gos dang rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// g.yon du klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sgo bsangs/ phyag na pad+ma'i sdong bu bsnams pa/ 'di 'dra ba 'drir gzhug
489a3(rgyud): par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis g.yas kyi gzhogs su rtsa ba dang nye bar dkar mo rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ rin po che'i stod g.yogs can/ rin po che dang tsang+ga Ta ka phyag na bsnams pa/ bus
489a4(rgyud): mo sa la btsug pa'i lha mo 'drir gzhug par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i g.yas kyi gzhogs su rtsa ba dang nye bar 'khod pa'i thams cad dkar mo gzhon nu ma'i gzugs can rgyan thams
489a5(rgyud): cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ thal mo kha sbyar du byas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma dpa/ bcom ldan 'das la nges par rtog bzhin pa'i bde ldan 'drir gzhug par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
489a6(rgyud): phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du sgrub pa po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la blta bar gyur pa/ gos dkar po'i stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs can dbyibs dang rnam pa'i khyad par ci 'dra ba bus mo gnyis btsugs
489a7(rgyud): pa/ lag pa spos por thogs pa bya'o// lha'i bu rnga bo che rdung bar byed bzhin pa bya'o// sprin las glog dang bcas pa bya'o// phyogs bzhi dang phyogs bral du'ang bya'o// g.yas su ras ris kyi steng du gnas
489b1(rgyud): gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu me tog 'thor bar byed bzhin pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// steng du zla ba dang nyi ma rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// steng du dung dang rnga bo che dag go//
489b2(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g.yas su nag mo gsus pa 'phyang ba/ rgyan thams cad dang / mche ba gtsigs pa/ stag gis pags pa'i sham thabs dang / go zhes bya ba'i bgra
489b3(rgyud): pas dkris pa/ gtsug pud la thod pa'i 'phreng bas 'phyang ba/ rdo ba la rab tu bzhugs pa/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can/ phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas kyi phyag gis dgra sta yongs su bsnam pa/
489b4(rgyud): phyag g.yon pa'i dang pos khrag gis yongs su gang ba'i snod dang / phyogs dang ldan pa'i lus la smin ma dang slar ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba byas pa sen mo ring po can/ glang
489b5(rgyud): po che'i pags pas stod g.yogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dka' rab tu nod par byed bzhin par gyur pa'i 'phags ma sgrol ma'i srin mo chen mo 'drir gzhug par bya'o// de ltar ras ris 'drir
489b6(rgyud): bcug nas gtsang ma'i phyogs su dag pa dang / skyong ba dang / tshan ma nyid kyi yan lag rnam par spangs pa/ ri bo dang chu klung gi 'gram mam/ gzhan du'ang rung ste/ gtsang ma'i gnas su'o// de nas du bathul bas ni
489b7(rgyud): dbang du byed do// gang thabs cig gsang sngags byed pa de'o// lha thams cad gsal bar byed par 'dod pas dkar po'i brgyad pa'ang rung ste las brtsams par bya'o// gtsang ma'i sa'i phyogs su gzhu'i tshad kyi
490a1(rgyud): thang la yongs su byug par bya ste/ de'i dbus su so phag gzhag par bya'o// phyogs bzhi rnams sus las byung ba'i rtsa ba dang nag po med pa'i chu'i bum pa bzhi la brgyad brgyar
490a2(rgyud): bsngags pa gzhag par bya'o// gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srang bu tshen sna lnga pas legs par dkris pa'o// dri zhim po'i phye mas dkyil 'khor byas nas/ phyogs bzhir chang dang sha med pa'i gtor ma dngul
490a3(rgyud): bar bya'o// dri bzang po'i me tog gi mchod pa bya'o// gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul lo// zangs kyi snod mar gyis bkang ba bzhag nas 'gram gyi phye ma rnams la nye bar gnas par gzhag par bya'o// shar du mngon
490a4(rgyud): papar phyogs pas phyi rol lam dkyil 'khor du ral ba gcig ma la mchod pa dang gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// de nas ku sha ljang khu blangs nas gos dkar po gcig 'chang bar byas te/ ji srid du rkang pa gnyis kyi bar
490a5(rgyud): de srid du byabs par bya'o// de nas mar gyi snod kyi steng du ku sha des dor bar bya'o// de nas mar chung ngu de la gal te dri ma dang / sen mo dang / sgra mthong na de dor nas gang dang gang gcig tu bya'o// ji srid du rang 'dod
490a6(rgyud): pa dang smra ba lhag par skyes kyi bar du'o// de nas bum pa re re blangs te zlos bzhin pas gzhag par bya'o// sbyangs pa'i snod nges par gnas pa byas nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
490a7(rgyud): byed du gzhug go// 'di la'ang 'di'i bsku mnye sbyin par bya'o// pri yang ku dang / na ga ge sar dang / sbrang rtsi can dang / tu ru ska rnams gcig tu byas nas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas te bslu bar bya'o//
490b1(rgyud): ba'i mar dang bsres pa'i bza' ba mchog bza' bar bya'o// nAd med par 'gyur ro// gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i sras bu sngon por bcos pa la lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas rna ba la bcing bar
490b2(rgyud): bya ste mig gi nad bzhi'o// mgrin pa la bcings na skyugs pa sel bar byed do// sras bu 'di nyid kyi ras yug 'thag tu gzhug par bya'o// stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pa gyad kyi lus la
490b3(rgyud): bcing bar bya ste/ g.yul du gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// khru bzhi pa'i tshad kyi dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma la dri bzang po'i me tog gi mchod pa byas nas pa'i mar gyi sgong
490b4(rgyud): me dbul bar bya'o// de nas byang chub kyi shing gis me sbar nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i sra rtsi pog gi sreg blugs thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis
490b5(rgyud): shig/ nyi ma bdun la gang 'dod pa de'i nad yun ring po nye bar zhi bar byed do// bgegs thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed par 'dod pas rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gi 'gram gnyis kyis blangs nas
490b6(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i seng ge dang stag gi gdong pa can gyi bgegs rnams nyi shu rtsa gcig lhag pa'i brgya bya'o// de nas nag po'i brgyad pa la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas gtsang ma'i phyogs su khrag
490b7(rgyud): sgrub par byed pa nye bar thogs te las brtsam par bya'o// de'i 'og tu phyogs bzhir rgya skyegs kyi lo ma la 'dug pa'i bgegs rnams gzhag par bya'o// bgegs rnams kyi dbus su bgegs chen po log par
491a1(rgyud): 'dren pa gzhag par bya'o// lan cig mngon par bsngags pa'i tshon sna lnga'i phye ma de rnams kyis thog mar dkyil 'khor bdun bya'o// me tog dmar po dang dri dmar pos mngon par mchod/
491a2(rgyud): par bya'o// phyogs bzhir mar gyi mar me dbul bar bya'o// phyogs bzhir shwa'i gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// rgya skyegs kyi khu ba phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma stong phrag
491a3(rgyud): brgyad du mngon par bsngags pa 'am/ brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa'i srad bu dmar pos bgegs thams cad la g.yas skor du dkri bar bya'o// de nas bgegs kyi rgyal po chen po bcings par/
491a4(rgyud): bya ste/ de rnams kyi dbus su u dum+ba ra'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas bgegs bcing bar bya'o// zhes brjod nas swA hA'i yi ges be'u'i lci ba la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags
491a5(rgyud): pa'i mtshan mo stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ de nas sgrub pa po de'i bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// rig pa thams cad sgrub par byed bzhin pa na bgegs med
491a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// de rnams ni de rnams kyis byabs pas log par 'dren pa chen po gcig tu bzhag nas bgegs rnams thams cad la me tog thams cad dbul lo// srung ba thams cad kyang ngo // bdug pa ni log
491a7(rgyud): 'dren chen po rnams la ka ra wI ra dmar po dang tsan dan dmar po dbul lo// bgegs thams cad dang nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad la mchod yon dbul lo// log par 'dren pa dang bcas pa la gu gu la dang mar
491b1(rgyud): bsres pas mchod yon dbul lo// de nas lte ba'i tshad du dong brko bar bya'o// de ru so so so sor bcug nas slar yang sa'i sar bya'o// de ltar rig pa 'dzim pa'i bgegs thams cad med par 'gyur ro//
491b2(rgyud): ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dus la ma lhung ba'i ba byung gis dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te/ dri dang me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas u dum wa ri'i yam shing gis me
491b3(rgyud): rab tu sbar te/ tshangs ma'i khams shing rnams kyis thun gsum du sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad gyis shig/ nyi ma bdun phrag gcig gam/ nyi ma bdun phrag gnyis su tsa ru bza' bas yid gzhungs
491b4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// khru bzhi'i tshad kyis dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te 'o ma can gyi lam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas 'o ma'i sbyin sred gyis shig/ bram ze dbang du 'gyur ro// tsa ru'i sreg zugs
491b5(rgyud): gyis shig/ rgyal rigs dbang du 'gyur ro// zho'i sreg blugs gyis shig/ rje'u rigs dbang du 'gyur ro// nas kyi sreg blugs gyis shig/ dmangs rigs dbang du 'gyur ro// thams cad/
491b6(rgyud): du bsgrub bya ba sgrub pa'i don du nyi ma bdun phrag gcig go// dgra la bltas nas bzlas par bya ste rengs par 'gyur ro// mA sha ka'i yam shing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa rnams thun
491b7(rgyud): gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ gang la bltas nas bzlas pa de las su mi rung bar 'gyur ro// chu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas dug thams cad sel bar byed do//
492a1(rgyud): drug thams cad la 'dod pas byab par bya'o// zhu mkhan gyi ril bu la lan bdun mngon par bsgrags nas mig dgang bar bya ste/ mig nad nye bar zhi bar byed do// khyis
492a2(rgyud): pa gdon gyis zin pa la srang bu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas bcing bar bya ste/ grol bar byed do// nad pa la bcing bar bya ste/ gdon thams cad mthu med par 'gyur ro// thal
492a3(rgyud): ba la lan bdun bzlas pas dkyil 'khor bcing ba'o// bu ma thon pa la til mar la yongs su bzlas nas sbyiran bar bya ste/ bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro// rmongs pas mngal gyi dus tshod la 'das
492a4(rgyud): pa la khrus byas nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba'i mar la lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas btung bar sbyin no// bza' ba mchog dang ldan pa bza' bar bya'o// bu skye bar byed do// de nas bu lol po can gyi lam shing
492a5(rgyud): stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ thal ba de bum pa bzhi chus kun tu bkang nas brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa dkyil 'khor du gsum gzhag par bya'o// skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro// 'di'i
492a6(rgyud): bu 'chi ba'ang med do// shu dag la brgyad brgyar mngon par bzlas te lag pa g.yon la bcings na smra ba thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i me tog thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad
492a7(rgyud): sbyin sreg gyis shig/ phyogs gcig la g.yul du gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa byas nas mdud pa bdun bya'o//
492b1(rgyud): lag pa la bcings na brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dug mthu med par 'gyur ro// de nas mi bzad pa'i sbrul gyi mche ba'i dug la swA hA'i yi ge'i bar du khyor bar chu blangs nas brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags/
492b2(rgyud): te btung ba sbyin par bya'o// dug nyal ba'ang slong bar byed do// de nas ma langs na phyog bzhi rnams su mngon par bsngags pa byas te btung ba sbyin par bya'o// 'jog pos kyang mche ba'i dug slong bar
492b3(rgyud): byed do// stan gam+b+hi ka la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa sa la byug pa sbyin par bya'o// ma bcings par yang de nyid du skam par byed do// tshor ba med par byed do// khams kyi nye bar 'tshe ba rnams la
492b4(rgyud): grong ngam grong khyer gyi dbus su mtshan mo phyed nas ba lang gi pags pa'i tshad kyi thang la nye bar byug par bya ste/ dkar gsum gyi gtor ma byin nas dri dang me tog la sogs pa'i gtor ma byin te/
492b5(rgyud): 'o ma'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas 'o ma'i sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma gsum gyis grong gsum gyi dang / nyi ma bdun gyis khang pa'i yams nye bar zhi bar byed do//
492b6(rgyud): de nas nye bar zhi bar ma gyur na 'dir nyi ma bdun du bad kan mthar byed kyi lam shing gis me sbar nas/ ak+Sha'i til mar gyis btags pa'i 'bras yos stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma
492b7(rgyud): gsum la 'phral gyi khams rab tu zhi bar byed do// thal bas 'gram bcings te zlos bzhin pas gang mthong ba de dga' bar 'gyur ro// gang ma bsgrubs par yang bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma
493a1(rgyud): sgrol ma'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'gyur ro// cho ga gzhan ni ring srel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngang zla ba nya la gzugs brnyan la dang por nag po'i
493a2(rgyud): phyogs la mchod pa rgya chen po bya ste/ arka'i yom shing gis me sbyar nas zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pas thun gsum du mdzub mo'i tshad kyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad ji srid bco
493a3(rgyud): lnga pa'i bar du gyis shig/ de nas grub par 'gyur ro// de lta bu'i sbyor bas stong phrag gsum du bzlas par bya'o// stong phrag gsum du bzlas pa bya ste las gzhan rnams su 'gyur ro// 'dis sngon
493a4(rgyud): du bsnyen pa byas pas grub par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i blon po dbang du byed par 'dod na/ bcom ldan 'das ma la mchod pa byas nas byang chub shing gi lam shing la i ng+ku da'i til
493a5(rgyud): mar gyis btags pa thun gsum stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma bdun la dbang du 'gyur ro// cho ga 'di nyid kyis grul bum dbang du 'gyur ro// til btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg
493a6(rgyud): gyis shig/ 'byung po dbang du 'gyur ro// dur khrod du ro bsregs pa'i dum bu can stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ sha za dbang du 'gyur ro// wa Ta'i shing gi yam shing stong phrag brgyad sbyin
493a7(rgyud): sreg gyis shig/ gnod sbyin dbang du 'gyur ro// bal gyi sreg thugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ 'o thug dang / tsa ru dang / til gyi thug pa rnams kyi sbyin sreg gyis shig/ rigs
493b1(rgyud): bzhi dbang du byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro// gu gul gyi ril bu stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ lha chen po'i rjes su 'brang ba'i gdon dbang du 'gyur ro// mtshan ma gtsang mar langs nas stong phrag
493b2(rgyud): brgyad sbyin sreg dang bzlas pa gyis shig/ phyogs gcig la 'ching ba las grol bar byed do// zla bas 'ching ba chen po las grol bar byed do// til dang pir+N+Na ka'i sbyin sreg gi khro ba nye bar zhi bar byed do// /
493b3(rgyud): yang na til gyis sbyin sreg gis so// gos 'dod pas dur ba'imyu gu'i sbyin sreg gyis shig/ gos zung brgya rnyed do// thun mong ba'i skyes bu dbang du byed pa la go be dr-i gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig/
493b4(rgyud): sbrang bu mchu rings kyi mchu bcing ba la sa mI'i 'dab ma'i sbyin sreg gyis shig/ stag gi mchu bcing ba la gi ri kar+Ni ka'i sbyid sreg gyis shig/ seng ge'i mchu bcing ba la siM ha kar+Ni ka'i sbyin sreg gyis shig/
493b5(rgyud): sbrul rnams la na ga ge sar gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig/ zhi ba'i don du sA mi'i lo ma dang 'o ma can gyi yam shing gis ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i don thams cad la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar
493b6(rgyud): gyis btags pa thun gsum du nyi ma bdun nam zla ba phyed du sbyin sreg bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lus dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa byas nas 'bum bzlas par bya'o//
493b7(rgyud): ma grub pa sgrub par byed do// gzhan gyis bsgrubs pa'ang rnam par 'joms par byed do// ku la sogs pa'i gdon rnams la phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba la sogs pa bzlas/
494a1(rgyud): pa nyid kyis byed do// mtshan mo bdun du thun gsum du tsher ma'i sbyin sreg gyis shig/ dgra bcom par byed do// rim pa'i lam shing tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa stong
494a2(rgyud): phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ mtshan mo bdun gyis skye bar 'gyur ro// sgra las khyad par du phung bar byed pa la a riSh+Ta'i yam shing stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ skyes pa'i sha dang smyo byed la rtag
494a3(rgyud): tu bzlas par bya ste/ thams cad du phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro// gi'u wang la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas nas thig le byas te rgyal po'i sgo ru dang / shu dag la stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags par byas
494a4(rgyud): nan lag pa la bcings nas gang blangs pa de rnyed do// gdon 'bros par 'dod pas mi'i rus pa blangs nas sor brgyad pa'i tshad byas nas brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa gdon gyi gnas su gdab par bya ste/
494a5(rgyud): gdon 'bros par byed do// me tog dang / dri dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags par byas nas gang la byin pa de dbang du byed do// rig pas bgegs rnam par gzhom pa'i don du seng ldeng
494a6(rgyud): gi lam shing stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma gsum nas bgegs med par 'gyur ro// de lta bu la sogs pa'i las thams cad byed do// thams cad du gso sbyong can gyis ras ris kyi spyan sngar
