521a4(rgyud): ma dang / mar me 'ang ji srid zla ba nya ba'i bar du bya'o// zla ba nya la mchod pa rgya chen po dang / gtor ma dang / ma me 'ang byas nas smon lam gdab par yang ba ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
521a5(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bya ba byas nas mA li ti'i me tog gis yongs su bkang ba'i dri'i chu'i sdod lag pa gnyis ka sA blangs nas pus mo gnyis btsugs te/ rtsa ba'i sngags lan bdun
521a6(rgyud): brjod nas rang gi lha rnams spyad drang bar bya ste/ mchod yon dang gdang phul nas slar yang byabs te ba ser skya'i mar la btags pa'i mA la ti'i me tog sbyin sreg bya'o// lha rnams tshim par byed
521a7(rgyud): pa byas nas bsrung ba byas paM ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ nga rgyal dang bral ba mi smrabs g.yo ba bcom ste/ dran pa mchog gis dmigs par byas la ji srid 'phags pa spyan ras
521b1(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug rang nyid pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba byon pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// sems dpa' chen po byon pa dang / sa g.yo ba dang / ri'i rtse mo nyil ba dang /
521b2(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / lha thams cad me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs par byed pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char 'bebs
521b3(rgyud): pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams rin po che chen po'i char rab tu 'bebs pa dang / lha ma yin thams cad ut+pa li'i char rab tu 'bebs par byed do// drug po thams cad khro ba dang bral bar
521b4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// dmyal ba pa rnams kyang skad cig de la bde ba skyes te mchog tu 'jigs pa smra bar byed do// dri za rnams gru snyan pa'i sgra thos par byed do// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang rang gi rig pas
521b5(rgyud): yongs su bskor te/ ji ltar rnam par 'phrul pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i drung du nye bar 'ong bar byed do// log 'dren thams cad dang / bgegs thams cad dang / srin po thams cad dang /
521b6(rgyud): dgas thams cad dang / ji srid du drag po sna tshogs pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' byon pa mthong nas zhi ba'i sems su gyur to// sprin las gu lu gu lu'i sgra sgrogs pa dang / sa rnam pa drug tu
521b7(rgyud): g.yo ba dang / phyogs bzhi skyong ba rnams byang chub sems dpa'i drung du nye bar 'ong bar byed do// log par 'dren pa thams cad dang bgegs thams cad 'ong ste phyogs bzhi rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro//
522a1(rgyud): rlung 'gro ba dang / drag po rab tu 'gro bar byed/ dus ma yin par shing la me tog tu 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad 'ong ste/ phyogs gang du/
522a2(rgyud): rig pa 'dzin pa sgrub pa byed pa der sems dpa' chen po'i dga' ston la thams cad nyid 'dus so// sgrub pa pos byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong nas mchod yon phul
522a3(rgyud): nas phyag bya'o// lha thams cad dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad la mchod yon dang gdan phul nas/ de nas lha thams cad dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis sgrub pa po byang chub sems
522a4(rgyud): dpa' la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ srid pa gsum gyi chu bo chen po las bsgral bar byas pa de rnams nges par rgyal ba kun tu snang bas mnan pa byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang lhan cig 'tshe ba'o// de nas
522a5(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis lha thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i phyag g.yas pa sgrub pa po'i spyi bor mug par mdzad do// de 'chi ba med par
522a6(rgyud): mdzad do// de nas sgrub pa pos gang yid la snying po bsams pa der 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los skur ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po lha nyid dang / lha nyid gang 'dod
522a7(rgyud): papade rnams ches gzhan du snang ste/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gru 'dzin de mthong bar 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpas
522b1(rgyud): skyes bu chen po phyag g.yas pas bzung ste rig pa'i rgyal po rta mgrin la yang dag par gtad par gyur to// gru 'dzin du song zhig/ gang 'dod pa de sbyin par 'gyur ro// de nas rig pa'i rgyal po rig/
522b2(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba dang bcas pa sgrub pa po'i lag pa g.yas pa nas bzung nas rgya mtsho'i dbus su lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang ga nam mkha'
522b3(rgyud): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa sgrub pa po'i rig pa'i tshogs la me tog gi char 'bebs pa dang / rnga bo che dang / rnga pa Ta ha dang / rnga dang / rdza rnga kha gcig pa dang
522b4(rgyud): rdza rnga rnams skra 'byin bzhin du gru 'dzin du 'gro bar byed do// rgya mtsho'i steng der rgya mtsho chen po rig pa'i rgyal pos thos nas skyes bu dam pa de'ang chu klung thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba'i
522b5(rgyud): rin po che'i mchod yon rab tu stsol bar byed par 'gyur ro// legs so zhes bya ba'ang gnang bar mdzad do// rigs kyi bu legs so legs par 'tsho ba dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i
522b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas so// de nas rgya mtsho chen po bsgral nas gru 'dzin du song ste mthong ba dang / der gang rig pa 'dzin pa'i lha dang / klu dang /
522b7(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams thams cad mchod yon gyi snod kyi me tog gi char chen pos sgrub pa po la bsu ba la
523a1(rgyud): 'ong bar byed do// de nas gru 'dzin mthong nas sna tshogs pa'i nor bu dang sman gyis bslus pa/ mu tig gi do shal rab tu 'phyang bzhin pa/ gser dang shel las byung ba dang /
523a2(rgyud): bai DUR+Ya las byung ba dang / in+da nI la las byung ba dang / mthon ka chen po las byung ba'i them skas dang / snam bu rnams kyis sna tshogs pa'i me tog nye bar mdzes pas rig pa'i rgyal po dang / sgrub
523a3(rgyud): pa po de la mngon par dbang bskur ba byas nas/ sgrub pa po la smras pa gnas 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas rin po che sna bzhi las byung ba/ khang pa
523a4(rgyud): dbus mar ji srid byang chub kyi bar du rang gi gnas bzhin du kun tu spyod cing gnas so// de nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po la mngon par dbang bskur te/ rig pa'i rgyal po rab tu bgrod par gyur to//
523a5(rgyud): 'di ni dngos grub ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di'i mthu rnam par bsgyings pas mtshams med pa byed pas kyang 'di 'grub par byed do// rtam grim rgyal pos rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad la smras pa
523a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ma dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas rin po che sna bzhi las byung ba dbus mi'i khang par rang gi gnas bzhin du bzhi la gnas pa'i rig pa sgrol ma dang /
523a7(rgyud): gnyer can dang / gzhan rig pa thams cad pha rol gnon pa chen po'o// rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni ma bsgrubs pa nyid du las thams cad byed de gtan pa gcod par byed pa dang / hUM yig gis
523b1(rgyud): rgya mtsho skems par byed pa dang / sor mo'i sngags 'dzub kyis thams cad rengs par byed pa dang oM yig gis 'gugs par byed pa dang / phaT yig gis lhun po rnams kyang rnam par
523b2(rgyud): 'joms par byed pa dang / yid kyi bzlas pas sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa dang / oM yig gis spyan drang ba dang / hUM yig gis gshegs su gsol ba dang / phaT yig gis/
523b3(rgyud): gsod pa dang / swA hA'i yi ges 'tsho bar byed pa ste/ mdor na rig pa rnams kyi cho ga ji snyed yod pa de thams cad rig pa 'di nyid kyis 'jig rted dang 'jig rted las 'das pa bsgrub par bya'o//
523b4(rgyud): 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi cho ga thun mong ba ste/ gang la cho ga med pa dang sdig pa byed pas kyang lan gsum du bzla'o// rta mgrin rig pa'i rgyal po brtson 'grus chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
523b5(rgyud): rjes su gnang ba/ stobs dang pha rol gnon pa chen po 'di lan gsum gyis mtshams med pa byed pas kyang 'grub par byed do// dad pas byang chub kyi sems yongs su gzung bar 'dod pa chen po dang /
523b6(rgyud): snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ ser sna med pa dang / byas pa gzo ba dang / sangs rgyas dang chos la mngon par dang ba dang ma dang ba dang / ma dang par shes pa dang / myur ba kho nar bzod pa dang
523b7(rgyud): tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa ma bsgrubs par yang 'grub par byed de/ mdor na las thams cad pa 'di brjod nas rig pa gcod par 'dod pa dang / sel bar 'dod pas 'di brjod nas te
524a1(rgyud): 'di ni las thams cad pa'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gzhan gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lta ste/ rig pa'i rgyal po sems can thams/
524a2(rgyud): cad kyi bde ba rdzogs pa'i ched du rta mgrin rgyal po'i mgul du'o// byang chub sems dpa'i mthu rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i le'u rdzogs so// / de nas 'od dpag med
524a3(rgyud): mthong bar 'dod na kha tshar ma bcad cing skra dang bral ba'i ras la ri mo ma kham gso sbyong can gyis kha dog ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'phags pa 'od dpag med gser
524a4(rgyud): ltar ser ba/ pad+ma la bzhugs pa 'drer gzhug par bya'o// 'og tu chos kyi 'khor lo'i gzhogs g.yon du rta mgrin rgyal po zhal rnam par 'gyur ba 'jigs par byed pa/ gsus pa
524a5(rgyud): 'phyang ba/ me dmar ser 'bar ba 'phro bzhin pa rin po che'i 'phreng ba'i mchod phyir thogs pa can lag 'gro'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ ral pas 'od dpag med 'dzin pa sor mos log par
524a6(rgyud): 'dren pa la sdigs par byed bzhin pa/ de'i rgyab nas log par 'dren pa 'bros par byed bzhin pa'o// g.yas kyi gzhogs su rnam par brgyan pa sbyangs pa'i snod dang / gos dang / phyag g.yas
524a7(rgyud): ba sgrub pa po la dbugs 'byin par mdzad bzhin pa'i 'phags paspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser ltar ser ba/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba'i dbus su 'od dpag med mgo bos 'dzin par
524b1(rgyud): byed pa/ pha rol gnon pa'o// 'od dpag med kyi steng gi sprin de la sprin gseb nus gnas gtsang ma me tog rab tu 'thor bzhin pa 'drir gzug par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi pad+ma de'ang klu
524b2(rgyud): gzhon nu rnams kyis 'dzin pa'o// 'og tu lag na spos por thogs pa'i sgrub pa po pus mo gnyis btsugs pa/ 'od dpag med la rnam par lta bzhin pa'o// ri mo'i las yongs su rdzogs pa
524b3(rgyud): dang sgrub pa pos gtor ma dang / mar me dang / mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ zla ba nya la mtshan mo gsum du sbyang bar gnas pas sbyangs pa'i snod dang gos 'di nyid kyis rig pa'i rgyal po rta mgrin
524b4(rgyud): bkug nas mchod yon phul te sgrub pa dang slar yang ga shegs su gsol te/ ba ser skya'i mar dang / pad+ma'i sa bon dang / na ga ge sar rnams gcig tu byas nas/ nyi ma bdun du sbyir
524b5(rgyud): sreg gyis shig/ de nas rig pa 'dzin pas lha rnams tshim par byed pa byas nas ku shA'i khres la nye bar 'dug pas smon lam gdab par bya ste/ ji srid du sa rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yo ba dang /
524b6(rgyud): mar me'i rtse mo 'phel ba dang / sprin las gu lu gu lu'i sgra sgrogs pa dang / me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs pa dang / tsam ngan gyi phye ma'i char 'bebs pa dang / dril bu'i sgra thos pa de srid du bzlas
524b7(rgyud): par bya'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rings pa rings par bzlas par bya ste/ ji srid du rig pa'i rgyal po brtson 'grus chen pos pha rol gnon pa rta mgrin rig pa thams cad kyis sgrub pa sa la 'ongs/
525a1(rgyud): pa de srid du'o// de nas sgrub pa pos me tog dkar po dang dri'i chus yongs su bkang ba'i snod kyis mchod lon phul nas smon lam gdab bo// 'di skad ces smras so//
525a2(rgyud): khyed legs par 'ongs so// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug pha rol tu phyin pa dang bcas pa'i ched du slar yang legs par 'ongs so// rta mgrin 'di ni brtson 'grus chen po stobs dpa pa
525a3(rgyud): rol gnon pa rig pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod pa'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la lan gsum bskor ba byas te dpus mo btsugs nas 'di skad
525a4(rgyud): ces brjod par bya'o// khyod la sdang bar gyur pa gang yin pa de rnams lhan cig 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyag g.yas pa sgrub pa po'i spyi bor
525a5(rgyud): myug par mdzad de/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// skyes bu dam pa brtson 'grus chen po stobs dang pha rol gnon pa khyod kyis gang brtson 'grus chen pos pha rol gnon pas rig pa'i rgyal po bsgrubs
525a6(rgyud): pa legs so legs so// khyod cag gis mngon par 'dod pa smros shig/ mchog sbyin par bya'o// 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba can du 'gro bar 'tshal lo//
525a7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'od dpag med de dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
525b1(rgyud): dbang phyug phyag galas pa brkyang ste/ sgrub pa po phyag g.yas pas bzung nas rta mgrin rgyal po la yang dag par gtad par gyur to// rig pa'i rgyal po chen po skyes bu dam pa 'di bzung nas me tog gi char/
525b2(rgyud): rab tu 'bab pa'i bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song zhig/ gang du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa der sdong du bcug nas
525b3(rgyud): slar yang gru 'dzin gang nang yod pa der shog cig/ de nas rta mgrin rig pa'i rgyal pos sgrub pa po bzung nas me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs pa'i bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song ste/ sgrub pa
525b4(rgyud): po la smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos ston pa la ltos shig ltos shig/ de nas rig pa'i rgyal pos der sdod du bcug nas/
525b5(rgyud): slar yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gru 'dzin der 'ong bar mdzad do// de nas sgrub pa po 'jig rten gyi khams der 'phags pa 'od dpag med kyi drung du chos nyan no// dngos grub 'di/
525b6(rgyud): ni gnas ma yin pa rnams la gang sbyar bar mi bya ste/ gang zhig byed na dam tshig las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod nas/ mchog gi sgrub pa rnams la 'di gnas pa ma yin pa rnams la rab tu mi sbyor/
525b7(rgyud): te/ de'i dam tshig med do// las de rnams thams cad rtsa ba'i sngags kyis byed du gzhug go// thal bas thal ba'i ra ba'o// sgron me gsum gyis me'i ra ba'o// chu la lan bdun mngon par
526a1(rgyud): bsngags pas nam mkha' bcing ba'o// yungs kar dkar pos sa gzhi bcing ba'o// til gyi sbyin sreg gis log par 'dren pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// ske tshe'i sbyin sreg
526a2(rgyud): gis yi dgas dang sha zu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// kA ra wI ra'i me tog gi sbyin sreg gis khro bo thams cad 'grub par byed do// me tog thams cad tsha ba'i ti la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg gis
526a3(rgyud): 'jig rten pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// d+hu d+hA'i sbyin srog gis dbang phyug chen po dbang du 'gyur ro// pri yung ku'i me tog dang / mA la ti dang / sau gan+d+hi ka dang / gu gul ba ser
526a4(rgyud): skya'i mar dang lhan cig tu byas nas sbyin sreg byed na/ rig pa thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / rkang gnyis dang ka/ rkang bzhi pa thams cad
526a5(rgyud): dbang du byed do// gi'u wang la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas thig le byas te/ mche bas tha dad pa za bar byed pa dang / tha snyad las rgyal bar byed do// sngar brjod pa'i tshogs pa ser skya'i mar blangs
526a6(rgyud): nas lus la mngon par byugs te mer rab tu 'jug par byed do// seng ldeng las byung ba'i rdo rje blangs te/ hUM yig dang lhan cig pas phug gi sgor lha ma yin gyi bu mo byung ba dang / rab tu zhugs pa la 'khor
526a7(rgyud): lo'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo // gal te 'khor lo rab tu 'jug par byed mdam tshig dran pas hUM yig gi phung pos 'khor lo phye mar byas par 'gyur ro// / de nas ril bu'i sgrub pa 'byung ste/
526b1(rgyud): rig pa 'dzin pa ril bu sgrub par byed pas tsan dan dmar po dang / me tog lnga pa dang / pad+ma ge sar dang / 'bras sA li dmar po'i phub ma dang / gaN+Di ka'i myu gu dang / d+hU ka'i sa bon dang / 'bru dang
526b2(rgyud): ma sha'i myu gu dang / ru rta dang / rgya spos dang / tu ru ka'i til mar rnams gcig tu byas te/ cha mnyam pa gcig tu byas nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i bser skya'i 'o ma la gso sbyong can gyis ser skya de la rnam par
526b3(rgyud): dben par rtsa ba'i sngags su bzlas nas khyim du btags te/ legs par btsags pa'i chu la mngon par bsngags nas nyi ma bdun du spyad par bya'o// khyim du 'am rnam par dben pa'i phyogs su'ang rung ste/
526b4(rgyud): nas bsrung ba byas pa'i ba lang gi rdzi nges pa bzho bar bya'o// de nas 'o ma de dag gtsang ma'i phyogs rnam par dben par bum pa la bzlas par bya'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas bram ze'i bu mo'i lag pas srub par
526b5(rgyud): byed du gzhug go/ mar nges rdzas 'di rnams btags par byas te/ lcags gsum gyis yongs su dkris pa byas nas/ de'ang bsor skya'i ba byung lngar ril bu mtshan mo gcig tu bcug nas bzhag par
526b6(rgyud): bya'o// de nas gton nas dri'i chu la gzhag par bya'o// bkrus te pad+ma'i 'dab mar gi'u wang gis byugs la gzhag par bya'o// de nas ras ris zhal nub tu phyogs par gzhag nas srung ba'i cho ga byas pas
526b7(rgyud): gtor ma dang / mar me dang / mchod pa'i cho ga rgya chen po byas te/ de nas rig pa 'dzin pas lag pa gnyis kas pad+ma'i 'dab ma rnams kyi ril bu brgyad blangs te pad+ma kha sbyor du gzhag nas/ ba ser skya'i mar de nyid
527a1(rgyud): mA la ti'i me tog dang gcig tu byas nas sreg zugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis rang gi lha spyam drang ba byas nas/ 'phags pa spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyug gi/
527a2(rgyud): spyan sngar ji srid du du ba 'phrul bar byed pa dang ba phyed ba ming du rdza par bya'o// du ba 'phrul bzhin bus mi snang ba dang / dbang du byed pa dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// nyi ma 'char ka dang
527a3(rgyud): mtshungs pa'i 'od kyi rig pa 'dzin pa mtshan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo rnams kyis lhan cig brtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed do// lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do// gang gi
527a4(rgyud): tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe rgyal rigs kyi khyim du skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba dran par yang 'gyur ro// 'di nyid kyis pad+ma'i sa bon dang / paN+Di ta ka ri'i sa bon dang / tu ru ska dang / a ka ru nag po dang / tsan dan dmar po dang /
527a5(rgyud): sau gan+d+hi ka dang / ma la'i me tog dang / bur kum dang / ldong ros dang / gi'u wang rnams pa ser mya'i ba byung lngas gzhon nu ma gso sbyong can dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pas btag par bya'o// de nas rig pa dzin/
527a6(rgyud): pas pr-i yang bu'i shing brangs nas khang pa brtsegs pa gtsang mar shing bzo ba gso sbyong car byang chub tu sems bskyeng ba/ dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa'i lag pas zam tog byed du gzhug go// za ma tog der ril bu
527a7(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gcig bcug nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ gtor ma'ang phul nas za ma tog blangs te gos gtsang ma g.yogs nas mtshan mo gsum du sbyang bar gnas pas rig pa'i lha rnams spyan
527b1(rgyud): drang ba byas nas/ ji srid du rdo ba byed pa dang / du 'phrul bar byed pa dang / 'bar par byed pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o// rdo bzhin pa la dbang du byed pa dang / mi snang ba 'gyur ro// dra 'jal rin pa gi pa phyin/
527b2(rgyud): pa gzhon nu'i mchog gcig go// 'bar bar byed pa ni rig pa 'dzin pa drug dang lhan cig 'gro ste/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas lhun po'i mo ze ba byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgung mo /
527b3(rgyud): su spyod par byed do// me stong drag ldang 'tsho bar byed do// gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshen chen po rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// skye bdun par rabar gyuraro// 'di nyid kyis mig sman ljong ngos sgrub par byed do// dkar po'i bco
527b4(rgyud): la dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i gi'u wang blangs nas mtshan mo gcig tu smyung bar gnas pas/ nyi ma gung la bram ze'i bu mo gso sbyong can gyis pad+ma'i 'dab mas pa ser skya'i 'o mas btags par bya'o// ras ris la
527b5(rgyud): mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ ras ris zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhugs nas srung ba'i cho ga byas pas rang gi lha rnams spyan drang ba byas te/ mchod yon dang gdang phul nas pri yang ku'i me tog dang ba ser skya'i 'o mas sreg blugs
527b6(rgyud): bdun sbyin sreg gyis shig/ lha rnams tshim par byed pa byas nas slar yang lha de rnams mdun du pad+ma kha sbyor du ril bu bcug nas/ ji srid du du ba 'thul ba dang / dro bar byed pa dang / 'bar bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par
527b7(rgyud): bya'o// dro bzhin pa la ni thig le byas pa'i skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// du ba 'thul bzhin pa ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro// rab tu 'bar bas thig le byas na rig pa 'dzin pa drug gis yongs su bskor ba'i rig pa 'dzin
528a1(rgyud): pa'i bu mo rnams kyis lhan cig rtse bar byed do// gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe nor chen po'i khyim du skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba dran par yang 'gyur ro// til gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig/ klu dbang /
528a2(rgyud): du 'gyur ro// nya dang sha'i sbyin sreg gyis shig/ li dgas dbang du 'gyur ro// mA la ti'i me tog gi sbyin sreg byed na/ lha mo chus byung dbang du 'gyur ro// pri yang ku'i me tog gi sbyin sreg gyis shig/ lha dbang du
528a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sau gar+b+ha ka'i sbyin sreg byed na gnod sbyin dbang du 'gyur ro// yungs kar dkar po la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas gang gi spyi bor byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// gdon gyis zin pa dang / rims kyis btang
528a4(rgyud): pa dang / srin pos zin pa'i mdun du ske tshe la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas sbyin sreg byed cing / de'i thal bas sbun par byed na grol bar 'gyur ro// rta mgrin rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo 'di'ang rdzogs so//
528a5(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ngas gzigs dbang phug gi mthu bsgyings po/ 'jig dag 'dzin rnye sa 'das pa thams cad du 'gyur ba de 'thung ste/ rig pa'i rgyal po gang la chog med pa de rnams chog 'di nyid kyis
528a6(rgyud): sgrub pa dang / rtog pa'i rgyal po de nyid kyis thams cad byas te/ mdor na mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'ang lan gsum gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gang dad pa dang ldan pa/ ser sna med pa/
528a7(rgyud): goyo med pa/ phra ma med pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po la gus pas gang rtog pa pa la mchod par byed pa dang / klog par byed pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / gzhan la ston par byed pa dang / sem sna med par gyur nas
528b1(rgyud): skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa'o// ral pa gyen brjes kyi rgyud phyi mar rta ma grin rgyal por chog
528b2(rgyud): zhib mo'o// // slar yang dus de nas shar gyi phyogs kyi cha nas mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sgrol ma mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa gzhal bar bya ba dang /
528b3(rgyud): bgrang bar bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i stobs kyis skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir/
528b4(rgyud): gsang sngags thob pa gang du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bzhugs pa gling bzhi pa bar ma 'di nyid du 'ongs nas/ ji ltar byung ba'i pad+ma'i gdan
528b5(rgyud): la gnas pa de rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar 'phel ba'i stobs dang sgrub pas pad+ma'i gdan de la bzhugs so// de lta bu la sogs pa gzhal du med cing grangs med pa'i sangs
528b6(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed bzhugs pa de rnams skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis gling bzhi pa bar ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du'o// de nas mi 'khrugs pa la sogs
528b7(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i rgyud phyi ma 'dir/ bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sngags kyi spyod pa la so sor rjes su yi rang ba'i ched dang / bsrung ba dang /
529a1(rgyud): bslab pa dang / sba ba'i ched dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad pa'i ched dang / bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i dngos grub kyi rgyud du bsod nams kyi skyongs kyis
529a2(rgyud): bsgrubs pa'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig rnams gsungs pa na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma ak+Sho b+h+ya ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ arba te/ sa myaka saM bud+d+ha ya ka tad+ya thA/ kaM ka ni kaM ka ni/ ro tsa ni ro tsa ni/ tro Ta nI
529a3(rgyud): tro To ni/ trA sa mi trA sa ni/ pra ti ha na pra ti han/ sarba kar+m+ma pa raM pa rA Ni swA hA/ na mo rat+na tra lA la/ nam sh+tsan+da sUd+ha yA yA ta thA ga tA ya/ aH taM/ sa n+ya ka sa~M bud+d+hA ya/ tad+yaT+Ta/ tsan+d+ri ma ti/ tsan+ti ka ra Ne/
529a4(rgyud): mi lwa/ mi le/ prad+d+he ma d+hiSh+NI t+ya ka si le si li/ d+harmA/ A d+hiSh+NI twe/ ki lo ki li/ sa~Mb+hi a d+hiSh+T+rI Ni swA hU~M/ rigs kyi gyu ma/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa 'di'i mtshan 'dzin byar/
529a5(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu chun mi 'chad pa bskal par brjod de yid la byed par 'gyur ba de rtag tu bskal pa stong phrag bzhi bcur 'tsho bar byed do// skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa thob par
529a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHpuSh+pa ke ta be/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ sa myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ puSh+pe buSh+paM puSh+pe puSh+pe puSh+pe puSh+pe su ru puSh+pe sAhA/ gzungs 'di me tog la
529a7(rgyud): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te cho ga ji lta ba dang / 'du shes ji lta ba bzhin du byas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rab tu gtor bar bya'o// de'i mngon par 'dod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
529b1(rgyud): pa dang / las kyi sgribs pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHsar+b+ba ni ba ra Na/ biSh+TAM bI ne ta thA ga tA ya/ arba te/ samyaka saM bu d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/ s+phu Ta n+tu me/ sar+b+ba bA
529b2(rgyud): pA ni/ sar+b+ba bu d+hA sat+ye na d+har+m+ma sat+ye na/ saM b+ha sa t+ye na/ in+d+ra sat+ye na/ ba ru Na sa t+ye na/ le lo ka sa t+ye na pA ri Na sat+ye na sat+ye na/ sat+ye sa tsa ne na s+phu Tan+tu/ sar+b+ba pA pA ni sarba bu d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA ne na sA hA/ mtshan mo//
529b3(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gcig gis las thams cad zad par byed do// nyin mo dang mtshan mo gsum byas nas drug tu rab tu sbyor bas mtshams med pa nges par zad par byed do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nam po ro tsa nA la/ thA ga tA
529b4(rgyud): la/ ar+ha te/ sa myaka saM bud+hA ya/ na ma A kA sha gar+b+hA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ hu ru tsu ru/ bai ro tsa na/ rasmai sany+tso di dai/ A gats+tsha Ar+ya A kA
529b5(rgyud): sha gar+b+ha ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ pU re ya/ shu b+haM daR+sha ya bud+d+ha bi Sha yaM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri swA hA/ 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs bklags pas 'grub pa ste/ skrag pa dang
529b6(rgyud): rgyan po dang / dug dang / dug brtan pa dang / byad snyems dang / rgyal po dang / chom rkun la sogs pa rnams gnon par byed do// gang du bris pa gnas pa 'am/ mgo dang lag pas 'chang bar byed pa de
529b7(rgyud): la nye bar 'tshe ba dang / nad 'go ba thams cad mi 'byung ngo // 'di rtag tu bzlas pas dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin so sor rnyed do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo bai ro tsa nA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya nam
530a1(rgyud): A kA sha gar+b+ha ya/ bo d+hi satwA la/ ma hA sutwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ badz+ra m+b+ha badz+rAm+b+ha/ badz+ra d+hA dze/ shU n+ya ta pra de she/ bai ro tsa na gar+b+he sany+tsa in+d+ra la sho d+ha ni swAhA/
530a2(rgyud): cho ga ni rtag tu bzlas pas 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas so sor rnyed do// bdud thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / dgra thams cad dang / bgegs dang log par
530a3(rgyud): 'dren pa thams cad kyis thub dka' bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gang bris nas lag tu 'chang bar byed pa de la'ang yon tan 'di rnams so// na mo rat+na tra lA ya/ na maHsar+b+ba durga ti pa ri sho d+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA yA/
530a4(rgyud): arba te/ sumyaka saM bud+d+ha la/ tad+ya thA/ sho d+hA ne sho d+ha ne/ sar+b+ba pA paM bi sho d+ha ne shud+d+he bi shud+ha sarba kar+m+ma a ba ra Ni bi shud+d+he swAhA/ gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ rtag tu bzlas pas sdig pa/
530a5(rgyud): thams cad 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi sa byin gyis brlabs pas skye ba bzhir skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// ji srid byang chub kyi snying po la mthar thug gi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su zad par 'gro bar
530a6(rgyud): mi 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA yang / na mo b+ha ga wa tai Ar+ya pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA yai/ oM shru tiM/ smA ti/ bi dza ye swA hA/ 'od gzungs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung bar 'gyur ro// 'di'i cho ga/
530a7(rgyud): ni 'phags ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bzhugs nas/ de'i mdun du sa la ma lhung ba'i ba ser skya'i ba byung gis dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te/ nyin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas pas gnas
530b1(rgyud): der mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas/ ba'i mar gyi mar me phul te bya ba yid la dran par gyur pas gdon par bya'o// de nyid du ku sha bting nas gser gyi kha dog gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ngo // de 'di la yang
530b2(rgyud): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ston par byed do// tho rangs sam mtshan mo nyid du'ang rung ste/ tshig tu gdon par bya'o// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra lA yA/ nu ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya
530b3(rgyud): bo d+hi satra la/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA pa/ tad+ya thA/ dza ye dza ye/ ma hA dza ye/ dza ya bA d+hA ni/ dza la ut+ta re/ ka la ka la/ ma la ma la/ tsa la tsi la/ hu la la/ k+Shi ni k+Shi ni/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma A ba raN+Da ni/
530b4(rgyud): me bi sho d+ha ya/ b+ha ga ba te/ sa ha sra/ A brta/ sar+b+ba bud+d+ha a ba lo ki tai/ tsak+Shu/ shro tra/ g+hA Na/ dzi hA/ kA ya/ ma no bi bi dz+nyA na/ sho d+ha ni/ su ru su ru/ pra su ra pra su ra/ sar+b+ba bud+d+ha/ a d+hiSh+Ti te swA hA/ d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he swAhA
530b5(rgyud): a b+hA ba/ sar+b+ba d+harma a bi b+ho d+hi ni swA hA/ gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ mtshan mo gcig tu rjes su dran par byas nas rtag tu bzlas pas bskal pa stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'ang zad par 'gyur ro// sangs
530b6(rgyud): rgyas stong gis nye bar bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa stong gi 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par byed do// skye ba brjes te lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// mi'i rgyal srid dam yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas
530b7(rgyud): kyi zhing rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas ji ltar 'dod pa'i rmi lam mthong bar byed do// 'di ni stong 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs de yin te/ phan yon chen po byang chub sems dpas yang
531a1(rgyud): dag par brjod pa'i mdo bklag par bya'o// rtag tu yid la bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA la/ na maHsat+kA la/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA la/
531a2(rgyud): ma hA satwA ya/ swe tA ya/ shwe ta b+hu dza ya/ dwA da sha b+hu dzA ya/ e hiM e hi/ b+ha ga wa na/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ Ar+ya ma nu sma ra/ bud+d+ha ma nu sma ra/ d+har+m+ma sat+ya ma nu sma ra/ saM g+ha sa t+ya ma nu
531a3(rgyud): s+phu ra/ tad+ya thA/ na tu na tu/ ki Ni ki Ni/ tu ru tu ru/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ku ru ku ru/ sar+b+ba sar+b+baM me sA d+ha yaM hi ri mi ri Ti Ti/ nai ni/ ma ma sa pa ri bA ra s+ya/ si d+h+yad+d+ha/ man+t+ra pa dA swA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
531a4(rgyud): 'od dpag med kyis gzungs 'di gsungs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyi rtsa ba'i rig pa'i gzungs
531a5(rgyud): 'di ni bklags pas grub pa/ ma bsgrubs par yang las rnams 'byung ba ste/ zla ba nya la gso sbyong can gyis nyin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas pa'ang rung ngo // spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar byang chub
531a6(rgyud): kyi shing gis me rab tu sbar nas til nag po stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ de bzhin du nyi ma bdun du lan re 'am thun gsum du byas na rgyal po'am rgyal po'i blon po dbang du 'gyur ro// mtshan mo
531a7(rgyud): gsum du sbyang bar gnas pas yungs kar dkar po stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ phyogs sam zla bar yul gyi don du grogs mkhar bdun gyi rtse mor song nas re re 'dzegs te/ nyi ma snga dro nas ji srid phyi
531b1(rgyud): dri'i bar bzlas par bya'o// mtshams med pa grol bar byed do// bu 'dod na 'o ma'i sbyin sreg gyis shig/ mtshan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i khye'u 'byung ngo // gzungs 'di nyid kyis bdag nyid/
531b2(rgyud): bsrung ba dang / gzhan bsrung ba dang / gnod par gdon 'bros par byed pa la byabs pas sam/ rdzas su bcings pas kyang rung ngo // yang na chom rkun thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// rtag par rgyun du zlos bzhin
531b3(rgyud): pa ni nor nye bar bsags par 'gyur zhing / dgra rnams las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis slar yang ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi
531b4(rgyud): tshig rnams gsungs pa/ na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA la/ na maHsaM g+hA la/ tad+ya thA/ hu lu hu lu/ bi ma le/ nir ma le sho d+ha ni/ kA tsa ti/ mi ra pa Ta la/ sar+b+ba ni ro gaHbi na sha ni ts+tsha da ni/ ts+tsha da ni/ khA tas
531b5(rgyud): mud+b+hi taM bA ta sa mu tiSh+Tha tAM/ shweSh+ma/ san+ni pA ta sa mud+d+hi taM sar+b+ba nA shi na/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra s+ya/ twe dza na na s+yan+tu/ ak+Shi ro gaHgzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
531b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor byas nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ lag pa 'am ku sha la brgyad brgyar yongs su bsngags nas mig la byab par bya'o// long bas kyang mig so sor rnyed do// zla ba drug gis rtag tu dran par byed na
531b7(rgyud): mi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / gru 'dzin na gnas pa'i 'khor chen po la legs par gzigs nas/
532a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu grub pa'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig 'di ni rtog pa'i rgyal pos rgyud phyi ma 'dir brjod pa/ sngon gyi sangs
532a2(rgyud): rgyas kyis gsungs pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub pa pos rtag tu dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen mas chos gos kyi rna ba 'am/ gos kyi mtha' la mdud
532a3(rgyud): pa bya'o// gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma sgrub par byed pa des lan cig brjod nas/ gsum gyi gos la bgos pas dgra dbang du nye bar 'gro bar 'dod pa dang / bdug pa thams cad rengs
532a4(rgyud): par 'dod pa dang / dngos grub thams cad rtogs par 'dong pa dang / don thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'dod pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug par 'dod pa dang / mi mdza' ba rnam par 'joms par 'dod
532a5(rgyud): pa de ci'i rgyu dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can don thams cad bya ba la rab tu 'jug pa 'dzin par byed do// de la yid la grub pa'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig rnams ni/ na mo rat+na tra lA la/ na mo
532a6(rgyud): a mi tra b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+Na te/ sa myaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lau ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ na ma Ar+ya ma hA s+thA ma prab+hA ya/ bo d+hi satwA/ bA ma ne tra nA maHs+ya mi tAtra na maH
532a7(rgyud): s+yA mi bi ma na/ pi shA tsi paN+Da sha la ri par+Na sha wa ri/ bi shA tsa/ b+ha ga ba ti/ pA shi hasta/ paR+YA d+hA ra Ni/ pA ni/ kA ni/ ts+tsha ta/ b+ha ya ni/ ut+se tun+te/ lak+Sha sh+tsa/ ri tA yau/ lA ka sh+tsi ta/ ma hA bA d+yo/ ye ke tsi ta/ u bA dra bI/ ye ke
532b1(rgyud): tsita?/ Ar+ya bak+Sha/ ye ke tsit+ta/ yu ba swarba/ a u pa swan/ sam+bad+b+ha bA/ ut+sA t+yat+te/ sar+b+ba NI tA ne/ sar+b+baM stAM/ sarbe te/ bA la ta d+ha na/ ut+sa tud+hA na/ pAN+Di an+de na/ sat+ye na/ sat+ya bA ke na/ i b+hiHpaN+Di ta a/
532b2(rgyud): d+hiSh+Ti tairman+na pa rai rma ma rak+ShaM ku ru pa ri tA NaM ku ru/ pa ri gra haM ku ru pa ri pA la naM ku ru/ swastI ya naM ku ru daN+Da pa ri ha raM ku ru/ shash+ma pa ri ha raM ku ru/ bi Sha ba ri hA raM ku ru/ bi Sha d+hu Sha NaM ku ru/ bi Sha nA sha NaM
532b3(rgyud): ku ru/ tad+ya thA/ a mri te a swa targe ma/ ma ra ma ra sa ma/ pra sa ma/ u pa sa ma/ tu nu/ bi tu nu/ tu le tu mu le/ ma ma sarba satwA nAny+tsa rak+ShaM ku ru swA hA/ 'di ni re khrod lo ma can zhes bya ba'i gzungs te/
532b4(rgyud): bzlas pa dang sbyin sreg gis nad thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad 'joms par byed do// 'di lta ste/ mi rnams la khams kyi nye bar 'tshe ba la shing sha mi'i lam shing gis
532b5(rgyud): me rab tu sbar nas gang ba'i sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad thun gsum du ji ltar nus pas sbyin sreg gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas ri khrod lo
532b6(rgyud): ma can la'ang bya'o// de bzhin las byas pas nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad 'joms par byed do// ba lang gi nye bar 'tshe ba la ba lang gi spu dang rus pas sbyin sreg bya ste/ zhi bar 'gyur ro// ma he'i nad thams
532b7(rgyud): cad la skra dang rus pas nyi ma bdun du sbyin sreg bya ste/ zhi bar 'gyur ro// rgyu skar gyi gnod pa la nyi ma bdun du 'o ma'i sbyin sreg bya'o// dngos grub thams cad rtogs par 'dod pas nyi ma bdun du nye bar 'tshe ba la
533a1(rgyud): seng ldeng gi phye ma'i sbyin sreg go// mgo bo na pa la dri bzang po'i me tog la yongs su bzlas nas bsnams nas mer gzug par bya ste/ rang gi gnas su 'gyur ro// rims la srad
533a2(rgyud): bu bcing bar bya ste/ rang gi gnas su 'gyur ro// za ba dang sbyin sreg kyang bya'o// gdon la bag zan las byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas la lan bdun bzlas te nyis bdun nas grol bar 'gyur ro// mig na ba la mig sman gyi
533a3(rgyud): sbyin sreg kyis shig/ nyi ma bdun gyis grol lo// zhi bar 'dod pas dur bu'i sbyin sreg gyis shig gzhi bar 'gyur ro// rgyas par 'dod pas lungs kar gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig/ rgyas par 'gyur ro// rgyal/
533a4(rgyud): ba la shu dag gi sbyin sreg gyis shig/ rgyal bar 'gyur ro// lan tshwa las byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas nas sbyin sreg gyis shig/ dbang du 'gyur ro// sbrul gyis mche bas zin pa la yal 'dab kyi las so//
533a5(rgyud): sbrul las byung ba'i nyi ma bdun la dbang du byed do// 'byung po dang sha za'i rgyas btab pa la lan nyi shur bzlas pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnun par bya ste/ rang gi gnas su 'gro'o// rtag tu bzlas pas skye bo thams
533a6(rgyud): cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug pas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gdong la yongs su bzlas na gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg gi las thams cad la nyi ma bdun du sbyin sreg bya'o// mdor na
533a7(rgyud): nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad 'joms par byed do// sna ma'i me tog gi sbyin sreg gis las thams cad byed do// las thams cad la dang por gang ba'i sreg blugs sbyin sreg gyis shig/ las thams cad la'ang las 'di nyid kyis
533b1(rgyud): shig ces bya'o// gso sbyong can gyis bya ba'o// sems can thams can la sems kyis dmigs pas sa las byung ba'i ka ba la dang / sel+la ka la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags par byas nas/ gzhon nu mas mdud/
533b2(rgyud): pa brgyad brgya bya'o// de nas de dri'i chus bkrus nas shing la bzhag ste/ de'i mgo la bcing bar bya'o// de bzhin du ma he rnams dang / ra rnams dang / phyugs rnams la chom rkun gyis nye bar 'tshe ba la ra ba la bcing
533b3(rgyud): bar bya'o// bum pa chus gang ba byas nas gtsang mas brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa byas te nad pa'i rked pa la bcing bar bya'o// rang gi gnas su 'gyur ro// khyim du tshangs pa'i srin po dang sha zas nye bar 'tshe ba
533b4(rgyud): rnams la sbyin sreg gyis shig/ ji ltar nus pa'igator ma'i cho ga bya'o zhes te/ 'di ni ri khrod lo ma can zhes bya'i gzungs ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar gsungs pa byang chub sems dpa' yang
533b5(rgyud): dag par brjod pa'i mdo sde'ang ngo // / slar yang dus de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor
533b6(rgyud): phyag g.yas pa rab tu brkyang nas myug par mdzad de/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu rin chen 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/ 'di klog par byed pas 'grub par sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
533b7(rgyud): rjes su yi rang bas gsungs so// rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po phyi ma de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i ched dang / ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub pa po'i dngos
534a1(rgyud): grub byed pa rtag tu byed du gzhug go// blo gros dang lhan dus gang dge ba'i tshes grangs la bris nas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams bka' stsal/
534a2(rgyud): to// na mo bud+d+ha ga/ na mo d+har+m+ma ya/ na maHsaM b+hA ya/ na maHsab+hA naM/ sa myaka saM bu d+d+ha ko TA nAM na mo mai trai ya/ pra mu khA nAM/ sar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA naM/ na maHsa myag+ha tA naM/ na maHsa myak+Sha ti pan+d+ha nAM/ na mo ar+ha tAM/ na mo rA gA mI nAM/ na maHsa
534a3(rgyud): kr-i hA bA mi nI/ na maHsho tI ban+d+ha nAM/ mamo mar+ha ta/ mar+d+ha tu/ a pa ra dzi ta hrid yaM/ mA brta li Sh+ya mi sa mya ka saM bud+d+ha b+hA Shi ta / ma nu mod ti/ de ba ga Ni sar+b+ba kar+m+ma kA raM/ shu d+haM/ kha bi tra ny+tsa bA/ maM ga l+yaM/ d+ha n+ye/ gu b+ha ka ra/ wa byaM k+Sho//
534a4(rgyud): g+hA sarba satwA nA~M/ de bany+tsa a pa rA dzi ta hr-i da laM/ mA brta li Sh+yA mi sar+b+ba bA ba/ pra sham nAM/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha n+yai/ d+hA nAM/ sarba gra ha bi nA shan+ti/ ni t+yA dza ya/ ka ri h+ye/ shak+ka s+yai ba a ba ra dzi tA pa Sha kr-i t+ya/ nA sha n+di tse ba/ rA dza/ aSh+Ti'i mu nA tsan+ti/
534a5(rgyud): kr-i t+yA kar+d+ha Ni/ be tA Do duHswa b+hA bi a tha sU ta na de ba/ dA na ba/ gan+d+haH/ lak+Sha rak+Sha sa/ pan+d+ha ga/ pAtAM/ kurba nu me ni t+yaM sa mAn+ta tsa/ te dzan e hi kA/ dwi ti la ka dz+wa rA tri tI s+ya kA/ tsa tur+tha ke b+h+yo/ rak+Sha laM bi Sha ma dz+wa ra kar+m+ma Ni khi ShaM b+huk+taM ga
534a6(rgyud): ba b+h+yo dz+ya brdza yi Sh+ya ti ya s+ya bA na b+ha ba ta gad+ho hi yan+te ya s+ya dA ka ra ka/ rat+na mA la i yaM te ShAM k+Shi pra ma ma ba ha te/ dza ya mar+tha/ kA mo la pa tar+the/ shrI kA mo la b+ha te shri yaM/ bi tha te/ ra Na/ saM gra he/ k+Shi pra mA bA te/ dza paM/ a tra
534a7(rgyud): bi t+yai/ pra ba kA mi / ra mA la ti/ khi p+pa taM/ tra ba tA lo ka mA tha hitsiSh+Tha matrA nu ba d+ha traM/ tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha na ka ri bi pu la ka ri ya sha ka ri / bid+ha ka ri a yun+ta ti a lak+Shi pra sa ma ni d+hi ni rmA n+ya bi bar+d+ha ni ba shI ka ri/ sarba gra ha/ nak+Sha dza/
534b1(rgyud): ba sha / brti ni me/ d+hA dza na nI/ su tra dza na ni pa ri bA ra ba d+h+ya ni/ A gun+na ni/ prI ti ka ri/ dzam+b+ha ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ a mo ha shak+ti kany+tsa na/ mA la gA hA si mya/ ka ra Ni sar+b+ba kA li kA la hA bi gra hA/ bi bA da pra sha ma ni/ ba ra tsakra/
534b2(rgyud): ni bA ra Ni pa ra sai n+ya stam+b+ha ni tsit+ta nirma lI ka ra Ni/ sar+b+ba pA pa pra shra ma ni sarba kilpi Sha nA sha ni swA hA natsu Tu tsu Tu/ tu Tu tu TuT mu Tu mu Tu swA hA sar+b+ba de ba a nu dz+nyA te sA hA sar+b+bA nA ga saM rak+Shi te swA hA/ oM ni ri pa T+ya/
534b3(rgyud): ha na ha na phaT/ da ha da he phaT/ ba tsa ba tsa phaT/ le ShAM bi d+ha Shan+ti bi sha ma tsit+tA yan+ti/ ha ha ni/ kA khorba kurban+ti/ ka ra yan+ti/ kr-i tany+tsa a b+ha lA nu mo da ni tha ba phaT swA hA/ ag+ni s+yAm+b+ha yA mi bi ShaM shas+t+ra yu da kau tsau
534b4(rgyud): sarba duSh+TAM sarba byA d+hi ta/ tsan dr-i dza na lA mi hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i 'dab mas khrus byas te rin po che'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan pa las thams cad byed pa 'di ni rtag tu srung ba byed pa'o//
534b5(rgyud): bzhin nyid du'ang gro ga'i 'dab ma la bris pa 'am/ gang du 'am/ der yang rung ste/ la la'i bgegs srung ba dang / bsod nams mchog dang / sdig pa dang / dri ma 'joms pa dang / g.yul du 'am/ rtsod pa 'am/
534b6(rgyud): thams cad du rgyal ba sbyin zhing dge ba'o// gang 'di 'dzin pa la rig pa zhi ba bris pa dang / skyes pas rtag tu klog pa de la 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// klog pa dang 'dzin pa thams cad rtag tu srung bar byed do//
534b7(rgyud): gsang ba pa rnams kyis yongs su skyong bar byed do// cho ga'i rgyal po 'di rtag tu mthar byed pa ni ji ltar rin po ches spras pa'i 'phreng ba steng du rnam par 'bar ba'i dpal gang yin pa de rig pa 'dzin par byed do// 'di la gdon de rnam
535a1(rgyud): par nyams par byed do// nad rnams kyang mi 'byung ngo // bu dang tsha bo rnams kyang 'phel lo// 'khor bzang po can rnam par gnas so// rig pa 'di ni thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa
535a2(rgyud): rnams kyis sems can la phan pa'i don gyi ched dang / byis pa rnams khyad par du bsrung bar bya ba'i ched do// lha dang / rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang phyogs bcu rnam
535a3(rgyud): su kun nas gzigs par mdzad do// dge ba'i don rnam par 'phel ba dang / sdig pa thams cad kun nas zad par 'gro ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa rnams dang / nyes par byas pa rnams las kyang grol te/ 'dir the tshom med do//
535a4(rgyud): ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi ma'i gzungs so// / de nas 'di las rgyud 'dir byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid gsungs so// 'di lta ste/ gtsug pud dang / go cha
535a5(rgyud): dgar ba dang / snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po zhes pa ste rnam pa lnga'o// rtsa ba'i rig pa la ni drug cur bshad do// don thams cad sgrub pa de la dang por re zhig ra bi ta dang / bi Ni ka dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthar thug pa rnams so//
535a6(rgyud): mthe'u chung khab kyi rnam pas nges par btsir ba'i gung mo dang mthe bong dag tu bshad do// 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gang ba'i phyag rgya'o zhes rnam par grags te/ don thams cad sgrub pa'o// rig pa tshim par byed pa/
535a7(rgyud): lamathe'u chung gnyis bsnun par bya ste/ rnam par tshim par 'gyur ro// lhag par gnas pa ni mthe bong gnyis ka khab kyi rnam pas so sor g.yo bar bya ste/ snying po rnam par shes par bya'o// bstod pa kho na'i ming gis so//
535b1(rgyud): nye ba'i snying po la mthe bong gnyis 'di lta ste/ nang kho na'i khu tshur ro// mthe chung lcags sgrog gi cha'i sgra'i dang / sdigs mdzub kha phye ba khab tu byas pa 'di mi go cha'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid de/ rtag tu bdag nyid la/
535b2(rgyud): rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// sdigs mdzub gnyis nges par btsir nas gung mo dkris te khab kyi rnam pas bsgrigs pa 'di ni gtsug pud kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan ma ste/ bdag nyid kyis gtsug pud bcings pa'i dus su rab tu sbyar bar
535b3(rgyud): bya'o// slar yang khu tshur bcings nas sdigs mdzub kha phye ba khab kyi rnam pa ste/ 'di ni bzlas pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid do// de lta bu kho na yongs su gyur par sdigs mdzub khab kyi rnam pas ra ba'i phyag rgya bya'o//
535b4(rgyud): khu tshur bcings nas sdigs mdzub gnyis lcags sgrog gi rnam pa ste/ mtshan ma 'di ni dam tshig srung ba'i phyag rgya'o// rkang pa mnyam pa la g.yas pa'i rkang pa rab tu bzhag nas gar gyi sbyor bas yongs su bskor bar
535b5(rgyud): bya ste/ gzhan du bskor nas lag pa gnyis kas rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i las sbyar ro// dpral bar yang las thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya bcings pa dang / bzlas pa'i dus
535b6(rgyud): dang nyal ba'i dus dang / rnam pa gzhan du'ang rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// gdon gyi las dang las thams cad la rtsa ba'i phyag rgya rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de
535b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas ral pa gyen brjes kyi rgyud phyi mar spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rjes su brtse bas bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma sgrub pa'i don du phyag rgya bcing ba gsungs so//
536a1(rgyud): de la 'di rnams yang dag sbyar bya ba// yams ni bde bar bya dang mkhas pa phyag 'tshal ba// rig gsum la yang thun mong phyag rgya ni// de rnams nye bar drang ba phyag 'tshal phyag rgya ni//
536a2(rgyud): g.yas pa'i sor mo'i tshigs la tshigs kyi rtse mo kun+tu/ phyag rgya nyid ni rjes su bcings par gyis shig dang // rtag tu gsol ba 'debs la gtsang ma gsol 'debs pa'i// phyag rgya de bzhin pon dag la supa
536a3(rgyud): sor mo yi// tshigs rnams tshigs su byas nas rjes su yi rang bya// mchod pa thams cad kho na gtsang mus rtag tu ni// mchod pa rtag tu rjes su yi rang byed pa dang // sor mo rnams kyi bdud rtsi thams cad yang dag ldan// tshig
536a4(rgyud): kyis rtse mo mthe bong snying por yang dag ldan// 'di rnams rgyal ba yi ni phyag rgyar 'gyur// sor mo'i rtse mo yang dag sbyar ba gung mo dang // mthe bong gnyis kar gang du mi 'gyur phyag rgya yis// bzlas pas mchog sbyin yid
536a5(rgyud): kyekyi bzlas pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nas yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams thams cad rang rang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs pa'i mtshan ma ston par mdzad bzhin pas slar bzhengs pa'i mtshan ma mdzad do//
536a6(rgyud): de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa dang / sems can rab tu 'gul ba dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa 'dir rang 'gul bas skrag cing me tog gi char 'bab pa dang / bar
536a7(rgyud): snang la spyod pa'i 'byung po bye bas thams cad du 'gro ba'i gdug pa rab tu btul lo// / de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la yongs su
536b1(rgyud): zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu des na ral pa gyen brdzes zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ rtog pa'i rgyal po zhes bya
536b2(rgyud): bar yang zung zhig gi spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ rig pa dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i mdo sde zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i le'u rab 'byam
536b3(rgyud): zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ thabs kyi spyod pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam gyis de rnams yang dag par
536b4(rgyud): ldan par 'gyur/ chos du zhig gis lhags par gnas pa lags/ byams pa des gang chos bcus 'di lta bu mthong ba kho na ste/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang /
536b5(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / yi dgas la sogs pa rnams kyis kun bsrungs par 'gyur ba dang / gzungs mnyam pa'i sems zab mo'i bzod
536b6(rgyud): ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos la kun tu gnas pas ji srid du 'dri bar 'gyur ba dang / bris nas 'chang bar 'gyur ba dang / glegs bam du gyur par byas nas mchod par 'gyur ba dang / tshe dang / nad
536b7(rgyud): med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / bde ba phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / bde 'gror 'gro ba ste/ yon tan mang po nyid dang / phan yon chen po nyid kyis chos kyi rnam grangs/ lha dang bcas pas byin gyis brlabs pa/
537a1(rgyud): #/ rig pa dang sngags chen po 'dus pa/ 'khor ba'i pha rol tu song ba/ bdag gis kyang yang dag par rgyu skar dang / mtshan mo dang / nyin mo dang / zla ba dang / le
537a2(rgyud): bde ba'i ched du mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro// dge ba bcu'i las kyis lam dang grags pa 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ral pa gyen brjes 'chang ba po dang / khyim du gzhag
537a3(rgyud): pa dang / rab tu byung ba rnams la'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
537a4(rgyud): mkha' lding dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' 'o// ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi ma rdzogs so// /
537a5(rgyud): 'di ni jo bo chen po a ti sha'i phyag dpe rA sgreng nas dka' thub chen pos gdan drangs nas/ shAkya'i dge slong rin chen grub kyis 'bar ba'i lo// cho 'phrul chen po rta'i zla ba'i tshes bco lnga la rdzogs par
537a6(rgyud): bsgyur ba'i yi ge pa ni/ lo tsa ba chen po de nyid kyi zhabs drung du nye bar gnas pa/ shAkya'i dge slong bsod nams grub kyis bgyis so// paN+Di ta la ma gtugs shing // dpe dbang 'grel pa ma rnyed pas/
537a7(rgyud): sgra don log par gyur srid na// mkhas pa rnams kyis bcos par gsol//
